In the 3 weeks I have been out and about I have had to activate the hotspot option on my phone to allow my kindle to hook up and download a paper. It has worked great. It certainly beats the extra cost of getting 4G capable and the monthly plan addition. So think about it when you are buying. I also bought the 89.00 accidental coverage plan. I couldn't find a cover I like right off the bat and I had the previous misfortune with my other Kindle. I recommend buying the insurance. I did find a good cover for a great price if you are not a hardcore road warrior extreme athlete. CaseCrown Bold Standby Pro Case , it is great and for some reason it was not coming up in searches when I was buying my Kindle.

Reviews.Title: ANY KINDLE IS A GREAT BUY, BUT THE FIRE HDX, .....NOTHING CAN CAN COMPARE TO IT. NOT EVEN A SAMSUNG! Sorry!
Reviews.Author: Carol Pfeiffer "Foster Mom/Want to Adopt"
Reviews.Content: I have three Kindles. First one I got was A 7 inch Kindle Fire HD. Now I have two Kindle Fire HDX's which are also totally awesome. A Laptop cant hold a candlestick to any Kindle. So if I could get them to Print what I need too. I would sell the PC and the Laptops. Period. If you want something well made for your hard-working money, then you need Kindle. I have had two others, and neither complare. This is the tablet for you, your family, your dog, cat, gorilla, grandma, grandpa, auntie and uncle. Get them while they are hot. Believe me!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful tablet, fast, beautiful picture, Love it, and you can change sim cards
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Pohle
Reviews.Content: the Kindle HDX is really fabulous.  I had posted a review that you cannot change sim cards (necessary for overseas travel) but I was wrong.  Sim card is pretty easy to remove.  Am excited to get used to using this new beautiful and fast tablet.  Have a lot of things to learn as I switch from my ipad but since I read my kindle app a LOT am excited to use the real thing.

Reviews.Title: Much hand-wringing, teeth ginnding,  and late nights at Apple - Me Thinks ;)
Reviews.Author: Rabid Reader
Reviews.Content: Use your IPad for a doggy toy - this is much better! Thanks Amazon, you knocked it out of the park ;)

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Amazon.com Fan
Reviews.Content: Beautiful, light, thin, fast, easy to use...the new Kindle HDX seamlessly incorporated all my videos, magazines and books from my other Kindle devises within seconds of the very simple and short setup. With an Amazon.com Prime account, shopping for everything from books to space heaters and managing my content and account has never been easier. Using Bluetooth headphones and keyboards makes going wireless more than a joy---it's liberating, especially when using the treadmill. I installed the "Lastpass" application, so logging on to banking then switching to Amazon.com and other websites requires just one password entry and one tap between sites, plus added security. I wish I could buy everyone in the world a Kindle Fire with free WiFi and cellular coverage like the roads; it would singlehandedly end starvation and poverty. Imagine the possibilities of a world with free people armed with Kindle Fires, free access to roads and internet with fair trade practices in exchange for our corrupt governments and their nuclear hellfire coverage. Thank you, Amazon.com.

Reviews.Title: no flash player
Reviews.Author: Lynn D. Nieto "nietold"
Reviews.Content: wish i could use it with my games on facebook but since there is no flash player that is not possible,  i still think there is another way to get around that but it is just not available

Reviews.Title: replaced my HD with HDX, perfect!!
Reviews.Author: Sarah "thebookpusher"
Reviews.Content: I love the improvements!  Moving the charger to the left of the landscape side is perfect! Controls on the back remove the chance to accidentally push them....changing the whole "e-reader" to more of a tablet....perfect.  an integrated video player that shows YouTube....perfect.  smaller size, just enough to fit better in my purse, perfect. Lighter, perfect.  Love you, Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: doudou
Reviews.Content: In spite of spending 3 hrs. speaking to various Kindle Mayday "experts", I have been unable to send e-mail with my Kindle. It only receives them. Bottom line from the "experts": they "have never heard of this problem before", 2) it must be my server, wi-fi, etc... problem, not a Kindle problem, so see "your IT guys". I did. Problem not solveable: the device is unable to recognize the wifi connection. I try from home and from work. Nobody seem to be able to help, even our IT people. One of the Kindle "experts" hung up on me, one was very kind (Michel) and spent one hour trying to help, unsuccessfully. I am going to return it and get an iPad.

Reviews.Title: Amazon.com videos
Reviews.Author: L. Panchula
Reviews.Content: I am extremely disappointed in my new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9.  When using my Kindle to browse the Amazon.com website for products to purchase, I ran across the problem of not being able to view product videos.  After several phone calls with Amazon customer service, I was informed that the Kindle is simply not compatible with the Amazon.com website.  If the Amazon Kindle does not even work with the Amazon website, I hate to think what else it will not be compatible with.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME TABLET!
Reviews.Author: Glenn
Reviews.Content: Simply the best ... FAST! FAST! FAST!. Smooth scrolling...amazing resolution. I went into Netflix, Showtime, HBOgo, Starz, etc. and watched some shows, to test it out, they all performed flawlessly. Crisp, sharp picture. Great depth of Dolby sound.Then tried Facebook, it opened up and worked smooth as silk while I gave it a spin.Book reading is great! Played with all the settings and let it read part of 'Enders Game' to me in several different voices, male and female. British, Australian, United States. It was fun!And I did most of it through my bluetooth headphones that took only a moment to connect. It sounded incredible. Went to the store...searched the web... played some games! Every bit of it is fun. I have already ordered 3 more for the rest of the family.I was a bit worried about the blue screen issue that the 7 inch has...but voila. Nothing! Literally nothing! Picture perfect! I love this tablet. Our family has every generation of Ipad, cept' for the the latest 'air.' We have early Kindle Fires. 4 iphone 5's. 5 laptops, and 3 desktops. And the list goes on. (Large family) And of all the devices. This is my favorite. I can get in bed, put on the headphones and play, listen, read, watch movies or surf. At one point, I had a wrestling match with my 11 year old. She wanted to try it so bad. Finally gave it to her. Had to trick her to snatch it back an hour later. She watched "YouTube" videos, with my headphones on and was laughing up a storm. This thing turned me into a kid again.Prime is great for a media junkie.INCREDIBLE TABLET! Thanks AMAZON.

Reviews.Title: Mayday and Prime Downloads a disappointment
Reviews.Author: Patrick Baude "pbaude"
Reviews.Content: The ability to download prime instant videos was the deciding factor in my purchase.  When the HDX arrived, I successfully downloaded 6 1080p movies.  One week later when I tried to download another movie all my previous downloads were gone form the "Videos" module.  The kicker is that they still showed as taking up 40+ GB of space.  So no movies and no space for more movies.  This was the start of my experience with Amazon support for the HDX using "Mayday".After confirming my issue to the Mayday rep, she quickly said that she needed to transfer me to another department.  It would've been nice if this stayed within the kindle mayday world, but alas my support call was moved to the phone.  I guess mayday is really only for technology neophytes and not for resolving any real problems.  When I was talking to the third different department to which I was transfered my cellphone call was dropped.  I decided to move this inquiry to the email world.  The HDX support asked me to download some log files (by typing ;dm in the home search) to my laptop for emailing.  Alas the zipped logs exceeded the 6MB amazon email limit so I had to unzip and repackage the logs to be sent in 5 separate emails.  I stopped trying to solve the issue and returned the kindle when I found out that the email that Amazon told me to reply to was a donotreply address.I went with the kindle because I was willing to accept the kindle-ized version of android as long as everything worked smoothly and I coudl enjoy the amazon content.  But unfortunately the opportunity cost of the time I've spent in the first week re-downloading videos and working with Amazon support negated any price savings I may have enjoyed versus an iPad.I'm now 3 days into enjoying my Retina iPad mini and am much much happier.  I may be poorer in terms of $, but I am richer in terms of time that I can use to earn more $ or enjoy the tablet.

Reviews.Title: Boxed up and returned the very same day I received it.
Reviews.Author: 2Wanna
Reviews.Content: Every function I tried on the HDX 8.9" resulted in me rebooting it several times to get them to work.  It wouldn't download a magazine nor any of my books from the cloud.  It took TWO reboots to finally get those to download/open. It timed out and then gave me the "web page not found" error message several times when trying to open Facebook...reboot again.  Five minutes into a video it froze and then lost connection with WiFi (I have U-Verse.)  All this trial and testing was done along side my year old Fire HD 8.9" which performed flawlessly and always has.  After forty-five minutes of rebooting and frustration, I requested a return.

Reviews.Title: poor battery life...problem solved
Reviews.Author: Leonard L. Zaikowski
Reviews.Content: I really want to love this tablet but I'm having an issue with battery discharging when the unit is off. I fully charge it and don't use it for 2 or 3 days then pick it up to use it and the battery is completely dead. This has happened twice in the past week. I have the Amazon cover that shuts it off when you close it and I make sure no apps are running. Am I doing something to cause this?Found out you have to press and HOLD the power button down to fully shut off. I now love this tablet! 5 star.

Reviews.Title: This Tablet is amazing
Reviews.Author: D. S.
Reviews.Content: I believe this Kindle Fire 8.9" Tablet is the most advanced tablet on the market.I own three other tablets  including an Acer 8" quad core 4.2 Android and thistablet leaves them all in the dust. The 8 mp camera with auto focus is excellentand I used the flash when depositing a check or scanning a barcode. This is thelightest and highest resolution on the market and I am very happy with it. I findit a pleasure to watch TV and movies with no buffering and stunning graphics.This tablet is a great price and a joy to use. My only recommendation forimprovement is move the volume and on button to the previous location sothey are easier to access.. PS the mayday live assist is first rate to solve problems.Please continue to  stay ahead the competition in the tablet field..

Reviews.Title: Great tablet, but still ended up returning it.
Reviews.Author: tony
Reviews.Content: The tablet itself is wonderful.  It's a great size; thin, light.  The screen is crystal clear and vibrant.  The processor is quick, and everything is snappy.  All that being said, there are two (kind of three) reasons I ended up returning it.1) For me, the biggest thing is the lack of the standard Android play app store.  I know a bunch of other reviews have pointed this out, but I thought I could deal with it.  Honestly, I couldn't.  I use a lot of Google services (gmail, drive, maps, etc.), and none of these are available in the Amazon app store.  Some of it you can do web based, but some of it won't work correctly.  I really wanted to learn to love the Amazon store, but I just couldn't.  Some of my favorite games are not available either.2) I purchased the 'no ad' version, but there are still ads on the tablet.  They are not on the lock screen, but they are under the 'frequently used' app section.  It is SUPER annoying.  "Oh, we see you like Facebook, but have not downloaded Pinterest.  Click here and download it."  No, I don't want to see ads for other apps on my tablet.  It's incredibly obtrusive.  You can click and hold, and then select 'remove ad', but it will come back within 24 hours.  There is no way to get rid of these things.2.5) When using the tablet, every once and a while, the screen would go black while I was actively touching the display.  I hit the mayday button once (awesome service by the way), and they told me to do a hard restart.  That would fix the problem for a good while, but every once and a while, it would need a hard restart again (kind of like a computer).  I wouldn't return the tablet just for this, but it's worth noting.All in all, if you are not a heavy Google user, and don't have favorite apps in your current app store, you would love this tablet.  For me, it just wasn't a great fit.  Amazon's customer service was amazing as always, and the return was no issue at all.

Reviews.Title: So Far So Good...
Reviews.Author: PIttsburgh Troll
Reviews.Content: This review is for a HDX 8.9, 4g+WiFI, 64GB. Also note that I am a Prime member.Pros:-Screen is excellent-Silk is a vast improvement (I had the initial Fire, so it is a huge leap in performance)-Very intuitive layout.-Excellent customer service.  My screen started to show purple and blue streaks, and after calling support, they agreed to replace it without hesitation (they send a new one and you have 30 days to return the problem unit)-4G performance is very good; pages load almost as fast as with WiFi-Integration with Amazon cloud is well done.  Most of your Amazon music purchases are available, and if you use the Amazon Cloud Player, you can download music from iTunes or most other formatsNeeds improvement:-While Mayday response is very fast, I found there is still a lack of knowledge.  For example, I asked why my magazine subscriptions could not be viewed any longer in text format, and the representative just said they would note that for future reference.  However, purely by accident, I found that all you have to do is double click on the article in the native format and it switches to text.-I find that WiFi needs to be stopped and started occasionally.-There still appears to be a lot of apps that are very buggy.  Read reviews before you download, even if free.-Note that some videos are not downloadable.  I don't find this an issue as the selection is expanding, and I doubt I will ever even scratch the surface of the Prime video library.Overall, I am pleased with this tablet and would recommend it to those that are looking for a media tablet.  As far as my 4 rating, I believe that is fair given my "needs improvement" section.

Reviews.Title: froze up
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Twice e new kindle froze.  Nothing I tried got it back to nor.al.  So far that's the only issue.  Hope no other issue.  How can I contact you?  Ge

Reviews.Title: The 3rd Tablet in Our House and WOW!
Reviews.Author: waldo_OH
Reviews.Content: After two iPads, this little gem is dynamite, a much better value and as applications get added it will continue to be a better and better value.

Reviews.Title: Very Poor Battery charging
Reviews.Author: L. Snyder
Reviews.Content: I bought this after getting 4 replacement Kindle Fire HD 8.9 replacements within 4 weeks for the same poor battery charging issue. I was disappointed when the HDX charged to 75% and stopped. I tried all the standard resetting, turning off power features, using different outlets, buying another fast kindle power charger, none of it worked. I read reviews that some others are having the same exact problem. I loved my kindle, but now I'm out money paid for accessories. My friends I-pad, while heavier, charges and works fine and longer. Please Amazon, fix the battery issue!

Reviews.Title: Made me a believer!
Reviews.Author: Kandi Perry
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my Kindle Fire HDX!!!  I was hesitant about purchasing a tablet--did I really need one, would I use it since I have a lap top and desktop computer and smartphone?  A friend recommended the Kindle Fire over the IPad.  Now that I have it I can't imagine living without it!!  Not only is the display crystal clear--I can't believe how clear and vivid it is!!  I use it to read my magazines I subscribe to--magazines that otherwise sit on the shelf collecting dust.  I also use it to read books everywhere, anytime!  It's also nice to lay in bed watching things on Netflix and Hulu.  With Prime, I also have an awesome variety of apps and videos I can use at no cost.  Over Christmas I was able to compare this to my cousins new IPad.  I'm glad I went with this product!!!  Not only was it lighter in weight, had a clearer picture, worked faster, but things I got at no cost, they had to be paid for on the Ipad!I highly recommend this product!!!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9", HDX Display, Wi-Fi, 16 GB
Reviews.Author: Sgt.
Reviews.Content: Being an old man I was not sure if I would like it or if I could learn to use it but I have down loaded many free books and into reading much more now !

Reviews.Title: One of my favorite Toys
Reviews.Author: C. Bayne "katluvr_1"
Reviews.Content: I named him Sherman - he of the Wayback machine that can take you anywhere and any time.  I also have a Galaxy Tab 2 7-inch.  I wasn't going to get a Kindle Fire because I didn't want to be locked into the Kindle ecosystem.  Of course, I bought most of my apps and all of my music through Amazon anyway.  I knew that I could get apps from other sources, and I have.  So yay to the ecosystem!The reason I finally bought Sherman is because a) the Mayday button, which I haven't used yet but it's nice to know it's there, b) the reviews the screen got - and they were right - it's gorgeous, and c) Amazon did an extra $20 smile donation to HALO - Helping Animals Live On the day I bought it.  I was really going to wait.I love this!  I have the Origami case, which is perfect.  I play games, read books (though I like my Paperwhite better for that), and surf the web.  I decided on the bigger screen because I have the smaller Galaxy Tab, and though it's great, I wanted to be able to see better.  I have watched a movie, and I love the X-ray feature.  I love X-ray for music too!  Nice to know what they are really saying.The speakers are decent.  The screen is beautiful and very responsive.  I'm used to the carousel.  This was a great purchase.

Reviews.Title: Bought for Spouse
Reviews.Author: Fredddd
Reviews.Content: But now I want it!  I have a Kindle HD 7 inch.  I've not really had complaint with it except occasionally slow/sticking browser etc.  But for watching movies and t.v shows, no problem whatsoever. UNTIL I turned the Kindle HDX 8.9 on!  Now I realize the 8.9 is larger of course, but the picture is absolutely better on the HDX 8.9,  More light, the colors more bright, crystal clear, awesome!The Silk browser on the HDX is much faster than on the HD.  When I compare the two on the same page of a site, definitely the HDX looks better.  I wasn't expecting such a change with the HDX since I hadn't been unhappy with my HD.I had attached tape along the speakers of the HD to help point the sound toward me. (Don't laugh, they make tapes in lovely colors now!) With the Origami cover on the HDX, it directs the sound from the top, straight to you.  There is a difference without the origami case.....( better sound- with the case.)The sound is loud enough for me, without using an add on speaker.I like the touch buttons on the HDX using the origami case.  You don't have to look, you can tell by feel which is round and which is a rocker type button in case you forget which button is which. So of course, you can also without the origami case.I hope next year Amazon comes out with a 12 inch Kindle Fire HDX with as good of specs and hardware as the HDX.I love, love, love that all I have to do with a Kindle device is- turn it on.  I don't have to register, fill out forms, emails etc.  It's automatically done for you.  I love convenience.  Don't have to remember different passwords or log ons etc.I have  watched and read reviews comparing an Apple device to this Amazon/Android device.  The HDX beats those Apples in almost every way.  Yeah maybe Amazon doesn't have one million apps.  I'm never in my lifetime going to use one million apps, so that 'point' is senseless.I love that I can go camping without internet access available, no 3 or 4 G around, and still watch movies on the KindleHD/HDX!  And now we can download prime movies and shows too!I don't have use for an 'office' type device and am not a big gamer.  I use this to consume movies etcMy spouse has an Windows 8 laptop - absolutely detests.  So I got  the Kindle HDX- no logging on, no passwords to put in, open the cover swipe and go.Sure laptops have their use, and I still have an older windows version......but that's going to be changing with these tablet computers that are easy to use...Yes we have apple devices.  They are declining in specs but leaving prices high and high for accessories.Don't regret one bit buying the Kindle HDX 8.9 over an apple device.I use a tablet to check weather, surf the internet  and watch movies and t.v.  And the Kindle Fire HDX is excellent for doing all those things.Spouse says- "it's Awesome, neatest thing since sliced bread"UPDATE:I did order another 8.9! The picture on this Fire HDX 8.9 is better than on my huge smart tv on some of the shows I watch.  The color and disctinction is better on the HDX. Movies are actually awesome on the Fire HDX and our smart t.v.  But some shows are better on the 8.9.The HDX is so lightweight! Easy to hold with one hand. I use it with and without the origami cover. A pure pleasure. The best picture I've seen on a device and yes I have Fire HD, Apple devices and now HDX (2 of them).  I didn't choose another apple, but I did get another HDX 8.9!I did also upgrade the router to an Asus ac router as well since the HDX has the new 802.11 ac /b/g/n , although I had a good router, we have so many devices we were losing connection on different devices, at different times.  Added more bandwith from the ISP as well.All is smooth now!Also added the origami cover and once again, the sound is better with the origami cover on it as it sends the sound forward to you, instead of up and out...Easy to get the HDX in and out of.  Does add some weight, but it's worth it.Those who try to compare an Apple to an HDX are deceiving people.  the HDX doesn't 'stretch' the screen to make it appear bigger and apple devices do...the old 4.3 instead of the 16.9 format.  HDX is absolutely the better more vibrant, accurate color, better camera by far etc.The old Fire HD still works fine, it's in the laundry room now so I can continue watching while hanging/folding laundry, without having to carry the HDX with me.Is that the sound of someone being spoiled?If your looking for a device for watching and consuming content you can't do better than the HDX.

Reviews.Title: Edited:  Great hardware with several software annoyances
Reviews.Author: J. P.
Reviews.Content: I had the 8.9 HD before this, which I liked, but was laggy and a bit slow.  When I read the specs on this baby, I pre-ordered it along with the Origami case.  No regrets whatsoever.  Performance is fantastic...my wife has the iPad Retina (not the Air) and this is better in almost every way, and way cheaper to boot.  I also have an Android tablet so I realize the Amazon app store is not yet on the same level as the Google or Apple app stores.  I have found all the apps I need though and like the Amazon media features that are only available on the Kindle line.  I don't know of a pure Android tablet that can match this for quality, battery life, and performance at this time.  The Tegra 4 models are disappointing, it looks like Snapdragon is the processor to have right now.I'm hoping they make a 10.1 inch version of this...same resolution and processor just a bigger screen and battery would be fantastic for those of us without great "close up" vision.EDIT:  4/6/2014  OK, after living with the HDX for a while it has one pretty serious flaw, and a few annoyances as well.  The flaw:  Text scaling on websites is terrible....everything is TINY, with lots of white space usually left on the sides.  On some sites this is easily fixed by zooming.  Other sites do not allow zooming and you can't do anything about it.  This is not a function of the screen size...my 2nd generation Nexus 7 and my wifes iPad Mini w/Retina display do not have this issue.  I can't find any way to increase the default scaling.  Sometimes a green "Reading View" button pops up on the browser, which opens the page full screen (and scaled properly) and works great.  Unfortunately this option is only available on some pages.The annoyances:  The Silk browser is frustrating.  Some sites behave very strangely, like zillow.com.  The keyboard is terrible compared to the Asus keyboard on my Asus memo pad FHD.  (to be fair this was an issue on the Fire HD 8.9 from last year as well).  Amazon does not offer you the option of changing the keyboard or browser.  I may try side-loading a different browser.

Reviews.Title: Kudos to Amazon!
Reviews.Author: Stephanie A. Stark
Reviews.Content: Received my first Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 on 12/27/13.  Immediately noticed that it would not charge to 100%.  Highest charge it achieved was about 87%.  Contacted MayDay & Amazon tech support, tried their suggestions, but it still would not charge completely.  Sunday 12/29 contacted Amazon requesting replacement.  RMA immediately issued and new unit sent out.  Supposed to be delivered 1/2, but was on my doorstep 12/31/2013--fully 48 hours early and just before a major holiday.The new unit is awesome!  Georgeous screen, charges fully and even seems to use up the battery much slower than the first one did. Really happy with the purchase, and very pleased with Amazon's customer service--as always, they're great!

Reviews.Title: WOW! Just WOW!!!
Reviews.Author: Emsy Van Wyck
Reviews.Content: This is my third Kindle Fire. I've had them since the first tablet became available and thought that the step up to the Kindle Fire HD 7" a year and a half ago was good. BUT the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" is in a class by itself. I absolutely love it and find reading on the larger screen a pleasure with the super resolution. The processor is both fast and responsive. I don't experience the crashes that were becoming ever more common as I tried to check Facebook and read a book with the HD.I'll admit to having a problem when it was first delivered as it wouldn't fully charge. And the reason I purchase Kindles from Amazon was quickly apparent. Without question they shipped me a replacement making sure it was scheduled for priority next day service (I received the Kindle for Christmas and the replacement arrived on New Year's Eve - that's service!) Luckily it seems the problem was actually the charger and not the original Kindle's battery, so I'm shipping the replacement back (I don't want to relinquish my new best friend).So would I recommend that you purchase a Kindle HDX - absolutely! I really love the size of the 8.9", but would guess that the 7" is equally superb. BUT the one thing that is a great benefit with the larger Kindle is the rear camera. I love it. The one thing I regretted was while practically having my Kindle attached to my side, it didn't have a camera like the iPad or iPhone to capture those spontaneous moments. Now I have the best of every world.So, purchase from Amazon with the assurance that they stand behind their products and the Kindle HDX is a product to be proud of! This is offered by a "professional reader" who devours about 2-3 books a day for review. Believe me, you'll love it!

Reviews.Title: An excellent device...a worthy alternative to an Apple
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: As the owner of an iPad and the Kindle Fire HDX I wanted to give my honest opinion. I love the Kindle.The video quality is excellent and the sound is great. I also connected a blue tooth speaker easily.I play hidden object games and find them superb on the Kindle. I would like to see more Big Fish games for Android / Kindle.The movie download list is smaller than I would have thought. Hopefully that will improve.I loved my iPad and wanted to get the Mini but its price was just not acceptable. So I researched the Kindle and gave it a shot. There is absolutely nothing that I could do on the iPad that I can't do on the Kindle...and for much less.I heartily endorse the Kindle Fire HDX in both sizes. I might add that I already was an Amazon Prime member so the extra perks are nice for me. I am very happy with my choice.

Reviews.Title: Wow! Wow!
Reviews.Author: mystery lady
Reviews.Content: This is a great piece!! I'm loving it more and more every day! I'm 70 years old and some things are hard to get in this old head, but this so far is like falling off a log. I even used the live tech the other day and she was great! I set up every thing myself except the time. That's what I used the tech for. It's easy peasy! I have a kindle fire and everything just transferred over . I got the easy pay plan. I hope they still have it when you decide to purchase your Kindle fire HDX 8.9"HDX display, Wi-Fi, 16 " GB.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased!
Reviews.Author: Allan C.
Reviews.Content: I have noted negative reviews because of certain perceived shortcomings.  The latest selection of available apps in the Kindle App Store more than met my needs.  I was able to find and download every "Essential" app I wanted that was recommended on multiple web sites.  I understand that there is a "middle-man" web site to get to Google Play apps that have been previously purchased.  Whether all those apps will be HDX compatible is unknown but at least you can get to them.  HDMI out?  Right now there's no adapter cable solution as the HDX just doesn't provide native HDMI streaming but there is Miracast (available here on Amazon and HDX certified) that user reviews when using with the HDX are very positive.  Some issues with using Miracast with other devices but we're talking HDX here.  External storage/PC connectivity?  A microUSB to USB adapter cable works just fine with Windows 7 and I'm sure it would work equally well with an external USB drive or even a USB hub. Don't want to be tethered to a cable?  The are a couple of decent WiFi apps in the App Store that work to provide PC connectivity.  Keyboard too small?  I'm using a Logitech Bluetooth model that hooked up right away.  Charging issue?  Not on mine plus keep in mind that to extend battery life, remember to turn off your WiFi and 4G when you're done using it.  Had to do that with my old original 3G WiFi Kindle too.  I have the AT&T; 4G and really enjoy the abundant and free AT@T hotspots (at least here in the Southeast anyway).  There's a decent Outlook/Hotmail app that I use and although I wasn't happy with the Maps in the Google+ app, when I browse to Google maps via the Silk browser, everything works as I am used to including directions.  Speaking of Silk, I have no issues with it, including speed.  Skype? No problems.  YouTube? Haven't run across any clips that won't play.  I am completely pleased with my HDX and definitely recommend it.  Too bad you can't get the 64GB model if you want the AT&T; 4G LTE but considering that I can have external storage, the tradeoff for the free hotspots balances things out for me. Works great with my Epson WF-3540 wireless printer after getting a printer app from the App Store then downloading a couple of small drivers during setup (just follow the prompts). Final plus for me is that I can read in bed without a light on!  Yes a paperwhite would have been lots cheaper but the HDX has tons of extra capability.Update: Tried to connect to an external USB Hard Drive and that didn't work. That's fair I guess as Windows always installs drivers for whatever I connect via USB (including my HDX which then had full drag and drop capability). The tablet OS doesn't do that so I guess we'll have to wait till Seagate or some other manufacturer comes up with an app to support USB external drives. Until then, I am looking at wireless external drive solutions and have seen several HDX compatible ones on Amazon that I am considering.

Reviews.Title: Best purchase ever!!!
Reviews.Author: Snapdragon
Reviews.Content: Love..Love..my new Kindle fire HDX 8.9.  Have 32g...so fast and responsive!  So light and gorgeous display...clear and bright and great sound too!  I was suffering with another tablet bought last year..at twice the price with charging keyboard that was literally junk....ungodly s l o w.....but Kindle far outshines them all.  Very fast......Love it and thin enough with case too fit in my purse!  Not cumbersome..not too big..not too small....

Reviews.Title: Practically Perfect
Reviews.Author: Bradley N.
Reviews.Content: I have used many different electronic tools in my lifetime, from old PC's to laptops, tablets and smartphones, but none of them come anywhere close to fitting my needs and my lifestyle as my Kindle HDX. As a business tool, it is large enough and powerful enough to handle nearly any research, document management, scheduling or communication need. As a personal assistant, it works flawlessly to help me keep tabs on all of my social obligations and to stay in touch with friends and family. And as an entertainment center, the Kindle HDX is quite simply the best electronic device of any kind that I have ever owned, seen or heard about, especially with the added benefit of my Amazon Prime membership. Books, games, music and videos all at my fingertips anywhere and anytime, and with Amazon Prime, many are free or at deep discounts. There may be a better device out there someday, but when it comes, my bet is that it will be a Kindle.

Reviews.Title: My father in law cannot put it down
Reviews.Author: D. Yost
Reviews.Content: I purchased the HDX for my father in law who is 66 and not a tech person at all.  I was a little worried he wouldn't like it, but once we showed him what he could do he never put the thing down.  He even created a facebook account on the darn thing!He now switches between reading books and watching netflix on it all the time.  We also got him the Netgear push2TV device which allows him to watch netflix from the device on his TV wirelessly.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: JasonS
Reviews.Content: As the subject says I think the tablet is great.  The screen resolution is amazing and the ease of use and size make it easy to handle and operate.  The only thing I have noticed is the battery life seems to go quicker than I expected.  I have plugged it in to 100% and gone to bed and in the morning have woken up to it sitting at 87%.  I have turned off all the apps so they do not update and the Amazon tech advisers have told me it may be due to leaving the WiFi enabled over night.  By comparison, my 3rd gen iPad does not lose nearly as much battery so that was why I was trying to determine if I was not turning something off that should be to conserve the battery.  The only other obvious item is that there are not as many apps available as there are in other brands of tablets, but I am sure this will become better as time goes on.  Overall the HDX 8.9 is a great tablet and I would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Best Kindle ever!
Reviews.Author: southern boy 12
Reviews.Content: Wow! is a good way to start.  As an owner of one of the original Kindle Fire devices, I certainly know the quality and ease of use of the Kindle.  This new HDX is absolutely amazing.  If you are in the market for a great tablet and you are an Amazon fan, this device can't be beat.  Screen resolution, speed, ease of use, etc are all 5 stars.  I highly recommend the HDX.  I am extremely pleased with my purchase.  With my Amazon Prime subscription, it does everything I expect it to do.  Great job, Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Incredible Device
Reviews.Author: Kelly
Reviews.Content: Jeff Bezos keeps hitting home runs left and right. The Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is no exception.Pros:1. Super light. I meant his when I write it; we have a Kindle Fire HD 7" and this feels lighter than that (and this is the larger version). I've held the iPads (including the mini) and this device trumps them all.2. Way to go with the new power and volume buttons. They are recessed so you can feel them without looking on the side of the device.3. Power USB Placement: It's on the left side of the device now (the HD had it on the bottom which was awkward when you wanted to lay in bed and charge while watching Prime Instant Video.4. Speakers: Excellent placement (top of the device as opposed to the bottom). Sound quality is shockingly amazing for such a thin device.5. Cameras: Front and rear facing and the picture looks amazing.Haven't tried out much else yet but love it so far.Cons:1. They took away the micro USB port for HDMI. You have to use a mirror cast feature. Not sure yet if my TV is compatible. I'll check on that.Overall:Don't waste your time with an iPad or Samsung product. Amazon takes care of you in the tablet arena and gives you everything you need with this premium product at an incredible, rock-bottom price.

Reviews.Title: Christmas present to myself!
Reviews.Author: volebal1
Reviews.Content: I love it!  I got it to replace my computer on the go.  I wanted to start reading more books and the size of this makes it very easy.  The games are good to kill time.  I like the fact I can take pics of the grandkids and keep them on my kindle to show my friends.  I can check the weather, my bank accounts, read the paper and check my calender for events. AND with the Time Warner app I can watch another tv channel while the hubby watches his football games!  This will be my go to for travel, ball games, dr apts, and entertainment for the grandkids.  Easy to operate and fun to use - even for a senior!

Reviews.Title: Best Electronic Device of the Year
Reviews.Author: Jeff Casey
Reviews.Content: My new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" is my favorite device. This is the best reader for e-books AND audio books AND you can watch all of your Amazon digital videos on it. You can also load all of your mp3 music on to it. The only thing that I would add might be a small memory card reader for expanding your available memory beyond 64GB. It is compatible with just about all of the Android apps. However, I would recommend one of the new mobile security apps early on to prevent you from downloading garbage... Personal favorites are Lookout Security and Bitdefender. If I could only have one device on a desert island with electricity (and, er, internet) this would definitely be it~!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Riley
Reviews.Content: I only got to have a 30 day trial of this beautiful device. It truly is worth every penny. It' just so light and the screen is so sharp almost hurts your eyes.(in a good way) It definitely is better than an Ipad  Air for just price alone but all it's features too. I work with electronics as a job and we carry Apple products and only thing it has on this device is a bit bigger. Other than that this device is faster smoother and sharper. Plus it has very good sound for such a thin light machine. I would definitely pick this up if your looking at something under $400 you won't be disappointed. Plus like everyone probably has seen on T.V. it ahs the mayday feature which shows how good Amazon is with there customer service. So quit reading this and BUY NOW!

Reviews.Title: Nothing Compares
Reviews.Author: Tanya D. Williams
Reviews.Content: The latest kindle...WOW! Love, Love, Love this device. The weight, screen size, graphics and options are exceptional. It definitely competes with the other tablets in the market. Excellent buy.

Reviews.Title: Amazon definitely got this right!!!!!
Reviews.Author: B. Thurier "soothsayer"
Reviews.Content: Very impressive piece of technology!!! I have been a huge Amazon user for years now. I have owned every type of Kindle since the very first e-reader came on the scene. I was debating between the HDX and the Google Nexus 7. I have to believe I made the right choice since I get all my books and movies and music with my Amazon Prime membership .This tablet is very smooth and fast in every task I put it through. Nice and thin and lightweight. This was my Christmas present to myself and I am very, very happy with this purchase. I will be taking it over to my brother's house on Christmas and compare it to the iPad mini he just bought for his wife. I think he might be regretting his decision.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE KINDLE FIRE HDX
Reviews.Author: T. vanburen
Reviews.Content: My entire Family loves it! we have so many apps and cnnot put it down! I take it on the go as well. i read text, I check emails, play candy crush and watch Scandal on ABC.com!

Reviews.Title: My Third Kindle! Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 64GB
Reviews.Author: Prolific Reader
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd kindle and by far the best! The graphics are amazing. The processor is fast and it is lightweight. Sorry IPad you are a distant 2nd.

Reviews.Title: BEST GADGET I EVER BOUGHT
Reviews.Author: Linda Black
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle!!  It has gone beyond my expectations.  I am not at all technically gifted and I am doing amazingly well with it.  I have used the help button and it is magical.  Each time they have given me what I needed to master my problem or answer my question.I can now email, facebook,  take photos and even print from my Kindle.  I am very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Ron Maron
Reviews.Content: Ready to use as soon as opened. Already charged. Amazon has scads of apps to download from their App store. Many of them are free. The MADAY function is super. A technician comes on in just a few seconds and solves every question or problem with ease. The tech sees your tablet screen but not you. You however see the tech in real time. I highly advise purchasing the 8.9 HDX as I did.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: Suz
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle.  Have loaded a few apps....you tube,  time warner cable....works perfectly.Love it!  I waited 2 years to buy a tablet because I couldn't make up my mind about this one or theSamsung Galaxy,  broke down and bought Kindle.  Awesome!!!

Reviews.Title: Nice Tablet
Reviews.Author: Aaron
Reviews.Content: Got this as a thirty day trial and have decided that since it's still refundable until January 31st I will hang on to it a bit longer. Great display and quite a nice device. I've put games and several movies on the tablet and have been impressed with both sound and picture. My son and wife love the games and the access to Amazon market place.  There's really no downside to the tab other than our family are pretty much exclusively Apple. We have iPhones, iPods, iPads and even Apple TV.  I can't really integrate this tablet into my fold as well as I'd like to. The browser it has is quick and I enjoyed using its web browser Silk.  Compared to the Apples browser, it keeps up perfectly.  It also has a bit higher pixel rating.  Depending on whether I go through with returning this or not, I will review it in more depth after the holidays.

Reviews.Title: great product easy to set up and at a good price.
Reviews.Author: terrence kalicharan
Reviews.Content: this is a good tablet for the price and its pack with features than any of the other brands in its class, love the hd resolution and everthing is easy to slide without that irritating lagging, front and rear camera's and a lot of apps, the live customer help is great and very little wait time, I bought this as a gift for a friend but I like it so much I want to get one for myself....more....easy to set up and is very lightweight...great Christmas gift for someone you LOVE.  I can't find anything bad to say about the product..Kindle did well.

Reviews.Title: Replaced my home computer
Reviews.Author: James Burr
Reviews.Content: This is my 4th Kindle (I keep upgrading) and it is by far the best.  I have used this and no longer need a home computer for almost everything I do.  I keep finding nifty features every time I use it.  The display and sound are great!

Reviews.Title: New Kindle Fire 8.9HDX
Reviews.Author: Kate M.
Reviews.Content: Received my new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9  on time as was scheduled by Amazon.  Light weight asthey indicated and user friendly.  I want to learn more about this tablet as soon as possibly...I really like the new covers that have the opening for the charger and volume control...also theoff/on button has a hole in the cover.  Im hoping the mayday will really help me also..cantwait to get going on it.

Reviews.Title: I really like this tablet
Reviews.Author: John D. Guenther
Reviews.Content: I have had my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" for about four weeks now, i really must say I really like it. It lives up to everything I expected from it with a couple of very minor issues. The screen is fantastic, I find it very easy to read books on this screen. I bought it mainly to put my database manuals and find it well worth the investment for that purpose. I also find my photos look much better on the this screen than on other tablets I have played with.The minor issues I had with it were with apps I would like to have that are not yet available for the Kindle Fire. Not being able to easily install apps from the Google Play Store is a little annoying but not a deal breaker by any means. I highly recommend the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" tablet to any one who is looking for a light weight tablet with the best screen I have seen and great performance.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Product
Reviews.Author: MMPdel rio
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HDX is everything Amazon claims it to be.  Probably one of the best, if not the best tablet on the market.  The screen color and resolution is unbelievable.  True HD! The help feature is outstanding.  You just tap the help button and a real person pops up on your screen in about 10 seconds.  I used the help function a couple of times during the set up process and was more than impressed.  Another great feature was that everything I had on my old first edition Kindle Fire transferred to the HDX as soon as I turned the unit on.  All books, apps and all the data in the cloud came right up.  If you are a current Kindle user I recommend you upgrade.  If you are not a Kindle user buy this one.  The only thing I wish the Kindle would do is allow you to download a different internet browser; Chrome would be my first choice.  The browser, Silk, that Kindle uses is OK but I would like to have a choice.  Bottom line, great product.

Reviews.Title: BEST K FIRE I HAVE OWNED (4th)
Reviews.Author: ajs_fla
Reviews.Content: I have owned at least one of every version Kindle Fire since the first.  I have always been hapy with the tablets features etc for the price.  Have a Fire HD 8.9 which is a nice tablet but at time thought it was a bit sluggish if i opened a spreadsheet on it using a 3rd party app.  When the HDX was announced I knew i needed itbecause of the processor.  Bought it from a brick & mortar just on timing issue.  I am really happy with this tablet.  By far the best Fire yet.  Amazon has a great product to go with their great service

Reviews.Title: Downloading Amazon Prime to the device for the WIN!!
Reviews.Author: Ryan S.
Reviews.Content: I'm travelling a lot more for work now and bought this device over any other device (iPad, Android, etc.) for the ability to download Amazon Prime videos to my device for NO EXTRA CHARGE!!!  It truly is the best tablet on the market.If you plan on downloading a lot of full HD videos make sure you buy at least the 32 GB version, with all my apps installed I was able to download about 8 episodes of full HD Doctor Who with my 32 GB tablet.  A 16 GB probably wouldn't have downloaded enough episodes to get me through one full flight.

Reviews.Title: A Great Gift
Reviews.Author: Rodney J. Case "rodnick"
Reviews.Content: It does everything I need. 'A beautiful combination of everyday computer tasks: email, reading books, buying, getting information, watching tv o r movies, and much more. It's all within the touch of a button. It meets my needs even before I'm aware of them. 'GREAT SOUND AND PICTURE.

Reviews.Title: Tried my best to like the kindle fire hdx
Reviews.Author: A. Federici "tonyf1964"
Reviews.Content: I purchased a kindle fire hdx last week.  I was very excited about this purchase and was so much looking forward to this kindle.  One of the main reasons for my purchase was the text to speech and also that the kindle has a camera (where as my apple ipad does not have the text to read, read to me option).The text to speech worked perfectly and i was impressed, as this was better then my earlier kindle from two years ago. However my thrill for the kindle soon disappeared when i tried to make a 30 second "happy birthday" message and send this to a relative.  It seems that this is not possible with the kindle (where as the apple ipod, i have made hundreds of 40 to 50 second video messages and sent them to relatives and friends).I figured that i must be doing something wrong. So i used the instant help "mayday" (which is nice), once the technician help came on, he told me that the video can not be longer then 30 seconds and this should work fine.  So i made another video that was about 27 seconds, however this did not work.  So i used mayday day, this time the technician told me that it must be less then 25 seconds long.  So again i made another short happy birthday message that was 22 seconds long.  Once again, this video would not send and i used mayday and spoke with a third technician. This technician told me that the video must be less then 20 seconds.  So once again, i made a very short 15 second happy birthday message, and once again, it would not send.  So once again, i used mayday and spoke with a forth technician and i was told to purchase a special app that would allow me to send a video.  So i purchased this app, and once again. It did not work and the app crashed.  So i called amazon and spoke with a supervisor who informed me that he believed that the kindle COULD NOT make any videos longer then 2 or 3 seconds that i would be able to send by email. This supervisor was very kind and informed me that i might be better off returning my kindle fire hdx and just purchasing a kindle fire hd (just for the "read to me" option).  So this is what i did (however i really did not want to as i was bored and i wanted to spend the money on a new toy for fun, and i was just looking for any reason to keep the kindle fire hdx and did my best to try to make a video using the camera and send this in a email, like i can do with my apple ipad).I was hoping the kindle fire hdx would be user friendly as much as my apple ipad, however for myself, this was not to be!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 16 GB
Reviews.Author: Kristina2011
Reviews.Content: I currently own a Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1 (2013 edition) and have owned an iPad (2nd gen), Nook Tablet, and Nook Simple Touch in the past. I love my new Kindle Fire HDX because it is remarkably fast. I purchase/rent kindle editions of my textbooks and I noticed a lag when reading them on my other tablets with the Kindle app. This isn’t a problem with the Kindle Fire HDX, thank you quad-core processor! Another reason I wanted a Kindle was for the Immersion reading experience. I use this feature almost everyday. I originally thought I could save some money on audiobooks and just use Read-To-Me but the voice is too robotic and mispronounces words like “isn’t”. The last main reason I wanted to try a Kindle was for the ability to mirror the tablet to a TV screen.It isn’t the best reading experience outside when it is bright but I think it is better than most. It is really lightweight and I never know when it’s in my purse or backpack and the battery life is excellent.I really like Kindle books but unfortunately when I started purchasing e-books I had a Nook so I had a lot of books in the B&N; store that I did not want to repurchase from Amazon. I don’t have that kind of money. I was going to return the Kindle Fire HDX but changed my mind when I found a way to get the Nook app on my Kindle. I am still disappointed in Amazon because they made it challenging. You can’t personalize the background on the lock screen and that is also something I really don’t like. I originally saved $15 by purchasing the Kindle with special offers but the ads were too annoying so I decided to pay the extra money to get rid of them. Unfortunately the default backgrounds are not a lot better to look at.I would suggest doing research before deciding to purchase a Kindle Fire. If you want a tablet and don’t already have one, the Kindle Fire will probably not be good enough for you. If you have a lot of digital purchases from amazon (books, audiobooks, video) and want a simple tablet/e-reader, this will probably be a good investment for you. The price of the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is a little high considering the average price of an android tablet (that you can personalize with your own pictures).

Reviews.Title: wifi has a systemic problem
Reviews.Author: John Kiblin "(Laura)"
Reviews.Content: As many know the wifi on the HDX is pathetic. I've had several other kindles and have never had this problem. Amazon replaced it once but it still has the same problem. When you call for help they just read the scripted response for a wifi connection issue. This is not a connection issue. The device shows a strong signal but it consistently drops the signal. The only way to get it back is to shut the wifi off and turn it back on again. This gets very old after about 30 times a day!Maybe the 3g and 4g devices work better. But I'm right in my house with a very strong private signal so I should not need 3-4g. Or does Amazon purposely want us to buy the more expensive model? I sure hope that's not the cause.I've been a good customer for years and spent a lot of money (my wife says too much!) on Amazon. However if this continues I will have to go back to iPad. There are scores of complaints about this issue...just google "kindle HDX wifi problems.)This is not a happy rating for me because I've always felt that Amazon was customer-centric. But in this case they are not listening. Just tell us you are working on a fix and we'll be happy again.

Reviews.Title: We LOVE It - Totally Worth the Upgrade / Extra Cost
Reviews.Author: Robert J Collins "Robert J Collins, Netlogic ...
Reviews.Content: We have been using Kindles since the first ones that were paper and had whisper net.  We have loved our Kindle's right down to our Kindle Fire HD, however I have to say these new Kindle Fire HDX systems totally rule.  They are significantly better and yes it is very noticeable. From the killer graphic display to the supper fast performance, this is a whole new beast and it is amazing! If you are considering a Kindle and are debating between the less expensive Kindle HD and the more expensive HDX, go with the HDX.  It is way worth the cost difference...

Reviews.Title: Best tablet i own!
Reviews.Author: B. Flesher
Reviews.Content: I have the old kindle fire hd, an Asus transformer and the new Dell venue 8 pro to compare this to. I also played around with an iPad mini at the store.  This tablet is very responsive, very quick, and I just can't take my eyes off the screen. So far the battery life is really good, have never ran down during the day. I use it to play games,surf, read and my kids watched a movie, of course I charge it every night with my phone. Reading is great and the text to speech sounds really good. I love the 8.9 inch size, my 7 inch kindle is a little to small and my 10 inch Asus  is a bit bulky so this just seems perfect, right in the middle.  I don't feel that I'm missing out on anything because of Amazon's modified android operating system, it's nice change very simple user interface. Everything I need nicely organized. I am an Amazon prime member so I enjoy the movies but they do seem limited. The sound from the movies is really good and clear, plenty loud enough even tho the speakers are on the back.The only thing I've found which is probably my internet, is that when viewing my picture's from the cloud it does seem slow to load. And I guess my biggest problem is weatherbug does not work with this kindle, not sure why? works with my kindle fire  hd But that is just my personal preference I've always liked weatherbug.Pros:  amazing screen  Nice in between size  Nice sound  Very quick and responsive  Simple user interface  All day battery life  Light weight (lighter then my 7" kindle)Cons:  slow to load pics from cloud ( probably my internet)  Still building their app selection (Weatherbug not compatible yet)  :-(  Limited movie selection as a prime member

Reviews.Title: Great starter tablet.
Reviews.Author: CP "Nurse Educator"
Reviews.Content: I bought one of these for my husband for Christmas and one for myself. I chose this particular model because it was at a special price, and it seemed to have everything he would need. He is a little old fashioned, tech-wise, having never used a touch pad device.. not even a smartphone,  so I wanted to make it an easy transition for him. So far, so good.The device is intuitive, so easy to get to know. Picture is great.. watched Dispicable Me2 one night in bed.  Still working on getting the most out of it. WiFi is flawless. Loading speed is great, no lines, no waiting.  The 4LTE is a waste of time.. stuck with my wireless plan instead. I am still getting to know the bells and whistles.

Reviews.Title: To me Kindle, Kindle Fire HD, and Kindle HDX are the top tablets!!!!
Reviews.Author: Childbride
Reviews.Content: Whats not to like. Loved all my kindles. Yes, i did manage to print without much effort. Also managed to download directly from the internet pdb files into Isilo and print some documents. The main reason I upgraded was to put into use all the new apps like printing and documents and charts etc. Performs as expected. Love it. Wish the JW.org app had been ready for it, but they say it will be available soon. That will truly make it perfect for me.

Reviews.Title: Great device except a few issues with screen
Reviews.Author: Erik Martinez
Reviews.Content: I just received my unit today and am amazed at how fast, light, and thin the device is! I've been playing around with four the day and I noticed a few odd things that would happen. When I enter a new page or screen, there is a slightly noticeable change in brightness as it tries to adjust even though my auto-brightness is off. I'm not sure if this is normal for all devices so if anyone can clarify this issue, it'll be greatly appreciated.Although this may seem extremely minor, it is still distracting and I want to get my money's worth without a defective unit. I will revise my review when my issues are addressed.[UPDATE] I also just noticed that there are grid-like spots(pixels I think) that is evenly spaced throughout the screen that can be seen on a white background when it is angled and viewed regularly. Has anyone else noticed this? I would prefer hearing from other customers before talking with Amazon and have them try to convince me that this is normal.

Reviews.Title: So far, I Love It!
Reviews.Author: Richard K. Ziegenfuss
Reviews.Content: I have had the HDX for only 2 days, and so far I am totally satisfied.  The display is incredible, and so is the sound using high quality headphones.  This is still a learning experience for me, and I am having a lot of fun along the way.  I talked to, and saw, Cynthia at Mayday, and she easily solved my problem.  I don't know how this stacks up compared with other tablets, but, so far, I am having a ball with it.

Reviews.Title: Returned Kindle due to App store
Reviews.Author: Anthony Weaver
Reviews.Content: Cameras were good, the screen was incredible, and free Gmail costs 99 cents. The Android app system is so closed off I can't use three-quarters of the apps on the Kindle that I use on my phone. That's why I returned the Kindle. The app store is a joke!!!

Reviews.Title: Better than any IPAD  that I have researched for!
Reviews.Author: Mary Von Elling
Reviews.Content: AWESOME! AWESOME! AWESOME! Can't brag about this KINDLE FIRE HDX enough! MY son & I simply love the features available on it and the free stuff that came with it such as the extra game coins for game apps.I've never owned an IPAD but this is so easy to handle and learn from. A great price for an awesome IPAD.It has such a great screen and great sound. I love the MAYDAY Button. I was not born into the technology generation so Amazon took care of any question that I had to ask them. My son has autism and he likes the voice activation of the unit that speaks out each time you touch the pad and gives him that social activity feeling that he requires.After checking with Consumer reports it gave me the same conclusion of an all around great Kindle for a great Price.

Reviews.Title: Amazon delivers
Reviews.Author: Madscientist "lcjr2002"
Reviews.Content: Finally Amazon delivers. An awesome tablet in every aspect. Side by side comparison to iPad Air, the HDX has a noticeably better display and better viewing angles. Better colors. Amazing performance with no lag (the iPad Air also has amazing performance with no lag). This tablet truly provides a great user experience, instant response. Games run smoothly with amazing graphics. The display is impressive. Full HD movies play with no lag. The tablet provides great multitasking, watching a full HD movie while running some calculations in a spreadsheet application, no video stutters. The Mayday feature is awesome. Sound is great. This tablet is a winner and you cannot go wrong here. The only disadvantage to some is that this tablet is integrated with the Amazon ecosystem and does not provide the official Android operating system with the GooglePlay store out of the box (though it could possibly be rooted to do so later). If not having official Android is not a problem and you are fine being tied to the Amazon ecosystem, this is the best tablet. Finally giving Apple's iPad real competition for a lot less money.

Reviews.Title: Buyer Beware
Reviews.Author: R. Vazquez
Reviews.Content: Purchased the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" in late January.  Three months in, it started to do the infamous reboot a lot of consumers have reported.  Amazon's solution is to send you a refurbished device.  Somewhere some poor soul will be receiving mine.  This is unacceptable and bad business.  Don't let the scripted customer service rep read you some spiel about your ISP and WIFI to try and pass the buck.  I build computers and am very tech savvy.  I am also street smart and know when someone is trying to hustle me.  The good part is i paid for this lemon with the Amazon store card.  That means that Amazon is going to have to keep sending me a Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 whether its refurbished or out of a trash bin at their warehouse for as long as i have a balance on their card.Rest assured that in the end i will get my moneys worth one way or the other as i am in no hurry to pay off this card.  When the 1 year warranty expires and you are still sending me refurbished junk, make sure that you keep doing it without charging me because at this point it will be YOU/AMAZON that ends up getting screwed, not this consumer.

Reviews.Title: Amazon tether
Reviews.Author: Russell D. Glynn "kimiko dad"
Reviews.Content: I am impressed with the technical specifications and the price is competitive. But for all users but the computer challenged, this "tablet" is not a good choice. For some inane reason, Amazon seems to be in a war with Google. You can't download Chrome, or any other Google apps like Drive, Contacts, Schedule, or Maps. Many of apps they offer in their proprietary store receive low user ratings. You cannot remove Amazon apps from the device.

Reviews.Title: Great Job Amazon !!!
Reviews.Author: Laptopbs
Reviews.Content: It seemed like a long time for the release date to come around, and it was well worth the wait .. and every penny of the cost.As others have described the screen quality was stunning. Not good or even great, but stunning.I have only had it a few hours but it seems real fast and very light and easy to hold. I get most of my media (video rentals, MP3's and books) thru Amazon, so this purchase was a no-brainer for me.I read some earlier tech reviews discussing available productivity apps on tablets....yeah right.This will be my UN productivity tool for my real life. Pretty much all the media access I could ever want in a small, well designed packageGood work on this product.Did I mention the screen quality made you think "wow !" in amazement?

Reviews.Title: replaced with a USED device
Reviews.Author: Janie
Reviews.Content: I have had several Kindles over the years and have loved each and every one of them.  I was excited when I received the 8.9HDX as a birthday gift, unfortunately the device died in 5 weeks.  The screen went totally black and the unit needed to be replaced.  Amazon quickly sent me another device , to my surprise it was a refurbished one.  Had mine lasted even 4 months and then died I would not be upset with a used device as a replacement... however I barely got to use mine before it died which means my husband paid 444 dollars for a USED kindle as far as we are concerned... and we are sure had we not sent the defective one back we would have been charged the price of a NEW unit, even thou that was NOT what was sent to us.  Given how brief my time was with a new one and the fact that we have no idea how much time and wear and tear is on this replacement we are very dissappointed in AMAZON and their so called quality.

Reviews.Title: Replaced my iPad with the Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Deborah Theall
Reviews.Content: I was a bit nervous about replacing my iPad with a new tablet.  This was the best decision I ever made.  It takes a bit of getting used to if you have used the iPad for awhile but I have never regretted my decision to replace my iPad with this tablet.  I would absolutely buy another one.

Reviews.Title: Love IT
Reviews.Author: Mountain Marm "Linda Frost"
Reviews.Content: This is my third Kindle, and they just keep getting better.  It has all the features I wanted, and, having had an HD, I was already familiar with the platform. The graphics are wonderful, sound quality is much improved, and apps run much better. I added the Belkin Bluetooth Keyboard Cover and Office Pro app and turned it into a mini laptop.  I can produce documents and presentations, take notes at meetings.I also use my HDX for recreational purposes and read rather prodigiously  The dictionary has been upgraded and includes Wikipedia for further info on topics.  Yes, I'm a researcher who likes to learn trivial knowledge good for crosswords.  Yes, the crossword apps run better and have more features on the HDX than on the HD.All my apps are automatically downloaded to both my HD and HDX, so  I can instantly compare them.  I am disappointed with Facebook and Ancestry apps, however.  Neither one works as advertised.  With Ancestry, it may be the fault of the app, but Facebook simply does not perform up to the expectations as advertised.I assume this is a problem with the app?  Anyway, this is a bit of a disappointment, although a minor one.I highly recommend the new HDX 8.9 and, depending on your needs, recommend adding a Bluetooth keyboard of some kind, so that you can turn it into a mini laptop.  With the integrated keyboard cover, I close mine up, put in my handbag , and I'm off to the next stop.  It's always with me if I need it, if not for work, for play.

Reviews.Title: Love my Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Jbug10
Reviews.Content: It s faster than my ipad, the picture is sharp and clear.  Just watched my first movie on it, it was wonderful as clear as being in a theater except smaller.  only con is not as many apps as the ipad, but I still love it!

Reviews.Title: Great device
Reviews.Author: Barbara A McKinzie
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire is clear, crisp and easy on the eyes.  Great device for color pictures and games, outstanding clarity.

Reviews.Title: Useful and entertaining -- I am pleased
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: I purchased this just before Christmas last year, and it's had daily use since.  I've downloaded videos for airline flights, and off the wireless areas.  The five stars are based on this experience.  I do not miss the Google store, as I have side-loaded the apps that I needed from there, or just used the Silk browser.  I transfer and edit photos from my camera with an Eye-Fi SD cardThis is the third Kindle.  The second gen paper-white is still the best for reading.  The first Fire is still useful, but the large screen and memory makes the HDX 8.9 much better.Our household has an 4 gen iPad (16gig).  I personally prefer the Kindle overall.  Some of the apps on the iPad are better, but the video performance offline and the weight of the Kindle makes up for that.The quality of both the wireless and internet connection effects either device's performance,  The speedtest app helps evaluate the connection.

Reviews.Title: Screen is great..but have connection issues so the jury is out
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: I wanted this for Christmas but didn't get it to my very vocal dismay. I bought an Ipad Mini with Retina Display as a splurge for myself (that will show em!)  I loved it! Great screen, easy to use, connected to all wi-fi spots at home and elsewhere. However, I am very committed (addicted?) to the Amazon ecosystem and am a Prime Member so I thought, why don't I go with my original choice and save a few bucks. I took the mini back and order this. As usual easy order, delivery was in less then two days, etc. The tablet seems a bit cheaper when holding it then the mini (may be psychological) but really, who cares on that. Connected easily to home wi-fi and the screen really does blow you away...much better then the mini. Watched a video or two and the speakers are great. I thought I would never use the Mayday as that was for old ladies but on my second day I did, for a completely stupid mistake (setting the time zone.) The connection was fast, the rep was great, and she didn't even laugh at me for my dumb mistake (thanks Shelby.)The bad. I have an open Wi-Fi connection at work that this device will not connect to. My Ipad connected, no problem, my phone does, even my cheap little Nook HD+ did but this thing will not. I am waiting to hear back from the technical support but having read other customers Wi-Fi issues I am on hold to see if this is indicative of some other problems with connecting. If it continues I am going to return it and go back to the Ipad Mini which worked like a little soldier. If it connected no problem I would give this a 4 or 5 star.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: William J. Gecawich
Reviews.Content: The kindle fire hdx 8.9 is a great tablet.Pros- Screen is awesome.  Everything looks awesome.- Immersion reading- weight is very light- kindle case. I have the non-leather origami version. It is great how you can view in portrait and landscape. Very sturdy.- Speed of the machine. I experience no lags.- MayDay has been very helpful- text to speech is actually usable now.- Amazon and Audible content is great- much more like a tablet to compete with apple and google/samsungCons- app selection getting better but not there yet- kindle app does not have page animation- magazines do not take up full screen

Reviews.Title: The battery life ain't great
Reviews.Author: Brad Millman
Reviews.Content: I thought I would use this because I was doing a lot of reading (of web stuff) on my phone (an android). It turns out I mostly use this to listen to music or stuff broadcast on the web. It is okay for that. Making play lists of my music is a pain in the ass on the kindle. I like making play lists much more on i-tunes (I have an ipod for listening to must) on a real computer with a mouse.The batteries seem weird. Sometimes I keeps a good charge and some times it doesn't I basically do the same thing most days and sit in the same place (relative to the WiFi Access Point). I don't know why the batteries seem to last one day and don't the next day. I would consider getting an IPad the next time, given how this has worked out, even if it is more money.

Reviews.Title: Wife is an Incessant Reader - Loves Her Kindle HDX!
Reviews.Author: A. D. Leak
Reviews.Content: This Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" is my wife's third Kindle. She reads incessantly and likes to play an occasional game of Solitaire as she relaxes in the evening. She has been sold on Kindles since they came out years ago. Finally, after she wore the charging port out on her older Kindle, I talked her into getting this newer, bigger Kindle. We have it connected through our Verison account and are members of Amazon Prime, so she can connect to Amazon to download new books anywhere she can get cell phone service. I am a bit of a computer geek, so I maxed out its features. She loves the clarity of the screen and its readability in all levels of light! The battery on this model lasts much longer than the older Kindles and it is very thin - small enough to still fit in her purse. We haven't used it for Prime movies yet, but it is fully capable of doing so. She loves her Kindle HDX 8.9 and that makes me happy too! Great product.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased with the tablet.
Reviews.Author: Julie
Reviews.Content: This is my third Kindle and I thought I loved my first two, but nothing compared to this one. I have only had 1 issue so far. I was not able to port my contacts for email because of my email provider. Took me a week and probably 7 different Amazon representatives, but once I found someone with a TON of knowledge on the HDX he was able to walk me through 2 different ways to solve the issue. I absolutely love that I have instant access to a live person for help with the touch of a button and yes, a representative answered in less than a minute! It's very thin and light. Probably close to half the weight of my previous Kindle.I planned on asking for this for my birthday which is coming up in a couple months, but when Amazon offered me a payment plan with no interest, how could I possibly pass that up? If you are looking for a low-cost tablet with awesome customer support and rivals the other top tablets, this is for you! The last thing I would like to address would be the lack of affordable and lightweight covers for this on Amazon. I found a very low cost and lightweight cover elsewhere. Just took a few minutes on the internet to find several to choose from.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Hal Hall
Reviews.Content: I highly recommend the Kindle Fire HDX with 4G...It works great.  In fact, my daughter has an iPad Air that I have played around on quite a bit...the picture quality is much better...even though there aren't as many apps...I've got all the apps I can ever use.  So if you are trying to decide between the iPad and Kindle Fire HDX...chose the Kindle.  I love the mayday feature.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet, except...
Reviews.Author: Scath
Reviews.Content: I purchased it for House Hunney, who uses a tablet in addition to other equipment for storm chasing. He wanted to upgrade for faster processor and more internal storage.This Kindle Fire is awesome in every aspect except one: It's too proprietary. Yes, it uses an Android system, but Amazon has locked it down.He couldn't sideload many of the apps he uses, and unfortunately, only two of the apps he uses were available in the Amazon app store. The only work around would've been to root the device, and that voids the warranty, so I'm returning it because it can't be used as intended and I have no use for a tablet myself.Still prefer to read on my Kindle 3 instead of a backlit screen, though the Kindle Fire's screen is easier on the eyes than my desktop or laptop monitors are.

Reviews.Title: Upgraded from Kindle Fire HD 7"
Reviews.Author: Nikolai Greenidge
Reviews.Content: I own a kindle hire hd already and it's best tablet in that price range when i bought it and still is(my opinion). I decided recently to have fire hd installed as my media player in vehicle so i went with the fire hdx 8.9 to replace for personal use(also purchased the hdx 7" for my son) Upon arrival, the screen image was impressive and highly noticeable (sharp and detailed). I see some thought went into the buttons and mini usb port position..much better on the hdx compared to hd. Some nice feature improvements in OS also e.g calender, apps availability at home screen and mayday which i haven't used yet and hopefully never. CPU improvement noticeable also...browses much quicker.Would have love the ability to minimize and switch between apps instead of closing it out especially when reading a book and need to switch to browser for research (hopefully in an update). Would recommend this to any one looking for tablet in this price range.

Reviews.Title: Enjoying larger size
Reviews.Author: TexasGal
Reviews.Content: I have a 2nd generation Kindle Fire in a smaller size.  I am truly enjoying this larger size.  When inside, I prefer reading books on this version rather than my 2nd generation Kindle book reader.  If loads up pages quickly when surfing the net. The screen is crystal clear.  Having a great experience with this so far.

Reviews.Title: As Awsome as they say.
Reviews.Author: Roger A. Hackney "ArizonaRog"
Reviews.Content: It's just what I was hoping for. Can I just put the word AWSOME down 20 times and call it a good review. It's everything Amazon promised it would be on their Kindle Fire sales and Product INfo pages!

Reviews.Title: Boy, was my husband surprised
Reviews.Author: SAM "threeages"
Reviews.Content: He had purchased one of these for a silent auction his company was holding and he was smitten. He opened this on Christmas morning and you would've thought he won the lottery. It's lightweight (like, crazy lightweight). The screen is clear and bright. He's already reading books and watching movies on this thing. He loves its features . . . and me for making his Christmas. ;)

Reviews.Title: LOVE MY HDX!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: AD
Reviews.Content: I have been wanting a kindle fire for a while and I finally got one and so far I love this thing. I don't have any negative comments at this time. Fast, awesome picture and the sound quality blew me away

Reviews.Title: HDX 8.9 - The perfect Mid-sized Tablet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I pre-ordered the HDX 8.9 for my wife, her first tablet. She was interested in the Surface at first but after doing some price and spec comparison WE decided to give the HDX a look-see, knowing we could return it if not completely satisfied. Well, it was love at first sight. The display is beautiful, the size is just right, the response is better than expected, the battery life is great, and the price was far less than the other one she had her eye on. I know WE will connect again when the newness wares off and the battery ever dies....

Reviews.Title: love my new kindle!
Reviews.Author: Kathy W. White "mystery lover"
