Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd Kindle, and as with the other two, it is everything i hoped for and more!  I have an Ipad at school, and don't use it because it is not user friendly.  Keep up the good work Amazon!!

Reviews.Title: Love my New Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Susan B Mayo
Reviews.Content: Really am enjoying my new Kindle Fire HDX. Loved the way it came with most of my content already downloaded and then it is very easy to download what I already have purchased. It is a very clear screen and the ease of using is great!

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Tablet
Reviews.Author: John Berry
Reviews.Content: Kindle has out did itself on this version.  It has everything that you could ask for in a tablet and the viewing for movies is exceptional.  Because it is a Kindle, I can do all my reading as well as watch movies, games and connect to the Internet.  The size is just perfect and ranks right up there with the iPad and certainly cost a lot less.  I have used the Kindle Fire, the Kindle Fire HD and now the Kindle Fire HDX and I have not been disappointed with either.

Reviews.Title: had to exchange it after 3 days use
Reviews.Author: Ang Gobin
Reviews.Content: I have received a faulty top of the line kindle hd x so have had to exchange it, yet I have given it 5 stars because - when it was working - it was the most amazing device that I have ever used. So user friendly and fast and easy to use for work, play and surf. Just be very careful with the apps that you download as I think that this was the problem with mine. They need to protect the programs needed so that other apps and surfing cannot harm it.Although I have had a faulty device I still love it and am pleasantly surprised at how superb it is - and I got straight through to a uk person on xmas day using the mayday button. Amazing

Reviews.Title: WOW
Reviews.Author: Keithwsr
Reviews.Content: Gave this to my wife for Xmas, ordered on the 12/23 and got it on 24 Dec FREE SHIPPING.  This is the greatest Kindle yet and we have at least one of every generation. My wife loves the fact that it is SO LIGHT and the picture is unbelievably clear and sharp.  Eat your heart out Nook and I Pad.  There is no comparison to this Kindle HDX.  My only wish would be that it had a Micro HDMI but I will continue to use our Kindle HD for those situations where I want to hook up to the TV.Great Prouct Amazon!!!  How are you going to top this one for Xmas 2014?????

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Andrew J. Keane "Drew"
Reviews.Content: Great Screen, fast CPU, email looks better than on a PC, just sayin...awesome tablet for those who are not overly tied to certain apps. This has all the right features the price was great. Speakers were super good,really nice surprise, its also really light. May need screen protector like any tablet would,lots of touching...Kindle is cool and just what most people need.

Reviews.Title: Nice Upgrades
Reviews.Author: greg
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HDX is the best tablet on the market for the money if you want to Facebook, twitter, read books, watch Movies, etcThe rear facing camera was a much needed upgrade, and also moving the power charging plugin off the bottom to the left side was a smart move.The only short fall of the Kindle Fire is the Silk Browser still, which to me is a huge disappointment. I have a Kindle Fire HD, and had to sideload a new browser (Dolphin) that supports Flash Players to play some games on Facebook, watch some streaming websites, and get around the web same as my Desktop PC. You can do the same on the new HDX, but to the novice users it might seem a bit challenging getting it done.You can't go wrong for the price, and if Amazon decides to make a next gen Kindle Fire HDX2 they need to address the flash issues with their browser

Reviews.Title: Wife loves the Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Billy J Short
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Kindle Fire HDX for my wife.  She has a Kindle white page but I wanted her to be able to access the internet, read her books and play her games without being tied to the laptop, and to be able to perform these activitries as we travel since travel in one of our passions.  She is a little intemidated by computers but was able to turn the Kindle Fire HDX on and perform several activities, such as down loding a game from Amazon right out of the box.  She is happy with the tablet and I am sure she will be happier as she gains experince and knowledge of its features.  She loves the display, brightness and large screen.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: Mother in law loves the Kindle.  Will take her a bit to get use to how it works and all that it can do.  I am extremely pleased with the delivery to our home.  I ordered on a Saturday 12/15 and asked for standard shipping(more than 5 days) and it was delivered to our home on 12/17.  Thank you Amazon for upgrading the delivery without me asking for it.  You guys are Great!!

Reviews.Title: Great kindle
Reviews.Author: tschallenberg
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my husband for Christmas, he loves it.  He can download movies to watch on the plane, has the voice printing app, so I don't have to spell words for him anymore.  He can Skype with the kids and do whatever he wants to do on a laptop, but without being so heavy to lug around on the airplane.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use, this is a upgrade to my Kindle Fire. Battery life is much longer then the Kindle Fire. Would recommend for anyone to buy.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for a non-tech type
Reviews.Author: Ric Moore
Reviews.Content: I'm not a high tech type but this I found to be easier to use than my smart phone and I really like the connection to Amazon - one of the primary reasons for my purchasing it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 Display Wf-Fi 32 GB
Reviews.Author: Doumar
Reviews.Content: Was looking for more brilliance on screen from my first Kindle and we found it along with a much better sizing of the font. Most of the uses are easily done without having to hold an explanation in one hand and trying to make settings with the other. Love it so far and have done some reading with great enjoyment. With eye troubles this reader has made for greater enjoyment.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Patricia A. Barlow
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my husband because he liked my Kindle 8.9 HD but he wanted his own. I have to say I'm very impressed with the upgrade. I love my HD but the HDX is superior to mine! I love the fact that is has a front and back camera. Mine only has the front camera. I also like the fact that it is slimmer and lighter to use. I have the 16 GB which is plenty of memory for what I do on mine but I got my husband one with more memory because he will probably download more programs than I do. The colors on it are fabulous. I bought my grandkids and Ipad a few years ago. I think this HDX is even better than an Ipad! Had no problems with the delivery of the product to our home. If you are looking for a great tablet you cannot beat the price or the quality of this one.

Reviews.Title: Best ever!
Reviews.Author: Grandma Lori
Reviews.Content: This is my 5th Kindle, and an upgrade from the 8.9 HD Fire from last year.  WOW!  WOW!  WOW!  So light, so fast, the picture is even clearer, and I didn't think that was possible.  Worked with a Retina display ipad for a few days and this puts the ipad to shame!  My email was so easy to set up, even my exchange email for work.  This will definitely be travelling with me.  I have a Belkin Bluetooth Keyboard and it recognized it easily.  I love KINDLES!

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Annie K "Annie K"
Reviews.Content: I can't tell you how good this feels in your hands - its really light which is absolutely huge for anyone with arthritis or just for holding this thing over a long period of time. Its light but it never feels 'cheap' or flimsy.For those concerned about the proprietary version of Android - it works and looks great. If you find a need for apps that are not available in the Amazon store, side loading is only a click away and Aptide or 1Mobile work fine as alternate stores though I recommend sticking with the Amazon store unless there is something you really need that is not available.I have used mine every day since purchasing and have no regrets what so ever as to choosing this device over the iPad Air or Nexus 10. It the lightest and brightest of the bunch and if you are bought in to the Amazon ecosystem, it is unbeatable!UPDATE: Still absolutely loving this tablet! I use it every day and the screen mirroring with the new Fire TV works great. The HDX was one of my best purchases ever.

Reviews.Title: Simply perfect
Reviews.Author: Jeff Looney
Reviews.Content: Perfect in every way. Every one should own one. Easy to use and the graphics are superb. The help button is the greatest thing ever

Reviews.Title: 5TH KINDLE
Reviews.Author: wicky
Reviews.Content: This makes my 5th kindle and each one has been better. The Fire HDX 8.9 is no exception. It is easy to use, responsive and the thinner but larger size is comfortable to handle. I find the clarity of the screen excellent and the books easy to read. once again a quality kindle product.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Helene Lovell
Reviews.Content: This is my second Kindle Fire.  Although my first one died on me, decided to purchase the lastest model of Kindle Fire.  This one is wonderful!  Picture quality is excellent.  Like the way my Prime transferred to my new Kindle, along with all of my books.  This new model has lots more to offer.  Would recommend to my friends.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 its fantastic
Reviews.Author: LIN
Reviews.Content: I think the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is great.the color is.fantastic  and I love the screen  much.more convenient to read my books it so much lighter than my other one it's much.faster I just love it. The wider screen I am crazy about.

Reviews.Title: great on fire tablet
Reviews.Author: LSA "photo hacker"
Reviews.Content: faster outstanding screen clarity. Owned an original kindle fire and there is substantial improvement. Faster on internet than my desktop and laptop The ads on the start screen do not bother me. Amazon should have a hit with the product

Reviews.Title: Amazing new Kindle - best ever
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Combat journalist, media con...
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased this tablet for my wife's birthday, replacing the Kindle HD 7 I bought her last year.  Wow!  This is the first electronic device I've ever bought on the first day.  In fact, I had the clerk at Best Buy go back to shipping and bring me one (they hadn't set up their display.  This is our fifth Kindle, starting with the 3rd generation, and this update blew me away.  These  guys are setting the standard for Retina-beating screens and an amazing sound system.  And it's shockingly light (of course my own tablet is a honking Nexus 10).We've been Prime members since it was first offered, and we're deeply into the Amazon eco-system.  The company's producing a quality product like this just lures me deeper, lol.

Reviews.Title: more than i expected
Reviews.Author: aparcelrn
Reviews.Content: Amazing. Well worth the money. Glad I went with this rather than the iPad. Haven't had any major bugs and its been a few weeks.

Reviews.Title: Impressive piece of equipment!
Reviews.Author: Michael G Bacon
Reviews.Content: Love my Fire HDX 8.9"! Fast, very responsive, beautiful picture quality. Only reason I don't give it 5 stars is because of the scarcity of compatible apps. If that issue is corrected it'll be a definite 5 stars!

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Darcell
Reviews.Content: Plan on buying it after the trial hopefully because it is an amazing product. The only downside is the market needs to get the instagram app and a fee others. Other then that it is amazing. Very high def easy to use especially for.my two and four year old. Love reading books on it and watching movies. It certainly is a must buy product if your looking for a quality tablet

Reviews.Title: Fast break down
Reviews.Author: Gregory
Reviews.Content: This is a really good tablet it only has some minor glitches. Some apps you have to be uninstall and re install to use. You can't customize it in pretty much anyway. I mean over all its a good tablet, but its new and the kinks need to be worked out. Its fast really fast. Plays almost all games, except you don't have Google play store that ls a minus. A wonders screen that is a bit overkill but its great. It freezes up for no reason a lot as well. Over ll i gave it gave it four startspros1 fast processoramazing screen3 great internet speeds4 ok speakers5 charges battery to full in less then 4 hours and last ll day longcons1 no customization what so ever2 no Google play store3 sever glitches with apps4. freezes up from time to time and need hard resetover all its good tablet if you have the money i would recommend buying it if you want a kindle.

Reviews.Title: notso hotso
Reviews.Author: DixPix "DixPix"
Reviews.Content: Recently purchased the Fire HDX and the Google tablet, our first two tablets. The Nexus is wonderful. Although it is a great size at 8.9 inches, I find the Fire tablet to be very frustrating.When using the keyboard it seems that it put spaces in all over the place and is very hard to type what we want. When editing it is almost impossible to put the cursor where you want it - sometimes the cursor is not visible and sometimes it isn't showing up even though the computer has you set to type from that spot . The capitalization seems to jump around without asking it to. It seems to put a space at the beginning of each paragraph, and takes several steps to get rid of it since you can't move the cursor accurately. Voice recognition is ever so much better on the Google Nexus.  And in general the screen touch sensitivity just seems to be off.  Lots of retyping.When you set a bookmark it is named sometimes in caps sometimes not, sometimes with icons and sometimes not.  Bookmarks are in one menu system at the top left. Saving a bookmark is in another menu on the right. The buttons on the edge of the screen are not there for some of the applications, so you have to get completely out of the application to get the home button back.We knew that the application store would not include many of the games and other applications that are available on all other tablets. Didn't think that would be such a big deal. But to discover that some very common applications and games are not available in any way on this tablet makes it much less useful.I could go on with many other little frustrations, and there are many more . This is probably a fine tablet for some people, but it sure isn't working out for me.

Reviews.Title: Watch out for wifi version
Reviews.Author: Fred Williams
Reviews.Content: I was really looking forward to using the Kindle Fire HDX. Bought the 32 meg version in wifi only. Therein lies the problem. When it works it works well. But it has difficulty hanging on to wifi signals and just quits at times. Apps don't update well with wifi. Display is great but it just doesn't work well with wifi, even though I am 20 feet from the router.

Reviews.Title: Failure to Sync Unsolved, Wide-Spread....
Reviews.Author: Daniel C. Church
Reviews.Content: Told last night that CS rep had filled out a ream of concerns over failure to Sync. Suggested that I not return or replace pending developments. This is, possibly, good news as resources likely are being assigned. Still steamed over being dumped by prior upper-level tech. Amazon should pursue why I was not called back, if only based on my oversized purchases. No excuse for lies or evasions. As a former customer-relations manager, I found people really want the truth if a solution is not immediately available. Not ready for release: Repeatedly drops Wi-Fi during movies. Connectivity is solid on other devices. As annoying, neither email contacts or calendars sync. Been blown off on the first by engineering, which wanted my birth weight. As for the second, escalated -- if you can call it that -- to someone who claimed a bad connection and promised to call right back -- 11 hours ago.

Reviews.Title: Depends what you're looking for...
Reviews.Author: Stefanie
Reviews.Content: First, the pros - beautiful picture and screen. Perfect size - big enough to see things easily, but small enough to comfortable hold it and extremely light (one of the best aspects). Movies play wonderfully and books are easy to read and access. Now the cons - if you are accustomed to the large number of apps offered by Android and Apple, then you will be extremely disappointed. The app selection is seriously lacking and the apps that they do offer are way behind the ball on updates. Due to Google licensing issues, there are no Google apps (e-mail, Chrome, Google+, Drive, etc). Most of the stuff can be accessed in a roundabout way or over the Internet, but certainly not as convenient. Definitely don't read too much into the "built on Android operating system" comment in terms of apps. The other issue that I've had is, while it's generally pretty fast, it disconnects from the wireless router a lot. I consistently have to go in, turn wifi off and then turn it back on, so it reconnects - that issue is by far the most irritating.Personal opinion, it's nice, but I probably wouldn't purchase it again.

Reviews.Title: Significant Limitations
Reviews.Author: ROBERT J TOTH
Reviews.Content: Purchased the Kindle Fire to use when traveling. Works fine as a storage and reading device for books. Unfortunately this Kindle is very weak when used for streaming from, or working on, the internet. Freezes easily which requires turning off WiFi and then turning back on to correct problem. This unit is near worthless when used for in-flight streaming. Do not purchase this Kindle if you plan to stream video when traveling by air. Flat out does not work. I would not have purchased this Kindle if I had been aware of its' limitations. Wish I could have written a more positive review. - I have been very satisfied with my old non color Kindle.

Reviews.Title: So much potential, but it falls quite short.
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: I really liked this device,  after a few days of use to get to know it. It is very responsive, intuitive, and versatile. However it also crashes on graphics intensive applications and would constantly freeze to the point where I had to power cycle the device by holding down the power button to force a shutdown.I had very little expectations when I purchased this. I mainly wanted it for searching the web when I was away from a PC and reading books. I found myself hardly using any of my PCs at all, and completely relying on this device for videos, web browsing, reading books, shopping on amazon, and playing games.If it was not for the freezing/crashing issues, I would have gladly kept it and my review would have been 5 stars. Maybe I just received a dud, and with amazons 30 day, no-questions-asked return policy on the hdx, it is well worth trying yourself if you are on the fence.

Reviews.Title: No Epub Support
Reviews.Author: M. Phillips "tx.parrothead"
Reviews.Content: Had this, sent it back.  I found out too late it does not support Epub books.  Since I have over 2000 books in this format this device became essentially useless to me.  I wish I had done my homework first and found this out.  And SHAME ON AMAZON for not supporting the industry standard for electronic publishing.  I will not even consider a Kindle until that happens.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Tablet...Returned my Mom's iPad Air...
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Hello Folks,I have written over 150 reviews. I started my reviews recently but I have been a member of Amazon since the company started selling online in 1995. I am not a person that says, "I know it all" but trust me, I purchase thousands of dollars worth of products a year from Amazon. If I do not like the item after testing it or wearing it or even better, looking at the way it was manufactured, I return it.I purchased the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" 32GB for my mother for Christmas. My brother bought her the iPad Air. After my mother used both tablets, we returned the iPad Air because it was so difficult to use especially with the game Ruzzle, the play screens and layout were for some reason different and confusing on the iPad, just to name a few negatives.My mom uses the Kindle HDX Tablet for email, a few games and surfing the net. She reads her books on it and jots down notes with the tablet. The Kindle HDX is one Amazing Tablet and for the price, you cannot beat the deal! The screen is crystal clear, sharp and vivid. The colors are bright, true, and brilliant.Amazon "Nailed It" with the Kindle vs. iPad TV Ad. The Kindle is a fraction of the cost and the quality of the Kindle HDX is just as good if not better than the iPad. With Apple, you are paying for the name, nothing else. Apple gives you nothing extra, in fact, the iPad is a Tablet with no bells or whistles but yet because the name Apple is written on it, the company feels they can "Rip-Off" the customer and charge an arm and a leg for the iPad. Also, Apple tracks you all over the web including the push for you to purchase the Apple Cloud Storage space. This is sale smasher in itself. No company will tell me I have to purchase cloud storage when the cloud is not safe.When we first registered the iPad, Apple wanted all kinds of information, it was intrusive and aggravating. Registering the Kindle HDX was as simple as a few clicks.The iPad cannot even run flash, we tried, it would not work.Buy the Kindle HDX, you will not look back especially for the price you paid. If Amazon puts an SD Card Slot in the next version of the Kindle, it will be a hands down slam dunk winner and could crush Samsung.I hope this review helped. If it did, please click the "yes" button on the right side. Thank you

Reviews.Title: BEST OF THE BEST
Reviews.Author: B. Blankenship "Girls Can Hunt 2"
Reviews.Content: I was debating on purchasing a Kindle tablet for a year and a half, and right before Christmas, I started looking again to see if I really wanted to drop the money into one. My husband told me to get it, since I didn't buy myself much. We looked at the Apple Air on Walmart.com and then we actually saw a commercial for this NEW Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" screen being compared to the Kindle Fire HDX. Once I received it, I haven't been able to put it down. I'm now actually glad that I waited to get the newest and latest edition. The megapixels are unbelievable. It is so clear, very user friendly, and Amazon even has a "Mayday" button to where you can connect to a live person if you need help with anything. It is amazing, I downloaded many apps for my little boy that I home school, he is in kindergarten, and many of the apps. I downloaded were free. Amazon even gave me FREE 500 coins to purchase apps. and books, videos, and every time you purchase something with the coins, you earn more in return. I loved it so much, I even bought my husband one, 3 days after I bought mine. He received his today (Thurs. Dec. 26, 2013) and absolutely loves it!! GREAT PRODUCT, HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!

Reviews.Title: Really cool device
Reviews.Author: Tony Hammitt
Reviews.Content: I got this for myself for a Christmas present (from my kids :) )Really nice device, well-designed, rugged, lots of cool apps of course.  The Origami case basically doubled the weight, at 11.7 ounces itself (device is 13.7)Signing up with Verizon wasn't as seamless as I'd want, but that's on them.  Their website should give you all the options you need but it doesn't.  It is nice being able to keep using it where there's no Wi-Fi.The new Kindle book software is cool, too.  I use it to get to sleep, tell it to read me a story out loud and I'm out within a few minutes.  I've been having it read me Poe though, so I should expect some odd dreams...  I gave the text-to-speech a bit of a challenge with Huck Finn and it did OK.  Doesn't handle the extremely colloquial language well, but it's still understandable.  Would have liked it if it bleeped the n-word, but I can see why people may not want that; editing literature is evil, but it'd be a nice option.The screen is amazing, literally beyond your eye's resolving power.  Battery life is pretty good.  Seems better than my kids' Fire 7" models, which seem fine really.Great product overall, no complaints at all.

Reviews.Title: so. awesome
Reviews.Author: happyin2son
Reviews.Content: I have gone from original Fire to HD Fire to HDX. I really like the bigger screen. I don't like the change in orientation in Words with Friends. I really like reading my email on the HDX.

Reviews.Title: WONDERFUL device!
Reviews.Author: TucsonSusan
Reviews.Content: I must confess that I am a Kindle fanatic, and this is my fourth one, and it is, for me, by far the best one I own. It has everything I want:  a great screen that makes reading in any kind of light possible; crisp, clear books and apps; web-browsing; all my Netflix and Amazon Prime videos at my fingertips. It is lightweight and feels good in my hand. It fits into all but my smallest bags (and that one is about big enough for a wallet and keys). I am certain that it is as good as the iPad mini at about half the price. Playing games and using apps is even better than before, with brilliant color and blazing fast speed. I generally don't leave home without it, and consider it one of the best technology investments I've ever made. Now I am looking for good homes for its predecessors.The improvements over the first Kindle Fire are obvious and outstanding. There is an added bonus of "most highlighted sections" in every book. The size and weight are streamlined. The screen is glare-free and the graphics are rendered beautifully. It has an 8 mp camera which I haven't experimented with yet, but I will, eventually, and I am sure I will be happy with that. I cannot say enough positive things about this device, and thousands of reviewers before me have said it all.BUY THIS. You will not be sorry.

Reviews.Title: it my dream and now i love it..
Reviews.Author: Abu Omar
Reviews.Content: A long time a go I was looking to have like this device and since I bought kindle fire HDX I got what I'm looking for. Firstly, I am an international student and I came to the United states in the end of 2011. When I start my education at Champlain college since 6/30/2016 I read many books in English and not easy for an international student to read a book in foreign language. So, this device support translate books as well as read those books to us. One the other, hand the price much cheaper as we getting a huge benefit from it. Yesterday I did a test for this device on it battery. Then, I got this results ,, I got 40 percent to charge the battery on 78 minutes = 100 percent on 3 hours and 25 minutes. In addition, it stay work not less then 11 hours reading with leasing. This device support education much and much, so I recommend for those who intereste to get the education in an advance way. Very good idea when you get a kindle fire which a large company like Amazon stand behind it. Amazon much familiar with online bookstore as the first in this field in the world,, . In this time Amazon represents a biggest market in the world which you can access on it in your small device like kindle. Finally, kindle fire HDX more greater then I thought about it before I bought it. Thank you Amazon you make my dream is true.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product with some easily solvable flaws
Reviews.Author: Bruce A. Pearson
Reviews.Content: This is my 4th or 5th Kindle.  I bought it because of the prime video download feature which works great!  Two limits that need fixing though- it needs more ram.  I am constantly running into ram limitations.  Also, while Amazon allows a generous 25 download limit on prime videos, since I lost my previous Kindle HD with 8 downloads on it, those count against my 25 limit ... deregistering the lost Kindle does NOT solve the issue.  I have called Amazon customer service several times on this, there is no solution.  So I am essentially limited to 18 downloads.

Reviews.Title: kindle
Reviews.Author: Ralph Perkins
Reviews.Content: My wife loves to read books and this kindle with the MAY DAYis the greatest thing yet. I would still be trying to figure it outwithout MAY DAY. Thank You.

Reviews.Title: Great performing tablet
Reviews.Author: Gilman L.
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HDX exceeded my expectations.  Its a great way to consume media and digital books.  The screen is very clear and the tablet is very light. If you are going to get a Fire, I highly recommend the HDX over any other android based device.

Reviews.Title: Wifi problems
Reviews.Author: JLS
Reviews.Content: My kindle fire HDX drops WiFi too often. I have to turn off WiFi and reconnect many times every day. This issue occurs even when no other devices in the house are connected so I know it's not my WiFi causing the problem.

Reviews.Title: Price was right!
Reviews.Author: Happy All The Time "Grammy"
Reviews.Content: Really love the Kindle Fire. Your promotion prompted my quick purchase.  I love MayDay.  Great feature. My only complaint is - I wish all applications auto-rotated properly. I have a few that will only rotate certain ways. That makes my case up-side-down at times. Don't like that, but not a Kindle problem.As always, great service from Amazon. Thank you for your 5 star service!

Reviews.Title: Finally
Reviews.Author: Trina Williams
Reviews.Content: A tablet that does a lot more than allow you to read books.The touch screen is a bit stiff. I have to use the stylus most of the time.

Reviews.Title: Works great after five months, but have a few minor gripes
Reviews.Author: Rodney Cyr
Reviews.Content: I bought mine from Best Buy after Amazon shipping lost my order.  (I was going on a trip and needed it ASAP.)  I bought mine with the Amazon magnetic case which turns it on and off automatically when I open the case.  So far (five months) it has worked without a problem.  I use it to view downloaded movies and TV programs.  I have also used it as a photo album.  For both functions the colors are great.  I don't use it much for reading, except for a few magazine subscriptions.  I do most of my reading on a Paperwhite, which does work fine in daylight.The Kindle Fire's good points are:1) Very good color2) Very good resolutionIts bad points are:1) Hard to see in daylight, but then, so is my smartphone2) Low sound volume3) No mini-HDMI output port4) Hard to use selection screen for viewing movies - did not display titles, just an image from a few seconds into the program5) Possibly annoying ads on the home screen during start-upI suggest using the Sandisk APP that is intended for use with the Sandisk Media Connect, a storage device that connects to the Kindle Fire using WIFI.  The APP does show program titles, eliminating problem 4, above.  As I do own the Media Connect, I do not know whether or not you need it to use the APP.  It is possible that a subsequent firmware update has eliminated problem 4 anyway.I personally don't find the ads annoying, but others do.  In fact, the first ad I saw was for the Sandisk Media Connect, which I subsequently bought.I took off a star for the missing mini-HDMI port and for the low sound volume.

Reviews.Title: much improved
Reviews.Author: Dana G. Cook
Reviews.Content: I bought a iPad air and kindle fire hdx. I couldn't make up my mind so I bought both and tested them out. They are both great devices but I think the HDX is better for more people. Every app I wanted was available on the HDX. I had to load some apps, such as Next Issue, directly from web sites but the system works perfectly.  As a previous kindle and iPad owner, I always preferred the iPad web browser over silk. That is no longer the case. I had constant issues with the iPad browser and it didn't work with my bank's advanced features that I use such as person to person payments. The Amazon browser is much more stable and the reading view is awesome.  I have always felt that my iPad was more suited for access to apps and my fire for all things content related. Going forward, I don't see a need to own both. The fire HDX is superior for all things content related as it has been in the past, but with improved browsing, more apps, app switching and the mayday button this device is all I need.Superb product Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Purchase
Reviews.Author: R. Coleman
Reviews.Content: I bought the Kindle Fire HDX for myself intending simply to have a great storage system for technical books, etc. so that I could use it while learning Linux on my desktop since it is so much easier to have a tablet open in front of you for research while practicing using text editors, file management, etc. than to have an actual book. I love it for this purpose, but fell in love with all the other goodies that tablets have- such as streaming videos, movies, music, and so on. This thing really is spoiling me, as I never really use my desktop for media consumption- it's great to just reach out and grab this thing when having a sleepless  night; there is always something to do on the Kindle besides tossing and turning! So glad I finally made the move to Kindle and really, really love my Amazon Prime subscription...

Reviews.Title: LOVE!!!
Reviews.Author: mccool
Reviews.Content: I was only buying this to read my textbooks on but I have found so many more uses for it than just a book reader and I can't keep my kids off the apps n games. One of my son's who hates to read will read on the kindle.  Reading is reading however he does it thanks!!

Reviews.Title: Great tablet, only small design issues that don't impact overall experience.
Reviews.Author: Kara
Reviews.Content: LOVE!I really enjoy using this product.My only negative feedback so far is that when you plug the tablet in... the connection will eventually break the way that most phones break. There isn't enough structure/reinforcement around the outlet and power cord, and the location of it is such that it will have pressure on it over time and eventually loosen the connection and probably need to be repaired. Its is a problem I've had with a lot of phones too.The tablet itself performs very well, is lightweight and thin, and displays excellently. I'm not in love with the volume control and power buttons on the back of the tablet rather than on the sides, but I can live with it.The "special offers" enhancement is very non-invasive and totally worth it.

Reviews.Title: Hot Product
Reviews.Author: NancyEM
Reviews.Content: Wasn't sure which tablet to buy since there are so many on the market.  Decided on the Kindle HDX and I LOVE it.  It is as good as a laptop only smaller.  I can do anything on it and take it everywhere! Vibrant colors and watching movies on it is exceptional.  GREAT PRODUCT!

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!!!
Reviews.Author: cork999
Reviews.Content: I love it! I have owned 4 Kindles, and this one is definitely my favorite. It does still glare in sunlight tho. No matter how much anti-reflective glare covers you place on them. But, I love the rest of it. I haven't used the "MAYDAY" feature yet. After all the pads I have owned, I do pretty good on this one. The one thing I love about Kindles is the ease of use. My husband has an Ipad, and we love it, but, a Kindle is a bit more "user-friendly" in my opinion. Especially if you are not used to APPLE. Love it!!!!

Reviews.Title: Love my new Kindle
Reviews.Author: Mary Anne Kirchner
Reviews.Content: Love everything about it, especially the mayday button....that is the reason I bought this one instead of another tablet...I have used it and have not been disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: mertny
Reviews.Content: love this thing, super fast. haven't found anything that slows this sucker down yet. everything runs butter-smooth. Only wish it used Google Play, but I've found other appstores so it's nowhere near a deal breaker. honestly couldn't be happier with this purchase.if you're thinking about this, quit thinking and buy it.

Reviews.Title: Best Ever!!
Reviews.Author: chaosbleeds70
Reviews.Content: I have had my new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 about a month ago and I absolutely love it, it's been one of the best investments that I have made! The color and display is much brighter and clearer than the Kindle Fire HD, I love the new mayday button, help is just a click away and I can ask questions if I get stuck!! I like the way my books, games and movies looks and plays, I love how every thing sounds, the clarity and crispness of music is awesome!! I also love the front AND back facing camera and with the origami cover, not only does it protect my Kindle, but I can slide the Kindle up and it automatically activates my camera! ABSOLUTELY DELIGHTFUL!!!

Reviews.Title: doesn't support google play apps :(
Reviews.Author: Kendra Dawn
Reviews.Content: I love amazon and I love google!  I thought I'd get the best of both with the Kindle Fire....I was very disappointed to find out upon receiving this that kindle doesn't support google play apps and the amazon app store versions of google apps are sub-par.  Also, their app store is lacking.  I wasn't really digging their SILK browser and there were no other ways for me to load a different internet app.  Wait, correction: there are ways....but I didn't want to have to manage all the different crazy downloads of this and that and put up with error messages every time I turned my tablet on.  ([...])  On another note, I was astonished that I couldn't personalize the kindle more.  I kept getting these annoying offers on my lock screen which I turned off in the settings yet, they still appeared.  The Kindle fire really is a great product; beautiful screen and resolution, fast operating system, super sleek design...I just want a seamless interface that supports the google play store.  My fault for not researching more before I bought.  Really so disappointed that Kindle doesn't support google.  Back to the drawing board.

Reviews.Title: A gift for grandma
Reviews.Author: Dog Daze "Dash's mom"
Reviews.Content: I bought this kindle as a gift for my 75 year old mom. I'm very thankful to Charlie at Amazon who helped her set this up. My mom is hard of hearing so you have to talk loud and slow and Charlie was very patient and helpful. I am not familiar with any product unrelated to Apple and so NO help setting this up or operating it at all. But, I chose this for my mom because it has a decent size screen for her to see, large icons, access to Amazon help for operation 24/7 and seems very user friendly. The biggest plus is unlike Apple, who continuously phases out their own products with software updates so you are forced to spend money on their new products,that won't happen with this Kindle. This fact is the biggest reason I didn't buy her an apple tablet. My mom has had this tablet for only three days. So far she loves her scrabble app and has purchased books she loves to read. I am also hoping she'll enjoy movies and TV on this from Amazon Prime while I'm away at work and she baby sits my 3 kids. Grandma is dependable, great with children, a giver of love, a peaceful conflict resolutionist and plays well with androids. Buy a Kindle for your grandma today.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is the best!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon fan "Lourdes"
Reviews.Content: I bought the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 a few months ago. It is awesome. You can take great pics with it (8 megapixels). It is very user friendly and there are many apps to choose from, also tons of books. If you like to play music on your Kindle you will not be disappointed, the quality of the sound is incredible. I had previously owned a Kindle Fire 7" and after buying the 8.9 HDX gave the older one to my sister.. she loves it. I would highly recommend the Amazon Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 to everyone that desires a great tablet. You really can't ask for much more!!

Reviews.Title: Kingle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I really love it.  Since I have pain in my hands, it is so helpful to be able to hold it and not have to turn page.  I must admit, I didn't think I was going to like it because I am an avid reader andthought I would miss holding my beloved books.

Reviews.Title: A very good device
Reviews.Author: Duckman "Duckman"
Reviews.Content: I thought with having 64 GB would give me plenty of space for storage, boy was I wrong.  I bought it mainly for use on vacation, reading and returning emails, watching movies or reading books.  The movies especially in 1080p take up a lot of space, as much as six GB each.  This leaves little room for anything else.  I will say thou, the picture quality is outstanding.  The best I've ever seen, even better than a I pad.  I just wish that there was a slot for removable storage. Also the I would like to mention that the sound for such a small device is also very good.  hard to believe that such full rich sound can come out of such a small speaker. As long as you understand it's limitations, don't hesitate to buy one.

Reviews.Title: Great product and enjoying it
Reviews.Author: mypointofview
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a gift for my wife and she has been thrilled with it.  I know she has enjoyed many hours playing games and reading books on it.  She is fairly non-technical and I'm very technical as I work in the industry.  I judge how good a product is by how much she asks me to solve problems for her and that has been zero with the kindle fire HDX.  As the saying goes, if the wife is happy, I'm happy.

Reviews.Title: Happy customer
Reviews.Author: judy
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with my kindle, everyday I learn more about it, this is my third kindle I have purchased. I have one that my son gave me as a present, the black and white $69 one, that started me out. I use that one mostly for reading. My kindle hdx  fire was purchased to use for traveling so that we can stay connected if need be to the internet, our mini computer, so to say, and watch movies on long road trips. I even bought a kindle for my daughter too, as her children broke the one she had. I am very pleased with the color of the kindle hdx, what else can I say I am a very happy owner of all the kindles I own.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Lee Bennett
Reviews.Content: Got i for my wife. She loves it, its fast and she loves the mayday thing. Great product and great service from amazon.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet if you do not want iPad
Reviews.Author: Tahni Gould "Tahni"
Reviews.Content: I like this better than the older Kindle. I got this because it had a camera and I did not want the iPAD. Love this Kindle. Even when I had a problem with the first one I got (did not work unless plugged into the wall), easy to get it replaced. I love the things I can do with the camera, video camera and sending these to facebook. Glad I made this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Best full color tablet
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: My wife is in 7th heaven with this thing. She's an avid book reader and now she can easily take a number of books with her. With all the other features this can't be beat.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: P. Rosen
Reviews.Content: Great - love it.  Still use regular Kindle for books tho since I find it easier to hold and read.

Reviews.Title: Faster than the previous Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Donna J. Kelley
Reviews.Content: I read several reviews and finally decided to upgrade to the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" Wi-Fi.  I'm so glad that I did, because now I can sit in my living room and download content without getting dropped and I can play games on it without it freezing and taking forever to upload. I'm very happy with my purchase and would recommend it to anyone that is thinking of upgrading to this generation.  There's only one draw back really, that if you upgrade to 4G and you aren't currently going through AT&T; or Verizon for your internet, that you would have to pay for this service.  Since 4G is not currently available in the area I live in, it made perfect sense to go with Wi-Fi.

Reviews.Title: As Advertized
Reviews.Author: 1st Sgt
Reviews.Content: Putting out over $350 was a hard decision for this cash-strapped retired person.  I have the $69 Kindle, and had it loaded up with books.  When my new Kindle arrived, I registered it, and all my books transferred over automatically...something I was worried.  I did have a problem with signing into Kiva, a micro finance institution.  I pushed the "Help" button, and in 5 seconds there was a gal on my screen asking, "How can I help you".  I told her my problem.  She did some kind of hokey poky inside my Kindle, then asked me to try to sign in.  Bingo..it works just fine.  What a great feature, what a great device!  Faster downloading apps and internet pages than my Galaxy S3.  Enjoy yours.

Reviews.Title: Christmas Gift of Kindle
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I am just crazy about my Kindle Fire HDX.  I also signed up for Kindle Prime and I watched my first free movie last night.  I am so glad I asked for the Kindle.  I also added the Yahoo App for weather and have set up a few cities and check them everyday.  Of course, I have downloaded quite a few books already.  I just can't express in enough words how much I enjoy my Kindle HDX.  I ran into a small problem in regards to searching for movies and I called Amazon and Mary Ann walked me through it in 5 minutes.  Great customer service from a very nice lady.

Reviews.Title: MY HUSBAND IS JEALOUS OF MY KINDLE LOVE AFFAIR....LOL!!!
Reviews.Author: Victoria Mendez
Reviews.Content: I have become a hardcore Kindle freak.... and now I have two...one 7inch hdx and one 8.9inch hdx....Love em both....I'm a nurse so the 7inch hdx I use for work and the 8.9 hdx is for having fun at home. I'm a reader and a movie buff so the so called "closed" system of Kindle isn't an issue for me. Any google app I have on my android I have either successfully  found on kindle's system or found a satisfactory or BETTER replacement for it....seriously the best tablet anywhere for those who don't require a windows os. The screen resoulution is AMAZING....I'm a prime member too so I have TONS of free movies to watch....the speed is lightening fast and no freezing issues as some have experienced. I love AMAZON....who ever owns this company...."WAY TO GO!!!! I HOPE YOU BECOME A BILLIONAIRE BECAUSE YOUR SERVICES, PRODUCTS AND COMMITMENT TO EXELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE ACTUALLY MAKE PEOPLE'S LIVES BETTER" XXOO ;-)

Reviews.Title: almost perfect
Reviews.Author: Bob Linda
Reviews.Content: Would be a 5 star, but the Wi-Fi disconnects too much, my wife's IPad stays connected much better, and its only a gen3

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: M.Mitchell
Reviews.Content: I own 3 Kindles,The original Paper White, Kindle Fire HD, and now The New Kindle Fire HDX8.9. Although I love them all,the latest is perfect for me! The 1st. One was only for reading,out in my porch,at the pool in the summer. When I saw the Fire in color,and it was pretty much like a laptop I bought it and loved everything about it. It did have a glare,but that was fixed with a screen saver. I have a lot of health problems,and my Kindle keeps me company and reading is my pass time,but one of my disabilities is my eyesight is getting really bad. The New Fire HDX, 8.9, has a nice sized screen, no glare, more clear, and a lot thinner and lighter. I don't have any bad things to say about either of them but this one is perfect! Thank you to the makers, and Thank you to Amazon for the super fast 2 day Prime Shipping. If anyone has thought about buying a kindle this is the one to get.

Reviews.Title: Look out Apple!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The tablet is fast enough, has gorgeous color and he picture, is incredibly light, and even for a low tech writer, fairly easy to operate once you fool around with it for a few days.Mayday is excellent for when you really get confused. Great idea. I am sure everyone will soon copy it!Don't miss the Google play store since I buy those apps on my Samsung Galaxy S4 phone.

Reviews.Title: Love it except for the Sound
Reviews.Author: Victoria
Reviews.Content: I was already the proud owner of the Kindle Fire HD 7" and decided to get the 8.9' Kindle Fire HDX in addition, for the larger screen and two way camera.  I found the sound to be a bit distorted and low in volume, compared to HD 7". Then I compared it to the Kindle Fire HDX 7" (my sister-in-law) and it was the same result, both 7" were clear and loud compared to the muddled sound of the 8.9".  I proceeded to return twice and I found all three Kindle Fire HDX 8.9' I tried were all comparable in sound.  I gathered that the 8.9" is calibrated at a lower volume, all three were not audible until one quarter up the volume scale.  I am hopping this was done for engineering reasons like vibration or something than an evil plot to get you to buy speakers, which I did.  If anyone knows the real story please share it with me.

Reviews.Title: Bought for Photography / Miracast
Reviews.Author: Nanhenker
Reviews.Content: I did not have or need a tablet, but I wanted a quick and clean way to mirror photos and video to the big screen, and I have been a long-time user of Verizon mobile hotspot connectivity because I'm never at home.  I was instantly impressed with the color display as well as the very decent audio.  I consider myself a serious amateur photographer, and I have  to say that I am using my Kindle for quick clear macro shots instead of my cameras; but of course this is only a tablet camera. The connectivity is flawless, and the download speeds are like lightning with the double processors. I have used this device to control my GoPro camera remotely; nice!  (Although the free app had to be sideloaded.)  I do wish the built in Silk web browser had Flash compatibility, and the that the Google Play store was not blocked.  There are other sites that you can get apps from, and I understand why Amazon wants to protect itself as well as our devices, but the Amazon app store is severely limited.  There are simple effective workarounds for most major complaints here, and I have used the Amazon experimental video streaming player, however on some sites (read: subscription) where it will  not work when the content is routed off the site's servers to Amazon's servers. I'm working on how to fix this.  I have used every major feature except the Miracast, which I will try when I get an adapter for the TV, but so far, the device is lovely and fast!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Tablet
Reviews.Author: Zettie
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful tablet.  I wanted to upgrade from my older Kindle Fire and this is great.  It is lightweight and easy to read.  I am enjoying all of the great features of this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Shocked at how great this is...
Reviews.Author: Sam F.
Reviews.Content: I was a little skeptical of the entire tablet category, thinking they were just laptops that were less useful. And I didn't like how big full-size iPads were. But after a couple months with this unit, I enthusiastically endorse the HDX. It's completely eliminated the near-nightly fight over the main TV and DVR. The wife doesn't have to be relegated to the bedroom to watch something when we want to watch sports.Admittedly, the strength of this is as a content delivery device. I haven't really used it for office stuff and doubt it would be well-suited for that. But as a method to get books/movies/mags/TV shows, it's really unequaled. The real power isn't fully realized unless combined with Amazon Prime - seamlessly integrated into the operating system. If you have a bunch of Apple or Google Play content, the case for the HDX isn't nearly as compelling, but even then I think it's still a strong case on the combination of ease of use, perfect size, light weight, performance, and price. But with Prime, it's really no contest. Very satisfied. We use our Kindle HDXs (we have both a 7 inch and 8.9 inch) daily.The only thing I wish it had was GPS....you can still use Google Maps (no, it's not in the Amazon App Store, but it's fairly easy to add, along with Chrome, as the included Silk browser...well....kinda sucks) but it won't enable turn-by-turn directions since there's no GPS. Small price to pay for a primarily home-content device, though.

Reviews.Title: I absolutely love it!
Reviews.Author: Azlina Abdul Aziz
Reviews.Content: I sold off my Kindle Fire HD 8.9 to buy the new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 and I am so glad I did. The new Kindle Fire HDX is so light and with the specifications of a Quad Core 2.2 Ghz Snapdragon and 2 GB RAM, it is so buttery smooth. The display is fantastic. I am so happy I made this purchase. I just wish I could download google play though and that would hit the sweet spot. Nevertheless, I would highly recommend this tablet to people interested in media consumption.

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire HDX 8.9" Wi-Fi 4G LTE
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: The Kindle fire HDX 8.9" Wi-Fi 4G LTE works as promised. I love everything about this Kindle. it is handy for watching Netflix, reading, using the internet, and playing games. I wish they left the micro HDMI slot, which is the only negative I have. the mayday button is amazing. I regret that I did not get to thank the young lady that helped me. I would recommend an Amazon Prime account. Amazon Prime has a lot of free movie and TV shows to watch, and it is handy if you like to rent movies, plus the discounts you get and free delivery on a lot of items in the store.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Barbara L. Suesz
Reviews.Content: Our computer is set up downstairs.  When my husband had back surgery recently, the kindle fire was so nice for him to use from his chair upstairs.  It did have a learning curve and had some frustration over buying a book to tell you how to operate.  Our other kindles came with an owners manuel installed and that would have been nice.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: SAD
Reviews.Content: This is my third Kindle, they have done a great job on it! I like to read at night before going to sleep the lighted screen is just perfect my husband can sleep while I read, I don't have to have the light on. Screen can be changed to paper so it is not to bright so can still go to sleep. Color is perfect!!! The only thing I have trouble with is it it a sluggish changing the page on pentrest, but would not trade it. Oh, I gave my older one to my sister in law and she loves it!!

Reviews.Title: Very happy but...
Reviews.Author: ogre1164
Reviews.Content: Does everything they say it does and does it well. Compares very favorably with my wife's iPad. Very happy. Only disappointment is the fact that you can only get apps from Amazon. No Google apps. No Google Play. I understand you can jailbreak (or root) the device but it apparently voids the warranty. Come on Amazon don't you get enough of my money without nickel and diming me on a poor selection of apps? I also hate the "special offers"

Reviews.Title: Amazon does it again!
Reviews.Author: loreli
Reviews.Content: OMG, the best Christmas present ever!  I gave it to my husband  for Christmas, he hasn't put it down. HDX 8.9 speed, display, ease of operation, gaming is awesome, the camera rivals anything, viewing tv or movies is amazing, gotta love that mayday button.  Problem?  My Kindle Fire is so slow in comparison now!  So, the moment my husband goes to sleep or work, down goes my Kindle Fire, and I grab his 8.9 HDX WI-FI! Can't afford to get a second HDX right now, but luckily he doesn't mind sharing. Well, sometimes,  way to go Amazon! Did I mention amazing service?

Reviews.Title: Absolutely slick!
Reviews.Author: Mark D
Reviews.Content: I've had android devices ever since the tmobile G1 was released (I had a pre-order).  I have never had a device like this before though.  It is smooth- I have not experienced the lag or other distractions that remind you that you are on an android device.  This is likely due to the tweaks amazon have made to the android OS (to make it into Fire OS) as well as the blazing quad-core processor.  The speakers in this device add to the gaming experience and the processor drives games to awesome visual depth.  An office suite is also included.I didn't buy this device for gaming.  It was the specs vs. price which attracted me.  A 2.2ghZ quad-core processor is the fastest I could find in an android device and the Amazon integration is great but not overly distracting.  I have no regrets about my purchase at all.

Reviews.Title: nice upgrade from hd
Reviews.Author: Gram
Reviews.Content: I'm finding more things I love about the HDX each day. I think the best upgrade is the camera..Although I have used the May Day feature a couple of times. This service is GREAT! The reps are so helpful and congenial. I purchased a Samsung smart t.v. and next thing I know the kindle was asking me if I wanted to watch Netflix on the kindle hdx or the Samsung t.v.. I'm not tecky so all these new features are wonderful!!  Best tablet for the best price! I rarely ever use my computer anymore. No reason to - I can do everything right from here!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Debra Schultheis
Reviews.Content: I've been an Apple fan for a long time but because of the high prices, I thought I would give this a try.  I'm glad I did.  It has everything my Ipad 4th gen has and it actually seems a little faster.  It was easy to set up and get into.  Although, I am still learning, I enjoy all it has to offer and recommend it to anyone.  Very impressive.The only bad thing I found out was that no one in my area carries any of the cases for the 8.9" display model so Amazon you're there for me again.  Thanks Amazon!D. S., Illinois

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire HDX 8.9 inches, HDX display, Wi-Fi, 32GB- includes special offers
Reviews.Author: RainyDaisy
Reviews.Content: I like the feature of the Mayday button on the Kindle fire HDX.  I can contact Mayday and they take care of any problem that I seem to be having with My my Kindle fire HDX.  Another feature that I really like is the voice recognition, and so I am getting lazy,  I now use the voice recognition for all of the typing that I need to do.  This is quicker, and it saves me a lot of time.  I have used the camera just a little bit and it takes really good clear pictures.  I have watched a movie on my Kindle fire HDX and the sound is clear and the movies are perfect.  I am very pleased with the Kindle fire HDX.

Reviews.Title: If I bought this before my MacBook Air, it would be my only computer.
Reviews.Author: smac46r "smac46r"
Reviews.Content: If this Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" had an SD and HDMI slot, I would give it 5 stars.  If you are really only looking for access to the web, email, Facebook, video content and apps this tablet is fantastic.  It connects to my wireless printer, so I can conduct Ebay selling on it.  Has great wireless range, and is crystal clear.  The camera on the rear is fine - especially in daylight.  LED flash does not go much farther than a few feet, so low light pics are not great (no biggie for me).  I bought the 32 GB, and spent a fair amount of time comparing the iPad Air to it, and at such a lower price, this tablet is was a no brainer.  Bought during an Amazon deal day, it was $40 off the "regular" price.  With the comparable iPad Air being $599 (NEVER going on sale), and this model HDX costing $389, there was no way I was willing to spend an extra $210.  I would definitely recommend this tablet.  Has worked flawlessly so far, and the live (US based) "Mayday" help is fantastic.  LOVE IT!

Reviews.Title: wow
Reviews.Author: derek corson
Reviews.Content: first purchased my wife a kindle reader. used daily till the batteries died. bought her an upgrade and my daughter got number one. i finally broke down and got the first color kindle. again used daily till the batteries die. looked at the 8.9 and thought about it until Amazon had a special, so no excuses! 64 gb all out, love it. havent seen anything better yet!

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Stephanie
Reviews.Content: Was a gift to me. User friendly, this is my 1st kindle. Easy to read from the screen& I like the auto-brightness feature. Great battery life, charge every few days. Saves me from opening my large laptop for simple tasks such as checking email, a recipe or reading a book. I really like the malware screen protector kit I put on it too.

Reviews.Title: Impressive
Reviews.Author: Deon Rosegreen
Reviews.Content: The kindle hdx is an awesome machine. I've done a lot of tablet research and I was unable to find any other tablet with as much ram and processor speed. A huge benefit is the wifi range. My iPhone could not find the network as to the kindle could see it and even had two bars. (That's insane) pretty much the only cons I have are the lack of none expandable memory which at this point isn't that much if an issue. Secondly the semi closed app market. Things like iTunes sync you have to pay for but again this is a minor issue. All in all I couldn't ask for a better tab. Money well spent if you ask me.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire
Reviews.Author: GFRESH
Reviews.Content: The is my first tablet, i hve been watching "the kindle fire hdx 8.9 vs the ipad" for a few months, until i decided to get thet kindle. I even thik my wife is jealous that my KF is better than her I

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: garry shavers
Reviews.Content: Very nice screen is amazing does everything I have ask it to do. Still testing it.. I read lots of reviews and I am glad I went with this kindle.

Reviews.Title: Excellent for Media consumption
Reviews.Author: K. Lange
Reviews.Content: The Kindle HDX is the best tablet for media consumption there is. I have 9 Tablets including 4 kindles and I always reach for my HDX 8.9 first.There are a coulple of advertised features that are more help than hype:Printing: you need an app which is free but any tablet can print to a wireless printer with the right software.Office Suite: is read only.Rear facing camera: Is OK but I don't have a lot of need to take pictures sittin on my couch watchin' a movie. Also the slide the tablet out of the Origami case to expose the camera thing is more cute than usefull.Second screen, only for Samsung tvs and PS/3s Not exactly a wide market.Miracast: The device they recommend for the kindle  has only a 3 out of 5 star rating and costs $59, and then you still have to have an hdmi cable from it to the TV. I haven't got up the guts to risk it yet. I would've rather they kept the hardware port.Display: Gorgeous.Processor: Fast. The tablet can navigate as fast as I can swipe.Some of the stuff that deserves the Hype:Mayday: its everything they say it is.64GB: I can watch all day and all night if I have the power for it.New Buttons: These are way better than the old especially using them through a case.text to speech:  you got like 6 different english voices to choose from with the HDX and they sound very realistic.Origami Case:  Thinnest Rotatable standing case you'll ever find. Holding the tablet in with magnets is strange, but you get used to it.Better wifi:  My HD8.9 had problems with my router, and I would have to recycle my router once every day or so to get it back on line. My HDX has no such problems.

Reviews.Title: Gramma is getting technology smart
Reviews.Author: Joyce Schwartz
Reviews.Content: I'm still learning what this piece of technology can do. So far am having fun with it and looking forward to learning more.

Reviews.Title: Great...but.
Reviews.Author: Paul Shetley
Reviews.Content: Not compatible with flash player or dolphin browser like my kindle hd was. Other than that...Great! I recommend this item.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Sallyanne Urciuoli
Reviews.Content: Love it so much...that my mother in law bought one as well! Would recommend this product to everyone. Two thumbs up!

Reviews.Title: It's fun
Reviews.Author: Lissak
Reviews.Content: For the most part I really like my new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" 64 GB. The apps are fun and I read on it all the time. Most things work really well.It has a couple of problems though.... the battery drains fast and the Silk Browser crashes often, which is really annoying. Hopefully they fix that through a software update.  I'll probably come back and give it another star if they do.

Reviews.Title: Thought it had MAYDAY and had to be UNREGISTERED.
Reviews.Author: Diane Williams
Reviews.Content: Didn't realize it would come with an ID already on it that I had to changed before I could try to order a book.  Kept getting an error message.  Had to have my daughter help me and after a LONG time she figured out it had to unregisterd and then registered under me.  Also I thought It had the MAYDAY button it.  When I ordered it, it didn't say anything one way or the other so I assumed it would be on the Kindle.

Reviews.Title: miss my original kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Julianne Henning
Reviews.Content: I have to turn it off and restart all the time. Apps hang up and it locks up a lot. Not sure what the issue is. Maybe this particular one is a lemon.  I really miss my old kindle fire. Not a lick of problems with it.

Reviews.Title: disappointing
Reviews.Author: Dar
Reviews.Content: Not happy I can,t watch videos.  I cannot play some of my games.  Could not get itunes.  Missing to many things I like to do.

Reviews.Title: It beats my laptop
Reviews.Author: Thomas Peterson
Reviews.Content: I paid over five hundred bucks for my laptop and this smokes it. Definately a very good buy. I totally reccommend

Reviews.Title: Miss my ipad
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: My first generation ipad had just about had it so my husband got me the new kindle for Christmas.  The ads had us convinced it was just as good as an iPad just better priced. Although I like the excellent picture and lightweight feel, I still miss my ipad. I find kindle's android platform much less user friendly and am disappointed I can't get a bunch of my favorite apps on my kindle. I can't seem to customize the home or lock screen either. If you've always had Android products than I'm sure kindle is right from you...but if you're thinking of making a shift from Apple to Android I think you'll find yourself homesick like me.

Reviews.Title: It's okay I guess
Reviews.Author: Mark S. Marinelli
Reviews.Content: No audio for Mayday feature.Even with a great signal it consistently logs off.Nice color/graphics.Relatively fast despite problems listed.Wonder if I simply have a lemon?

Reviews.Title: Too many limitations
Reviews.Author: Wilma Huffman
Reviews.Content: Amazon has put too many limitations on the tablet, ie., slimmed down browser and selective use of apps etc.  not the android you might think you are buying.  Also, I bought a case with an opening for the camera, but the tablet still thinks I have to push the tablet up out of the case to use it.  Very inconvenient and MAYDAY has no solution.  When in the case, if you open the camera app a big sign comes up on your screen-in the middle of where you are trying to take a picture, and says "push up to take a picture"

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: DIANE KELLEY
Reviews.Content: I have always loved the Kindle products, but this is by far the most amazing of the group. The picture is crystal clear and sound is much improved. My only comment is the location of the power and volume buttons - they are on the back edges and are not easy to get to with a cover on. I liked the edge placement better.

Reviews.Title: Quite good, with one limitation
Reviews.Author: T. Miller
Reviews.Content: Overall I am pleased with the device.  It is a thin, light unit with an excellent display.  Battery life is excellent.  The system software is robust but not perfect, I experienced two instances of network lockup in a month, both times were resolved by a power cycle.  (In each case, the OS indicated the wireless network was up, but an application reported the network was unavailable.)  The Amazon Prime library has a good free movie selection, although they obviously prefer to sell programming -- which is priced competitively with other on-line media services.  Applications are easily available only through the Amazon app store.  Some folks will view the curated Amazon app selection as a good thing -- "sanitized for your protection".  Coming to Amazon from the wide-open Google Play environment, I was mildly annoyed by Amazon's modestly more-restrictive selection. For those who chafe at Amazon's selection, a bit of web searching will show you how to sideload apps to the Kindle (Amazon does provide the ES File Explorer app, which is a very useful tool for the task).

Reviews.Title: So so wonderful
Reviews.Author: Candy, Ohio
Reviews.Content: I love it. This is my second kindle I have.  The first one was a kindle fire HD 7". I needed a bigger screen so I got the next bigger one kindle fire HDX 8.9. I love it so much. Quality is wonderful. Kindle products will never disappoint you.  Love reading or surfing the web. This is what you need then. And you get lots of free books to.

Reviews.Title: Lovin' my Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: D. Stone "Bedford Wife"
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is all I expected it to be.  It performs quickly and without very many glitches.  It is not a PC, so it does sometimes have issues opening web pages or with links, but by downloading a second browser, I could get around many of those.  I'm still exploring the many things I can do with my Kindle.  Reading on it is great, once I stopped trying to flip the pages ;)  There are so many free books available, too!  I've taken some good photos, used Skype, and played games with my grandkids.  The Special Offers included are not annoying, only seen on the opening screen.  My only concern is that it does eat up battery time pretty quickly when browsing or playing games.  I find it needs charging nearly every night.  Was awesome to have it on a recent trip.  So light to carry on a plane!

Reviews.Title: email does not sync, printing difficult
Reviews.Author: steve phillips
Reviews.Content: I was disappointed to find out that email does not sync.  I have att.net and while all the email loads, there are no contacts, folders or updating of deleted, sent, etc.  I have to manually delete all received emails.  Printing to my wireless canon pixma722 printer does not appear possible (or easily done) is another major issue.  To me, email and printing are basic functions of a tablet that should be a given feature.

Reviews.Title: Stays on it.
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer "fletch1"
Reviews.Content: I think I've lost my wife. She stays on it to much. But I'm happy she loves it. Oh well , at least she's home.

Reviews.Title: Christmas Gift
Reviews.Author: Carol Donovan "Luv my Westie pup"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my son for Christmas along with the wireless keyboard.  as a MAC user myself, I was absolutely impressed with the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 - when I can, I plan on purchasing one for myself! Sorry Apple

Reviews.Title: Outstanding tablet (but)
Reviews.Author: Clinton
Reviews.Content: This product is right up there with those of Apple and Samsung. I actually tried it out for 30 days for free while I had my ipad air with me. The screen is magnificent and bright much more superior to that of the ipad air. Some games actually tend to run smoother on it and I never experienced any sort of lag. It's perfect for movies, videos and some games in particular. The tablet is comfortable to hold in the hands.Now cons- from the very first day the back panel attracts fingerprint so much and is very noticeable and might be a turn off for some.The operating system is so boring and very dull looking. It's not cool and very non adjustable. I wish they had gone for an open android like system.Extra - the cameras are average, like any other tabletAll in all this is a very good product and I was very impressed with it and even though I chose the ipad over it, the only significant benefit from that is just the numerous tablet optimized apps for the ipad. Otherwise this is better.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9", HDX Display, Wi-Fi, 16 GB - Includes Special Offer
Reviews.Author: Ella Lindenhofen
Reviews.Content: I just received my new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9", 16 GB tablet an hour ago, so I will have to return in a month or two to give a true review, but I can say that I am a 67 year old widow and not what you would call an expert in the field of high tech gadgets. I took the Kindle out of the box, plugged it in and synced up with my router and was up and running in no time. If you can read directions you can set this up without a problem. I actually watched Downton Abbey first episode from Amazon Prime and it was incredible. Picture quality is outstanding, and the sound is fantastic. There are still plenty of feature's to explore, as I would like to stream movies and watch them on my TV, etc.  I will write a follow-up in a month to see if I am still as elated as I am today.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Kinney
Reviews.Content: This is my 7th Kindle purchase, and so far the best. I have given kindles to family members and they share my enthusiasm for the Kindle.

Reviews.Title: I. LOVE. IT.  Beautiful display, excellent sound.  Perfect.
Reviews.Author: Sandra Acquistapace
Reviews.Content: The problem is I never want to put it down.  Watching movies with some headphones is similar to watching on my large screen tv. (not kidding).  The device is very responsive has plenty of options/settings to personalize to your preferences, such as changing the "sleep" timer setting (default is 5 minutes).  To get the full benefits of owning this latest 8.9" HDX Kindle Fire you might want to consider becoming an Amazon Prime member.  Excellent product and Worth Every Cent!!

Reviews.Title: the fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Nancy Saladin
Reviews.Content: The weight of the kindle is light.  The screen is very easy to read.  I enjoy using it, but it did freeze up on me once, and I couldn't turn it off or do anything with it.  It ran out of power of its own accord and seems to be working okay now.

Reviews.Title: why I love my kindle fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: mary
Reviews.Content: This was a first purchase for me and I was NOT disappointed !! I researched a good bit, prior to purchasing the Kindle Fire and found it was recommended as being superior to it's competition. I would highly advise anyone looking for any device that does it all, with ease of use, to get themelves a Kindle Fire HDX 8.9. I just love it !!

Reviews.Title: LOVE MY KINDLE FIRE HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: MARGIE KITCHENS
Reviews.Content: Love my new Kindle, 8.9 great size take it everwhere. Im on my free 30 day trial membership of Prime at this time wished, Primed members could borrow more than 1 free book a month and I wish there was more movie you could watch for free even if the yearly rate was a little more than $79.00 year. would gladly pay a little more if more was offered. THANK YOU

Reviews.Title: Just what I had hoped for
Reviews.Author: cjneedlepoint "cjvisser"
Reviews.Content: This tablet is everything I had hoped it would be.  I can use it fully anywhere there is Wi-Fi including at hotels internationally.  I get my e-mail, browse the web, order on the web, read my Kindle books, play games, Google information, etc.  It has been like having a mini-laptop wherever I am.  I know some reviews have dissed it concerning downloading movies.  I have not done that so I cannot speak to its problems there.  I just know it is what I was looking for.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX rocks! Best electronic I have purchased.
Reviews.Author: d.peterson
Reviews.Content: I recommend this product to the entire world! This is the best electronic toy out there. If you want to make your knowledge go somewhere this is it.

Reviews.Title: More than expected
Reviews.Author: angeleverlast "AG"
Reviews.Content: I got this for my mom for Christmas.  She hasn't put it down since she opened it. She had a kindle fire, which is now mine and the fire is nice as well.

Reviews.Title: Wow
Reviews.Author: Lisa Freeman
Reviews.Content: It's really more than I expected, every thing and more than I can do with my laptop apps make it capable of doing everything

Reviews.Title: The second kindle as a gift.
Reviews.Author: linda vailous
Reviews.Content: This gift was for my husband. An upgrade to the Kindle Fire HDX. He loves it. This is the first time it was a no brainer. The old kindle will go to a family member.Grade sizeNew features great.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: jade barb
Reviews.Content: Got mine for Christmas. I've gotta say that I've had a blast using it! Incredible clarity, lighting fast speed when downloading anything, and the prime library rivals that of Netflix. Games have no lag, books are very easy to read... I love my kindle. I use it way more than my computer now, haha

Reviews.Title: It's an amazing tablet for its price.
Reviews.Author: Steven R "S R"
Reviews.Content: For this price I don't think you will find anything better. If you're a Prime member then there's no question that this tablet is for you, but even if not, the graphocs is still stunning and battery performance is great. This is the real deal!

Reviews.Title: Wife loves it!!
Reviews.Author: Lisa Isbell
Reviews.Content: Got  the kindle fire for my wife for Christmas . She loves it!! Not sure if it's good for me. I think she has a new best friend.... Lol

Reviews.Title: gifted
Reviews.Author: Matt Merrill
Reviews.Content: It was a gift for my wife. i dont use it at all. but my wife seems to enjoy it very mucj

Reviews.Title: Wifi Spotty
Reviews.Author: Christopher J. Saam "Csaam"
Reviews.Content: I have a heck of a time getting this kindle to discover networks and once connected stay connected.  I can sit with this device and my POS Kyocera Rise phone and have the Rise work and the Kindle not.  I've owned at least one kindle in each of the last 3 generations and this is the first time I have seen this problem.  Without reliable wifi this device is a very over priced ereader.

Reviews.Title: 8.9" HDX is a great media tablet
Reviews.Author: Bill Esposito
Reviews.Content: I'm not going to go into a long technical review of this tablet as there are plenty of those reviews for you to read here.I bought the 64 gig 8.9" HDX, I currently own and use a Samsung Note 3 for my phone and a Galaxy 10.1" tablet (mostly retired since the HDX).  I travel out of town via air about 40 weeks a year and have been doing that for about 10 years.  I've tried all sorts of portable media devices from Archos, Ipods, MP3 players smart phones and tablets.The HDX is the first media device that I've owned that has actually met all my traveling needs.What I like:SizeAmazon Prime DownloadsNetflixSideloaded appsWhat I don't like:Wish there were more downloadable moviesWish the Amazon Appstore had ALL the apps I wantThe size is the feature which first sold me on the HDX.  It is a large screen and very thin and light.  So thin and light that I did not want to put a heavy case on it and have purchased the Leather Kindle Fire HD/HDX 8.9" Sleeve by Dockem  so that I can remove it and leave it in my backpack while using the HDX and keep my tablet thin and light.
