I also purchased the Anker® Multi-Angle Portable Stand  for watching movies.Amazon Prime Downloads.  I just flew from east to west and back this past week. Was in brand new airplanes in First Class but there was no on board entertainment. I watched three Amazon Prime movies and finished a book.  Need I say more?Netflix has a better video selection in my opinion and the app for the Kindle works great.Apps.  I've not found an app that I've needed that if not on the Amazon AppStore I couldn't side load from another source.  Each day I use the Kindle the restrictive app store offerings are mitigated.Back to Amazon movies.  I just wish that there were more current offerings...maybe it will get better as time goes on.And lastly, while there are work arounds for just about everyghing on the Kindle, it would just be easier if you could load Google PlayStore apps....And this is really the last thing, I just bought Laser Projection Virtual Keyboard and after about 5 minutes of practice I find that it works great.  Vastly speeds text input for both my Kindle and phone.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: anne vincent
Reviews.Content: I love it! So easy to use, with great options for the whole family.  Glad I got the bigger screen size.  I just wish there were more cover options.It was difficult to find a cover.

Reviews.Title: 4.5 Stars - Review for HDX 8.9 16GB Wi-Fi version
Reviews.Author: Nadine - Hook Me Up Book Blog
Reviews.Content: Review from a book blogger perspectiveI bought me the kindle for Xmas and have to say I’m pleasantly surprised. Its sleek design and thinness makes reading so much more fun and less a hassle. Compared to the iPad, the weight difference is truly obvious. It’s easy to navigate, especially if it’s your first tablet as it's for me.It synchs your contacts and Amazon infos easily; even Goodreads was already on it, which is a big plus if you’re a book-addict like me. Adding your email accounts was done super-fast and even my gmail calendar got synched. The bright colors and the sharpness of the screen is just amazing. I love to see all the book covers in color instead of the boring black and grey.The two cameras are great –I can’t complain about them. While skyping I had a great picture and my family could see everything clearly. The photo editing options are easy to handle and navigate; totally dummy safe.What threw me off was that if you have read/finished a book it still stays on the screen (under Book and then click Device/Cloud) –it’s confusing. I’m used that when I finish a book and move it to a special genre folder that it’s gone from my home screen but with the kindle fire it’s not the case. It took me quite some time to get used to that.Another thing that bugs me is that I CAN’T switch out/change the screensaver photo for one of my personal pics or background pics –bummer. Compared to my older kindle, the battery dies faster, which is a bit annoying but I blame myself for using it way more –surfing the net, checking social sites etc.But other than that, I LOVE MY KINDLE FIRE HDX and I’m happy I bought it. Reading, highlighting, sharing book quotes is so much easier.I highly recommend it!!

Reviews.Title: This is one great tablet
Reviews.Author: Kent Ogaard
Reviews.Content: I bought a new ipad air and this HDX 8.9 and can compare them side by side. I ordered the ipad first because the HDX was not available yet. I would not have bought the ipad if I would have had this kindle fire first. it does everything and more and costs less

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: DJ
Reviews.Content: I really like this tablet.  It's the first tablet I've purchased, so I'm still in the learning mode, so to speak.  But so far so good!

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx 8.9
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Bezold
Reviews.Content: Kindle fire HDX:Lives up to its expectation.  Larger screen worth the money! I have enjoyed all the features from reading books to watching movies to checking emails etc.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: AllenMW
Reviews.Content: This device meets or exceeds all of my expectations. It is versatile. Easy to use. I have utilized the Mayday button, and am very satisfied with the experience. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet!
Reviews.Author: Gary
Reviews.Content: This is my first ever tablet.  I wasn't sure whether to go with a Windows or Google-based product but ultimately decided on the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 64 gig because of it's top-rated screen quality.  I've only had it for a little over a week and so far I am really impressed!  I know from reading a lot of reviews that many people would like to see more apps such as what you can get at the Google store...I must admit there a few that I have on my Android phone that I can't get on Amazon but I am hopeful that they will eventually get added.  The tablet is incredibly thin and light!  I did also purchase the Origami polyurethane case.  It does add significant weight to the Kindle Fire HDX but... it does provide great protection with a stand that folds into some cool designs...a nice change from most stand cases.  Overall I am really satisfied with my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 64 gig as I've loaded my gmail, and most of the apps that are most important to me.  We are now a 4- Kindle family!

Reviews.Title: AWESOME
Reviews.Author: Tammy Nelson
Reviews.Content: My husband is very happy with his Kindle Fire HDX, and that is an accomplishment and a compliment to Amazon.He is a Web Master and a Professor teaching Dreamweaver at a nearby city college and he loves the way his web pages look on the kindle HDX. It's digital quality is to die for. KEEP UP THE GOOD WORK AMAZON...

Reviews.Title: Great Little Machine
Reviews.Author: bvail "meganik"
Reviews.Content: First, my Kindle history:2010 - downloaded Kindle app to smart phone2011 - Kindle 3g 6" screen - pretty lame for internet - e-ink no color2012 - Kindle Fire - nice color - better for e-mail, etc.2013 - 8.9"All I can say is this thing rocks.  Beautiful HD screen.  Very fast on internet.  Surprising sound - not like my Kindle Fire.I chose not to get the 3G version, as I have the FoxFi app on my smart phone which makes it a hot spot as long as the phone has a signal.I waited until Amazon had a special offer and last month they had thirty bucks off any HDX so I pulled the trigger the last day of the offer.  Also signed up for the Amazon CC for an additional fifty bucks off.  I'm a prime member so free two day shipping and a price of $399 delivered for this bad boy.  How good is that?Oops, forgot to add that when I opened the box and took the Kindle out I'm thinking this is a work of art.  Very thin, elegant with simple controls on the back and light as a feather.As far as 'limited apps' go, how many does one want?  From what I gather but haven't tried yet is to go to settings and allow downloading of non-Kindle Amazon apps.  Also, some complain they can't access YouTube.  Oh contraire!  Go to silk and then type your default browser in the address box (I use MSN but freebies like FoxFire would probably work)  and then go to YouTube or whatever you wish.  Easy Peasy :o)I've had this jewel for only a couple of weeks, but I'm totally satisfied.  My wife, who has no experience with a Kindle at all was very impressed with it, checked her email, etc and she is somewhat of a Luddite :o).  I had to talk long and hard for her to switch from dumb to smart phone.  She now loves her Samsung Galaxy III.One thing I don't get is the many reviewers who complain that this is not a full featured notebook and the many who compare it to iOS units.  But then I'm biased against anything Apple, be it phone, mp3, computer, whatever.  This Kindle fits my needs and I'm pretty sure there are workarounds for utilities, such as Word, but then I have computers for those tasks.One more thing.  As thin and lite and 'pretty' as this unit is I wouldn't want to scar it up, so like all my electronics I will install a cover.  Most are pretty expensive but I found this one:  Maxboost Amazon Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 Case Book  Leather Stand Cover  for the measly price of $12.95 delivered.Cons?  None to speak of...

Reviews.Title: Works perfect, including "miracast" wireless WiFi projection, to my big screen LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Steve Donato "sailor.in.florida"
Reviews.Content: Great Tablet for reading ebooks, and watching videos, especially taking advantage of Amazon Prime's free instant movies & TV shows.  I use the Kindle Fire's "miracast" setting to project the picture to my vintage big screen,  65"  Panasonic LCD TV, (my TV is 10 yrs old). I use  Belkin's WiFi Screencast Streaming adapter, which is HDMI connected  to my TV (also purchased from Amazon).  My new Kindle Fire HDX (via miracast app setting) connects to the Belkin adapter via WiFi, transmitting the video, which is then transmitted by Belkin to the TV. Works Great as advertized. Screen on Kindle is crisp & outstanding. On my wish list would be to include a USB connector, which it does not have.

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Dale L. Dawson
Reviews.Content: The best device for the money! Unfortunately it is so new that developers have yet to update their apps to fit the 8.9" HDX format, but I am waiting patiently. For this old mans eyes, it's size beats the 7".

Reviews.Title: LOVE!!!!
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: I made the switch from the Nook Color to this, and I have absolutely no regrets!!!  I was nervous at first, but after having my kindle for a few weeks I'm upset that I didn't make the switch sooner!  The product itself is just so much better - the operating system is simpler and easier to navigate, the display is so much more vivid, and I've even noticed that 50% of the books that I had on my B&N; wish list were cheaper on Amazon (the others were the same price - none were higher).  Definitely love my new Kindle, as both an e-reader and as a tablet!

Reviews.Title: What an excellent machine.
Reviews.Author: Pamster
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd Kindle, and certainly my favorite.  It's great for reading, but then, all of them are.  I downloaded some movie rentals to take on a trip, and even though I downloaded them in the lowest quality resolutoin in order to save space on the device, they still displayed beautifully on the device itself.  (Not sure how they would have looked on a TV screen or larger monitor, but I wasn't trying that.)  Today I got it set up to stream to my TV using Display Mirroring - what a great feature that is.  I can hardly wait to try out some more of the features.

Reviews.Title: wow
Reviews.Author: Robert M. Gassner
Reviews.Content: I have had two previous kindles.  One with the keypad as the bottom, which I broke, and the second the kindle touch.  Loved it, but missed the backlit feature of the ipad I had borrowed while waiting for the second kindle to arrive.  The paperwhite was not out then.  Later purchased a cheap tablet on line from Walmart, which worked fine, but was slower than all get out.  Ordered the fire hdx when amazon offered the no interest financing, and all I can say is WOW.  Speed and performance wise, it left the tablet sitting in the dust.  Was kind of alien at first, but learned more about the fire each day, making it more fun  and productive to use each day.  I now find myself reading while listening to free music, and checking my email inbetween.  The only thing I wish that kindle had included, was a slot for SD cards, but hey, who knows what tomorrow holds.

Reviews.Title: This is the best Kindle by far
Reviews.Author: Dennis C. Rahn
Reviews.Content: If you read books or surf the web, this is for you.  It is the best Kindle by far and sending emails are simple as you type words appear on a line and you can choose which word you want to use greatly speeding up doing emails.  It also has a mic for dictation or emails.

Reviews.Title: just do it!
Reviews.Author: Jacob
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love this thing. Buy the otter box with it. Saved my butt a couple times already :). Fun games, stunning video, awesome audio. Very great tablet. Would recommend highly!

Reviews.Title: kindle fire HDX
Reviews.Author: ptee1208
Reviews.Content: I like my new kindle fire but why do I get emails saying I can get $30.00 off.  I would like to get $30 off.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!!!
Reviews.Author: pat
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet and I love it. Amazon Prime is DEFINITELY worth it. The selection of free movies and tv shows its WAY better than Netflix. If I had to pick one thing I wish this had was the ability to hook my external hard drive right to it and play movies that are on it but I can still copy movies to it. I also like the fact that you can side load Google Chrome and Gmail without rooting the Kindle and voiding warranty. Memory upgrades WAY cheaper than iPad too...

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: marchelle
Reviews.Content: The kindle fire is amazing!! I couldn't ask for a better tablet. Its inexspensive, very easy to download things..and its quite simple for a five year old. I would recommend anyone that is searching for a tablet to go with the kindle fire. You will not be disappointed!. Five star all the way!

Reviews.Title: Everything as advertised
Reviews.Author: Howard F. Mandel
Reviews.Content: I'm a dialysis patient and as such am strapped to a chair for hours three times a week.  The HDX provides me with books, TV, movies and music, all in the highest quality available.  All media at my fingertips when I only have one hand available is just the best.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Penny
Reviews.Content: Love it! So much better than my old one. Faster and the colors. It's so far everything that I wanted Thank You

Reviews.Title: Mayday is great
Reviews.Author: Patricia E. Glander
Reviews.Content: This review refers to the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 64 g with Verizon 4g LTE.I haven't had this device long enough to speak about its durability, but am so impressed with the helpful folks one contacts via Mayday, I just had to write a review in praise of this feature. If, like me,find you are befuddled by new technology and unable to figure out how to do what you wish to do even after viewing the tutorials etc.,  don't worry.  Mayday provides assistance within seconds of tapping the button. The  folks who have responded have been courteous and knowledgeable - and extremely patient.As for the tablet itself, all the functions and features I've tried so far work as advertised  The display is gorgeous. The rear camera is more than adequate and though the colors are not absolutely true, picture resolution is good and the auto focus and flash work perfectly. The silk browser is quick.  I've had no problems with it.  The sound quality is good and the volume is more than adequate.  I won't be needing external speakers, only ear buds or ear phones so as not to disturb others.No tablet is perfect and there may be shoal waters ahead, but to know help is available when I run into a problem is worth every penny I paid.  Thank you, Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Best tablet ever!
Reviews.Author: larry39208
Reviews.Content: I own a retina display iPad, an iPad mini, a Kindle fire and a Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 7.0.  The HDX 8.9 is the perfect size and the display is much better than the retina display iPad.  The HDX will do anything any of the other tablets will do and does it faster and better.  The only thing I wish is that it had access to the android app store, but Amazon's app store is fairly comparable.  This is a great buy!

Reviews.Title: Awesome and wonderful.
Reviews.Author: v "txcwgrlmom"
Reviews.Content: I have been with Amazon e readers since day one. I moved up to a kindle fire HD 7 inch last year when they came out. I was not sure I would like a color e reader but since I have quite a few magazine subscriptions too I decided to upgrade so I could discontinue paper subscriptions. I love my 7 inch and I decided to get an 8.9 too, after looking at different tablets in that size range. The color is superb and the tablet is so light.  I love Amazon's customer service, ease of use, audible, and music on my kindle fire HDX. I also am using some of the other apps like calendar, notes, etc. To be more productive at work. I am hoping more business related apps will be made available for the kindle. I just installed easy grader and skyward which is helpful for my job. Thank you Amazon for a wonderful tablet.

Reviews.Title: Great Product (with caveats)
Reviews.Author: J. Fahs
Reviews.Content: First, the things you read about the Kindle are true. Amazingly light, awesome screen, incredible integration with Amazon content, great app store experience. It charges quickly and the battery lasts for a long time. It is probably the best thing to happen to your Kindle library (text looks amazing).Folks who are moving from other Android or iOS devices will need to adjust their expectations about apps. While the app store is well laid out, there are a lot of apps that aren't available on Kindle or work on Kindle Fire, but aren't available on Kindle HDX. Amazon needs to either support the google play store or increase their efforts to get apps out in order for the HDX to be the best out there.That being said, I would buy again for all the positives and I'm guessing Amazon continues to improve the app situation and I'll get to upgrade this review to 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!
Reviews.Author: joan
Reviews.Content: There are not enough words for me to describe how much I love, love, love my Kindle Fire HDX.  I am a member of Amazon Prime and this suits me to a T.  I love the fact that I can snuggle on my couch or in bed and watch flawlessly streaming movies and my favorite TV shows.  I purchased the 64 GB and I'm not sorry that I did.  There is no buffering during the streaming and I have lots of room to download movies to take with me wherever I wish to.  The display is crystal clear, also.  I can almost count their eyelashes!  lol  As you can tell I am very much in love with my kindle!!

Reviews.Title: Very light weight nice device - Not that good app support
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I love the device. It is so sleek and lightweight. Awesome device. However, I don't understand why Amazon does not provide support for installing android apps from Google play. I had to do a workaround to get dropbox, google play music, gmail, and my other favorite apps from google play onto my device. I had to manually copy apk files and install them. The whole process took 2-3 hours to get these apps on kindle fire hdx. I was missing these apps so much that at one point I was ready to return it back, but then researched a bit and got these apps installed. Now I am loving my device.

Reviews.Title: Better than the iPad mini
Reviews.Author: B2Mommy
Reviews.Content: OMG - I love love love my new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 Display.  I originally had just a standard Kindle 7 Display and have used it so much in the last year for everything from reading books, to fantasy football tracking, to shopping on Amazon that I decided it would be worth the investment to upgrade and upgrade I did!My new kindle is awesome. The dual cameras are great.  The Kindle also has a flash, which the iPad does not.  My 5 year old son received an iPad from Santa for xmas, so I've been able to compare.  The display is SO much cleaner on the HDX and slightly larger than the mini.  The photos are better, the sound is better.  I mean, I'm totally in LOVE!If you're on the fence, don't be.  It was worth every penny.  I'm only sorry Santa didn't bring my son an HDX as well...(although he specifically wanted an iPad because they use them in school)If I was Oprah and I had a Favorite Things list, this would be number 1!!!Love it :)

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: tiahra chandler
Reviews.Content: I own an iPad a kindle fire and a laptop. I got this as a Christmas gift  and I couldn't have received a better present. The battery lasts way longer than the original kindle fire and it also has way better clarity 5 stars Amazon!! This is by far my favorite device and since I received it I haven't touched any of my other devices

Reviews.Title: Wow! 5 star.
Reviews.Author: Billy Milbeck
Reviews.Content: Absolutely amazing tablet. Outrageously strong wi-fi antenna. Beautiful graphics. Nice & user friendly. Love that u can download prime movies. Only 2 things i can think of is I'm glad I got the 32gb & almost wished I gotten the 64gb. The 32gb was completely full after 4 movies(3 in HD & 1 SD) I understand from a business perspective but wished they could've added micro sd storage. Also lockin me out gmail & youtube on a android device is a bummer. But overall I am truly impressed with the Hdx. Nice work Amazon! Easily takes the ipad vs hdx competition

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: frabo
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a Christmas present for my wife - being I have the Samsung 10.1 and am very dissatisfied with Samsung - I thought I would give this a try. Believe me, it has the Samsung beat in every way imaginable to the point I am considering throwing this piece of crap Samsung in the garbage and purchasing another kindle fire HDX 8.9" for myself.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Karen Miller "karen2323"
Reviews.Content: I have used Ipad, mini ipad and the kindle fire. But far, the kindle fire is the all around best. Small and portable. My grandkids loves the games. Battery life is good and its so portable. I got this for Valentines day from my sweetie and glad he got it for me. I would recommend it for all ages. The 7" is a great present for a younger child.

Reviews.Title: Old Timer Friendly Device
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey B. Potts
Reviews.Content: I can't help but be amazed at the technology that goes into making these wonderful machines.  Book reading, game playing, e-mail and numerous other uses including surfing the web and hosting your FaceBook page.  Very user friendly.  Great job Amazon. :)

Reviews.Title: Buy this great invention
Reviews.Author: Susanne J Claar
Reviews.Content: This tablet is wonderful...I can see the screen easily...the colors are fabulous...getting around all the different sites is so easy... I would recommend the BOX highly...especially to the 60's crowd..solo easy to use

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: B. Oswald
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my wife for Christmas and she has hardly put it down!! Just the right size and the live help button is a feature that she finds most useful.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 WI-FI, 64GB Rocks!
Reviews.Author: DRB "ScorpioDave"
Reviews.Content: This is my second Kindle and it just is amazing....It has it all. Ipads are nice but the specs on this unit are amazing!  I loved my Kindle HD 8.9 but this new Kindle Rocks!  The screen resolution is amazing....very fast processor and lighter, the bazel edge is smaller so the screen looks much bigger. I can only say buy this unit...you will absolutely love it. It has everything you could want and more, plus free apps with Prime....and so forth...wow...

Reviews.Title: Beautiful Kindle Fire.
Reviews.Author: Inge-merethe Otey "graitdane"
Reviews.Content: This Kindle Fire is the best that Amazon has put out I love it and the Mayday button is great I have used it ones it work just like they said it would,nobody will go wrong with this Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: product review
Reviews.Author: Pamela
Reviews.Content: What a difference over my old Kindle.  Com had one when they first came out.  This one is amazing.  My phone and check computer are lonely because I can pretty much do everything now on my Kindle

Reviews.Title: Excellent picture and easy to use.
Reviews.Author: Maria Pluemer
Reviews.Content: I would recommend to all my friends and family. Love the screen size, yet it is still light weight and fits in my purse. Beautiful graphics and so easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Nice upgrade from the Fire HD with one irritating issue
Reviews.Author: Diane
Reviews.Content: I had the Kindle Fire ND and love the HDX so far. Definitely a nice upgrade but when booting up the screen is upside down. Not a huge issue but a little annoying.

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: CKA "CKA"
Reviews.Content: I love most everything about my new Kindle.  The larger viewing surface, the color display, the sound, the two cameras and I really appreciate the lighter weight.  It makes it easier to take with me.My only complaint would be that it is sometimes difficult to locate the on/off switch and the volume switch.  Other than those minor annoyances, it is superb!  Thank you Kindle..

Reviews.Title: kindle fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Jason McDonald
Reviews.Content: This is the first tablet I ever purchased. And I love it. Thank you amazon for making a quality tablet.

Reviews.Title: Christmas gift
Reviews.Author: NancyK
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my (grown) granddaughter for Christmas. She was thrilled!  Her Facebook post read something like "status coming to you from my new Kindle Fire HDX.  It's amazing!  And my Mimi spoils me!"  She's right, I do.

Reviews.Title: Love it but...
Reviews.Author: LUV2READ
Reviews.Content: I am a loyal customer. This is my 4th kindle and I am pleased. However, the ONLY thing that bugs me is I have to reboot my kindle way too much in order for it to work properly. Even when my WiFi bar is at full strength(5bars)!  A few times I couldn't hear the rep from Maytag. But overall, it's lighter, thinner and the Maytag feature is a cool addition. I would recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE my new Kindle!!!!!
Reviews.Author: galtex
Reviews.Content: My original Kindle Fire, bought in 2011, is still going strong, but the new Kindle HDX 8.9" is awesome!!!I have clicked on the "mayday" button and both Nancy and Molly were both patient and helpful.  Thanks for another great product.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: John Zion
Reviews.Content: I love it so far. It does everything all the other tablets do, and at a great price compared to others. I need to find other stuff to do on it to justify my need to play with it more.

Reviews.Title: amazing
Reviews.Author: Gail Sims
Reviews.Content: I purchased the kindle fire 7" about three years ago.  I upgraded to the kindle fire HDX 8.9 this Christmas.  The difference in amazingly wonderful.  Thanks for a great tablet at a low price.

Reviews.Title: Just what I thought it would be,
Reviews.Author: Leonard D. Jompulsky
Reviews.Content: An exceptionally fine tablet. Great vivid colors, light weight and fun to use and easy to navigate.Very happy that my children bought this for me.

Reviews.Title: i like it very much, the display is very clearly, process is so fast. the Mayday function is wonderful.
Reviews.Author: shi guo ping
Reviews.Content: it's perfect and better than ipad mini.the price is more competitive.also the service for Amazon is the best of all(Mayday is wonderful)

Reviews.Title: My new Kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: Diva45
Reviews.Content: I just love my new Kindle HDX 8.9, I already own the Kindle Fire HD 32GB "7". It's easy to use, & I just love Amazon, I'm really excited that I now have a rear camera, cause I just love taking pictures. It's very light easy to use, I'm trying to get use to how fast it goes. Anyone who don't have one please purchase one it's really something you and the whole family can used.

Reviews.Title: Ongoing problems
Reviews.Author: BillFL
Reviews.Content: The resolution is excellent, response times very good.Problem: intermittently unit stopped with the blue screen of death; upon rebooting blue screen still displayed; after several minutes unit would reboot but reboot extremely slow.Occasionally, when using back arrow unit aborted with totally black screen; same reboot problem.Tech support made assurances fix would be downloaded; did not happenStill some hidden bugs in the overall system

Reviews.Title: I am a happy camper!
Reviews.Author: H. McCaddin
Reviews.Content: I have only had this for a few days, but I love it! The battery is long lasting so far, but haven't watched movies or anything yet. It was a breeze to get set up and going. Very user friendly and so skinny! I have yet to have an issue with it. Will add to review if something negative pops up in the future. Am very happy now!

Reviews.Title: Love the HDX
Reviews.Author: Diamond D
Reviews.Content: I had a HD fire, and thought it was good, but the HDX blows the HD fire away! It's so much faster, sleeker, and lighter. Great price, great product!

Reviews.Title: love it!!
Reviews.Author: maam
Reviews.Content: worked right out the box very easy to maneuver screen brightness is adjustabel and or adjust for you love that feature. HD quality is fantastic. still figuring out features but very happy with. light weight fits in my bag without weighing it down. battery charges doe snot last it you are playing games for hours on end and forget the time! oops! need to buy a second one so hubby will leave mine alone

Reviews.Title: GREAT !
Reviews.Author: tetvet6768
Reviews.Content: Bar none - nothing less can be said. Great screen, great color, great graphics, great lay-out, great UI, great apps, easy set-up and integration with other components (Kindle PaperWhite 3G) and previous purchases of books, etc.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful, with one tiny issue.
Reviews.Author: Kellen Wynn
Reviews.Content: Incredibly impressed with this tablet. Startlingly light, fast and responsive. Sure, the Appstore is lacking, but side loading apps is super simple. Mayday works perfectly, just as advertised.You can't get a better tablet, this size with this kind of hardware, for the price. Definitely recommend!----------UPDATE------------This is just a personal opinion, and I'm not going to dock a star or anything. I just don't like how the charger fits into the device. It sits at a kind of cock-eyed angle, sort of pointed up. I feel like I'm breaking it every time I plug it in to charge. Not a big deal at all! Just be kind of careful.ALSO! I'd recommend getting rid of the special offers. (which you can do at anytime, for $15 plus tax) I felt like it really drained my battery very quickly. Again, just a personal opinion. My original opinion stands, that this is the best tablet you can get for the money, and really is the best tablet I have ever used.----------UPDATE #2----------Finally having issues at a little under three months, I knew such an amazing device has to have a flaw. Starting 3 days ago, my Kindle started spazzing out (the only way to describe it). It wouldn't select the book I requested, instead it opened Silk and navigated me through 2 yahoo pages and a Wikipedia entry, all by itself. It freaked out while scrolling, arbitrarily zooming in an out of pictures on twitter and Facebook. While reading, it would highlight words and navigate me all through the reading menus and stuff. It was exhausting. I did a factory reset last night, thinking it was something I downloaded. This did not resolve the issue. So I called Amazon Customer Service today for help. Within 5 minutes, after explaining my problem, they offered to replace my device, which will be here by Saturday, 03/15. I am docking one star, because Customer Service does not attest to the quality of the device. I haven't dropped my Kindle a single time in 3 months, it's barely even been out of my house. These issues were just out of the blue and random.Other than this issue, the device was great and I'm really looking forward to my replacement and jumping back into my books and tv shows :D

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 Wi-Fi 16 GB
Reviews.Author: Shorian "gadget guru"
Reviews.Content: Kudos to Amazon for quarterly installment payments on the Kindle. I wouldn't have been able to buy it otherwise. I am sure that the HDX will be discounted at some point next year after the holiday season. But even so, it will be a major purchase if I had to pay for it all at once.I owned a Kindle 8.9 HD which I recently sold to purchase the HDX. The HDX is a tremendous improvement over the older model in nearly every aspect. The display is brighter and clearer. Performance is very snappy. Setup was easy. I use MS Outlook for my email and all I had to do was provide my password. The Kindle app handled all the server setup automatically.I love the dual cameras, especially the new rear facing one. It has an LED flash and image stabilization, a great improvement. I also love the new voice recognition feature. I use this feature all the time on my Nexus 7 to dictate email and do searches. This helps someone like myself who has arthritis. For me, this was the main selling point.I haven't needed the new live help yet, but I am curious how well it works. I know I will eventually try it to satisfy my curiosity.Games and video play very smoothly, unlike the previous model that tended to freeze up at times. The speed difference is very noticeable.It is also noticeably lighter than the previous model. My arm and hand don't get tired from holding it to read.At this point, I don't know what Amazon could do to top this model.

Reviews.Title: Must have it
Reviews.Author: pezman
Reviews.Content: I have had this Fire HDX since day 1It has a beautiful picture.I also have a Samsung note 10 but the HDX has a better display.

Reviews.Title: Exellent product
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Diesen
Reviews.Content: With this offer I tried the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9  It is a excellent unit we use it everyday for internet access, movies, apps, everything. The display quality is superior, watching a movie is awesome.  The size of unit is perfect not to big not to small my 3 year old grandson can even navigate through using Kindle Free Time which is a huge success at our house it allows me to choose what content and for how long and does not give him the freedom to go to internet access. It runs smoothly and is easy to set up and navigate through. I will be keeping this unit and it is worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Just gotta say Wow!
Reviews.Author: Frugal Shopper "BunellaZoe"
Reviews.Content: so far I can't find anything negative to say about this tablet.  I already had the Fire HD 8.9 and was in love with that but this is even better.Better on/off button (i kept turning the old one off when i was trying to raise/lower the volume).  Also better volume buttons.The camera is so cool, I'm taking pictures of my husband while he's dozing in his recliner cause he thinks I'm watching Amazon Prime Videos (which I am also).  The picture is gorgeous, the sound I think is Dolby.Set up was so easy since I already have a Kindle account and everything that was on my old Kindle was in the Cloud somewhere and now it's on the new one.  For the wifi all I did was input the password for my home network and i was connected.I've only had it one day, so i'll come back and follow up in a month or so.

Reviews.Title: Even better than the HD
Reviews.Author: Shana Clemens
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd Kindle Fire. I was excited to get the new HDX after learning it had a better battery life, quad core processor, and is much lighter. Finally, I don't have charge my Kindle every day. It is much faster than the HD and the scrolling is noticeably smoother. I am thrilled with my HDX and glad I didn't wait to get it.

Reviews.Title: If you're on the fence....
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: I just got my kindle fire HDX 8.9 yesterday, and it is amazing. If you're on the fence about getting this - GET IT.The good: The display is breathtaking. Seriously. It's very user-friendly. My non-tech savvy mother figured out how to play around with it almost immediately (after i showed her how to turn it on... see my comment below). If you have prime (which you should - if you want to get the most out of your kindle), they have plenty of content available for viewing. The lending library is awesome. They also have this program called "kindle first", where you can get an advance copy of next-months releases. So... free movies + free TV shows + free books = happy girl. Some people have complained it's hard to find the free stuff. I'd have to disagree. There's an entire category for "free" stuff in the store, which makes it super simple. Amazon cloud drive is pretty neat too. I can back up my photos from my phone and tablet to the cloud drive so they are nice and safe.The bad: why are the buttons on the back? This is kind of silly. My tech-savvy boyfriend couldn't figure out how to turn the dang thing on because there's a tiny tiny little button in back. I always have to turn it around every time to find it so i can put it to sleep or wake it up. Also - 16gb is going to be too small for the average user. I bought the 32gb and i'm already close to capacity after downloading three HD movies and a few apps. If you're trying to decide which size to get - go with the 32 or larger. Also - the special offers are annoying. Get it without. We see enough ads in our everyday life to have ads on our reading devices, right?! one last thing. This is not an android tablet so you won't be able to download all the apps your android or apple phone has. It doesn't have a few apps that i use (instagram, google hangouts, gmail, etc.) But i'll survive. This might be a deal-breaker for a few people, but i have my android phone to fill in the gaps.Have I mentioned how amazing the display is??? I haven't been able to put the dang thing down since i got it! If anyone has questions - let me know and i'll try to answer.

Reviews.Title: Very powerful tablet, amazing screen, just not my cup of tea.
Reviews.Author: Brent H
Reviews.Content: When I took the Kindle Fire HDX out of the box, I was impressed with the build quality. The power/volume buttons seemed to be in strange locations, but after a few minutes, I was used to them. The buttons work very well if you are using the tablet in landscape, they are a little awkward in portrait mode. The finish/feel of the tablet was great, it's very slim and light.Once powered on, I loaded up a couple Amazon HD videos. The screen is amazing. There really isn't much more to say about it. Everything is so sharp and clear. And color reproduction seems great to me, but i'm not a videophile. Besides the screen, the next thing that really stood out to me was the sound. The speakers are some of the best ones I've ever heard on a portable device. They are not going to blow you socks off like some high end Bose system, but they seemed well above what the norm is for portable devices.The OS (operating system) on the Fire HDX works well. Everything was very smooth while navigating. Loading and switching between apps was nice and quick. The factory installed apps seemed to work well. I had never used a Kindle Fire tablet before and the OS seemed pretty easy to figure out. The Amazon App Store seems to have a lot of decent apps/games, but is still missing some of the apps I was looking forward to using. This is where things just didn't fit for me.I can use the Amazon App Store on my android phone, but can't use the Play Store from the Kindle. I understand why Amazon want's you to use their store, but I wish I had the option to use others without having to "hack" the device. I did find a way to load unsupported apps onto the Kindle, but it took a decent amount of effort, and I felt like it was a little too much to go through for unsupported apps.The only other complaint I have is that you can't change the background in the OS. I know you can change the lock screen background (if you paid to remove the ads, which I didn't mind the ads at all), but not the one inside the OS. It seems you are stuck to a black background. Which maybe I just didn't figure out how to change it. Someone can correct me if I'm wrong.In conclusion, the kindle fire HDX 8.9 tablet is truly an amazing piece of hardware, I think as far as tablets go, it's a top dog for sure. The OS is not bad by any means, but it's not the "pure" android experience I was hoping for. The Amazon App Store not supporting some of the apps I mainly bought this tablet for, was the deal breaker. It seemed like way to much money for something I couldn't use as I had planned, so I ended up returning this tablet to Amazon.That said, I did purchase two of the 7" Kindle Fire HD's for my kids for Christmas :)I will be going to a more pure android tablet for myself.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" is Incredible!
Reviews.Author: Robert C Brown
Reviews.Content: Have the Fire HD and the features on the HDX really improve the experience! I highly recommend buying one today.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Pat Myers
Reviews.Content: i already loved my older kindle version, but this one is marvelous.  I love seeing all the covers of the books i have on my kindle as well as being able to facebook, surf the web, watch videos, etc.  The camera is amazing and it takes wonderful pictures.  Thanks Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Love th Kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: Barbara Toppin
Reviews.Content: I like its size and weight.  I was having trouble holding my ipad so decided to get the HDX.  There is not one thing I dislike about it.  It is just what I wanted.  Just as all the other Kindles I have purchased.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!!
Reviews.Author: jjwatson
Reviews.Content: I use my Kindle Fire for everything, and absolutely love it!  It's light weight, has a big screen, and so easy to use!  I would recommend this to anyone!!

Reviews.Title: A real leap forward from HD model
Reviews.Author: D. Craig
Reviews.Content: I have purchased most of the Kindle devices at one point or another. I really like the Fire and the HD 8.9 inch model. But the HDX is a real jump in technology. The screen is so good that reading magazines is very easy. Movies and apps also look outstanding. The device itself is much lighter than the HD model, much faster, and has a much better screen.Initially I was just going to stay with the HD model because I was happy with the Kindle. I bought an HDX model, took one look at the screen, and decided to keep it for myself and give them the HD model.If you are a long-time Kindle user and are happy with the HD model, don't count out the HDX. The speed and resolution of the device, along with the new OS, makes a lot of small but significant differences that add up to an almost required upgrade.

Reviews.Title: Very lightweight Kindle!
Reviews.Author: Marilyn WK
Reviews.Content: This is my third Kindle Fire and I love it! I just cannot get over how thin and lightweight it is! It did take a moment for me to figure out that the on/off button was on the back and not the front or edge where the illustration said it was. It literally took less than five minutes to set this up with both of my email providers, connect to Twitter and Facebook as well as my home wireless. It was more than half charged so I just plugged it in while I was setting it up and it is good to go! I can't wait to start using it.The lack of choice in covers for this Kindle tablet was underwhelming. Compared to the last big Kindle introduction (the Kindle Fire HD last Christmas), I was really disappointed. Sure there is the origami case which I'd hoped they would come out with for the Kindle, but only black, red, and blue?

Reviews.Title: The bigger screen is better.
Reviews.Author: Gayle Street
Reviews.Content: I like the bigger screen with a clear picture for viewing movies and reading books.  I also like the live chat feature when I need help.

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied
Reviews.Author: john l thompson
Reviews.Content: I really enjoying my new Kindle fire HDX 8.9 and for my first tablet I think this is by far the best.  Had use the Mayday button for a little problem, the technician was a great help I will definitely recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Look out Tablet World!
Reviews.Author: Oz
Reviews.Content: BOOM! Another win for Amazon....Light, fast, functional and perfectly priced. Whoever you buy this for will be very satisfied and happy!

Reviews.Title: No complaint
Reviews.Author: Danilo M. Mijares
Reviews.Content: So far I enjoyed using this Kindle Fire HDX 8.9.  Picture and sound are fantastic.  It is very easily to hold, not like the Apple iPad.  Overall - no complaints.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Grams910
Reviews.Content: I have been using a Kindle 3G Touch - so I gave myself a late Birthday present - early Christmas present.  So far I have had no trouble with it and I love it.  Still getting use to it.  Need to find good apps for it.  So far have had trouble with finding what I am looking for.

Reviews.Title: Endorsed by Moms
Reviews.Author: Chickpea
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my 68 year old mother (shhh...don't tell her I told you how old she is).  She absolutely loves it.  Keeps raving about the clarity of the screen, the instant help button, and how easy it is to use (which means she isn't calling me to ask how to work it - bonus!)  Seems like a win-win gift for all!

Reviews.Title: Another Great Kindle
Reviews.Author: Katheen A. Sitzman
Reviews.Content: Love the fact that it has two cameras and can print to a wireless printer.  And do enjoy the larger screen

Reviews.Title: On Top
Reviews.Author: William M. lee
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is by far the best Tablet/Reader on the market. It has a stunningly crystal-clear display that not only enhances the reader function of the device, but also allows for breathtaking video replay and picture-taking. I own a B & N Nook as well, and the Kindle blows it away in nearly every aspect. I highly recommend this device if you're looking for a full-functioning Tablet that also serves as an e-Reader.

Reviews.Title: loving it!
Reviews.Author: Carol Cameron
Reviews.Content: I just got it last night and am loving everything about it! I had a 2 year old Kindle Fire and was getting frustrated with how slow it was. Plus I was having increasing difficulty reading due to my aging eyes. This HDX8.9 is amazing!

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: uneekfish
Reviews.Content: So sharp and clear.  My first tablet, but I looked at others and I liked the layout of this one and the size is just right for me.

Reviews.Title: awesome tablet
Reviews.Author: showitup
Reviews.Content: I really like this Kindle.  It's smaller than my Ipad. I take better pictures and all the apps I have on my ipad was able to put on the Kindle. I really like the flash light on the Kindle. With my volume and power button on the back of the Kindle is helpful for when my Lil girl wants to play with it and she can't because she don't know how to turn it on. Even though this is only a trial to use I want it and will sale my ipad to be able to purchase the Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: DogMom
Reviews.Content: Just got it to replace my Kindle Fire HD which I already loved.  This upgrade is GREAT!  It's much faster, and the display is amazing.  I stream content when I exercise which means I can watch Amazon Prime, Netflix, Showtime and HBO.  My only criticism, which isn't about the device but the cover, is that you have to take it out of the cover to use the camera.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: marilyn hewson
Reviews.Content: This is my first kindle that i bought for myself. Its very easy to use and the display is so clear! I love using it and would recommend it to anyone wanting a great tablet!

Reviews.Title: Awesome product
Reviews.Author: Michael Dixon
Reviews.Content: sound quality is absolutely fantastic. This is my fourth Kindle I absolutely love this tablet it is beautiful.. Picture is really beautiful it is so light easiy to handle I haven't had to use Mayday yet but I'm sure that will be great also. Amazon knocked this one out of the park

Reviews.Author: Josh
Reviews.Content: Really awesome tablet. Games and app run flawlessly with the speed. No time at all to load up games. Only downside for now is the inability to set a background. Once we get that update it'll be perfect

Reviews.Title: KINDLE AND PRIME!
Reviews.Author: COREY YOUNG
Reviews.Content: Love it! Books come at a steal amazon have everything you could ever need cant wait for helicopter drone delivery...

Reviews.Title: best tablet
Reviews.Author: joey hamilton
Reviews.Content: Great tablet very fast big screen does everything you could possibly want to do. Great range on the WiFi a must buy

Reviews.Title: HDX Dream Machine
Reviews.Author: nedjinski
Reviews.Content: It's hard not to give this thing 5 stars - I was an early Kindle Fire adopter - I had the first edition KF 7" , then the 8.9 HD, and now the 8.9 HDX. The evolution of this device has been amazing. With each iteration I was highly impressed, but none more so than this new HDX - it is simply incredible - very fast, very smooth, light weight, super sharp screen graphics. I can't imagine these things being exponentially better in a year or two.I would like it if it were more of a device open to the rest of the world - meaning it would run all apps in the google play store seamlessly - but it does what it does very, very well.Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Quality tablet for reading/web browsing.
Reviews.Author: LostITGuy
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased the Kindle Fire HDX as the kindle versions of books I needed were $120+ cheaper.  As far as the HDX unit itself, I've been very impressed with the build quality and construction.  My unit does not exhibit the blue tinge that I've read about in other reviews, and backlight quality is phenomenal.  I use my HDX primarily for reading and web browsing, and both have been very enjoyable on the unit.  Both Kindle books and PDFs look absolutely gorgeous on the 2560x1600 screen (even older scanned texts).  I ended up purchasing the 8.9" as the 7" screen was too small for me.  Web browsing with the silk browser also looks great although there is stuttering on some bloated pages (I have not tried side-loading the Google Play store and using chrome yet).  Overall I'm very happy with my purchase and can definitely recommend the unit to anyone using it primarily for web browsing/reading.As far as the special offers, they only show up on the home/lock screen and are not annoying.  I haven't paid to remove them as they really have not bothered me (and I've been lazy)

Reviews.Title: So far, so good
Reviews.Author: Dorothy L
Reviews.Content: This version, so far, has a faster Silk browser than the HD version and hasn't frozen up yet.  This was a big issue with the HD version.  I've only had the HDX three days, but so far so good.  Other features are great and the improvements have made it better.  I love the Fire, so I hope the past browser issues are really resolved in this version.  I haven't had an opportunity to try Mayday, but probably will soon to learn how to use some of the features I haven't utilized before.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Ms. Cynthia A. Hart
Reviews.Content: LOVE LOVE LOVE my new Kindle!!!  I bought the Kindle Fire when it was first introduced 2 years ago.  Have been waiting to see what new Kindle would be introduced this year.  Once I saw this one, I knew that I was ready to buy a new one.  It also have a larger harddrive which I was looking for.

Reviews.Title: Very nice
Reviews.Author: m
Reviews.Content: I have only had mine a couple of weeks but so far I really like it. Very easy to use it has all that I need on it. Glad there is a camera front and rear. It would be nice if it were open to more apps.

Reviews.Title: HDX is amazing!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love my HDX 8.9! The movies in hd are amazing to watch. One thing I have noticed is that if I want the battery to last I need to dim the brightness of the screen. Whenever I watch a movie though I make sure to change back to auto brightness

Reviews.Title: Great idea, very poor delivery.
Reviews.Author: Adam Cusick
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 should be fantastic but it misses the mark by a long shot.  I'm a geek through and through.  HTC One, Nexus7 (2nd gen), 3 rokus, raspberri pi, media sever, I mean the works.  When I had the opportunity to try out this device I read the specs and it looks pretty good on paper.  It is however limited severely by the shell that amazon has placed around it.  Not having true android market, gmail, and access to your purchased android apps makes this device ridiculous.  There is currently no root for this device as it is so new.  Those things are a problem that Amazon should work at fixing.  I'd like to see this tablet with a 49.99 unlock from amazon allowing you to use it as an actual android tablet.  Then you'd have the great specs that they've put together combined with the full functionality of android.  Bottom line, if you're wanting this don't. Go get the Galaxy Note 8 inch.  It will do everything this will plus more.  Price is about equal.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Mel
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a gift for my wife. She loves it. Can't get her off the darn thing. Recommend to all.

Reviews.Title: A very solid device
Reviews.Author: Flashfire
Reviews.Content: I've had this for about four months now, purchased during the promotional period around Christmas. Prior to that I didn't have much use for tablets but this one has changed my mind and become part of my daily routine.First, the audio/visual side of it works very well for me. Obviously the HD display creates very sharp images and video playback runs smoothly, looks excellent (with a high-quality source), and I have had no complaints about the sound. I added the origami case and while some people say the design doesn't really affect the sound, I do think it improves it slightly by helping redirect it back toward you just a bit. Even without it, you can hear everything just fine.I can't really get into all the deeper details about how the tablet itself works except to say navigation is simple and easy for me. The carousel is a snap to customize as far as showing what you want on it with the rest of your apps elsewhere.I mostly use the tablet for e-books, some games, and Amazon Prime videos. I've also propped the tablet up in the kitchen to follow a recipe without having to print something out or go back to the CPU to double-check something.  I have always been a traditionalist when it comes to reading, preferring the physical feel of a book in my hands, but having it on a tablet compared to a smaller device has made me change my mind.  It's probably a standard option, but I also prefer being able to set it as white text on a black background since my eyes are a little more sensitive to bright things than usual.  It just helps keep them from getting strained.A major selling point of the device is the ability to watch video through Amazon Prime.  The simple fact of the matter is you aren't going to maximize the potential of the Kindle Fire without it, because it opens up a ton of viewing options when it comes to movies and TV shows.Not everything is free through the instant video service, of course, but there's still a whole lot of stuff you can access that way.  You just have to see what the options are for each film or show.  Some allow you to download directly to the device while others don't.This should be showing up in the right place, but I bought the 64 GB version, wifi only, because for the most part it's an at-home device.  When I thought about what I pay for home internet vs. what I'd probably be paying to stream or download over a 4G connection, it made more sense for me to get the wifi-only version and live with knowing that if I'm going to take a vacation or otherwise be out of town, I'd have to either download stuff directly to the tablet before I go or hope to have a wifi signal somewhere.As an example, I took an overnight trip out of town and even though I stayed at a place with wifi, I didn't bother getting it.  I just downloaded a few episodes of a TV show to watch and that was that.  I also took a two-day train ride that did not have wifi, and I was able to watch an entire season of a TV show during the trip.  The HD episodes took up about 3 GB each so I came pretty close to maxing out the storage capacity, but as soon as I finished watching an episode I just deleted it.Be aware that once you start watching a show or movie you've downloaded, if you're not connected you have 48 hours to "verify" things again or you won't be able to watch that particular download until you do.  This is really a great feature of the device, since you can actually watch downloaded stuff while being completely offline for a bit.  It made the train trip extremely convenient, and I also got through most of two e-books by the end of it as well.I find the battery life to be pretty much as advertised.  It holds up well even when watching a few videos in succession, though I often charge it when I'm not using it.The camera gives a good enough image, but the examples I've taken with it seemed to have a bit of a contrast issue compared to my smartphone or the actual camera I have.  I'm not the kind of person to go around taking pictures or video with a tablet anyway, so it's not a big deal to me.  The camera itself was hardly a factor in what I decided to get.One small criticism I have is probably not a device-specific thing, but it does bear mentioning.  I have it set to automatically update my apps, though from time to time an app will prompt me to update and send me to the appstore only for there to be no "update" option.  On a few occasions, I've had to uninstall then reinstall the app in order for the update to register.  The last couple weeks, at least, apps I had that problem with seem to have auto-updated fine, so this may be fixed.By the way, if you're concerned about the "special offers" being intrusive or anything like that, they're not. When you access the device, they're no more than a displayed ad that goes away when you unlock the device, and you're on to what you want to do.  there's a tab at the top of the home screen to view all offers if you want to.  You can also spend $15 (I think) if you want to have them removed, so you're not stuck with them if you originally buy a device that comes with them.Overall, for what I got the tablet for, it meets or exceeds my needs. It's highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: BAD BAD BAD
Reviews.Author: Chad Michael Wright
Reviews.Content: One star is really a generous rating for this item. The product arrived fine and quickly. That is were the good rating ends. First day of using it the camera would shut down for no reason. As it was Christmas with family photos are super important. Contacted amazon and they sent another and more camera problems except it would shut down entire device.  Contacted amazon again and  third device would not hold a charge. I returned third and final device for a full refund.

Reviews.Title: Not user frieindly
Reviews.Author: caca
Reviews.Content: I am not computer literate and this product makes me feel even worse.  There are no instructions and you don't know where to start.

Reviews.Title: Amazon Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: First thing you notice when you open the device and pick it up, is just how light it is, the lightest tablet I've ever held. And I flip it around I like the new design compared to last years body, It feels so good when I hold it I just love it, and the other thing that amazes me is how thin it is, its not as thinner then the iPad but still just as thin I would say, but its way lighter, they have removed the HDMI port so you wont be able to connect it to a TV but you can do it wirelessly with Mira case, I first turn it on and the screen is really Beyond HD, its beautiful its really amazing, the only thing I don't like about this device is they made the volume lower then the Kindle Fire HD 7 (2012) the HD was the loudest tablet I have ever heard but they made this tablet speakers worse but it is much more clear and has surround sound, but its just not as loud as the HD. When I first power house game (Dragon Slayer) it ran smoothly with no lag what so ever and the game gas I would say PlayStation 2 or 1 graphics, and it ran smoothly with no lag or stutter, Its a really fast and snappy device really it will handle any app you put on it, Its running the latest  Snap Dragon processor, and its really fast, its the fastest tablet you can get for its price. The other thing I like is that they finally added a rear camera its 8 Mp (mega pixels) its not so great but it will do what ever you want knowing tablets don't and shouldn't have really good cameras and this one has flash not many tablets have flash, only Samsung really does that and Sony is all I know of but its nice that they include that. I also like the interface its has a good design instead of fire os 2.0 which just had a plain black background, this one has a grey and black background mixture that looks amazing, and with this perfect screen it looks even better, with Fire OS 3.0 (mojito) Its a skin version of android made of all Amazon content which has a good selection, but not much of it on its app store, but it only has all the good stuff none of those useless apps. This Tablet is amazing I love it and its a great family tablet with Kindle Free time, I mean if you are an amazon user you will LOVE this device, and maybe if you never used amazon you will soon start to love it, really its the most easiest thing to get used to, its so simple. This has been my review, and hope you guys Love it

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX8.9  Simply Wonderful!
Reviews.Author: D. L. Blair "reader"
Reviews.Content: It's the best tablet out there.  Has many great features and is really slick.  Highly recommended.  I really love it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Kindle
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: This kindle is amazing! I bought it for my wife for Christmas. She loves it! It works as advertised. It is easy to use. Instructions are easy to follow. Start up was fast and easy. It is a great product with plenty storage. My wife loves the many available apps and software and books.

Reviews.Title: SHOULD have been better
Reviews.Author: M. Seroczynski
Reviews.Content: I've spent a lot of time over the last three days searching, working, and "fighting" with my new Kindle Fire 8.9 HDX (I also have first generation iPad). I was really intrigued by the hardware (primarily the display) and lower price than the competing "Air" product.I am very impressed how cool it runs (but I have not tried to play games with it and the display's brightness is turned down) and it has not crashed even once. Also, the battery is good for many hours of lightweight use.>I probably would have returned it by now, but I've found a couple of very good applications that I would like to continue to use: CalenGoo and Polaris Office (I don't think spending a few hundred dollars on just a "content viewer" is such a good idea), so I will probably keep it.>I keep discovering user interface issues. I have just discovered a problem with Kindle's PDF reader where I was unable to exit the reader when viewing a single-page PDF (would not display any "soft" buttons/icons and there is no hardware "home" or "exit" button). Apparently there is no way to empty "email trash" other than selecting each and every deleted email first (!). There seem to be NO WAY to place photos in collections or folders (I've created folders with a file explorer but they were ignored). I am just wandering who wrote the software...>So far, I have not been able to set up the Kindle calendar (this just amazed me). It wanted me to synchronize with an existing online calendar of some sort, but I don't have one. It will NOT work in a stand-alone mode and, apparently, it will not store it's data in Amazon's Cloud either. With "CalenGoo," I created a few Google calendars (as it recommended), and so far it is working very well.>I was able to open, edit, and save older versions of Microsoft Excel files with "Polaris Office," but it does not work with Google Drive. I used a file explorer to transfer files from-and-to Google drive and then I moved them from-to another subfolder on the Kindle; it was doable but unnecessarily tedious.>The often bad-mouthed Silk Browser has worked quite well (but I've turned the "acceleration" off); the only problem I've discovered so far was NASA's Astronomy Picture of the Day (APOD) site (disappointing).>A fact that the user cannot change the screen backgrounds (login and "desktop") is astonishing...The included user guide is too basic. I've just bought an e-book to solve that problem.>Amazon does not allow access to Google Play, which has some applications that are either newer or even not-available in the Amazon's App Store. I have also discovered that a lot of the available applications I was looking for (productivity and utilities) have poor users' ratings.>It would have not bothered me that there was no easy way to connect to Google Drive directly if Amazon offered a similar functionality. For example, not allowing storage of calendar data in IT'S OWN "cloud" totally amazed me (unless I am missing something here or I am just having a bad dream).I think, the Kindle Fire has a great potential; Amazon just needs more ambition to go beyond the reader-viewer-listener-shopper business model, or sell them for half price so we can buy multiple tablets for different purposes.Please report all shortcomings to Amazon, so the software can be improved (hopefully soon).>For clarity sake, I am a long time, "loyal" Amazon's customer.==============================================================================================For people new to Kindle Fire 2013 (now or in the near future), I recommend this e-book by Michael J. Young: "Kindle Fire: The Complete Guidebook - For Your Kindle Fire HDX and HD, Second Edition"==============================================================================================I've tested three PDFs with OfficeSuite Professional: no problems.

Reviews.Title: NOT GOOD EXPERIENCE AT ALL
Reviews.Author: marie leslie "Les"
Reviews.Content: I was so excited to get this and all the options that it had for movies, books, gaming etc. However when it came it took over an hour to download the software. When I choose some frees games it would not download them. I could not watch movies they would just buffer. I called Mayday and the connection did not hold and the man did not seem to know anything technical. He turned me over tokindle support. I was not offered any real technical support. I tried to inquire if a certain amount of broad band was needed and she said you don't have enough. You can return it so I did. Later I called again to see about another device and I was told that the HDX did not need certain broadband requirements. No one really offered to trouble shoot the situations and I could hardly understand the person helping me. She did not seem to fully understand my questions and seemed like she was reading from a script saying the same thing over and over. I was not only disappointed in the HDX I was even more disappointed at the support which seemed really non-existent. I called again to inquire about the HD after all I am not going to spend over $400 if I can only read and no one can answer how that would work. So I am really writing this to see if Amazon reads these and if they really care about how their staff responds to problems.

Reviews.Title: Having so much fun
Reviews.Author: Marcia
Reviews.Content: Having so much fun with my new Kindle fire hdx.  Movies, music,e-mail, Facebook, surfing the internet.  Very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Excellent performance but...
Reviews.Author: Atomtraveler
Reviews.Content: I like the Kindle, because I have an Amazon Prime account and enjoy reading.  It does have a decent amount of apps.  But if your expecting the availability of apps similar to what Android or Apple has, then the Kindle may not be for you.  The size and weight of the Kindle HDX 8.9 is great, very lightweight.  I use mine with just a skin as protection.  The screen on the Kindle is its strong point, absolutely great for watching videos or reading books, superior to Apple or Android in my opinion.  The battery life so far has been great, for my usage.  But like any other tablet, it depends on how much you use it and what you use it for. Have yet to use the mayday feature, mostly because I haven't had the need to yet, which is a good thing.  Disappointed in Amazons epub reader selection, and they make it somewhat difficult to place your own epub books or documents from a source other than Amazon.  So, if you have an Amazon Prime account, and use it often, then this is a great purchase.

Reviews.Title: i like it
Reviews.Author: melody worley
Reviews.Content: it is so much lighter. it fits in my purse. i think it is just sexy... i am so happy i traded in for the new model.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Jerry J. Sechrist
Reviews.Content: We are so pleased with our purchase of the Kindle Fire HDX.  We highly recommend it to anyone who is looking for a tablet.

Reviews.Title: Jury is still out on this one.
Reviews.Author: TeriS
Reviews.Content: I just recently upgraded from the original Kindle Fire version to the lovely, larger HDX version. It seems that certain online videos, as well as some of the apps react/stream so much slower on the new Kindle than in the old one. Also...there seems to be a bright red pixel type burn area only noticeable when the screen goes briefly blank when opening or closing apps. Not noticeable when I'm actually within an app. Will call on the weird red spot...other than that...dunno. Just seems much slower instead of faster.

Reviews.Title: Kudos to Kindle
Reviews.Author: James Larsen
Reviews.Content: Despite all the jealous sniping from devotees of a certain fruit pad, I find the kindle to be a rather able platform; especially with some android side loading (very easily done).  I got the 32 gig 8.9 incher and have only managed to fill up 4 gigs, and I have a few dozen apps and over 220 e-books on it (mostly in large part still on amazon servers, ie the cloud).  The sound is loud enough that everyone in the room can hear when someone reads to us from the 2 able speakers on the tablet, but I wish it were just a tad bit louder.  It is louder than my 16 inch notepad speakers.  Amazon whisper sync is the cat's meow for starting a book on my HP laptop and finishing it sometimes on the tablet or vice versa.  This tablet is overkill for my wife's reading needs, but I am enjoying it's other features.  I have 3 browsers on it and 2 readers, and the pixel count exceeds that of most apps and games,  so it should be a photographers delight. The 8 mp camera takes the best pics compared to a certain fruiti pad.I hope the screen is gorilla glass; so far so good.  Stays charged a long time also.  The reflexes and speed  on the kindle exceed those of a cheetah, no gripes there.  I have no gripes about the wifi.  I do find that the auto brightness can be distracting, so I turn that off most of the time.  I discovered quite by accident that it has sleep mode and Off, and no instructions about that unless I do some internet research.  It's really simple to use.  Sleep mode is a power sipper.  I can charge it from way low to over 90% in about 2 hours with the handy dandy wall wart and usb plug.  It's bright enough to read even  under my 2x4 foot skylight, which is pretty darn bright.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx 8.9
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love the hdx 8.9.  I does everything I want it to do.  It is light but powerful. I have compared it to other tables and the kindle just comes out ahead of the others.  I have already recommended it to my family and friends and will continue to do so.

Reviews.Title: hdx 8.9 is great
Reviews.Author: AnnD
Reviews.Content: I love the new kindle fire hex 8.9 but wish it had adobe flash player.  And some things I want to stream don't work.

Reviews.Title: Like the Fire HD a lot
Reviews.Author: K P Lierz
Reviews.Content: Like the HD. Like the back lite, makes easy to read in poor/no lite. Like the access of cloud holds many more books than will ever read.

Reviews.Title: very happy with kindle fire hdx 8.9
Reviews.Author: Lisa B.
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with my purchase.  I have had it about one month.  I had an earlier version of the kindle fire.  I like the larger screen.  While it is bigger than the old one, it is not as heavy and it is still small enough to take it with me when I leave home. I have used the May day option twice; my "how to" questions were answered very quickly.  They walked me through the procedure.

Reviews.Title: Excellent quality
Reviews.Author: lillivun
Reviews.Content: I loved the color and good quality.  VERY well fitted around on/off, adaptor outlets and open and close auto shutdowns.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Kristin Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: The best of the best. Superior in its class and I will never use up all the storage this beast has. Love my kindle. I never leave home without it.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Liz
Reviews.Content: It meets all of my expectations.  I let my son-in-law use it and he loved it as well so my daughter got him one.

Reviews.Title: My new Kindle
Reviews.Author: Kindle'n 4 life
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love the kindle. I now use it for most of my reading and surfing. It is awesome.It is the best kindle out there.

Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Deegal "Deegal"
Reviews.Content: What's not to love?  Even has that wonderful little live person who comes on the screen to help you.  Great features and fits in my purse but still has a nice size screen.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Don
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife. The Fire hdx 8.9 is a huge improvement over the Fire hd 8.9. I will be buying another for myself.

Reviews.Title: can do tablet
Reviews.Author: donna
Reviews.Content: I consider the fire a tablet because I can do anything  on it . I use it primarily for reading.  WIth all of the apps,available for the fire  I can use it for documents  and surfing the net. I check the weather, my grandkids play games, watch movies etc.  I used May day once just to see how it works.  It worked as advertised . They answered right away and  were very professional  and helpful. This is my 3rd kindle and have loved each one. Go for prime because it takes your kindle to a whole new level of use.  Free shipping , borrow 1 book a month, watch movies for free  you can't beat prime.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: robert a kabase
Reviews.Content: I find it slow.  Now after 6 months of ownership the item has locked up on me and the kindle is getting hot to the touch and I am unable to get it to respond to remove and item or turn off!!!!I am unable to get to Mayday option...lot of good that option does me.I had better luck with the app to read books.I was looking for a table that could do it all.  Read magazines, books a game or two and search.  Not working out like I thought and a lot heavier than I expected.

Reviews.Title: Does everything I need.
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: Ok,  I got a few years on me, and I ain't that tech savvy, but I love this thing. I read, listen to music, audio books, check my email etc. This easily meets all my needs. It took a little getting used to  but once I adapted to the touch screen and learned to navigate around l found it easy to use. I don't use many apps so that's not an issue. I down loaded a lot of my music and that went pretty well. It seems to lose WiFi connection more than I think it should and the glare on the screen makes it hard to use outdoors. I bought an anti-glare screen protector that helps some. Those are small complaints and overall I am very happy with this Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Who needs an IPad when there is the Kindle Fire HDX!
Reviews.Author: Patricia Ganey
Reviews.Content: I always wanted a tablet, but didn't want to spend a fortune. The Kindle Fire HDX has all the features of the IPad but half the price. When I'm reading books or downloading learning apps for my kids, it is such a breeze. I love my Kindle F and wouldn't want anything else!

Reviews.Title: no newlivestream
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Like the device except for one big problem...can't seem to access New Live stream . THis is a really important app for me. Some events are only available on Live stream. May be a deal breaker for me. The device is great in many ways but if I can't use it to watch Newlivestream.in particular..ONENESS events..not much value to me.I have tried to side load it and May day..which is a wonderful service in many ways.w a sn're able to help in this case.Update I was able to watch a Live stream video using moboflash and Dolphin. SO all is well and I would now have to say that so far I couldn't be happier with my kindle fire HDX. Really an awesome tablet!

Reviews.Title: Better then IPAD all day!
Reviews.Author: Michael R. Burgett
Reviews.Content: My friends and brother all have IPADs and they try to sell me on one everyday.  As much as I liked Steve Jobs, Apple just doesn't allow the same freedom the Kindle does.  I did mainly get this to go along with my new Amazon Fire TV, and it is nice...I can be watching a movie in my living room, pick up my kindle and it transfers the movie to my kindle and it picks it up right where it left off.  Then if I go into my bedroom I can just transfer from my kindle to that tv.  The functions, features, and picture quality are amazing!

Reviews.Title: wonderful value
Reviews.Author: Carolyn Coyle
Reviews.Content: I was not sure what I expected of this device, but it has certainly surpassed anything I could have imagined.  I have only had it for a few days and I already know that I wouldn't want to be without it. The screen resolution is excellent, the speed is excellent, the camera is great.  I haven't begun to explore all it's possibilities and probably never will but I think it is a great value for the price.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: J. Reed "luv2draw"
Reviews.Content: I love the ease of using the Kindle Fire. I started with a Samsung Galaxy & found it would not allow access to Amazon Prime. Found out from Amazon that only i-Pads & Kindles can access Amazon Prime. I tried a friend's i-Pad and had great difficulty trying to figure out how to use it. Since I have a laptop, I don't really need to be able to use word processor/excel on a tablet. The Kindle is much easier to use than i-Pad or Samsung, the screen clarity/color is outstanding & the camera takes great pictures. I only wish it had a close up option. I also like the option of the MayDay button. I've only had to use it once so far, but love knowing it's there. I am very happy with this Kindle and Amazon customer service rocks!

Reviews.Title: Right desition
Reviews.Author: ReadingBitch
Reviews.Content: I played with the thought to get a Kindle for a while and finally gave in, now I wonder why I did waited for so long. I mainly use it for reading. I have so many books that I decided to get the 64 GB one so that I can have a bigger part always with me without hoping for Wi-Fi.

Reviews.Title: Everything I expected
Reviews.Author: Kalani Waldron
Reviews.Content: This is a great product and fun to use. I will be using this tablet for years. Perfect size too.

Reviews.Title: My husband loves it
Reviews.Author: T. Driste
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a gift for my husbands bdayHe had an older Kindle and it needed to be updatedHe loves his Fire HDX

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire is great!
Reviews.Author: Sue
