Reviews.Content: The clarity is wonderful and I love the Mayday feature.  They were very helpful and knowledgeable  I would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased!
Reviews.Author: Echo Karras
Reviews.Content: LOVE the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9! Bought it as a birthday gift for my husband (will probably buy another for myself!). It works FAST, it's fun and easy to use, and the Amazon pricing special made it affordable.We have only used the "help" person once, but it was wonderful to SEE & HEAR who was helping us - a new high in customer service.I would recommend the Kindle Fire HDX to ANYONE looking for a tablet - one of our sons is in the Army and stationed abroad, so my husband loves to be able to keep in touch using his Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Excited then let down with app availability
Reviews.Author: dkarger
Reviews.Content: Love the product but rather dismayed when the play store is not available on the Kindle and a lot of the apps that I had purchased were not available to me or even available in the Kindle store. Of course there is always a way around everything which I found but why would you make it difficult to begin with.

Reviews.Title: Can't play certain videos
Reviews.Author: Phillis Combs
Reviews.Content: I was very disappointed with the new Kindle Fire.  It does not come with an adobe flash like the old kindle did and now I can not watch a lot of videos.  Wish I had not bought this one and just kept on using the old 7".  They need to come up with a fix for this.

Reviews.Title: Love It!!!
Reviews.Author: TAMMY PHILLIPS
Reviews.Content: I just wish you could get Google Play on it.  I can't play POGO games on it.  I wish it had more apps like checkout 51 and other apps for us couponers, other than that I love it.

Reviews.Title: miss the light.
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer "Michael"
Reviews.Content: I love the picture,there is one thing that I miss from the previous kindle fire. The previous one had a tiny orange light, that told you it was charging. It turned green when fully charged.  I always used to check it's status.

Reviews.Title: Kindle 8.9 HDX
Reviews.Author: Albert N. Haler
Reviews.Content: This item has meet all of my expectations.  I have steamed movies and also downloaded movies both worked flawlessly.  The 8.9 HDX for my needs is the perfect size, easy to handle and not to big to carry with you.

Reviews.Title: Best Display I've ever seen but....
Reviews.Author: Watchguy
Reviews.Content: This thing has an awesome display and amazon customer service is great as always. However, the interface isn't as good as my iPad. Several websites I tried didn't render quite right and made them difficult to use. Apps are good, but not iPad good. I think the product is superior to iPad, but the infrasctructure just isn't there yet.

Reviews.Title: good for reading not so good for other stuff
Reviews.Author: Karine Valliant-Saunders
Reviews.Content: So I bought this a little while ago.Its great for books, but the apps for it are not the best.Netflix and hulu plus both seem to crash a ton on this device, which I imagine is the apps themselves.However, when I try to use the "mayday" function, it doesn't work.  The internet browsing is also ridiculously slow.Maybe I got a bad apple, but I don't think so...if you're looking for a bigger ebook reader, it's great, but other functionalities are minimal.The only other thing I use it for is taking notes in my night classes-for that it works great, I downloaded the office suite kindle version.  So for my two main purposes it works great, but if you want something for movie viewing-unless you're downloading the movie I'd go for something else.  The streaming on the kindle isn't great and there isn't a ton of support (despite mayday) to really help out with glitches.

Reviews.Title: Volume Needs to Come up
Reviews.Author: Abigail
Reviews.Content: This is a nice kindle to have. The only problem I have is that the sound is not as loud as the 7" one.I mean it sounds like this is half the volume of the kindle 7". I love my music, so therefore I AM NOT ALL THAT PLEASED.but for listening with earphones, I guess it would be fine. But I use this kindle and let my music go from room to room. But overall, I think it is good.

Reviews.Title: Ads?  Really?
Reviews.Author: Statari
Reviews.Content: I got the slightly cheaper version of this product which apparently means that the greeting screen is irrevocably an ad of some sort.  It's mildly annoying and unexpected but nothing I can't live with.

Reviews.Title: review
Reviews.Author: Mary L. Nisttahuz
Reviews.Content: I am extremely happy with my new Kindle Fire HDX.  This my third Kindle, each one having better than the last,  I use it primarily for reading but also enjoy movie previews, book reviews and games.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Hol
Reviews.Content: Love it and easy its to use.  Does the same as any other pad, maybe even better. Clear screen display!!!

Reviews.Title: Love my new Kindle!
Reviews.Author: beckyc251
Reviews.Content: Wish I could learn to use it better.  Easier to maneuver than my last one. Takes great pictures.  I'm a definite Kindle fan...my 3rd!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 etc
Reviews.Author: Penny
Reviews.Content: Replaced an earlier Kindle Fire. It is great. Love all the apps. Nice to have a larger reading service. Color and clarity are excellent. Need to use a stylus but do not mind.

Reviews.Title: I bought 4 of them!
Reviews.Author: Melanie Wojtulewicz
Reviews.Content: After I bought Kindles for two nieces and a nephew for Christmas, I decided to treat myself too.  I never imagined how you could take a computerized book to bed.  Now I can take lots of books to bed.  I am very happy with my machine.  I do with that they came with instructions. I do not like the idea of trying to figure everything out my trial and error.  I don't know what flat bellied people do  Mine sits just right on my big tummy.

Reviews.Title: Android Tablet, Some Unique Features, Some Unique Failures
Reviews.Author: T. Steyaert
Reviews.Content: I got the Kindle Fire HDX after using the Google Nexus tablet.  When the HDX came out, I thought about the change and decided to wait for a bit.  Did more with my Google Nexus and when I couldn't find a good way to show the Prime videos, I decided to try the HDX.Pro:  HDX will show Prime Videos, including downloading locally. Great graphics resolution.Con:  Amazon Marketplace, not Kindle Marketplace. A new account, so linking things to Google's account doesn't work.  Lots of applications seem to run all the time, causing issues with other applications.Who wants the HDX?  If you want to watch videos from Amazon Prime, get the HDX.  Need the super high graphical resolution, get the HDX.  Basically, anything else you can do from a standard Android tablet for cheaper and much more configurable.Android tablet has more configuration, and a much bigger application pool.  With the Kindle, you can load applications from another Android device, but you don't get updates.  Overall, if you need the higher resolution, or want to watch Amazon Prime videos, I would suggest just about any other Andoid device.

Reviews.Title: shoulda gone with the iPad
Reviews.Author: Miss Cellophane "Clearly, you don't remember me."
Reviews.Content: So few apps (like airline apps) on the Kindle.  I am sad that I didn't spend the extra money to get the iPad.Additionally I can't sync my work stuff on this device.The glare on this tablet is annoying when reading.  I love the old school kindle for reading and continuous to use that whoever possible.

Reviews.Title: cant wait for the fix.....still love it...
Reviews.Author: mitch3155
Reviews.Content: I loved the first kindle, wanna love this one, too. The quality of construction and clarity of the screen are second to none. The only issue I have, which the people from kindle assure me a fix is coming, is the sudden loss of WiFi. Can't wait for the fix. This is truly the only device you need when traveling here or Europe. Haven't tried it in South America.

Reviews.Title: It works well
Reviews.Author: G. Plude "orchid lady"
Reviews.Content: This is my first foray into the tablet world.  I was on the fence as to whether I needed or wanted a tablet when I have a smartphone and a touch screen laptop.  I was on the fence too when I bought my first Kindle reader and feel immediately in love with it (and I won't give it up for reading books).  The HDX is easy to use, easy to get used to (I haven't had to hit Mayday yet).  I have found I use my phone less for email, unless I'm away from home, and I can see the portability advantage.  Is a tablet crucial, probably not, but it is fun.  More to come.

Reviews.Title: Some Problems with Options
Reviews.Author: RGrabber
Reviews.Content: I am still working on understanding all the options.  This is my first tablet and it appears as though Amazon expects a first time buy to know the ins and out of finding option.  The Mayday is helpful if you know what questions to ask.  They have been friendly.  If you know the basics my feeling is that is a good item.

Reviews.Title: Not what I was hoping it would be!
Reviews.Author: Jean
Reviews.Content: I hate the fact that I can't download some of the games I had on my Kindle Fire HD onto the HDX!  The one game that I really liked to play (Pogo) can not be downloaded.  I've lost other games too but that is the one that irks me the most.  If I could I'd like to go back to the old 8.9" Kindle Fire HD.  This one is NOT worth the money!!!

Reviews.Title: First thing I check in the mornig and the last thing I read at night.
Reviews.Author: James B. Kuminecz
Reviews.Content: My constant companion for work and play and leisure reading. Suggest that you get the HDX Fire8.9 Wi-Fi,64 Gb.After four months have still not made use of all it features. NEEDS A WIRELESS CHARGING CAPABILITY. Has my Catholic book of prayers and Bubble installed. Has apps for banking Drug Store as well as medical reminders and references.

Reviews.Title: Light, fast, beautiful
Reviews.Author: Gurjeet Bal
Reviews.Content: I find it more useful than I thought would be. It is light so doesn't strain hands, It is fast and screen resolution is great. Its fun to watch small short videos which I never had time or ease to watch it on laptop. There are many apps now for it so there is no issue regarding the usability. I am glad I got it. price is also cool compared to similar products.Only annoying thing is that I can not share prime movies on it with family member account but that is more of Prime account rather than the device itself.

Reviews.Title: Love the Fire!
Reviews.Author: Ewenice "ewenice"
Reviews.Content: For the price, it should have come w/a protective screen cover.  Also, there are so many times, I've clicked on certain things and the message "that I need Google Play Store for whatever it is I'm trying to do" keeps coming up and it's very frustrating.  Kindle and Google need to get together somehow and make things easier for people such as I am.  All in all, I'm glad I made the purchase and I hope to learn all I need to get the full use of it.  After that, I'm sure I'll love it even more!

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet, Best for Videos
Reviews.Author: Joanne
Reviews.Content: I use the Kindle Fire HDX almost every night to watch videos as I unwind from the day and gradually fall asleep.  The screen quality is just beautiful for movies, photos, etc.I gave only four stars because of the difficulty in having to sideload apps from Google Play.

Reviews.Title: Like my new Kindle.
Reviews.Author: Muriel J. Farnkoff
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle, however I just had some problems with the Zynga game, Words with Friends and was unable to use it for a month. I know this is not Amazon's fault, but thought I would let you know.I did not give it 5 stars, because I am a little disappointed in the life of the battery.  I'm pretty sure it was advertised as having a longer life than my older Kindle, but it seems like 3 hrs., give or take, is all I get from a full charge.  Is this the correct time I should be getting?I really like the Mayday button, as I am still learning all the things that the HDX fire can do and it is so helpful to have someone you can ask a question of and get an answer !!!!

Reviews.Title: difficult to see outdoors, battery drains fast, camera doesn't work well.
Reviews.Author: Lee100
Reviews.Content: I've been using the device for several hours now, I noticed several issues:The advertisement says HDX makes things easier to see in "any lighting conditions, including outdoors." this is misleading: even at maximum brightness it's hard to see what's on the screen when ambient light is bright (I tested it inside a car, it was bright outside, but the screen was not exposed to direct sunlight).The advertisement says Kindle has "12 hours mixed use" battery life, this is again misleading, the battery drains very quickly if you do anything at all, (down to 60% in less than one hour)A third issue is with the Camera:  when taking picture, the kindle was always trying to focus. it makes taking pictures difficult.

Reviews.Title: Connectivity
Reviews.Author: Nicole K
Reviews.Content: In general, I'm pleased with my Kindle Fire HDX.  However, I do have an issue with wi-fi connectivity.  Quite often apps won't load or web pages due to the device thinking it's not connected to the internet when in fact it is.  The only way to fix this issue that I have found is to power the unit down and restart it.  This becomes a little annoying when I'm restarting it for the 4th time in one day.

Reviews.Title: The Good, The Bad and The UGLY
Reviews.Author: C.C.
Reviews.Content: The graphics are great, the weight is amazingly light, BUT there are some small issues I'm having. When I press the power button nothing happens, I have to repeat that step a second time, this happens every time not once in a while. When reading the news the screen fades off just slightly, then goes back to total brightness, this is annoying to me. I'd hit Mayday but I had a terrible experience with the people who were suppose to help me, they didn't have a clue. I have a few days left to decide if I'll keep this HDX8.9, I hate to give it up, but these glitches are annoying.

Reviews.Title: Sweet media machine!
Reviews.Author: B. G. "MMA Fan"
Reviews.Content: Love my Fire HDX.  Plays video like a champ, streaming and otherwise.  The app selection is limited, yes. The silk browser is kinda sucky.  But! there are solutions to both via sideloading.

Reviews.Title: really really like it
Reviews.Author: greg bertrand
Reviews.Content: Awesome light bright quickConsThe screen gets smudged but not much you can do about thatWish there was some directions

Reviews.Title: complicated for this older man
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: There seems to be no organized way to take the customer through the directions, organization and placement of content for easy use. You must have a cover , it is so touch sensitive; yet there are times I can pound on it before it will respond to my "touch". I will need more than the 30 days I have had it to become comfortable with all it has to offer. A short course in beyond the basics might help. Otherwise, it is a great Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Good or great?
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Ferrantello
Reviews.Content: I love the size and ease of use. But I didn't realize the lack of capability with external applications and programs.Hopefully Amazon will work with these companies so we can access the things we need.

Reviews.Title: enjoying my kindle fire hdx 8.9
Reviews.Author: millerbr
Reviews.Content: Very handy when needed. Grand kids are always asking me for it to play games. I have had no problems at all. I have used the May day once to return a DVD and it was a great experience. Thank you kindle people.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Tablet
Reviews.Author: Mai "Mai"
Reviews.Content: I wanted a great tablet for entertainment. This is it. Downloads movies and TV shows easily with no buffering. Resolution is excellent. Availability of books for purchase or borrowing is fantastic. Screen is easy on the eyes and top quality. Plenty of options for games. A help button provides the best customer service I have found for any tablet. Strong wifi capability. Super camera. The Kindle Fire is an amazing tablet.

Reviews.Title: So Coo
Reviews.Author: Elliepoo
Reviews.Content: I really really like this Kindle.  So happy I got the HDX - audio is fantastic and picture quality is great

Reviews.Title: A bigger screen helps and is a big plus
Reviews.Author: John Hanley
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Kindle (my 3rd) before Christmas. I have not been a big fan of reading devices before as they were too small.However, this Kindle Fire is big enough that I can use it whenever I want. I am seeing impaired and by double tapping a web page I can comfortably use this Kindle.Note: I do not use the Kindle for book reading (my girlfriend does and often wants it first after dinner). I use it primarily to keep up to date on my work or hobbies for which it is excellently purposed for me. My son uses it to watch Amazon Prime movies with ear-buds.Note: I don't remember when we bought the first Amazon Kindle (five years ago maybe), but all three continue to work with no issues. We have all of the Apple iPad generations also and I would say that they are very close in quality and ease of use. For my family Amazon Prime is the key factor (movies for everyone and the big screen for me and low cost books).

Reviews.Title: Not Worth the Money
Reviews.Author: Zito Medeiros
Reviews.Content: I must admit that the picture quality is excellent, but the sound is only mediocre.  It is quick and responds well.  The battery lasts a real long time.  My main disappointment is that the operating system is a modified version of Android.  As a result, many of the apps I am used to on my phone cannot be installed on the Kindle.  One of the main reasons I bought this Kindle was to read one of my magazines that is only digital now.  I downloaded the previous issue with no issues, but when I try to download the current version, I get an error claiming that I have to update some software.  Some of the apps not available are Google Now and Zinio,  I feel like I overpaid for this at $379.  I feel that I should haves hopped around for a Android 4.2 tablet, and i would probably have found something comparable for less than half the price.

Reviews.Title: Love, Love, Love my Kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: Cara
Reviews.Content: Cannot say enough about my Kindle - it replaces my lap top computer totally.  If I didn't work on my lap top I would probably never open it.  The display is amazing, the sound is clear and distinct, there are what seems like a "zillion" apps in the store.  I'm an avid reader and hate to be without new books. Searching for what you want takes longer than the purchase and transmission.  Does it all, beautifully. Again, LOVE IT!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" HDX Display, Wi-Fi, 16 GB
Reviews.Author: Ingrid P. Long
Reviews.Content: I was researching the Kindle Fire for quite sometime and when the HDX came out, it was a no-brainer for me.  I really like that it isn't very heavy and it connects me to everything in an instant.  You really don't need more than 16GB.  The display is crisp and the great size screen at 8.9" is perfect. I also have the Special Offers which you really don't notice because you just swipe to "unlock" and it's gone :)

Reviews.Title: E Reader
Reviews.Author: gghia
Reviews.Content: I have owned a previous Kindle and the Sony. Without question this Kindle Fire is easier to read, faster to download, and has become such a part of my life that I use my laptop and phone less. A must buy.

Reviews.Title: Love it better than my ipad
Reviews.Author: reader
Reviews.Content: Got one for my mom and she really appreciates the new features, lighter weight, and the mayday button. Transition for the older model was great. Easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: Great device
Reviews.Author: joevas
Reviews.Content: Just recently got it and am setting it up. It is well thought out and, with Amazon's support, it works well for me. I love Silk, the browser, and there is so much available it was worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire or IPad?
Reviews.Author: Nicks Nuna
Reviews.Content: After talking to several people I decided on the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" because of the mayday button. I've used it twice and it was much easier (and personal) than "chatting" on line.LOVE IT, LOVE IT.....Thank you Amazon!

Reviews.Title: bought for wife
Reviews.Author: robert lindenberger
Reviews.Content: got it for my other half for her anniversary an that's what she wanted. I made a good choice.when she is happy I am happy!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: This is a must have!
Reviews.Author: C. Barnett
Reviews.Content: Everything about it surpasses the IPAD 4 I had before it!  Amazon beats Apple on all counts.  Love the HDX!

Reviews.Title: kindle hdx 8.9
Reviews.Author: tom eakle
Reviews.Content: Its greatExcellent graphics and soundVery light weightEase of use for the novice and plenty of help and great cameras

Reviews.Title: handy .. fun .. convenient
Reviews.Author: Zoe's mom
Reviews.Content: I use it daily .. wish there was a better help system. . And for crying out loud .. figure out an easier way to clean out the deleted emails !!! Yeesh .. other than that .. I'm on the go .. so it has replaced my laptop for 90% of my life right now .. so much easier to toss in my purse .. . and I toasted my iPad .. I want everything on the same operating system ... and I'm still getting into it's full potential..

Reviews.Title: I Love My Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Carol
Reviews.Content: I absolutely LOVE my Kindle Fire HDX!!  I am somewhat "electronically challenged" and had no desire to own a tablet.  My husband wanted to buy me one for my birthday and I told him not to because I would probably never use it.  Then I saw an ad for the Kindle Fire HDX.  What sold me on it was the "help" feature.  Being able to get help 24/7 from a person who I can actually see on my screen as we are talking, to me, is absolutely fantastic.  (I kind of look at it like I have a helper living right inside my tablet:)).  I have already called for help several times and have waited no longer than maybe 10 or 15 seconds for someone to "show up" and they are always able to help me with whatever question I have.  So far, I have used my Kindle Fire HDX to surf the web and to play games.  I love browsing in the app store, too.  I have watched a couple of tv shows, too.  I plan to download some movies soon and also learn how to download and then listen to music.  I am having so much fun with my Kindle fire HDX!!  (The only complaint I have is that the battery does not last as long as I would like it to).

Reviews.Title: Great tablet, great price, great screen.
Reviews.Author: D. Byrne
Reviews.Content: I also own a Google Nexus 7, and my wife owns a new I-pad. The screen on the HDX blows them both away. The silk browser is super fast, and the OS Fire 3.0 is amazingly fast. I researched tablets very carefully as I had a lot of issues with the Nexus and I-pad. I would HIGHLY recommend the HDX. Get the 8.9 if you take a lot of pictures or video or watch a lot of video. The 7.0 is a little tight. GREAT PRODUCT.

Reviews.Title: Good not great.  Missed opportunity.
Reviews.Author: GORDON GIRVIN
Reviews.Content: Very good display and very responsive. Sound is weak.Two big mistakes -  no widgets and no other browsers.Hoping for software upgrades.

Reviews.Title: My kindle fire
Reviews.Author: william k. raley
Reviews.Content: I love my new kindle fire HDX 8.9".My wife and son say I don't by myself anything. So the kindle fire HDX is all mine.

Reviews.Title: kindle
Reviews.Author: Mrs. P. J. Singleton
Reviews.Content: this is my fifth kindle and that is only because it is the larger size. started with the very first one brought out and have continued to purchase over the years since. best thing ever.

Reviews.Title: Not a 'bargain', but worth the money.
Reviews.Author: Norbert Pohl "Car Nut"
Reviews.Content: Amazingly fast. Easy set up. Great screen. Unparalleled tech support system. Good battery life. Takes great pictures, panaorama pics are awesome!Only downside is some popular apps aren't made for it, and some sites don't support this device for their content.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Linda G "Linda G"
Reviews.Content: Best gift i ever received. It Does everything and more. Love it. I play my games, read my books and take care of my emails and web business.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I just Love this Kindle. I have had a Kindle Keyboard with 500+ books on it for a couple of years and have enjoyed it too. The Kindle Fire HDX is just incredible. It is so quick with everything. I have loaded it with games for myself and my 5 year old grandson. The Kindle Fire HDX has a great camera too.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Sally McEntire
Reviews.Content: So very happy with my new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9, still learning everything that it does. Took some great pics with it already. I have already recommended this to several friends. Downloaded a guide and it has been very helpful.

Reviews.Title: Highly recommend
Reviews.Author: Angela Lane
Reviews.Content: Excellent choice.  extremely simple to use and even easier to read than expected.  No problems at all.  Absolutely pleased with the purchase.  It was a birthday present for my husband and he is thrilled with it as well.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Al Lenhardt
Reviews.Content: Would like to do spreadsheets and documents on the device as well as to print from it. All other features are what we wanted and need.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Patrick Eakin
Reviews.Content: A good tablet compared to the others currently on the market. The screen has a vivid display and graphics and videos look good. It works works great with my wireless home network. It didn't come with a screen protector so I purchased a screen protector and a nice case to protect it. Battery life is decent for what is it used for as well.

Reviews.Title: Great way to read, surf, get emails
Reviews.Author: PRHPage
Reviews.Content: This is a gift for my husband, and he loves it! He's had a laptop up to this point, and the Kindle is much more portable, but the screen on this devise is plenty large enough that he doesn't miss that part of the laptop. This devise is very light-weight, and the graphics and colors are stunning. It's quick to pick up wifi.My husband (and I) have no reservations or problems with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Claricei "the Truthseeker"
Reviews.Content: FAR surpasses the ipad.  Husband loves it-display is terrific. We will have to see how it holds up.  The Kindle Fire I bought him 2 years ago is USELESS now.  Some internal breakdown of charging port has left it unusable.  I hope the HDX lasts better

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Reisetante
Reviews.Content: This is an upgrade from my previous Kindle HD Fire. The screen is bigger, the colors very brilliant, and best of all it has a rear facing camera in addition to the front facing camera on the older model. The Kindle Fire HDX is a very nice tablet with many useful functions - some of which I still have to discover.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Daisy Dingess
Reviews.Content: I got this kindle fire after using a regular kindle fire for a couple of years and was greatly rewarded with the speed and color and the sounds.The difference while playing games is like night and day. My grandkids want to use it now also instead.I still love my other kindle with all my books on it.It's so much easier to browse on the internet.I'm very happy with my purchase

Reviews.Title: KINDLE FIRE HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Jay
Reviews.Content: I ENJOY MY NEW KINDLE FIRE HDX 8.9". I HAVE A BIGGER AREA TO VIEW WHEN I WATCH MOVIES OR READ A BOOK. PLUS I HAVE MANY NEW OFFERS TO CHOOSE FROM. STILL HAVEN'T FIGURED OUT ALL THE THINGS IT CAN DO.

Reviews.Title: Simply Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Jeff Salleng
Reviews.Content: I have upgraded from the original Kindle Fire to the new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" and I couldn't be happier.  Everything about it is pure upgrade. The screen, the power, the performance, the everything.  This is what a tablet should be. Period. End of story. Make yourself happy and get one of these.

Reviews.Title: like my new kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: nancy spero
Reviews.Content: Wish I could print anything from it. I find I still have to use my laptop too much.  It doesn't have capability to use a lot of app's that are vailable on the phone. Too expensive for not a lot of upgrades.

Reviews.Title: Fire's burning bright
Reviews.Author: David J. Brumbaugh
Reviews.Content: This is one beauty of a Kindle Fire and it's as light as can be!! There is so much more to it than you can believe!! There are no drawbacks to it PERIOD!!! This is money that's well spent and if you want the cleanest sound in playing music you are able to catch every nuance of it!! For a shining example as to that go to the music store and if you're a big fan of the animated Transformers movie type , or should I say Swype?, and go for Transformers soundtrack and look for Spectre General and buy that song and turn the volume all the way up and you will hear every last word at the end of the song!!!  You will love this machine!!!

Reviews.Title: Can't go Wrong with a Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: CybaX
Reviews.Content: Looked at many tablets for many months. Since I am a Prime member I decided on the HDX 8.9. I can say I made the right choice. The main complaint I heard prior to purchase was the lack of the Goggle Play Store. This is not a dealbreaker. Amazon has many apps & is growing. Also, if you know what your doing, you can load compatible apps from other app stores.Have not used the "Mayday" feature & hope I don't encounter a problem I have to. But it's nice to know it's there if I need it.

Reviews.Title: All the bells and whistles but encountered some glitches
Reviews.Author: R. Eye
Reviews.Content: I bought this Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" as a Xmas gift for my 23-yr old daughter.  I saw her watching a movie on her smart phone and asked her why she wasn't using the HDX.  She told me that the Netflix streaming kept stopping and she had to start it all over again, which didn't occur on her smart phone.  She also told me that she could not watch youtube videos on it.  I called Amazon customer service but with Kindles one must now call a special Kindle service line.  The Kindle CSR told us that we needed to do a number of things and then call back if the problem persisted.  It persisted but not as often.  We called back to report this and we were instructed by the Kindle CSR to reload some apps including Netflix.  It was strange that the Kindle CSR blamed Netflix's streaming for the glitch or our wireless router when our family of six watches wireless Netflix & Amazon streaming on numerous devices in numerous rooms throughout the house with no issues.  My daughter told him that she accessed Netflix with both the Kindle HDX and her laptop side by side watching the same movie from Netflix and the Kindle froze but the laptop did not.  She told him that this should be evidence that the problem was not Netflix or a wireless issue at our house.  the Kindle CSR told her that if this second round of steps did not fix the problem, then a new Kindle HDX would be sent out.  After she reloaded the apps and did what the Kindle CSR told her to do, the problem was still there, so Amazon sent out a new Kindle Fire HDX.  The new one has not encountered the problems that the old one did.  It is an expensive item to have issues with streaming when other items like our numerous laptops, smartphones, iPads, and Android tablets do not and we think that something must have been updated to fix this glitch.  My daughter likes the light weight and portability of the HDX, the image is clear and crisp, and she can download some college textbooks to it if she wants to.  She had downloaded many apps and is enjoying it.UPDATE: Now she can no longer view youtube videos again.  We give up.

Reviews.Title: Glad I bought the HDX and not an iPad
Reviews.Author: J Ambrose
Reviews.Content: When I first took the Kindle out of the box, I had a moment of buyer's remorse.  When I went to add apps like Blackboard, I felt it again.  But I have to say, I used a tech rental program to try out the new iPad and was very glad at the end of the rental period that I didn't buy an iPad.  I keep eyeing windows-based tablet PCs, but Microsoft seems at least a few years from working out all of the problems in hardware and OS.  After comparing my options, I find the Kindle to be the best possible choice for the money. It is faster and more intuitive than the iPad, and it is far less expensive than any equivalent performer of the PC ilk.The battery drains a little faster than I expected, but it also charges pretty quickly.  So far, there haven't been any functionality I can't replicate on the HDX, although I haven't found a way to run flashplayer content.

Reviews.Title: Easy choice for me
Reviews.Author: William P. Stallsmith
Reviews.Content: 5 stars because the HDX works exactly as promised.  A non-expert who can read and listen intelligently can use and enjoy it.  If a buyer does not need some exotic app available only on another tablet, then the HDX is his or her cup of tech.  The interface between user and machine is intuitive for the most part.  I use mine to watch old TV shows and movies, and to research references.  My only complaint is with the Amazon marketers who have decided to hump a heavy, $70 case for this light-weight beauty, while it is relatively difficult to find and buy a less expensive and better-working alternative.  I think I found one, but have as yet to get delivery from Amazon.  Fie on you, Amazon.  But again, thanks for offering the HDX.  This is my 3rd Kindle: the other 2 are the original ereader and a Paperwhite.

Reviews.Title: Better than I expected
Reviews.Author: Shanahan
Reviews.Content: This meets all my expectations and more. My laptop will sit and collect dust now don't need it anymore . Wow

Reviews.Title: By far the greatest Kindle to date.
Reviews.Author: Kyle D.
Reviews.Content: I am a Kindle addict, having owned every Fire model, and one before that.  The display of the 8.9 is unbelievably clear, even when compared to the 7inch model.  The sound is incredible and has a great range in volume.  I hope Amazon comes out with more Amazon software so it is possible to watch flash videos.  This range of products is still in it's infancy, and will only improve.  I believe that this is better than the IPad in many ways, price especially and soon will have more options than all competition.  Amazon has the best customer service and mayday is proof of this.  You will have zero regrets about buying this product

Reviews.Title: my Kindle fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Maartje Heitlager
Reviews.Content: Love my Kindle. Had a Asus window8.  I'm glad I changed to a kindle much easier for me to use.

Reviews.Title: Finally
Reviews.Author: Claire.N
Reviews.Content: For 2 years I've been looking at readers & tablets, following reviews. Grabbed an inexpensive reader that I was doing fine with until I figured I was ready to take the "plunge". Absolutely overjoyed that I did (and so is my 8 yr old grandson LOL).Big enough but not too big. I went for the largest amount of gigs because I know myself. Love the sound, love the display, not a thing I don't love about it. Battery holds up real well. I'm often amazed at how long it goes before needing to be charged considering all the game playing, web surfing, email checking, etc that goes on.One of the main deciding factors was the availablility of the Belkin Bluetooth Keyboard Case that I'll review separately.

Reviews.Title: What I was expecting
Reviews.Author: RosieQ
Reviews.Content: As a Kindle Fan, this is exactly what was advertised and expected.Having a previous version I must admit it took a couple days to get used to the new image of icons, which are more squared rather than the previous version in which they were rounded, but its an evolution.I loved the fact that is lighter, and the positioning of the on/off, and volume buttons is way better.A great evolution compared to the previous FIre HD

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: While I would like to have access to the Google Play Store, I really love my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9.  I have sideloaded many of the apps I use that are not available on Amazon.  The one I had to have is Dropbox which works perfectly on the Kindle.  The display is the best I've seen on any tablet.  I used a Galaxy Note 8.0 prior to getting the Kindle Fire HDX and am very happy with the trade.  The only thing that would make it better is to have more of the Android apps available in the Amazon App Store.

Reviews.Title: kindle 8.9
Reviews.Author: K. Bohl
Reviews.Content: I have been very happy with the kindle 8.9 . This is my second kindle from Amazon and both have exceeded my expectations.

Reviews.Title: Loving my first table!
Reviews.Author: Gary G. Gilmore "JJ48Fan"
Reviews.Content: I spend 6-8 hours on a computer every day. I work from home and have a desktop & a laptop going at the same time in my office and another laptop in the family room. I didn't think I would ever like a computer without a regular keyboard. I have an iPhone and those who know me would tell you my text messages are very short. I have big fingers and I just can't do what I see many teen agers do when it come to texting. I think many of them can text faster than they can talk. Anyway. this is much easier to use for responding to email and such. But that is NOT the only thing that I like about it. I love being able to get my Prime movies and TV shows on this. I am hard of hearing and wear hearing aids. I use close captioning on my TV. I used to have Netflix, but when they went to the streaming they didn't have closed captioning. I let them know my need and they said they were working on it, but it was never available for anything I wanted to watch, so I cancelled. It has been hard for me to use the Amazon Prime Movie downloads on my TV. I have to run it through my laptop into my TV and Prime downloads didn't show closed captioning. So I was delightfully surprised that everything I have been watching on my Kindle from Amazon Prime has closed captioning! I like the larger screen and the picture is amazingly clear, crisp, with great colors. I keep finding new useful apps to download. The battery seems to last a long time. I know it lasts a lot longer than my iPhone. This thing is very light in my opinion, but it is my first pad computer so I don't have anything to compare it to. I have come to prefer taking it to client meetings over my laptop. There are probably others more geeky than me that might want some things that the Kindle doesn't have, but I love mine just the way it is.

Reviews.Title: 64gb is the way to go!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I had the 32gb initially and had to upgrade to the 64gb.  I have mine loaded with comics and a various episodes from Amazon Prime Videos.  I miss the ability to hook up a HDMI cable to the TV as the HD series had at launch.  I do enjoy having the upgraded screen density, It comes in handy when reading tiny font on comic books.  The speakers could be a little better..mainly louder.  The sound quality is good, just not loud enough.  The size is perfect.  I tend to lean towards 7" tablets, but this is still in that realm of small tablets.  It's not a gigantic iPad nor a small Nexus 7, but a perfect blend of the two with it's own unique twists.  I'm on board the Amazon train.  I may not agree with the way they design all their products, but I accept it and love it.

Reviews.Title: Hard to sync up !!!
Reviews.Author: Frank Grippi
Reviews.Content: The reason a 3 star was chosen, is the difficulty getting your email, contact list  and calender to sync up. A second email had to be established for the calender to work. Contact list will be seen in the new addresses only, not your original address. Frustration, set aside,the kindle HDX has an amazing display, very light  and a joy to use. Waiting to see if a better option is made for a protective case.

Reviews.Title: It is the best
Reviews.Author: Kathleen Schmitz
Reviews.Content: It does everything I wanted and more! Easy to use. Light weight.Wish I had it a long time ago. I  forget my phone before I forget my Kindle.

Reviews.Title: A must have for us Amazon vets
Reviews.Author: Bio L. Titterington "Bio T."
Reviews.Content: I have the 1st gen Kindle and liked it but then I saw this was coming out and had to have it.The HD screen is great. They moved the speakers to a more logical position for tv/movie viewing and this thing is light. Really light.Battery life is good. I don't even know how they fit a battery into this thing. It's so slim.Only downside is that some of my favorite apps that I have on my iTouch are not available on Kindle. Not a deal breaker but a slight bummer.

Reviews.Title: First tablet
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: Love what this can do.  Use it mostly for email, browsing, and games, although I have tried watching a movie, the camera, and music just to see what it can do.  Much faster than my wife's non-HDX 8.9".  The button layout on this is MUCH better than hers too.  Here's some info:Camera:  Only tried a few times, but seems to work well and comes w/ great editing tools.Movies:  Again, only tried a few times but great quality and sound for a device this sound.Email:  I have my company account set up on this and it was a piece of cake to do and works well.Games:  Not much to say....they work great.Web:  It is what it is...browser works fine.

Reviews.Title: very nice except for
Reviews.Author: MNMan
Reviews.Content: While everything works fine, I wanted to stream movies to my TV, but the only things available have a high cost associated with them.  When will someone come up with a cable (micro B to HDMI).

Reviews.Title: Prepare to be entertained. This is the Kindle we have been waiting for.
Reviews.Author: the stout hearted "reinx"
Reviews.Content: Media consumption at its finest! This is the Kindle Amazon has really been striving for it seems. Gutsy(fast and responsive), stylish, and very surprisingly light! The origami case will add a noticeable amount of weight but you will want it to keep this particular piece of tech safe.Browsing the web and reading your favorite books are both immediately satisfying, while the Amazon app store continues to grow its offerings at what seems to me a reasonably competitive rate.The HDX's ability to catch hold of and maintain a signal from your WiFi is solid(impressively so) and will keep you connected for all your Netflix and other streaming needs.And stream you will, because the picture quality is very good. The speakers are not as loud as last gen, but for a tablet I find them adequate for a quick couple of tunes on break or an episode of my favorite TV show before bed.I have occasion to use my HDX for up to 12 hours at a stretch at times and the battery keeps up quite well for reading or researching the occasional article on the net. The included charger and cable will keep you juiced up at a very pleasant rate as well.Bottom line: The kindle as a media consumption device does its job without a hitch. Highly reccomended. The 8.9" screen is still quite handily portable but if you don't mind the loss of screen realestate you can't beat the price of the 7".

Reviews.Title: I love this Kindle fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Beverly A
Reviews.Content: This Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" was the first tablet I ever had.  I am computer literate.  I am a novice at this tablet, however it is easy to operate.  I like the idea of having WI-FI and 4G LTE.  I have WI-FI at home but I like the option of using this tablet anywhere instead of looking for a Wi-Fi hotspot when I am traveling.  It is easy to read a book or watch a movie.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: pumpkin8
Reviews.Content: This Kindle is fantastic.  The screen is high resolution and movies look fantastic on the 8.9 ".  It is very fast.  It also allows android apps to be downloaded. I highly recommend the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9.

Reviews.Title: hdx 8.9
Reviews.Author: Grandma of four
Reviews.Content: Good for reading especially long books!  I like that I can place book vertically or horizontally also for games.  It doesn't add much weight.but the cover is heavy.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet; one shortcoming
Reviews.Author: shopdaddy "musikdaddy"
Reviews.Content: I bought a 32GB Kindle HDX 8.9.  Traded my previous Kindle HD 8.9 which I was very happy with, but I got bit by the "new model" bug.  The HDX tablet is much lighter, has a sharper screen, has faster response, and obviously better WiFi.  The only shortcoming I have to complain about is that Amazon didn't see fit to include HDMI on the HDX as they did on the HD.  I really enjoyed this feature on the HD because I could download a movie, then play it back on any TV with an HDMI port.  Unfortunately, Amazon chose to build in Miracast, a technology to connect to TVs and other devices that is deployed on very new TVs and, apparently, is not yet perfected, based on the plethora of 3-star (and less) reviews of the Miracast adapters sold on Amazon.  It is the reason I didn't give the HDX 5 stars, otherwise, I'd consider it a perfect mobile device.

Reviews.Title: Good so far.
Reviews.Author: Charles L. Weichselbaum "Chaswax"
Reviews.Content: Got it for my wife. At first she was a little worried that it was only for reading books. She was so surprised that it could do almost everything her notebook could do and do it faster. has great speech recognition to use instead of typing. The screen is so big and clear so that even us old people can see and read. Best of all - it made my wife happy.

Reviews.Title: It is very good!!!!
Reviews.Author: Dale
Reviews.Content: It took me a while to figure it out, but as I learn how to use it, it is quite the instrument.  It should have had a instruction manual with it.  The biggest fault with the unite is when you go out of town it won't work without being hooked up to the internet.

Reviews.Title: Love IT
Reviews.Author: Georgetta M. Mitchell
Reviews.Content: This is my 4th Kindle. I pre-ordered it before Amazon was ready to ship. I have the Kindle fire HDX 8.9, 64 GB. Each one has met expectations.  The only reason i did not give it 5 stars is because many of the books now have the table of contents grayed out.  I could see and use the table of contents on previous devices.  However, I have located the table on most books and bookmarked it.The second reason for only 4 stars:  I have purchased 3 cases- looking for the perfect one.  Have not found it yet.  I do not want to raise the camera from the case to take a picture.  One case allows me to take a picture without raising the camera, but there is a black spot hiding the center of the picture, but the picture comes out great. STRANGE!Even though I only gave my 4th Kindle 4 stars, I would not give it up!

Reviews.Title: Nothing like this!!
Reviews.Author: Brenda Prentiss
Reviews.Content: This is my first purchase of a note pad of any kind but I rely don't think I would ever want anything else!  So portable and everything is right there at the touch of your finger. The HD is incredible! Facebook is so easy, my email is set up great. Nothing bad to say about it! I could go on and on but I want to get back to playing! :)

Reviews.Title: Awesome features!! Glad I got it!!
Reviews.Author: Mavisjo
Reviews.Content: I love my new kindle fire!! I already had one of the original ones which I still use because it is more compact & easy to stuff in my purse. I love the neat features the fire had to offer. The color screen is very clear & great for playing games and watching videos. Oh and it of course is great for reading, although as I mentioned I still use my first kindle for most of my reading. I find it has a better screen for outdoors & is more compact & lighter than the fire. I can access all my books on either kindle. I just sync and it picks up whenever I left off, great feature! I have yet to use the mayday app, still learning all it has to offer & haven't felt the need yet. I know I will at some point. If you are considering a kindle vs iPad, I would suggest giving the kindle fire a try, you won't regret it!

Reviews.Title: Great Ereader/Tablet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Engineer"
Reviews.Content: I received my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" about a month ago. I am greatly impressed! Amazon has done a wonderful job with this tablet and, and, product support. No more waiting on line or holding the phone for hours and waiting for call backs. And your credit card number to talk to a rep.  With the May Day feature, just press the button and you have support. Amazon, you deserve 5- thumb ups!!!The hardware is very nice to hold. This tablet is amazingly lightweight and thin. The HDX is very, very comfortable to hold and manage.The screen on the HDX is the best I've ever seen. "Beyond HD" is not an empty marketing phrase. This thing surprised me with its color, clarity, and brightness. It still reflects noticeably, though. Just to test it, I downloaded a movie and WOW!!!! Sound and picture beyond belief!!! Navigation is intuitive and easy. I can quickly and easily switch among reading, watching videos, shopping, and moreMost of the apps I want are available for my HDX. YouTube works just fine on the Silk Browser. And there are plenty of news apps, games, alarm clocks, etc. Seamlessly integrated with all things Amazon. I buy the vast majority of books and movies from Amazon, and my HDX provides an unbeatable way to enjoy them.Looking for a e-reader, tablet that offers great ease-of-use, picture and sound, and, and, and people always complain about support, not that they can solve every problem but at least you can get help. VERY IMPORTANT!!!… Best product on the market. I love mine!!!!

Reviews.Title: Amazing clarity
Reviews.Author: Gwen Drury
Reviews.Content: The picture quality of this is stunning! I am still learning my way on all the features and using trial & error to explore. Having a free trial of Amazon Prime is great, too.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Allana
Reviews.Content: The Kindle HDX is amazing, it is sharp, clear, and love the front and rear facing camera. The games just seem to come alive. I had a Kindle Fire HD, and it only had the front facing camera, which made it difficult to take pictures. I find myself reading more and enjoying playing the games as well. Internet connection is great, and it is faster.

Reviews.Title: new Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: granmuey
Reviews.Content: I really didn't need this Kindle but I sure wanted it.  It is a treat to use, lighter than my other Kindle and clearer.  Although I was perfectly satisfied with my older version, this one has me spoiled.  I can take pictures now!  I keep one with me at all times.

Reviews.Title: love my choice.
Reviews.Author: Shenelle West
Reviews.Content: Love the kindle, runs very smoothly. I was a bit hesitant because I thought that it wouldn't be able to run some of my favourite programs, but it does and very well I must add.

Reviews.Title: Hoping my Kindle Fire HDX continues to impress me over time !
Reviews.Author: terry
Reviews.Content: So far , In love with my New Kindle Fire HDX 8.9  , although with most things time will tell ! Hoping my Kindle Fire HDX continues to impress me over time !

Reviews.Title: Fantastic birthday gift
Reviews.Author: Connie
Reviews.Content: I received the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" as a gift and it is great.  Wonderful, clear, sharp color, quick downloads, instant internet connections, very light weight and manageable size.

Reviews.Title: great device
Reviews.Author: Linda L. Bleskan "CAT LOVER"
Reviews.Content: Love my 4th kindle.  Best to read or listen to and great to surf the web , pay my bills, games, and will print my stuff too.

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle!!!
Reviews.Author: Kimberly Lewis
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research before purchasing my tablet. The Kindle came highly recommended by a co-worker. It's light, a great crisp picture and absolutely fun!!  I love my Kindle!!

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Amazing Device
Reviews.Author: Bruno Ierulli
Reviews.Content: I am extremely happy with my new Kindle Fire HDX. Very thin, light and durable. It's wicked fast and simple to use right out of the box. I was an iPad groupy for years and had a Nexus 7.  This is my first Kindle, and I. Absolutely love it. Very stylish design, with a non slip rubbery finish on the back. You won't be disappointed. I recommend you purchase the model with no ads. It's one continuous infomercial on your device and lock screen.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 display
Reviews.Author: Kaye "km"
Reviews.Content: I purchased as an upgrade from Kindle Fire HD 8.9 display and it is definitely an upgrade.  Lighter, more responsive and great display.  I rated 4 stars instead of 5 simply because of the price and because upgrade required purchase of a new tablet.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet to enjoy the Amazon Prime privileges to the full.  Some limitations and issues.
Reviews.Author: Alison
Reviews.Content: We love the picture quality and speed of this tablets.  Though we already own two Kindles, we felt that this device finally allow us to enjoy the full scope of the Prime membership.  I especially enjoy watching Amazon Prime movies on the Fire because of the amazing X-ray features.  The names of the actors, trivia, goofs appear automatically at the relevant scenes.  I rewatched many of my favorite movies and oh boy how much more I learned about them!That said, we do have the following issues:1. It does not support Adobe Flash.  So my son cannot do his homework and my husband cannot do his online study on this tablet.  I know I can make it work if I jump some loops, but it really is a hassle and it always make me nervous installing unauthorized third party app.2. The tablet reset several time for no reason in the first week we got it.  It was a bit annoying because after each reset I needed to login to all the apps we have been using again.  In fact I was so annoyed that I thought of have it replaced.  The second week onward this phenomenon did not occur and I am keeping my fingers crossed.3. Occasional lose of WiFi connection, despite of strong signal.  I need to turn off and then turn the WiFi back on to get the connection again.4. Despite this tablet is basically running on Android, many of the Android apps are not available in Kindle Fire.5. It boosts to be able to print documents directly from the tablet to the network printer, it does not have a standard app to help you set up the printer to achieve that function.  I am totally lost in the process of shopping for the appropriate app for this purpose.  Why can't Amazon recommend the right app to do it?To conclude, a great device if you are already a Prime member and  the majority of usage is for movies, books and audiobooks.  The Silk web browser is good enough but without Adobe Flash support, too often you will find streaming video footage not playable on many of your favorite websites.

Reviews.Title: LEARNING THE KINDLE...TOO SOON TO EVAL
Reviews.Author: S Miles Schlesinger
Reviews.Content: LEARNING THE KINDLE ...SERVICE AND HELP HAS BEEN GOOD ...TOO SOON TO EVAL AS I AM OLD AND TAKES ME ALONG TIME

Reviews.Title: Great product, Love it.
Reviews.Author: Gary Willis
Reviews.Content: I'm recommend this to everyone.The May day feature hits a home run.This tablet is the only way to go.Way to go Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Loving it !!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Alicia Cox
Reviews.Content: I have the iPad but the kindle with the larger screen has my ipad collecting a little dust. I love all the new features and the case makes it seem like a  neat looking book. The volume is also better.

Reviews.Title: The perfect tablet?
Reviews.Author: David W Anderson
Reviews.Content: Have owned the tablet for a few days now and so far it has been a joy to use. Super light, crystal clear video make reading, whether a book or just perusing the web, easy on the eyes. The sound is super as well. I've used other tablets and I'm convinced that the Kindle Fire HDX was the perfect choice for our family.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire hdx 8.9
Reviews.Author: Ed C.
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with my purchase of the Kindle Fire. I also own a I pad and was discouraged from buying the Kindle because I was told that the Ipad was better. The mayday feature is amazing and I couldnt be happier with function. Amazon Prime is much better with the Kindle because of the fact that you can download free movies and tv shows. Since I purchased the Kindle I find myself only using my I pad for work.

Reviews.Title: My Kindle HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Carolyn Sprunger
Reviews.Content: I love my new Kindle.  I'll soon be 70 years old and I found this easy to use.  I especially like the "mayday" button.  The people that help are nice and patient.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: wildroseorganics
Reviews.Content: The sound is incredible, and the color on the screen, when I am watching a movie on Netflix is awesome. I love the size of the screen and the camera takes beautiful photos, even using the flash. It takes wonderful video footage, very clear. The mayday is just awesome, and all I have to do is touch it and I have live help. The customer service is wonderful, and you can see them, but they can't see you. They can see what is on your screen and help you with almost everything. I have my Bitstrips, and my instagram, but on the Kindle it is called Padgram, but works in conjunction with the instagram. I just signed up with  Statigr.am, which is similar to instagram. The games are so much more fun on the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9, my favorite is Subway Surfer. My grandson is in the Marines and stationed back in Missouri, and we play Subway surfer together.A little bit about 4G LTE, mine is through Verizon, and it was suppose to be $30.00 a month rather you use it or not. I got signed up with them and they pulled the 30.00 out of my account, 2 weeks later I received a bill from them for a whopping $175.00, with no mention of the 30.00 I already paid, with a bunch of BOGUS TRUMPED UP FEES, so be Leary.Most of the games are about extracting money out of your bank account, but there are some good ones you can play without having to pay more money.If you are a previous Kindle owner, all your games and information is transferred to your new Kindle, and you will find them on the cloud. You will just have to click on the cloud, and then click on what you want and it will download it right onto your new Kindle. It downloaded all my games, apps, and my book purchases, so you don't have to re-purchase them. I use my pinterest a lot on my new Kindle. I have 5 different emails, for various reasons, and thru the Kindle I have all of my email accounts at my fingertips.I forked out over a thousand dollars for the Ipad, and I was not impressed, and it is not ADHD FRIENDLY. The photos and video were o.k, but no flash. The sound doesn't even compare with the Kindle. I originally bought it so I could talk to my grandson through Facetime, but when I started comparing the difference between the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 and the Ipad, the Kindle won hands down. So I returned the Ipad and bought my Kindle HDX for 600.00, and I am so very glad I did. Now, I talk to my grandson on the phone and thru Facebook and it works for us. If you have any questions, feel free to ask.

Reviews.Title: Who needs an iPad when you could buy a Kindle?
Reviews.Author: Matthew G. Iannacone "MatthewGavin"
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle.  Everything I need a tablet for, I can do on my Kindle.  I feel most people buy an iPad because that is what everybody else has or that is the only tablet they know.  If they took at a Kindle HDX they would know the Kindle does everything an iPad does for a CHEAPER price.  I read my books, watch movies on Netflix and Amazon Prime, use Flipboard.  I love that the calendar syncs with my Nokia Lumia 920.  I stream music using the new Jambox Mini when I have people over.  I am very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Donald C Hudson
Reviews.Content: This tablet was bought and then issued to students in a paramedic class for use of all online learning resources and etextbook. It has met expectations. My only grip is that it does not support Goolge services. I understand the different competing manufactures, but great products from both can actually support each other and bolster sales on both sides!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" tablet
Reviews.Author: LesterT
Reviews.Content: I previously had a Samsung 10" table that was getting a bit long in the tooth.  I decided that the Kindle's size and clarity were to my liking, so I purchased one.  Interestingly enough - and I don't know if this special is still available - I got a good discount by purchasing it through AARP.That said, I don't have too many gripes about this product.  It's fast, easy to use, and makes reading novels (my primary desire for getting free novels through Amazon Prime) enjoyable.  My one big gripe is the Kindle app store. As a now retired techie, I like the ability to pick and choose which apps I want to use. The Kindle App store prefers to limit those choices by a wide margin compared to Android's play store.That said, I gave the Kindle four stars even though I believe it's a five star product. The Kindle App store issue, in my opinion, is not a minor grievance.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Love my Kindle Fire HDX. Wish I had purchased it sooner. Very easy to use. I hardly use my lap top anymore

Reviews.Title: phenomenal
Reviews.Author: Claiomh
Reviews.Content: The only two problems I have with this is that I can't get flash player for it, and, since I got the ad free version, I would like to put my own pics up as my screensaver. Those are the ONLY two misgivings about my hdx. Otherwise, I love my hdx

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: 4realguy Beaumont, Tx
Reviews.Content: I really love this product, i have desktops and laptops but the device is versatile enough to carry any where and it can do just as much and keep you entertained on the go.

Reviews.Title: GREAT
Reviews.Author: Berr Breiding
Reviews.Content: The versatility and graphics have us hooked.  Keep up the very, good work, and we 'll keep enjoying the apps.

Reviews.Title: LOVE LOVE LOVE it!
Reviews.Author: Sharon Schilling
Reviews.Content: I already have an iPad and I had to share with my husband so I decided to invest in another "tablet."  Im so glad I bought this.  I love the HD screen and at 32GB it has plenty of memory for me.  I love the size of it and it is  compatible with my other Kindle accounts.  I love that it came ready to go (with the exception of adding my personal email account) right out of the box!  Fully charged and my Kindle account/Amazon stuff was already synced with it the moment I turned it on!!!  Fantastic!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" WI-FI and 4G LTE, 64 GB
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: i  havn't had this unit very long. At first is was a little disappointed because I couldn't get an old black and white movie to play on it but I found the right app to do this, so so-far-so-good. I was initially concerned it was going to be too big to carry around, but it really isn't. Like they say in the ads, it is very light and has a great screen.  I would recommend to anyone gettingt a Kindle to max out the memory.  The 4G LTE has also proved handy when I was out of range of my wi-fi signal at a friends house; I was able to show them how I could download a book and do other shopping.

Reviews.Title: Met my expectations in every way.
Reviews.Author: Steven J Yetter
Reviews.Content: One of the few technology choices I have made in recent years that has met my expectations. The only issue I have is reading outside in bright light but I knew this was going to be an issue that is why I kept my Kindle DX. I would recommend the Kindle Fire 8.9 HDX to anyone who needs a good table and reader. I may even try to leverage my windows development skills on this platform.

Reviews.Title: What did we do with our time before this?
Reviews.Author: Mr. Dad
Reviews.Content: One word can sum this device up... FUN! Second to that I would say "time waster". But who doesn't know that going in? This tablet is phenomenal in its quality, entertainment, and is it fair to say usefulness?? Not a cheap investment, but much better price than Apple products. The biggest drawback is the apps; Amazon has it set to only work with their own rather than with other options like Google Play. Not sure why as that hinders people's fondness for the device. There are other ways around it, just not convenient. Great product and we're glad we got it.

Reviews.Title: ...My PRECIOUS....lol
Reviews.Author: Sue C Que
Reviews.Content: This is my 6th..(!!!) Kindle tablet. I was already super happy with my Kindle fire HD 8.9 and thought there could not be anything better..but..wow...the HDX rocks!The graphics are crisp and color is great. The 2 camera's (even has a flash) are the cat's meow! SO easy to use..so light..so pretty and what made my day is that now you can put your books in Collections (folders)...Fast, great storage capacity. Who needs a laptop? I am hooked! HIGLY RECOMMEND IT!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" display, Wi-Fi, 16 GB tablet
Reviews.Author: Harley Stow
Reviews.Content: I like the Kindle Fire pretty well. It is fairly easy yo use although I am not at all experianced with tablets so it might include a little more user information, but the mayday button is really nice. Have only used it once and the lady was rel nice and very hepful. Could not have asked more from her.I would reccomend it to anyone and I am sure I will like it better as I learn more about it.

Reviews.Title: I love the kindle fire hdx 8.9
Reviews.Author: Connie MN
Reviews.Content: I had the kindle fire and I went up to the fire hdx. 8.9" screen. I love it!! Its big but its lighter than my old kindle. I needed help and all I had to do was push a button and the guy showed up and helped me with everything I needed it was great!

Reviews.Title: Great device for me and the kids
Reviews.Author: paul d freeman
Reviews.Content: The kids really love it for reading and especially playing games.  A great feature is the abiliy to set time limits for reading and playing games.  There is also a lot of free media that we have taken advantage.

Reviews.Title: great functionality in a sleek frame
Reviews.Author: Adam Rast
Reviews.Content: My main goal when purchasing this tablet was to find an e-reader that could provide extra functionality while still excelling at its primary purpose (reading books); the kindle fire hdx has that in spades. Not only is it a high quality e-reader, it handles the full range of entertainment media. Perfect size, long lasting battery, affordable price tag, beautiful and vibrant color display, fast processing, and the entire internet at my fingertips. I can access all of my media with a few simple swipes, and the rest waits for me in the cloud. Really cannot find fault with this product.

Reviews.Title: Better Than iPad! In my opinion!
Reviews.Author: Meng T Lee
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a gift for my girlfriend on Christmas! She really wanted an iPad or Galaxy Note Tab but this was more in my budget. Thought she wouldn't like it as much but now she literally cant go anywhere without it! (Its getting annoying! Lol!) She's thanked me over 20 times every time she finds something new  to do on the Kindle! I also had the free trial of Amazon Prime and it makes the kindle even better! It's lightweight, HD picture is great the Help App is really useful too! They really talk you through things even if its the smallest things! There is just so many things to do on the kindle! I'm planning to get me one soon too! For the price, you really cant find anything better! Thanks Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Best Tablet Ever!
Reviews.Author: Flora Fauna
Reviews.Content: I love the ease of use of this product.  Other tablets I've tried have been confusing and difficult to use.  This tablet is light-weight, ergonomically easy on the hands, and if you do have a question you get a real live person to walk you through your problem in a matter of 30 seconds.  The video is clear and sharp.  I LOVE my Kindle Fire HDX!

Reviews.Title: The best treat
Reviews.Author: Sheila M. Colon
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with my kindle fire HDX 8.9!!!! From the moment I open the HDX 8.9 I can not put it down it is absolutely my favorite  electronic toy...I have recommended it to my friends kudos to amazon:)

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Philip M61
Reviews.Content: As a ipad owner as well it is a bit different to use but the clarity of the video it displays is suburb.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Jean
Reviews.Content: We love the new HDX Kindle Fire tablet.  The picture is so clear, my husband is enjoying watching movies from it.

Reviews.Title: Good choice!
Reviews.Author: Traveller
Reviews.Content: This was an excellent choice for someone like me who is not computer savvy.  The personal guide, which I have brought upquite often, walks me through every question that I have with my Kindle.  This is the most outstanding feature that I can have someonehelp me directly.  They all have been kind and patient.  There is not anything that I dislike about it.

Reviews.Title: The Time is right for Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Kent Johnson
Reviews.Content: Has a very good video screen; can download and watch Hulu, Amazon Prime, and Net Flix. Good availability of Apps

Reviews.Title: Love reading my PDFs on this
Reviews.Author: Patricia A. Walker
Reviews.Content: I get a lot of art instructions or magazines that are in pdf format.  I just discovered how easy it is to email them to the Kindle by using my kindle email address assigned to this new device.I still read regular 'text' stories on my Kindle keyboard, but this is for my art books and magazines that need that color format.  I've been reading them on my computer using the Kindle app, but this is so much nice to have available.  I also enjoy the camera feature.  The special offers are not obtrusive either.  I tried them on my keyboard once and they were totally obnoxious, eating up part of the screen all of the time, but not so with this version.  You only see the offers when you first turn the device on while the screen is still locked.  I am very happy with this device, although there is glare on the screen if you are in strong light, so I will be researching the glare screens available.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Sharona
Reviews.Content: Great buy..Checked out others but the pluses of this one won my heart. This is my 3rd kindle. I just seem to upgrade my kindle. Can't imagine what will be next.  Great sound,  AWESOME color.Super fast downloads..Glad I chose Kindle again.

Reviews.Title: I really recommend this machine
Reviews.Author: Joe Ferreira
Reviews.Content: I do like the Kindle fire HDX because I had an iPad and I like this better this machine is faster and it's got better resolution camera takes great great pictures

Reviews.Title: Love it! Love it! Love it!!
Reviews.Author: Donna Mcgovern "Donna"
Reviews.Content: Kindle did it again! I had gotten the first kindle fire when it first came out, now this one is outstanding! It basically has it's own brain!!  Can't say enough!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is nice
Reviews.Author: James H.
Reviews.Content: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is nice and take everywhere I go.  I enjoy reading from it and surfing using the Silk browser.

Reviews.Title: kindle hdx
Reviews.Author: geckogirl548
Reviews.Content: I love the kindle fire hdx 4 G lite. The screen is bigger and easier to read. I like that the on/off and volume buttons are on the back on opposite sides. This is my 6th kindle, so I know my kindles. Love it!

Reviews.Title: Light weight and powerful tablet
Reviews.Author: Kindler
Reviews.Content: Minimum weight, great screen, a powerful CPU, large memory, simple interface, convenient Amazon services. This is all I got for the minimum money. In my collection were and there are tablets, as a NOOK Color, Asus Transformer, Kindle Fire, Kindle Fire HD 8.9", NOOK HD Plus. So, the choice is absolutely relevant, meaningful and perfect result.

Reviews.Title: Apple man loves new kindle fire hdx
Reviews.Author: Marcus Davis
Reviews.Content: I love it. It's just the right size . Ultra light and the display is perfect. I am an Apple guy but I really love my new k kindle fire..And thanks Amazon.for.letting me.pay it off in installments!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire
Reviews.Author: ramvenfu
Reviews.Content: This tablet is great for the hardware and its performance, one drawback is Amazon limits some apps that you can download. I would like to have gmail, and chrome on it. I would not recommend the advertising one, it is worth the thirty dollars to not have it especially if you have kids.The battery life is great, lasts a long time. I get two days on one charge and that is with full use during the day. 17 hours is not a lie, this battery lasts 17 hours of use. The screen is great and is very better than my 42 hd tv with a blueray player, my son actually prefers to watch his shows on it. (16 months). He just got interested in educational shows and responds better to the Kindle than the TV.I like how easy it is to use your amazon products in kindle, I have prime so I download Barney videos and when out and about son can watch them. Makes for a nice dinner when he is watching his shows.Where would I go with this, well I would integrate Kindle fire OS with Ubuntu because of the close business relationship they have with Canonical also a tablet as powerful as the new kindle fire hdx would kill with Ubuntu. I have an old HP laptop with similar hardware specs and when I first was using it with Ubuntu I thought I had bought a new laptop. I am thinking of getting several more Kindle's for my wife and son, and maybe then one will convert into a Ubuntu tablet.I bought it because it was similar to or better than an Ipad or Ipad mini after owning one I know it is better than an Ipad even the latest ones on market right now, my friend just bough an Ipad and is thinking of returning it to get a KIndle HDX 8.9 because of price and well, he also has prime and likes he can rent/download videos with his prime. The kindle freetime is great too, although I have not set up an account for my son because he is just a bit too young.My only complaint is well Amazon is a bit like Apple with the apps and restrictions, let us use all the android apps, also allow for a dual boot Ubuntu :) tablet with an Amazon prime app that allows us to still take advantage of all the Amazon-Kindle environment.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful first tablet!
Reviews.Author: shelby220
Reviews.Content: Easy to use, great picture/camera! I love it... I use it for Netflix, social media, and reading. Great tablet!  I highly recommend purchasing this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Great, but...
Reviews.Author: Lyrisist
Reviews.Content: The one complaint is that the market did not have all of the Android apps that I needed it to have. Other than that, this tablet is the best 8.9" on the market.

Reviews.Title: Best thing since peanut butter
Reviews.Author: LMJB
Reviews.Content: I never knew I needed a Kindle Fire until my husband got one. Light, easy to use,take anywhere. Great picture taking abilities.

Reviews.Title: DOES IT ALL FOR LESS MONEY!
Reviews.Author: D. Bozeman
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Kindle Fire with the Origami leather case for my wife, who had been monopolizing my laptop, and now I can't get her to communicate with me (which in a small way, guys, be a good thing!). I'm not a techno-geek, but what I do know is that she is totally thrilled with everything about it. She plays a lot of downloaded games, uses Facebook, email, and browses websites probably 16 hours a day, while she works from home. Pandora works great and there is no need to use external speakers because the music sounds so good from the Kindle. This is our first tablet, and there may be some features that are lacking, but she hasn't found them yet. Personally, I have found Silk to be a bit cumbersome since I use Google Chrome on my other computers and I know it's probably just having to learn something new. Now my 17 year old daughter wants one so I'd better be saving my money for her birthday. I have never used the Apple Air so have nothing to compare to, but so far, we think we made a great purchase.

Reviews.Title: Newest Kindle
Reviews.Author: Jessiebear
Reviews.Content: Great product! Light and easy to use. The screen is just the right size for travel and I love the ease of use. I just got an orgami case for it. I can even watch movies on it. Awesome and kudos.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: angelina aynes
Reviews.Content: This is my first Kindle.  I love everything about it so far.  It is so much better for viewing pictures and videos.I love reading books on it.  I can change the font size so I don't have to wear my glasses to read.  I also love that it is so much more comfortable to hold for reading and turning pages.  I find  out something  new I can do easier and better every day.  I just wish I had more free time to play with it.

Reviews.Title: very great product
Reviews.Author: William Tiewater
Reviews.Content: I have used the different tablets out there, and I like this one the best, My wife uses this in her sunday school classes and is very easy to navigate from scriptures to class lessons.

Reviews.Title: Kindle
Reviews.Author: Lynn oltmanns
Reviews.Content: What can I say??!! This is my 4th Kindle. (I keep upgrading everytime a new one comes out!) They just keep getting better and better. I love it!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Derek J. Cusworth "Derekjohnc"
Reviews.Content: This is easily a near perfect Tablet.  It has all the features normally required for ANY tablet for a casual user and is perfect as an entertainment and communications tablet.  The MAYDAY button is especially unique and ideal for anyone who ever has run into a question or problem or confusion with using a new device.  The MAYDAY system is flawless and fun to use.  The Kindle is light and easily portable and ideally designed for use.  While the iPad may be slightly bigger it is also heavier and has too much that the average user would never need.  The Kindle has everything AMAZON offers and with a Prime Membership makes this the perfect tablet.

Reviews.Title: LOVE MY KINDLE FIRE TABLET!
Reviews.Author: Deb Wimberly
Reviews.Content: I am so happy that I got this Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 Tablet.  I researched for awhile before I decided this was the tablet for my needs.  It is so easy to use and I am having a lot of fun with it.  I would recommend this tablet for anyone that enjoys entertainment and social apps, and reading.  Still learning how to use all the functions but so far no problems.

Reviews.Title: kindle hdx fire
