Reviews.Content: Glad we got this.  Someone gave me one for a present a few years ago and about the only thing I did on it was read.  This one has a lot more features and we got two - one for me and one for my husband.  Been having fun with them and still use it for reading also.

Reviews.Title: Best One Yet
Reviews.Author: Doug Graham
Reviews.Content: It's faster and lighter than the previous generation and the power and volume buttons are much more accessible. It also has more RAM which really helps with web pages loading more quickly.

Reviews.Title: Awesomeness
Reviews.Author: Keri Palmer
Reviews.Content: Nice touch Kindle! Books, movies, music and there is so much more !! Keeps the kids happy also ! Just need a hammock !

Reviews.Title: Great product, but too expensive!
Reviews.Author: Mary E. Collins
Reviews.Content: It's a great product and I love. It's way better and functional then the Nook tablet. I did not find any problem with navigating around on the Kindle Fire. This was a free trial, so I will be returning it. I will however purchase the Kindle Fire HDX 7' due to the price. I can only afford the smaller version.

Reviews.Title: Device is good, help, not so much.
Reviews.Author: northcountry2 "northcountry2"
Reviews.Content: I bought the largest capacity one and I love that about the device. What I do NOT love is that when you have to call for service - at least in my experience, a lot of the people are not knowledgeable enough to be able to help you with the new HDX.

Reviews.Title: Good but not great
Reviews.Author: Mark J. Koviac
Reviews.Content: wish there were more apps, but knew that when I purchasedenjoy the light weightbattery life should be longer

Reviews.Title: Great tablet,Auto screen brightness is too sensitive...
Reviews.Author: skyscraper
Reviews.Content: ****Update****:- I analyzed the screen brightness issue/feature. The auto brightness setting is basically too sensitive. It adjusts even if you are indoors and just unknowingly move your hands with respect to the light source. I have increased the rating to 4 stars as I can easily live with this issue. I am taking away a star because of the known rare camera issue when tablet is put in a case (it keeps showing "please slide" message).I am seeing the same issue that is observed by some of the others... My screen brightness auto adjusts for no reason. Not sure if its a hardware or software issue. It would be great if Amazon can clarify. Apart from this issue, this is the best tablet I have worked on so far.

Reviews.Title: love it.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Use it everyday! I was surprised to find that some of the 'free' apps don't work with it because of the Amazon process but it still allowed me to buy them, which was weird.All in all, I love it.

Reviews.Title: Everything I need. Love it!
Reviews.Author: Alshoon
Reviews.Content: Between Prime, the picture quality, weight, speed, and the build quality, this thing is an easy 5 stars. After using it for a bit I realized 16gb would not be enough to fully enjoy the device, so I returned it and ordered the 64gb. couldnt be happier, well unless it had an sd card option. I am attached to this device. I take it everywhere and no longer bring my laptop to night classes. I even returned my surface pro 2!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Virginia Pounds
Reviews.Content: This was a surprise gift.  It has all the great features I use and need in this updated Kindle.  It is easy to learn to operate.  Love it!!!

Reviews.Title: The Champ
Reviews.Author: Duffer. "Bo"
Reviews.Content: Excellent display. Good battery life. Easy to carry around due to its light weight. Response time is rapid. I have had other tablets but this is far away the best.

Reviews.Title: Falling in love with my new HDX 8.9" tablet - no complaints
Reviews.Author: David M. Riley "Purgatory"
Reviews.Content: In love with my HDX 8.9".  Easy to set up, virtually did nothing on my end.  It had transferred all my stuff from my older Kindle HD, and then I unregistered the old one, and gave it to my wife to register.  No problems.Screen resolution amazing, and the crispness and colors.  I watch a lot of movies, which is great on the HDX.Since I am happily hooked up with Amazon Prime anyhow, makes me one happy customer.Everything I wanted in a tablet, for barely half the price of the same I-Pad, and none of Apple's nonsense.BTW, I bought the 64 GB version, without the ads.  And a red leather origami case, works great too.No complaints from this user

Reviews.Title: Love this new Kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I have had Kindles since they first came out. I have loved them all, this is the very best. I love it very much. The only thing I have trouble with is that if you get your finger too close to the screen it will change things, turn a page, loose a puzzle piece, turn page over, that kind of thing. A lot of that may be my fault, I have old hands.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding product
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: This is a great product. Does all I wanted it to do and more.  I just love it. It works just like a regular tablet and does everything I ask of it.

Reviews.Title: Yet another kindle for me.
Reviews.Author: Nat P
Reviews.Content: Just got the new 8.9 HDX today(Nov 7,2013).  Doesn't weigh hardly anything; the video is stunning; it's so thin.  A piece of cake to figure out if you've ever used a Kindle before.  I'm in the process of reading my first book.  The screen is so clear, to me it's comparable to my wife's paper white.  And yes, the new operating system with the WIFI is blazing!A bit expensive but so far worth every penny.  If anything changes, which I doubt, I'll amend this review.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE IT!!
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer "love country"
Reviews.Content: I love everything about it - from the size of the screen to the simplicity to use it (of course I bought the Kindle Fire HDX book to go with it as a just in case. lol).  I would rather read than watch movies or DVDs, so I haven't actually tried those features.  I especially love the automatic background light adjustment feature.  No more trying to guess where the Brightness button is located when I forget to turn up the light for daytime use.  I even used the Help feature once.  It was great to have someone answer immediately to assist me!  I have had the Kindle 2, the Kindle Fire, and now this Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" and this is my favorite one of the 3.  The only problem I have had so far is that I haven't figured out how to download the pictures from the Fire HDX to my PC, so I'll have to consult the book on that (I think I will need to upload them to the cloud then download from there to the PC).  I use it enough that I have to recharge it everyday, but that is no problem.  I read my first generation Fire while it is charging.  I love the way they sync between each other.  Thank you, Amazon, for a GREAT product!!

Reviews.Title: Missing capital free audio format
Reviews.Author: Marcio Barroso
Reviews.Content: I was almost buying one, but: no FLAC ==> no buying.I can't believe Amazon missed the most important audio format nowadays.

Reviews.Title: Meh
Reviews.Author: Sissy39
Reviews.Content: I decided to purchase a tablet vs. a laptop after having an IPad loaned to me from work for a year.  The IPad was okay, and it did the job, but it had its issues; kind of iffy WiFi reception (even in my house), problems playing certain types of videos that required flash player, etc.  I did a fair amount of research, for a layperson, read lots of reviews, and decided to purchase this tablet instead of going for a laptop.  My main reason for doing so was portability; so much easier transporting a tablet.  I really needed something to access work sites from home, do professional reading, casual reading, watch a movie here and there, play a game.The first thing that I noticed was that the graphics were amazing. Crisp, clear pictures; clean lines, really gorgeous.  WiFi reception was much improved within my house, pages loaded faster than the IPad, so far so good.  Then I began running into some snags.  Amazon doesn't have the app we use for our company email (First Class), which was available on the IPad.  I am able to enter using a browser, but the site does not function as well.  I tried to access another company website and was met with "Error 500" codes when trying to login; again, not a problem I had on the IPad.  This one hurt, because I actually had to get in to do some work, so I had to kick my 15 year old off of his desktop to get into our company website (that was enjoyable for both of us).I did play one puzzle game and it was great-no hangups or lags; same with watching a movie.  I wish I could say that everything went well in this area, but I also ran into some snags.  Some games aren't available for the HDX, only the non-HDX versions of the Kindle, but are advertised by Amazon as "Available for Kindle".  It gets frustrating when you think you've found something, only to find its a non-compatible version.  If you go looking for games on popular sites like Big Fish or Google Play, you notice how far behind in the market Android is compared to IPad (I was schooled by a 7-year old in a rather know-it-all tone).So, is the Kindle the end-all-be-all? Well, it's nice, but not quite the workhorse/playhorse their ads make it seem.  I'm off to buy a laptop and will keep this around for reading and surfing.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Linda Rae
Reviews.Content: Easy to use with various different avenues to choose from. To read or listen to a book this is great.

Reviews.Title: A layman's perspective
Reviews.Author: mathew d herford
Reviews.Content: I am not knowledgeable about most gadgets, nor do I try to keep up with the latest trends in technology. I got this primarily for reading books while out of the house. I opted to go with the HDX because I dislike the later generations of the simple Kindles. The minimal button layout doesn't appeal to those of us with clunky fingers.The battery life is decent. I can surf the internet or read continuously all day without having to recharge it other than at night.The picture seems really good, but I am not picky with that sort of thing.E-book prices range from amazingly good to outrageously overpriced. Staying diligent, I am confident one could find a dozen books to read a month for less than $30.Overall, it's one of the best purchases I've ever made. I would recommend it to anyone who reads often and wants to read a lot on a limited budget.

Reviews.Title: all that  hoped for and more!
Reviews.Author: SUSAN JOHNSON
Reviews.Content: The pictures are way cool - lots you can doVery easy to use.  did have to return a cover...remember to look for HDX

Reviews.Title: Love It!!!!
Reviews.Author: Shirley Souza "Shirley"
Reviews.Content: I already had the Kindle Fire 7.0, but I decided I wanted a little bigger screen so I could read my e-mails easier.  This Kindle Fire did the trick.  I just love it.  It is so clear and easy to use.  I also like the "Mayday" button feature.  It really does what Amazon says it would.  Now, I keep my smaller Kindle in the car with me so I will have something to use when I'm waiting for someone or I have an appointment.  It works wonderful.  I am so happy I purchased the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9.

Reviews.Title: kindle hdx
Reviews.Author: Izzy
Reviews.Content: I am loving my new kindle HDX! Easy to use. Everything off my previous kindle was automatically there! Love it!

Reviews.Title: FANTASTIC
Reviews.Author: Tracy Johnson
Reviews.Content: Thought I loved my Kindle HD, but the HDX is so much better and lighter weight (not that they weigh alot to begin with).  Go no where without my Kindle.

Reviews.Title: enhancing the usability of a gift is a must
Reviews.Author: AFJohnson
Reviews.Content: High quality back-ups and enhancing the usability of a gift is a must in my book.I recommend not going for the cheapest support items for a major gift.No corners cut here.  I recommend supporting flexibility and functions.

Reviews.Title: Vastly different than my prior Kindle, which was First Generation model
Reviews.Author: Linda T. Folsom
Reviews.Content: Still getting used to it as this is my first experience with this type of device.  A little disappointed it did not come with any directions other than "connect with wireless".  Quality of screen images is incredible.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Debbi "justdebbi"
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 to just get the upgraded version because I read a LOT.. I don't really use a lot of the features it offers but I like that I can if I want.. I have the HDX 8.9" and HD 7" and love both of them..

Reviews.Title: Love this tablet!
Reviews.Author: K Sheets
Reviews.Content: I was astounded at the quality of the camera and video!  Also it's very easy to use.. still learning it... Love the mayday app!  Have almost clicked it but just knowing it's there is great!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9",
Reviews.Author: Allen S Doxakis
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this product. It does everything that I expected and even more. I strongly suggest you buy one from Amazon too.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Sherri
Reviews.Content: I really love my new kindle.  This is my second one, but my other one is the smaller size, great for travel.  This kindle has great graphics and is easier for the kids to play with, it also allows for more aps that the smaller size can not support.

Reviews.Title: Love, Love, Love
Reviews.Author: cjenk
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love the Kindle Fire.  I am so happy I purchased the 8.9".  Takes fantastic pictures, it is light and easy to carry around.  I take it where ever I go so I don't have idle hands or get bored.  Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: great device
Reviews.Author: john jamsion
Reviews.Content: lot easier to use then I had expected, I use it every day to keep track of whats coming up.

Reviews.Title: Thank you Kindle
Reviews.Author: Margarette White
Reviews.Content: This is a tablet anyone should want.  I would recommend this tablet to anyone.  I enjoy mine very much.ENJOY

Reviews.Title: HDX is beautiful but....
Reviews.Author: Kathryn L. Mcqueen "amazonwomyn"
Reviews.Content: Fast, clear & bright picture for sure.  But for the price, I believe an iPad is a better value.  The pull down screen was unresponsive in a protect case (required a MayDay call.)  I'm not much of a gamer, but the Kindle is perfect for Amazon.com prime, etc.  So I returned it and purchased the cheaper refurbished HD 8.9 Kindle and I'm very happy with it.  It meets all my needs, just isn't quite as fast processing.

Reviews.Title: i love my kindle
Reviews.Author: Linda Locke
Reviews.Content: I had the 7 inch and traded up to this one.  I love being able to sit on my porch and surf the web.  The price and features are amazing.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 revue
Reviews.Author: Kary
Reviews.Content: I think it has good graphics,and is relatively easy to use. It holds it's charge well. I like that my reading material was transferred without my having to do anything

Reviews.Title: WOW!
Reviews.Author: Michael Norton
Reviews.Content: I have a 64 Gig Kindle and PRIME.  FREE Movies and TV.  Sweet!  I highly recommend them.  It's wonderful.  I bought them for myself.  Worth every penny.

Reviews.Title: Great for non-techie users
Reviews.Author: Dean McCallum
Reviews.Content: My wife loves her Kindle Fire.  She has had to contact them a number of times to figure out how to do some things, but better them than me.  I just got exasperated coming into a tech problem she would have and expected to fix it for her instantly.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Marcy Chizmar
Reviews.Content: An awesome little machine.  So far it is one of the best purchases I have made.  I haven't even begun to know all of the things that it can do!

Reviews.Title: 2nd Kindle
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: First, I really like my new Kindle Fire HDX.  It does everything I need it to do, and it does it with clarity and speed.  I'm also very pleased with the screen and sound quality.  Thank you Amazon, well done!

Reviews.Title: Size and weight fantastic
Reviews.Author: jennifer hibb
Reviews.Content: Was very pleased with the quality of the product, it met all my expectations. It is really an improvement on the kindle fire, I use it mainly for reading and have no complaint. It was really worth the money I paid for it.

Reviews.Title: I am extremely happy
Reviews.Author: Arline Declue "babywaif"
Reviews.Content: This product is amazing. Fast and easy to download. The only exception I have is I cannot download my music from my computer. I guess you have to pay, and pay

Reviews.Title: Very good tablet
Reviews.Author: wrdrichard
Reviews.Content: I have played this tablet for some time. I'm pleased with it.It's screen is very perfect.The fire os can be used very well.But I'm not satisfied with the used time of the battery .If the used time can be longer,I think the tablet is very very perfect.

Reviews.Title: I love this thing!
Reviews.Author: Jaci Black
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy my fire. I experience  absolutely  no eye strain when reading for several hours. I chose this over the ipad and I am glad I did.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 HDX Display, Wi-Fi 64GB
Reviews.Author: Charles
Reviews.Content: This Tablet exceeded my expectation. I use this tablet more than I uses the I-Pad due to it being just as clear, but more GB"sI feels that it's the best on the market for the money.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: rosarioit
Reviews.Content: Good quality. The kindle fire is a good device. There should be more products available. Probably having more choice would be better.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: NorGY
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my Mom.  She is in her 70's. She loves to read and loves word games.  She cant put it down!!

Reviews.Title: I Love It!
Reviews.Author: Laurie Cole
Reviews.Content: After purchasing the HD's for my granddaughters, I was so impressed that I decided to purchase the HDX for myself.  I wanted the HDX mainly for the camera.  I am able to put my photos from my phone and my computer on to the Kindle, using Amazon Cloud.  It's great!  Very lightweight.  (The only thing I was discouraged with was that I couldn't load my favorite game - PopCats - apparently it's not compatible.  No big deal.  I'm not a game-playing person but I like playing it on the HD so hoped I could also play it on the HDX.)

Reviews.Title: #1 product for the money!
Reviews.Author: Radar999
Reviews.Content: After reading reviews for several months I decided to get this tablet.  Glad I did.  Very light, Mayday is great, tried it once to see if it worked as advertised.  Great product.  Amazon is great!

Reviews.Title: What could have been an excellent tablet, spoilt by minor niggles.
Reviews.Author: John Shorter
Reviews.Content: I bought my Kindle on the strength of favourable reviews I had seen, particularly the praise for sound quality.  Well, the quality may be acceptable, with earphones, but the volume is certainly not.  Other annoying features are that the contents, and features, of Skype, and Facebook do not match those on my desktop.  Particularly annoying is being unable to delete Skype contacts. The facility is there, but, it does not work!  A box appears, asking if you want to delete the contact, but clicking on it does nothing.  I have reloaded Skype twice recently, so have the latest version, it still does not work.  With the Facebook app, contacts are not listed alongside the home page, as on the desktop version.  Another minor annoyance is inconsistent loading time.  On some occasions it can take minutes, from switching on, others it "wakes up" instantly.

Reviews.Title: learning the tablet
Reviews.Author: marcias1
Reviews.Content: Coming off a sony e reader it is taking me a while to master the functions on the kindle.  The one function i find poor is that when no wifi is available and you have to use a usb port to transfer books from your computer to your device.  The steps are tedious and require to many processes to accomplish a single function. With the sony reader it was done in  2 steps whereas amazon you need several steps and if one is not computer knowledgeable it appears to be very complcated;

Reviews.Title: Outstanding product
Reviews.Author: Evan Fournaris
Reviews.Content: We consulted Consumer Reports and found that this product was highly rated anda Best Buy. It has certainly lived up to its reputation. Great display and flexibility.We also had rave reviews from friends who own this product.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: David Orrino
Reviews.Content: This device is becoming my right hand.  I always have it around.  I don't do a lot of gaming but I use it for Internet access, reading books,  mail, calendar, almost everything.  I'm almost never on my PC anymore.  The only problem I have with this device, and it is not  a problem with the Kindle is that Evernote will not work properly on it.  I am a heavy Evernote user and Evernote works on my PC and iOS devices but it corrupts my notes on my Kindle.  Evernote support is silent.  Amazon has been helpful but this is an Evernote issue.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice Tablet
Reviews.Author: M. Marhanka
Reviews.Content: I've had this for several weeks now, and while I haven't had the chance to use it as much as I had intended, it has been quite pleasurable when I have used it.  The screen looks amazing, everything is nice and responsive.  It was also a pleasure to open it, as has been my experience with many Amazon products, things packed very thoughtfully.  My only complaint thus far has been with the Apps, in that some basic things I expected to have easy access to I do not, such as Youtube.

Reviews.Title: really love my new Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Sheila
Reviews.Content: The new 8.9 Kindle Fire HDX is outstanding. The display clarity is outstanding. This is a versatile tablet with a very strong battery unlike previous tablets I have owned. I would recommend it over other tablets including the IPAD. It is an excellent value.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: AniaNY
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd Kindle and by far the best one. It is lighter than the previous version, has collection for my books - HD does not have, even ed n I can take pictures. The main reason I bought was for books and the internet; however, there are much more options with HDX.

Reviews.Title: A great way to catch up with the rest of the 21st century.
Reviews.Author: glen barry banks
Reviews.Content: An amazing device that pretty much does away with the need for a home computer in most cases. It can be murder on your phone bill but it makes up for it with so many different uses.

Reviews.Title: don't expect help when you have problems
Reviews.Author: Nancy Lister
Reviews.Content: I asked for help through the May day button on my Kindle.  The Lady became upset with me and when we ended the help session, she reset my Kindle to the default settings.  I lost all of the movies and tv shows I had downloaded.  I once again accessed the May day button, I was told that the representAtive had not ever heard of that happening before therefore she could not help me with that problem

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Carol Elaine
Reviews.Content: My daughter has a Book Nook and tried talking me into getting one instead of the Kindle because of the price.  After a lot of research and comparison sites, I chose the KIndle and never looked back.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: S. Luna "Luna"
Reviews.Content: I have not had this long enough to truly say its all wonderful. However what I have experienced so far has been Great! The help line has been wonderful. I am not a gadget person & was on the fence about getting one. I went to the local store that carries them & I tried them all. Hands down this one was the only one I could pick up & make work. I knew we could be friends! Thanks for having such an easy to use product & are willing to help me on the spot with your help button. Love it! This product has exceeded my expectations & I am thrilled I picked the Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Nice upgrade from 7in.
Reviews.Author: Paul S. Kent
Reviews.Content: Larger screen is nice.  Still trying to figure out some of the operations. Battery life is less than I expected.

Reviews.Title: The HDX is AWESOME!!!
Reviews.Author: Peggy T. "Pegs Quest"
Reviews.Content: This is actually my third Kindle.  I purchased the Kindle Fire 7" initially, thinking that it would be everything I ever wanted.  But then the bigger one came out and was HD so I purchased it.  (I gave the other one to my husband and it works well for his needs.)  Again, I thought the HD 9" Kindle would be all I needed and loved it, but then the HDX came out and had even more capabilities that I could use.  One of the most important reasons why I bought the HDX is because it is thinner and weighs less than the Kindle HD.  The picture/screen is more resilient and the other driving reason I bought it is because of the camera - not just a front facing one (which is an app on the HD camera) but is a real camera with zoom and video and other capabilities.  The one main issue that is somewhat of a negative however is that nowhere does it tell you that if you want to watch a movie by connecting to the TV, you have to purchase an additional 'unit' (I spent $60 for it).  I thought that the 'adapter' I bought for the Kindle HD would work just fine - but no, it is entirely incompatible with the HDX!  Bottom line - the HDX is awesome - just do your research and get all the needed components along with it.

Reviews.Title: Best Kindle For Streaming Video Yet
Reviews.Author: Steele Magnolia
Reviews.Content: Pros (compared to previous model kindles):1. Longer battery life2. Lightweight for the size3. Lots of great apps4. Easy video streaming (network apps, NETFLIX, YOUTUBE, etc)5. Faster CPU response times than previous models6. Larger storage capacity7. Better internet browser8. Louder and clearer soundCons:1. Amazon Fire Video app - THERE STILL ISN'T ONE!I love this new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" and am glad that I bought it. For the price it was a great deal, comparable if a bit smaller in size than my husband's iPad and considerably less expensive. It has all the functionality I wanted and I'm glad that I got it. I will recommend this to friends.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX versus Samsung Pro Tab 10.1
Reviews.Author: William H. Weller
Reviews.Content: I'm a big fan of Kindle and E-books, but I also wanted a tablet. I decided to replace my older Kindle with a Kindle Fire HDX WiFi only. I liked the size, weight, and the brilliant display, but the browser, speed, and app utility didn't meet my expectations. I'll admit that I'm spoiled with my Samsung Galaxy 4s smart phone and the Android OS. The familiarity of the Android system was a bit too much for the Kindle Fire HDX to overcome, and I returned it after frustration with some apps I wanted to use. I replaced the Kindle with the Samsung Galaxy Tab Pro 10.1 WiFi only. It's just the right size, has a brilliant screen, and has all the familiar Android features. The battery life is good and audio levels are adequate. All my favorite apps are downloaded and working. If you're looking for an E-reader with some browser capabilities, the Kindle Fire HDX may be just fine. But if you're looking for a more functional tablet, keep looking. As a side note, the Amazon return policy and my new order for the Galaxy worked flawlessly.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire is the best of all!
Reviews.Author: Virginia K Glass
Reviews.Content: The screen is amazing. Takes great pictures. Sound is wonderful Love the size. Buy it you will be so happy you did.

Reviews.Title: VERY SATISFIED
Reviews.Author: JB
Reviews.Content: I would have given it five-stars but nobody walks on water.  I listen to music; I watch video; I surf the Net, and I still get to read all my Kindle purchases.  JB

Reviews.Title: Love the Kindle.... but...
Reviews.Author: drbrent
Reviews.Content: I got this for everything it does... but one deal breaker for me so far has been a very low quality audio out connection.  I have tried every headphone and audio cable I have and cannot get a halfway respectable audio transmission from the kindle fire hdx to my speakers or other devices with an mp3 player input on them.  I'm really not happy about this.  They are shipping me a new one to see if it will work better but I've seen online customer reviews (after I purchased of course) that claim widespread problems with the audio out functionality.  I really don't want to have to purchase an iPad or a Galaxy...  I want a Kindle darn it all.*****  Update  *****The replacement kindle fire hdx was an improvement... must have been a bad unit I received at first.  Still, the audio is not as good as a dedicated mp3 player, but it is not too bad.  Overall, I'm happy with my Kindle.  :)

Reviews.Title: Great reader
Reviews.Author: Harry Weidlich
Reviews.Content: Love the added utility comparable to I-pad. It's handy light weight and size makes it a great device. Also. I carry my whole library with me wherever I go!

Reviews.Title: The Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 tablet is beyond super!!
Reviews.Author: Fred Bolanda
Reviews.Content: I'm a long time customer that has previously had all the Kindle Fire versions. Bought the HDX because I wanted an IPAD style camera among other things. I got the HDX a week ago and it has blown me away. First of all, the weight is so light and also the battery is great. I played a video with the brightness all the way up and I got like ten hours with the WIFI off(the WIFI drains a lot of battery by the way so keep it off if your not on the web). The screen resolution is like BLURAY quality but also a great tip is that if you're watching an SD video, put it at least five feet from you and the brightness all the way up and it's very close to HD quality. It's very smooth and fast when scrolling around the screen. Love that they finally included a rapid charger. Nothing bad to say but are a couple of things they could improve on but are really minor. If you want a tablet with a great movie experience, there is no other better tablet on the market!!! Amazon rules!!!!

Reviews.Title: Buggy so far - please help!
Reviews.Author: J. Sembower "JS"
Reviews.Content: I just got the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" for my birthday, as I'm upgrading from a 1st Gen iPad.  I want to love this thing, but so far, the experience has not been what I've expected from Amazon.Within a few hours of receiving the unit:1. Became unusable (froze) multiple times.2. Discovered that the readily available Economist App for Android doesn't exist on the Mojito platform.3. the WSJ app is buggy (crashed twice)4. Downloaded the Kindle Fire HDX update - hoping that would solve my issues, but did not help.5. Learned that the top back of the unit gets super hot when operating normally.Things I like:1. Email - works great.2. X-ray for Music - super cool.3. Books - awesome.4. Text to Speech - Even awesome-er.I'd love for someone to reach out and help me make my experience better.  I don't want to return the unit, but so far my experience isn't what I expected.

Reviews.Title: Wow
Reviews.Author: Tai Pan
Reviews.Content: I expected a very good Tablet , but what I got was beyond what I expected....Wonderful HD resolution , easy on the eyes , over 1000,000 apps , but I need only about 25 , and only use about 10.......The Direct Help Link, nothing can describe the Usefulness of this App , a big winner..........I'm glad I upgraded from the 7" HDX.......So much lighter and easier to handle for a 9 inch tablet......

Reviews.Title: Excellent product.
Reviews.Author: Charlie Robertson
Reviews.Content: Excellent product. It does everything I experienced. There is a learning curve with it but that is not a big problem. It is quite simular to my smartphone but does handle things a little differently. Most of the differences are improvements. I'm still learning but love it.

Reviews.Title: Love the larger screen!
Reviews.Author: Marsha L. Biggs
Reviews.Content: I went from the Kindle Fire to the HDX 8.9 and just fell in love with the larger screen. I have only had this about a month but really like the ease of use and the rapid access to the different apps and programs.

Reviews.Title: Can't miss
Reviews.Author: Joan
Reviews.Content: This is my fifth Kindle.  It handles great.  I used Mayday twice and they were very helpful and very professional.  They were also very knowledgeable.

Reviews.Title: Great Tabliet!!!
Reviews.Author: Christina R. Parranto "Cristy Parranto"
Reviews.Content: Love the quality, color, speed and ease of use. The upgrades made tot this Kindle is well worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Mary Ellen Hawk
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my new Kindle Fire HDX.  This is the third Kindle I own!  I don't go anywhere without my Kindle!

Reviews.Title: Extremely Pleased
Reviews.Author: Bruce Hostetler
Reviews.Content: My wife is extremely pleased with her new Kindle HDX 8.9 with all the bells and whistles.She takes it everywhere.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product. Size about right. Good Sound
Reviews.Author: Yamil Camilo
Reviews.Content: I choose Kindle HDX 8.9 because the 7" is too little for me. The screen is bright and the sound is excellent. Also is paired up with my Fire TV.Using now as my main Tablet. I use mainly Apple products but these new amazon products gain me over.Maybe I will use an amazon phone in the future...LOL...

Reviews.Title: Great Job!!
Reviews.Author: Donna Paradis
Reviews.Content: Great product. Having loads of fun, that the whole family can enjoy.  Don't have any complaints at all love the product alot. Thanks

Reviews.Title: A great investment
Reviews.Author: Michael Tolle
Reviews.Content: I am glad I invested in the new Kindle. This is my third Kindle and  have been happy with each one. I am still getting used to the functions but they are great. I love the games, music and the books. Don't come out with another version. I don't think I could afford it.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: nao vue
Reviews.Content: Great but I have to learn how to move file to file  and folder to folder.  For the machine is great.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire
Reviews.Author: tamara
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle fire.I have had it for exactly a week and absolutely love it!!! I do wish I would have gotten it quicker than the 8 days it took but I was just impatient to get it!

Reviews.Title: Didn't meet my expectations
Reviews.Author: Cher barrett
Reviews.Content: It really isn't meeting what I expected.  The battery life isn't what I feel it should be.  Seems like I'm plugging it in all the time.  It also crashes back to the main screen A LOT.  I'm just very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: LMA1011
Reviews.Content: The picture on this HDX is amazing. Navigation through the features is so simple, even I can use it without any trouble.  I was so impressed with it that Is signed up for Prime.

Reviews.Title: I like it- graphics are great.
Reviews.Author: Robert G. Losi
Reviews.Content: I wish that the the tablet came with an instruction manual or a PDF of one. I find the mayday feature very useful and the the agents extremely professional and helpful.

Reviews.Title: Fast Processor and Bright Clear Display
Reviews.Author: T. Schuhwerk
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" tablet is a very capable book reader that also functions well as a general tablet computer.  I am very pleased with the purchase and definitely recommend this tablet to anyone looking for a highly capable device at a reasonable price!

Reviews.Title: Great gift!
Reviews.Author: Foot
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my wife to replace her smaller Kindle.  She is in LOVE!  Better picture, better sound, better everything!

Reviews.Title: Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: ShoreGirl
Reviews.Content: This is finally a reader/tablet that I  will use for a long time.. it is fast ancd the screen resolution is beautiful. I am very pleased with it. I am also happy with the battery life. I read on it a lot and the battery does not drain down like previous models did. Overall a winner !

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: JimMetcalf
Reviews.Content: I own an older Kindle-great for reading and playing games but not much else.  The HDX is more practical-can E-mail as usable speeds, play videos, movies,games,function as alarm clock, and the large screen is easy to see.  The picture quality is better than previous Kindle readers.  The HD screen displays colors and graphics is stunning detail and brilliant colors!  This is a fast machine! Mine has the 32G  HDX is more user friendly than most tablet computers!  I checked all available tablets,readers and selected the HDX as a good value!

Reviews.Title: I really enjoy it.
Reviews.Author: Leodell Philpott
Reviews.Content: The screen size is enjoyable and it has a very good clear picture. Now my granddaughter want to get one.

Reviews.Title: As advertised!
Reviews.Author: Rob Gallagher
Reviews.Content: Great unit.  We are enjoying it.  Does everything we need it to and beyond.  Would recommend to anyone looking for this type of tablet.

Reviews.Title: i love my kindle fire hdx 8.9
Reviews.Author: elliott
Reviews.Content: This is perfect for my needs of a lightweight tablet. Clear and sharp picture, easy to use and quick internet response.

Reviews.Title: The Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" is excellent in it's design and concept
Reviews.Author: History Buff
Reviews.Content: This tablet has a super high resolution screen, is well designed and fits my purpose for having a tablet like a glove. The set-up was so simple, it's a dream. Gone are the requirements to struggle with all kinds of questions and techno jingle, a few tabs and one is set up. Simply great.

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle Fire!
Reviews.Author: Nora C. Mccormick
Reviews.Content: I replaced a first generation Kindle with the Kindle Fire after comparing it with other devices.  I picked the Kindle because it best met my needs.  I love being able to access my email from anywhere.  And, of course, reading books is really nice.  The display is crisp and wit the larger screen I feel like I am reading faster.  I love the touch screen.

Reviews.Title: This Kindle Fire is great!
Reviews.Author: Sasquatch
Reviews.Content: I really am crazy about my Kindle Fire HDX.  What amazes me is how fast it is.  I setup my apps and subscriptions so much faster and simpler than I did with other devices.  When I took it out of the box, there is a quick start guide which I used to hook up the charger, and I began running it while it was charging up the battery.  When I tested my video apps such as Netflix,Hulu Plus,Epix and HBO GO, I was surprised at how fluid the motion pictures were.  Also they were in HD.  I downloaded some of my Kindle books that were stored in the cloud, and that was quick.  There seems to be so much that can be done with this that I have yet to find out.  I like the fact that the user manual is installed on the device for easy access, and there is a "mayday" button to talk with a live customer service rep to walk me through any problems if I should have need to.  Physically this Kindle fire is very thin and light, which makes it easy to handle and transport.  I have yet to use the camera, which I'm sure will be a blast if it is anything like the other functions.  This is well worth the price!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Tablet !!!
Reviews.Author: Joey
Reviews.Content: Its so beautiful! I have always wanted a bigger screen than my phone to play games and watch the news from apps. I recently got rid of my cable. Saved over 1 hundred  dollars.

Reviews.Title: best kindle
Reviews.Author: EVELYN GARCIA
Reviews.Content: I LOVE MY NEW KINDLE, IT IS MUCH BETTER THAN THE OTHER KINDLE(not that the other is bad) BUT THIS ONE I ENJOY MUCH MORE.KINDLE FIRE HDX 8.9 YEAH!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Ryan Modares
Reviews.Content: GOOD!!! IT'S AWESOME YOU SHOULD BUY JUST MARVELOUS MAGNIFICENT I AM RUNNING OUT OF WORDS.........OH NOOOOO GOOD BYE #YOLO #SWAG

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Ashley McNabb
Reviews.Content: Love!!!

Reviews.Title: The FIRE display.
Reviews.Author: Barney GM "barney"
Reviews.Content: It is an good display and is intuitive in use.  A improvement over the Kindle that I had before my wife captured it.

Reviews.Title: Couldn't get my hands off!
Reviews.Author: Jack Lim
Reviews.Content: I got this a day ago and its switch on and start surfing for books and videos! It logs-on to my home wifi immediately and after input of password, it starts working! Great piece of tablet! Yeah!

Reviews.Title: love
Reviews.Author: Susan Burkey
Reviews.Content: i gave as a gift and she love it so much she is no longer using her phone thank you i can Skype her now

Reviews.Title: Constant companion
Reviews.Author: Jacqueline K. Hand
Reviews.Content: I love it! It's the right size to carry with me.kitchen chores go fast when I can watch Hot in Cleveland. I can order a new outfit while I wait in the doctor's office. And I can spend face time with grandchildren.

Reviews.Title: Love Kindle Fire!
Reviews.Author: Farley
Reviews.Content: I am a HUGE fan of Amazon and the Kindles. I have a Kindle Fire HD, and Kindle Fire HDX and I LOVE them. My son and I use them all the time. We even have the You Version app downloaded on them and take them to church, instead of carrying a bible. I tell everyone that I would rather have a Kindle, than an IPad anyday.

Reviews.Title: I Love my Kindle.
Reviews.Author: George Douglas Abraham II
Reviews.Content: It went on sale a week after I bought it. It would have saved me $40.00 dollars. OH well. I love my Kindle.

Reviews.Author: J.SablanMesa
Reviews.Content: ;)First owned the Kindle Fire(1st-Gen)...Loved it's convenience, (especially for it's Price)......got Surprised for Last Christmas, with HDX 8.9" (Thanks Momma)......was Original 'Fire'......Evolved......I think iPads are Great,But I Love being a Proud 'Kindle'-Owner...;)(Now, I need to save for an OtterBox;:( just Wish "LifeProof" made Cases for Kindle)...

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT !!
Reviews.Author: Jake
Reviews.Content: I moved up from the previous model. This one is WAY better. (nothing wrong with the old one but--) The battery lasts a lot longer, the older one's battery only went one day or less, this one goes several days. I do leave it in airplane mode most of the time but treated the old one the same. Nicer screen, snappier response. Can't wait for the next generation.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is Amazonazing !!!
Reviews.Author: steven thaanum
Reviews.Content: I bought the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 for my wife to replace my IPad that she took from me.  The Kindle Fire is amazing.  Just the right size, beautiful screen, doesn't have the incompatible app problems like my Ipad with flash, etc.  She loves it !  I think I should have got that instead of my Ipad also...

Reviews.Title: Certified Refurbished Kindle Fire HDX 8.9", HDX Display, Wi-Fi, 16 GB -...
Reviews.Author: Alan626
Reviews.Content: This HDX is the ultimate of all the Kindles. I have had most of them and I love this HDX. The color is so very good. Actually everything about it is as advertised. The only problem I have is with the Bluetooth. It connects and stays connected but the sound is jerky. They told me about 3 weeks ago that here would be a fix sent to me but I still have the jerky sound. Even with this problem...I LOVE MY HDX!!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire Disadvantages
Reviews.Author: Cathy Parker
Reviews.Content: I like the Kindle Fire but you have to be in an area where you can get a strong signal.

Reviews.Title: everything I expected
Reviews.Author: C. Galloway
Reviews.Content: Love my kindle.  It is everything I expected. I would recommend the kindle to my friends.  I can do everything I want from the kindle.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Heather D'Errico
Reviews.Content: I love the kindle fire hdx 64gb. It is quick, has vibrant color, plenty of storage, does everything I need it too. I love it!

Reviews.Title: More than I expected.
Reviews.Author: Kevin C. Sparenberg
Reviews.Content: This tool is providing me with more than I expected. The movies, TV shows, and radio selections are great. I am able to read many more books now because I can adjust the print to large print. I plan to purchase a Smart TV so I can try out that feature. The purpose for the purchase was to try out educational games and apps to include in the Instructional Design of online classes. I have been impressed with the possibilities.

Reviews.Title: Adobe Flash Player Please...
Reviews.Author: Georgette A.
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet, so I have little to compare it with. There are certain sites that I cannot use like Polyvore and some sites that require Adobe Flash Player that I cannot access...

Reviews.Title: Really is Fire!~
Reviews.Author: Danny
Reviews.Content: Order this for my friends wife and she can't stay off it. Worth every penny. Amazon is stepping it up!

Reviews.Title: Thank heaven for new technology. the Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Ron Jones
Reviews.Content: I have never been happier with any of my purchases. This is the cream of the crop. My Kindle Fire HDX has become a permanent tool in my life. It's super easy to use, "EASY TO USE". It has a great display with beautiful resolution.  Tons of free app's. Email, teleconferencing, web, long battery life, and did I mention EASY TO USE. I love it. Hurry up, get yours!

Reviews.Title: So glad we waited!
Reviews.Author: Mark Rocchio
Reviews.Content: We love our Kindle- the 8.9" size is perfect; it's very easy to navigate; the Mayday service is fantastic and it's easy to navigate especially for a Tablet newbie like me!

Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: Jan "JANZ"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this model to replace my Kindle 2nd version and it quit working right.  I am happy with it but can't get apps for some things I want like Allstays for campgrounds and java so I can play pogo games.

Reviews.Title: review
Reviews.Author: Eb
Reviews.Content: Great device for the money. It does everything except the laundry. Have no problem with this at all. It is all fun.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Sharon A. Phillips "SPhillips"
Reviews.Content: I love this!!! I still have my previous (first) Kindle and I thought it was perfect, well this is AWESOME!!! I can be reading than switch over and check my e-mail or Facebook than do a little shopping or play a quick game, watch a movie or listen to my music all from this one device!!! I know there are still a lot of features that I have not even figured out yet!! It was super easy for me to get started and I was like a kid with a new toy, I was up most of the night playing with it!! :)

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It is all they said and more. I love the fact that I can just talk my words here not have to type. My recording is great I also like the Mayday button and have already used it and my question was answered in a few seconds and she showed me even more things that I needed to know wonderful ,wonderful I have never seen a kennel are a tablet like this one. The camera takes wonderful pictures. The movie camera is great also front and back cameras wonderful just wonderful. If you buy this you won't be sorry. I am happy  with all the things it can do ,just great. It was so nice talking to customer service , I have absolutely no complaints about this. I do not know a thing that could be improved everything is wonderful and I am thrilled . Have had it for several months and just still have not tired of it . I really love my books play my games watch movies , music  sounds beautiful on the stereo speakers. Do not fear buying it. You will love it. :-)

Reviews.Title: Glad I purchased it...
Reviews.Author: Robert L. Senz
Reviews.Content: I bought the first gen 7" Fire when it came out 2 years ago. I always enjoyed it, with the exception of the poor workmanship of the charging port. Amazon made that right by giving me a Fire HD (the first gen of the HD with the camera) for a minor cost upgrade even though my Fire was 2 years old.  I appreciated that and then bought this.  This really does a great job of tying it all together.  The only complaint I have about the Fire platform is that it's a little too "Apple" for me.  What I mean by that is that because Amazon earns so much off their content, they purposely limit what they feel is competition.  I can't use Chrome as a browser and I can't download dropbox. (on their native settings... I've not attempted to d/l apps from other sources yet), but that's all on the "App" side. The actual tablet is a nice tablet (a great size) and has most of the bells and whistles i need. I wish it had GPS for the basic WiFi version (My Nexus 7 does) but where they go wrong there, they have a flash for the camera. (my Nexus 7 doesn't have flash).So in summary, great tablet, just hope that Amazon realizes that they are better supporting the free market and the best product than attempting to force you to use all of their versions of apps.

Reviews.Title: Instruction book needed
Reviews.Author: Gretchen Thompson
Reviews.Content: I wish you had a book or booklet on how to use all the things that the Kindle can do.  I am not real computer wise  so a instruction book would help me a lot.  I know it has the May day help & I have had to use them on a lot of times.  But a info booklet would be much more helpful.  One should have been included for people like me.  Other wise I like it.  It is fun to play games on but I would like to do other things also.  Thank you.  Gmt

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: Designer
Reviews.Content: It's a little smaller than an IPad but large enough to where you won't be squinting. This Kindle has a lot of upgraded features that you won't find on other products. One of the upgrades is the mirroring program for you HDTV which unless you have a Smart TV you won't be able to use this feature. But there is a product out there that is compatible with your HDTV and this Kindle and will turn your TV into a Smart TV, it's the Netgear PushTV2. Some of the other features are as I'm writing this review words are being displayed above the keyboard and all I have to do is tap on it to be put into the sentence.  This is a good product and that's why I gave it five stars.

Reviews.Title: Lighting fast
Reviews.Author: suzee "suzee"
Reviews.Content: Love it so fast and fun to use. I was still using my Kindle Fire 1st edition, and this one blows it away.

Reviews.Title: great but no android store
Reviews.Author: John F. Davis
Reviews.Content: I like it. Books and movies. Pity I can't use the android store. I use my apps more than watch movies.

Reviews.Title: perfect tablet
Reviews.Author: R. Burriss
Reviews.Content: I like my kindle..from what others have told me the clarity is really good and the price was perfect. I haven't travel with it yet. But it works well for me

Reviews.Title: Still Learning!
Reviews.Author: Judith A Houston
Reviews.Content: After so many years on a PC  and then an iPad this system is still not familiar to me. So, I hope in time I will become more learned and consequently more at ease with this system.

Reviews.Title: love my kindle fire
Reviews.Author: nan bastin
Reviews.Content: My refurbished kindle fire HDX 8.9 is great. I Have not had any problems with it. Works perfectly. Size is great.

Reviews.Title: love my kindle fire HD 8.9
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: love it kindle fire is so easy to use with a reasonable price its a must have  its a must have

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: Penny
Reviews.Content: I love this Kindle and would recommend it to everyone that I know.  I love the larger screen from the previous Kindles I have.

Reviews.Title: Love It.
Reviews.Author: Opus Fan
Reviews.Content: I really like my new Kindle.  It is more then I expected and I feel a much better bargain than an IPad.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 was purchased from Amazon last month......
Reviews.Author: Gloria
Reviews.Content: This Kindle is everything I've wanted in a Kindle Fire HDX 8.9.  It is really fast; takes beautiful photos HD, both front and rear shots; I can bring up most things I can on a computer.Things I don't like, that I thought would be on it, are NBA Games, you have to pay for the games you want to watch;I play my family members on Words with Friends and we chat a lot, it sometimes will go into a mode of deleting your chat message, then it automatically switches you to a game you're playing with someone else in the middle of the message, you then have to go back to the one the message was meant for and start typing the message all over again. This Kindle has a chat line you can speak into to send your message, this way it won't self delete.I haven't used it to it's fullest yet but overall I'm very happy with this Kindle.

Reviews.Title: First kindle, impressions mostly positive
Reviews.Author: Timothy G. Blum
Reviews.Content: Great screen, great display, fast, top specs, etc. Works well on Verizon though usually use it on wifi. Only complaint being new to kindle was that I didn't know you were restricted in terms of apps-no Play Store access, and finding/loading apk files is kind of a hassle. Otherwise a great tablet and was top of the tablets available when I bought it (may move to Galaxy Note Pro though for bigger screen although not better resolution so we'll see).

Reviews.Title: I love this play-toy/tool!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Sand
Reviews.Content: I got this Kindle for Christmas from my brother and dad, it was on my wish list but was a pleasant surprise none the less. I already had a first generation Kindle Fire and loved it but wanted the updated version and a larger screen. This Kindle far exceeds my expectations. Love it is right!

Reviews.Title: Great Device
Reviews.Author: Thomas Geishecker
Reviews.Content: I actually like this better than I thought I would.  With my previous Kindle I could only read e-books.  Now I can do so much more.

Reviews.Title: Love It So Far
Reviews.Author: Rita Dotson
Reviews.Content: My Kindle is so light compared to my previous one and much faster. The size for me is great. Battery life and being able to use while charging is an A+, especially when I am in the middle of a game or reading and I see battery is low, I don't have to stop and wait. I like my Kindle way more than the IPad my husband has. My husband had me order as a gift from him and only had this one a short time and still learning my way around in it. My only complaint and it is not about the Kindle Fire, for the money, it did not come with a case or at least an offer of discount on one.

Reviews.Title: Awesome for what I need!
Reviews.Author: T Peake
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HDX and would recommend it to everyone who asks me! The extra features put it in a class of its own.

Reviews.Title: My kindle
Reviews.Author: charlene70510
Reviews.Content: Love my kindle easier to carry instead of my lap top does just what i wanted on a kindle Thanks

Reviews.Title: Great addition to my Life
Reviews.Author: Catherine
Reviews.Content: Kindle Fire HDX is a great addition to my Reading and getting out and doing more things with apps.  Am disappointed for can't find a cover which allouds me to read verticle.  do this while eating since I'm a widow and gives me joy at the table.  hope a cover comes out soon. Grandma C.

Reviews.Title: love it.....
Reviews.Author: Marie B. Young
Reviews.Content: I gave this as a gift and they love everything about this Kindle.... This is the 3rd Kindle I have purchased and they keep getting better.. Also Amazon  has the greatest representatives - staff  .. This also keeps me coming back..... Recommend highly to purchase from Amazon...

Reviews.Title: Great toy for those of us who do not own a smart phone
Reviews.Author: Kath
Reviews.Content: It does all I wanted it to do.  I can download a movie and walk around watching it. Yeah. I waited a while before buying this and it was worth the purchase. I own a kindle touch too.  The speakers on the fire and very good, the text to speech has a better sound quality then the touch. I also use it to read e mail and go to Facebook. I have it connected to Wi Fi but I also bought just the AT&T; 3 month network package when I go outside of my Wi Fi.  Hasn't let me down.

Reviews.Title: The Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 met my expectations.
Reviews.Author: Alan Dowhower
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9.  I like the speed and clarity.  I also appreciate technical support.  The technical support is the best of any company I have had to deal with.

Reviews.Title: Amazed, again.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Amazon never seizes to amaze me! I love all the little touches, features and enhancements from the slim and functional origami case to navigation on the device. Need to take a quick picture? Slide the device up and the camera's ready for action. Get stuck? Mayday's here to help! The HDX 8.9" also fits in my hand without getting uncomfortable due to the light weight and size. I've only used it on our wifi connection so I'll report back on how it goes on a 4G connection.I've owned every Kindle release and this is by far my favorite!Bravo Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: tish b
Reviews.Content: I really love my Kindle so far!  I looked at a lot of different tablets before deciding on the Kindle Fire and I'm sure I made the right choice.  I think the color resolution is awesome and I am enjoying it very much.  I like the 8.9" size much more that my old smaller Kindle e-reader. While I am new to all the Kindle HDX has to offer, I am having fun learning about it!  I know I will have many hours of enjoyment reading, studying and playing games!!  Thanks Amazon!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9", HDX Display, Wi-Fi, 16 GB - Includes Special Offers
Reviews.Author: ralphod100
Reviews.Content: I'm very pleased with how the Kindle Fire HDX performs. Internet access is fast and reliable. Screen resolution is excellent. Reading magazines, newspapers, books etc. is a real pleasure with the larger screen this Kindle has. Watching videos is also very good. My wife has an Ipad air, I haven't seen any noticeable differences in how they both function.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Dave Fus
Reviews.Content: I would really like to give my Kindle 5 stars, but it lacks a good way of organizing music and pictures. I experience no other problems and enjoy it every day. I have a 7" hd kindle fire and this 8.9 HDX out performs in all areas except music and pictures which is the same as my old kindle.

Reviews.Title: Great investment
Reviews.Author: SPARKLES
Reviews.Content: I am so glad that I bought the kindle fire HDX.  I have been having a great time with it.  The quality of the sound and video are impressive

Reviews.Title: Addicted
Reviews.Author: Nameless
Reviews.Content: I'm a slow adopter of new technology.  First tablet, and I'm glad I waited since the price-to-power ratio has gotten good.  I use this thing far more than I ever thought I would.  I've got old comic book collections that look amazing on it, my entire digital library is so easy to use in it, and the apps are really solid.  The browser that comes with it is good.  The whole thing is a solid product.  I use an iPad at work, and I'm not a mac guy, so when someone recommended this to me, I gave it a shot, and I'm far from disappointed.  It's fast, haven't noticed any hiccoughs or other problems.Only one thing: I wish I didn't have to charge it so often.  I do usually get a good 1-2 days, depending on what I'm doing.  But if I play a game on it for a few hours, it'll drain the entire charge.  Still, not a big deal to me considering how good it is.

Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: Susan Stone`
Reviews.Content: The larger Kindle Hdx has a great screen and brighter background than the Kindle Fire.Good product, with lots of apps.

Reviews.Title: As advertised
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I returned this very nice tablet, I wanted something to read newspapers and magazines, will wait for a larger screen.

Reviews.Title: My Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I love the size, screen clarity, getting my emails, everything! I have the Kindle Paperwhite, but just had to get this Kindle as well.

Reviews.Title: Love love love!
Reviews.Author: scoobydrlp
Reviews.Content: I can't say enough good things about the HDX, I absolutely love it! Picture quality is amazing! I never thought I would be one to watch tv shows and movies on a tablet, but I've watched entire series of shows thanks to Amazon Prime.I do wish there was a little better selection of apps in comparison to the iPad.

Reviews.Title: the price and quality
Reviews.Author: L. Khalilova
Reviews.Content: I had one of cheap Chinese tablets and liked it very much. But it didn't survive long. First power plug jack and headphones jack became very loose. Then power button just fell inside of a tablet. So for my next tablet I wanted something more durable, with US company behind it. iPad Air was good choice but offered only 16GB storage for the money vs 64GB on Kindle Fire HDX. The choice was easy. I use storage for movies on a long car trips.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Dwight B. Donica
Reviews.Content: We have had it for a few days and decided immediately we needed one for each of us so we ordered another but smaller version of the same thing.  We are certainly enjoying them, in fact, not much work gets done now and our desktop computers are feeling kind of deserted. The support (help) is fantastic, live help and they are great!

Reviews.Title: This tablet is incredible
Reviews.Author: Frederic Blin "Nodbuddabag"
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is unreal and definitely better than my Macbook 3 and its retina screen.  As long as you are prepared to deal with the Android system, which can be just as convenient as Apple apps as long as you choose your Android apps carefully, you will probably find this one to be better than an iPad in at least two things.  Picture quality and price.  I am still amazed at the picture quality of this item and for the price you just can't beat it.  I would recommend this to anyone looking for a tablet.

Reviews.Title: A great buy
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: IT IS A GREAT BUY.  It will be a great easy to use companion for our summer trips. with our portable hot spot we will use it in the car.

Reviews.Title: KINDLE 8.9 HDX
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: It's everything adverstised.  Very happy with screen quality & speed.  Huge improvement from original Kindle Fire.  Keeping fingers crossed it stays that way!

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: Kirsten
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle! I use it all the time. I originally got it to try and organize my busy life with two jobs and trying to reach a fitness goal of losing fifty pounds and the there are so many helpful apps on here. Plus I have begun to start reading again and love that I can borrow books with my Amazon prime account! I was originally worried that I made a mistake since it was so expensive but I use it everyday and it has replaced my broken laptop so can't complain!

Reviews.Title: present for lady
Reviews.Author: Scott Beason
Reviews.Content: if my lady is awake she is on her kindle HDX...books, apps, games, web, the only thing it doesn't do is laundry...would have gotten a 6 star rating if that was the case!

Reviews.Title: I love My Kindle
Reviews.Author: ROGER E. TEIDEL
Reviews.Content: This tablet is very fast. It performs as you would expect it to.Sized perfect for reading and is easy to use.

Reviews.Author: my 2 lil Chihuahua's
Reviews.Content: I could not be happier with my Kindle. Love the size, the shape and the weight. Sorry for the laptop that is now collecting dust because my Kindle does it all in a much more easier compact way!

Reviews.Title: Best Tablet
Reviews.Author: Jake G.
Reviews.Content: This is the most premium tablet on the market, regardless of price, a much better experience then any ipad. I'd recommend it to anyone looking for an additional screen (computer-wise)Great for everything tablet-related, there is no reason to get another.

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire hdx 8.9
Reviews.Author: Ayaan
Reviews.Content: I wanted to increase my reading, but still having hard time to cut my old ways of delaying thing.. Yeah I like the device so far.

Reviews.Title: This Kindle Fire is great!
Reviews.Author: Mark Duncan
Reviews.Content: I love using the Kindle Fire HDX, and this is the first and only tablet I have ever used.  I bought one for my wife as a Christmas present, and liked it so much I bought one for myself.  I'm still learning about all that it can do, but so far I'm very pleased with all that it does for you, especially the Reading View choice it offers you when accessing many sites on the web.  This is a fantastic plus.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Christopher Hutton
Reviews.Content: I have used apple and I dont like the Ipad.  But this really awesome and the batterly life is better then I thought.  One thing I do not like is that you spend nearly 400 dollars and do not get a complimenty case.

Reviews.Title: Best Device I ever owned!
Reviews.Author: Deanna Cleman
Reviews.Content: I started out with just the 7” Kindle Fire HD and really enjoy what all it could do but not enough speed and memory. I bought the Kindle Fire HDX because of size and all the other many features it has. I would recommend this to everyone. One feature it has which is great is reading with the option to enlarge the font so a person I know with bad eyesight that I recommended it to could read it. He loves it. Only thing is I wished I would of got it with Verizon built in that way i could have signal on the road.

Reviews.Title: Worth the wait!
Reviews.Author: Rise Simonelli-Phillips
Reviews.Content: I have been wanting the Kindle Fire HDX for many many months. I have received various special offers with $20 off here and there but I never ordered. Finally an offer came through that I could not refuse but before I could buy it, my son bought itfor me...a very v early Mothers Day gift! I love it.I had read reviews online comparing the Kindle Fire HDX to the iPad and most said the Kindle Fire HDX was the better purchase; I agree. Both my sons have the iPad and it is a fantastic product as well but I am so thrilled with my Kindle Fire HDX, it does everything the iPad oes but weighs a little less and, because I am a prime member I have free downloads of books and movies and I also have an exchange or swap option. And by the way, I have the model with special offers and it is not a bother at all, it is on the unlock screen, the reason I chose that was not because of the $20 discounted price but because when I read more on that offer I found that I would get early notifications of products and such from Amazon.I could go on but will end with "I think you'll be pleased if you buy this product" oh yes, he also bought me a 12 item accessory bundle which was worth the price and a good addition to this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Di "Di"
Reviews.Content: My son chose this for me and I use it whenever I do not have to use my laptop as my laptop is heavy.

Reviews.Title: very good tablet
Reviews.Author: A. Kaplan
Reviews.Content: This is a very good tablet. The display is exceptional. It is fast, the volume without headphones is the best I have heard on any unit. The only downside is that you can't access all the apps that are available on Google play.

Reviews.Title: Getting better all the time.
Reviews.Author: Val
Reviews.Content: Miss having a "paper" owners manual.  Not being a teckie made it difficult to get along even with basic questions.  After some coaching from some relatives,  I have gotten to love my Kindle Fire HDX. The bullseye is great.

Reviews.Title: So much fun!
Reviews.Author: Nose in a book
Reviews.Content: I am having a great time with this device,  I don't own a smart phone but I imagine this experience is pretty close.  The camera is a surprising good quality and I am pleased at being able to capture most events although like most point and shoot cameras it does suffer on action shots.  The fact that when I go to doctor's appointments and am waiting not only do I have books at my fingertips but games, movies and the internet all in one device.  I haven't yet discovered all I can do with my Kindle but I really am happy with this purchase,  it gives the ipad a run for it's money especially with Amazon and all that it offers at your disposal.

Reviews.Title: Love my 3rd Kindle.
Reviews.Author: K-Bow
Reviews.Content: I don't need to say a lot because it's simple.  This is my 3rd Kindle and I have loved them all. It is easy to use but does everything I want it to do, from paying bills to reading to playing games checking Pintrest and sending emails.  Now with the HDX I can Skype with family and friends around the world.  So go ahead and get the Kindle Fire HDX, you won't regret it.

Reviews.Title: First look at my new HDX
Reviews.Author: Coral E Showell
Reviews.Content: I have only own this HDX for a couple of days, but compared to the previous HD that i own there is no comparison. My HD would crash about once every two days, which i thought was to often. I have used this HDX all day today and i love it. Its as fast as advertised, and the screen is as clear as advertised. It is faster, and right now i can't find any problems.I love it.

Reviews.Title: love @first byte
Reviews.Author: matt winkelmann
Reviews.Content: It is way faster at everything including the intuitive typing. Everything loads quickly and efficiently. Where ever you think that there could be a problem there is not. I know that I would spend the money again without hesitation

Reviews.Title: A very solid offering
Reviews.Author: Jon
Reviews.Content: A great product especially because of its cheaper price point when compared to Apple or Samsung tablets.  The app store is limited compared to the others which is why it only receives 4 stars.  If you are an Amazon Prime member it is well worth the investment to enjoy movies with the Kindle's stunning HD screen.

Reviews.Title: KFHDX 7.8
Reviews.Author: Barbara Bowers
Reviews.Content: Best case cover I've ever had, works well in all positions, would buy again, recommend highly, you won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: LOVE Kindles
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I have had a keyboard kindle for years and it is basically my favorite electronic device so when I went to look for a tablet for my school work I looked no further than a kindle.The only thing I was wondering is if I could actually edit powerpoint documents on a kindle but after buying the office suite I found that is just as easy to do as it was on my laptop.  I just got it in the mail yesterday and I am already just as in love with it as my old kindle.  I think it will be a few weeks before I find out everything it can do because a kindle really is a learn as you go device without any specific instructions but when you do start something you haven't doneon it before it guides you thorugh the  process and even gives you some quick tips. Setting up the kindle was much faster than setting up an IPad I know because I had to set up three for my nieces and you have to go in and add cloud accounts etc while on the kindle as long as you bought it for yourself as soon as you receive it, it is already for your account information all you have to do it click yes this is me and voila all ready to go. Bottom line I think it is a great product and as far as I can tell will do what I wanted it to do for years to come.

Reviews.Title: Addicted to kindle
Reviews.Author: Cathyanddave
Reviews.Content: This device is AWSOME!!!!!!! Don't know how we managed before it came along  now we read EVERYDAY and love it

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Janice A. Davis "Granny"
Reviews.Content: Kindle arrived on time, packaged in a very sturdy box.  This is my third Kindle.  Each one is better than the last one and I am very happy with this one.  It's so easy to use.

Reviews.Title: I would buy it again.
Reviews.Author: Sam I Am
Reviews.Content: I bought the Kindle Fire primarily for reading and for travel convenience. It wasn't hard to figure out, even though I'm not very tech savvy. Whenever I got stuck, I called the Help line and with one exception, everyone was very knowledgeable and walked me through my questions/problems.  The battery life is great! I use it to read daily and when it gets down to 60-70%, I charge it for a while.  Doesn't take long to get back to 100%.  The issues/downside:  There was (is?) a packaging snafu and the adapter cord did not fit the adapter properly, therefore, the Kindle wouldn't charge. I had gotten an extra 9W adapter and after problem solving this with the Help line, I was sent what I needed at no charge, in very little time. After resolving that problem, recharging is much faster than my laptop.  My other disappointments were 1) it's not compatible with the program that allows me to play some of my online games, although I've been told that addition is being negotiated; and 2) I live in the Florida Keys, too far from the mainland for greater access to E books, so aside from purchasing the books I want to read, what's available to me for free is very limited. This is probably not an issue for people on the mainland. I have, however, been able to buy the books I wanted from Amazon ($9.99).  I haven't traveled with it yet so I don't know how it functions with videos, but all in all, I'm glad I bought it. If your primary use is reading, this is the one for you.

Reviews.Title: Awesome device
Reviews.Author: Judy Norcini
Reviews.Content: Great color and clarity. Easy to access apps. Takes great pictures. Book discounts and book referrals.  Support access 24/7. Easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great.. but with limitations
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I have owned the kindle fire hdx 8.9 for about two months.  Other tablets I have/have used extensively are: two previous versions of the ipad (job issued), a nexus 7, galaxy note 8 and a galaxy note 10.1 2014 (beautiful but returned because of changes to how handwriting recognition worked - see my review if interested) and a kindle fire 7 (original).  I have some background for comparison.Pro's:  A beautiful and responsive touch screen with plenty of power "under the hood".  The device is never laggy.  Great "consumable content" through the Amazon ecosystem including the ability to download some prime video (great for me because I travel extensively).  Relatively long battery life when compared to the Galaxy note 8.  Great value for the price.  Superb Amazon customer service - they stand behind their products and my experience with this product has been no different.  I consider this last pro to be one of the most important to me.Cons:  Limited apps in the appstore.  I agree with most reviewers that you can find most of what you need, HOWEVER, there are some caveats:  some of my favorite apps are not the most recent versions and can be buggy (Flipboard and Zite crash occasionally and im not sure if its the apps themselves or something with the Kindle), silk browser is improved over prior versions but still isnt on par with other browsers in rendering the odd page here and there (and what do you know?  you cant easily use any other browser yeah, I know I can sideload but should I have to? maybe this is because the default is for use of accelerated page loading so your data goes through Amazon's servers and they can use it to market to you?)  Additionally, battery life can be erratic occasionally and I had a black screen that didnt go away with power button reset so I had to completely reset it.  The onscreen keyboard is shifted to the right and makes it difficult to touch type but the ability to "swype" type negates that issue for me.I know the cons look like a long list but in reality it isnt.  The tablet provides real value in the form of screen, brute power, and content.  Its just a little rough around the edges.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE MY KINDLE
Reviews.Author: T. Hairston "mqvp"
Reviews.Content: OMG I'm So glad I brought my kindle. It is so much fun and  very addictive. I stay up for hours using all the features. I brought the Kindle to read books, but I fell in love with everything the Kindle has to offer. I'm glad I waited for this version to come out. I have put my laptop down. It's all about my Kindle. Thanks Amazon.

Reviews.Title: HDX
Reviews.Author: kaptmorgan "stormdawg"
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my new kindle fire HDX it has so many more features than my original and I would recommend this product to anyone

Reviews.Title: Still Learning.
Reviews.Author: rickster
Reviews.Content: Really like this tablet.  Haven't tapped into everything it can do yet.  Still learning all its ins and outs that are available.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is the best
Reviews.Author: Narvella Hiltabrand
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this Kindle  Fire HDX 8.9 . It is even more then I had expected and very happy that I got it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I have three kindles, this one is the best yet.  I like the ease of use.  I like the price of this unit.  The clarity of the screen is great.  The storage of this unit is out of this world.  Great unit for the price.  Kindle offers a lot of free books.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE MY KINDLE FIRE HDX 8.9 !!!!!
Reviews.Author: michelle
Reviews.Content: I love the way the movie show and the video. The camera takes great pictures and the download to social media is super fast. I read a lot of reviews some good some bad .All of the good ones help me make my discussion. A must have .

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Margaret L Courtney
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with my Kindle and am in the process of learning how to use it properly. Will be a handy asset to have and work with.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Sharon
Reviews.Content: I loved my first kindle , this one is so much nicer wish I would have been able to get a discount

Reviews.Title: Love My Kindle
Reviews.Author: Lorraine
Reviews.Content: I love this new Kindle.  The Mayday button works great.  The Tech's come right on to help you.  I wouldn't be without it!

Reviews.Title: My first tablet
Reviews.Author: W. J. Neubauer "Buffalo Bill"
Reviews.Content: I'm very pleased with this tablet. It does everything I expected of it. Fast, excellent screen. I do wish there were more of the apps I need (I have an iPhone).

Reviews.Title: Love this new Kindle
Reviews.Author: Jan Koepp
Reviews.Content: The 8.9" HDX has a really sharp display.  It operates faster than my old Kindle Fire and the battery needs charging way less often.  It's lightweight and easy to hold.  The size is just right, not too big for convenient reading or carrying, but big enough to look at websites, email and games.

Reviews.Title: im happy
Reviews.Author: Deneen "Richmond, Va"
