Reviews.Content: I am loving my new kindle fire HDX 8.9!I just got it yesterday and I'm loving it. The sound is awesome, the May day feature is awesome, I'm leaning towards getting prime. Initially I was gonna keep netflix but for this device you get the movies, books, and two day shipping on most items. It's a win win!

Reviews.Title: Good for reading
Reviews.Author: longjian
Reviews.Content: Good for reading.good quality for music and video.Nice design , fashion and lightable.I like it much more

Reviews.Title: Comment
Reviews.Author: Mary Lee Austin
Reviews.Content: I am still learning how to use everything.  I am surprised that you don't include a DETAILED users guide.  I will have to buy one on line.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!!
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: I love my new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 since I have owned it for about a month. My husband said that it is my new boyfriend... :) He sort of feel replaced by it. Love the Mayday button I think customer service knows my voice by now. Also the free app a day love it love it love it... Free apps you can not beat, also the free apps aren't just the once that cost 99 cents. One app I got for free cost 5.99 and it will help me with planing for my future finically. I hope this review helps, and also my kindle fire HDX is money well spent.

Reviews.Title: Impressed. Video quality superb
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I mostly watch movies on my kindle and I have to say the quality is great. It helps to have a quad core processor as well. Also impressed with the camera. The keyboard is nice, a nice improvement from the first generation Kindle fire. There needs to be a way to use google + hangouts. That would be a nice advantage if Kindle would have apps that would allow google to participate. If you have a camera and mic, not sure why it would be so difficult  to allow live video/audio. Overall good product, and hopefully in time, the app store will greatly improve.

Reviews.Title: i love this thing
Reviews.Author: sewcrow
Reviews.Content: I upgraded from a first generation Kindle Fire.  This is terrific.  Nice size, responsive, not too heavy.  Screen layout is better than the original.  The external volume button is nice.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Neuf "Neuf"
Reviews.Content: It's super fast; brilliant HDX display.  Slender, light weight.  Good camera.  I gave my old Kindle Fire HD away. ha

Reviews.Title: wasn't sure
Reviews.Author: Marilyn D.
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure if I had made a mistake buying this. It took twice as long to get it as I was originally told. But I have to say once it got here it has been great .

Reviews.Title: kindle
Reviews.Author: nancy holmes
Reviews.Content: I was disappointed when I went on a cruise and couldn't use it in the sun . I was looking forward to using it outside this summer. I should have researched it better , however I thought for the price it would have that feature.I love everything else about it.

Reviews.Title: Love it !
Reviews.Author: Catherine
Reviews.Content: This was my late Christmas gift to myself and I'm having a wonderful time listening to my audible books, playing games and getting on the web.  I'm 60 and finally up to date with electronics!

Reviews.Title: My Great New Kindle 8.9 HDX
Reviews.Author: Jerry  A. Prater
Reviews.Content: I like it for the length of time the charge lasts, the larger screen, fact I can check email when traveling.It is a little heavier because it is larger and thus a more awkward fit in some of my purses. I carry it nearly everywhere.

Reviews.Title: Upgraded to this one
Reviews.Author: Sharon V. Richardson "MadMom"
Reviews.Content: Had a Kindle Fire 8.9", and upgraded to this one.  Really enjoy it, but just getting used to it.  Quite a few things have changed since the original Kindle was introduced, so having to change my use, but do love it.

Reviews.Title: A must have
Reviews.Author: LINDA S. BEST
Reviews.Content: Love size and clarity. Help button is wonderful. Love touch screen. Good for price. Like having small computer at hand. A must have

Reviews.Title: It's great
Reviews.Author: marian anderson jones
Reviews.Content: Just what I wanted and needed. It takes great pictures. I like to watch movies. I can edit my work. I like it a lot.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use - Love the Mayday feature
Reviews.Author: Lynda
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use.  Display is Crystal clear.  Very easy to switch between internet, e-mail, apps, books, etc.  Screen size is just about right.  Camera works great.  Love the way the screen images rotate whenever you rotate the KINDLE so you can read it in any orientation.  Touch screen is not quite as responsive as I would like.  Disappointed that software does not permit editing e-mails that you want to forward.

Reviews.Title: Love the new Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Very clear picture. Big screen. Lot's of memory. I love all the stuff you can do with it. Netflix look's awsome on it.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!!!
Reviews.Author: Cary Lynn
Reviews.Content: I have had my Kindle HDX 8.9 for about three months and I love it!! I hardly ever use my laptop anymore. Great product!!!

Reviews.Title: True it is lighter than air !
Reviews.Author: GM
Reviews.Content: This is my 2nd Kindle ! Not only lighter but also faster easier to handle than "air", with a beautiful clear display screen + all the benefits of the Kindle reader.I find the iCloud application very handy and extremely useful !The aftersale service is swift & prompt...just outstanding.Keep up the good work!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Pat Mattingly
Reviews.Content: My new Kindle Fire is everything I thought it would be.  I had a Kindle Fire and really did like it but was looking for something with a little extra, so decided to get this one.  I am so pleased that I made that decision.  The color is so real I almost feel like I can reach out and touch.  Once I figured out how to navigate thru it, I am absolutely loving it.  I take it with me where ever I go.  Thanks for making a superior product.

Reviews.Title: Happy Customer
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I just love it. My first Kindle was black and white. I could only read books and play a few basic games. The colors , backlight and clarity on this one exceeded my expectations.

Reviews.Title: Origami case for Kindle HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Merton E. Coffin "Meco Services"
Reviews.Content: The perfect mate for the HDX! Really like the auto shut-off and start-up when you close or open the case. The slide-up turn on of the camera is also very handy. It makes a neat and clean profile for the unit. Well worth the cost.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet.
Reviews.Author: Wayne Sundmacher
Reviews.Content: Thought quite a bit about this purchase. Lots of research. Read about other tablets and notebooks. Decided to get the Kindle Fire HDX. Very happy with what we got.

Reviews.Title: Well deserved!
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Am very pleased with my new Kindle, have been researching for sometime and finally decided to purchase.  I would recommend this to everyone, easy to use and very easy to see, I got the 8.9 display screen and great for reading.

Reviews.Title: I am glad I waited for the Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Cynthia McElroy
Reviews.Content: It really is convenient for all of my needs and I love the video quality. I love the battery life of my device. I can enjoy it for a long time before recharging. I love it!

Reviews.Title: Excellent tablet
Reviews.Author: donna englert
Reviews.Content: Lightning fast, great features, BEAUTIFUL picture watching an movies videos. Great sound. All around perfect for everything. LOVE the Amazon Prime with this Kindle.

Reviews.Title: My first handheld gadget
Reviews.Author: Harleys Lady Forever
Reviews.Content: I put the purchase off for a long time while I thought about what I wanted. I finally decided on Amazon Kindle and got the most recent version. I just love this thing and carry it everywhere I go. It's opened up a whole new world for me in that I can read my book(s) anywhere and not have to lug a suitcase around with me to do it. I love the games too when I need to keep occupied for a length of time OR to keep the grandkids occupied too. I can't live without it now. ;)

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Robert A Carlson
Reviews.Content: Great product. Kids love it. Fast Delivery. Screen is awesome. Battery life is very good. This is getting used every day.

Reviews.Title: Awesome gift
Reviews.Author: Ant
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift and the recipient loved it.  They couldn't be happier.  It has so many features and is very high resolutions I wish I bought myself one.

Reviews.Title: HDX Display
Reviews.Author: Catherine Sharpe
Reviews.Content: The vivid color on the Kindle Fire is quite astounding. I can't believe that it is quite light weight and is very easy to handle. It's one of those "take a-longs" wherever there might be a "Wi-Fi" connection. Also, finding apps for the Kindle is very easy to do. Thanks for a great product!

Reviews.Title: Don't waste money on the ipad!
Reviews.Author: chase
Reviews.Content: AbSolutely blows the iPad out of the water! The screen is much better, the speed is astounding, and if you have prime you can watch your favorite shOws in high definition! I have the latest generation iPad as well, which I now know was a waste of money.the origami case is great as well, and allows You to use the kindle in numerous stances. do yourself a favor and save some money over the iPad while receiving a superior product.

Reviews.Title: Great kindle
Reviews.Author: diana gorski
Reviews.Content: How can you go wrong with a kindle,,,,I bought this as a Christmas gift for my daughter in law,,,bought the IPAD first and after reading the reviews of the kindle, and doing side by side comparisions,,,Well the IPAD went back!!

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: jr
Reviews.Content: I had the 7" HD for a year and loved it. Bought this when it offered with a $40.00 discount.  It is light weight but watch out for the case it can get heavy..

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX is Awesome!
Reviews.Author: C. SELF "no more bling/glitzy dolls"
Reviews.Content: The screen clarity and color of the Kindle Fire HDX is the best I have seen.We (I have two Kindle Fire HDX's - one for each of my children) have had people comment on how great the picture, graphics, and speed is.  In fact, one person who had an Ipad said it was better than their Ipad.Very pleased with everything about this product.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: becky shenk
Reviews.Content: I already had the Kindle Fire, and loved it too.  But was considering a 10" tablet.  Then the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 got my attention.  The smaller than 10" is not a big deal for me.  I love how it plays videos better than my first Kindle and how the functionality, size (weight, sleekness)  and better sound, are improved.  I take it everywhere with me.

Reviews.Title: great product 5 star
Reviews.Author: Donald W Clarke Sr
Reviews.Content: I like my kindle HDX 8.9 because of the ease of use and the only tablet that I know of that has the mayday button that is extremely helpful to a person who wants to learn all the features that are included with the kindle.The magazines that I subscribe to are very clear and crisp as though I were looking at the magazine in real time.The kindle is easy on the eyes.The size of my kindle is very nice and the weight is unnoticeable.Thank you Amazon for a very nice product.

Reviews.Title: if I knew
Reviews.Author: J. Quinlan "sois bon avec toi même"
Reviews.Content: If I had known the specials were abundant advertising I would have paid the$40 more.It's a good device with a lot of improvements but there is no way you can upload to the cloud except by taking photos. Can't upload anything from their web browser.They use html 5 instead of flash which Adobe is no longer developing because the 5 is faster. Some sites will tell you that you need flash and direct you to Adobe. Adobe flash wants to know what operating system you are using and offer a pull down which doesn't show the kindle 's. You can go to kindle apps for the cloud and there is an install button but it too directs you to Adobe.It's faster, has better volume and a good camera.VERY glad I bought it.

Reviews.Title: I love my HDX
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love the kindle fire HDX! The only problem I have found is that it is not compatable worth Direct TV's Genie Go! No app as of yet! Hope it's available soon! I really don't want to buy an I-Pad just for that function!

Reviews.Title: Best Ever
Reviews.Author: Patricia Szopinski
Reviews.Content: I have had my Kindle Fire HDX for about a month now and I love it! Right out of the box it is very easy to use. It has exceeded my expectations,

Reviews.Title: Nice tablet
Reviews.Author: ggrammab
Reviews.Content: This is a nice tablet to use. However, I ordered mine with advertising and wish I hadn't as it becomes kind of a nuisance after awhile.Other than that, it is easy to setup and use. The 8.9" display is better than the smaller screens. I haven't used some of the features like May Day, and the camera yet, but sure they will be just fine also.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: christine wickelman
Reviews.Content: bought for my husband while recovering from surgery.  he is really enjoying it. He is especially happy with the ability to talk to it and have it write out what he said.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Sharon
Reviews.Content: Wanted one for so long, now that I have it I cannot imagine being without it. It goes with me practically everywhere and takes the place of my desktop for many things. Wouldn't give it up for anything.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Tammy Jean Snider
Reviews.Content: This is the best gift l have ever received in a long time. I like how easy it is s to play with to work on. Thank!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: My likes and dislike.
Reviews.Author: Darrell G Zimmerman
Reviews.Content: I like the kindle just fine but I wish it had come with a manual. When something costs 400.00 it should have some instructionswith it.

Reviews.Title: Better than anything.
Reviews.Author: wroberthelms "Robert Helms"
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle HDX 64GB reader.  It gives me access to the Kindle book library which is vast and deep.  The free books from Amazon alone is worth the price of a Kindle.  Too good to tell it all.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Andrea Griffith
Reviews.Content: I really like my Kindle Fire HDX. It's a great buy without going broke. I am still learning how to get the most out of my Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire 8.9 HDX 16 gig
Reviews.Author: James M. Blankenship
Reviews.Content: One of the best decisions I ever made this for my wife for Christmas... My only problem is I should have bought two of these. My wife won't let me use it. I programmed it prior to giving it to her on Christmas morning...  she is a big reader and it is just super for her.... Thank You.Amazon................ Jim B.

Reviews.Title: Awesome buy
Reviews.Author: Cathy J. Mcknelly "Mrs. McK"
Reviews.Content: Love this!!!!!!  I have a lap top but I don't use it anymore except to write long word documents and that's because I am a math teacher and I need equation editor.  I love the fact that I can check my emails, search the web, and best of all - read a book on it.  Wonderful ---- that's all I have to say.  Buy it.  Forget Apple! :-)  and I have an apple 4S phone.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9", HDX Display, Wi-Fi, 16 GB - Includes Special Offers
Reviews.Author: Lynn Timko
Reviews.Content: I Love this size kindle. I like the 2 way camera. The Primetime features, the things you can add to it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!!!!
Reviews.Author: arnold ferral
Reviews.Content: everything is great about it one thing that does bother me is the ads when are they going to get rid of those sure would like to put my own background on the lock screen

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Carmela Marino
Reviews.Content: Convenient, lightweight.  Just a little slower than I expected. I would suggest purchasing a separate keyboardThe live help is amazing.

Reviews.Title: Love everything about it.
Reviews.Author: George W Wheatley Jr
Reviews.Content: Very simple to get it up and running. Very impressed with clarity of screen and ease of operation. Received product within 2 days of purchase, just in time to surprise my wife for Christmas. She absolutely loves it. Great product and great service.

Reviews.Title: Great when compairing to the original Fire.
Reviews.Author: Rager "~Rager"
Reviews.Content: If I could give it 4.5 stars I would. Everything is great just wish the battery would last a little longer sometimes, it's not terrible but to last a little longer would be nice.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Thomas P. Banas
Reviews.Content: I like it! But I don't know or understand what I get with "Prime?" I thought I got to stream movies for free? Whenever I look for movies to watch but they all seem to cost something and I don't understand apps either. Are they costing me money as well? Also, how can I delete some apps I thought I wanted or needed but really I did not? Not much information was sent along with my Kindle Fire and some things are rather confusing. Thanks, but it is a nice product and I do use it almost daily.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING
Reviews.Author: cmiras0323
Reviews.Content: The kindle fire HD is fantastic. It takes beautiful pictures and the display is incredible. Its very lightweight and can do everything you expect from a top of the line tablet. Made the perfect xmas gift. Love it! Highly recommend to kindle users in need of an upgrade.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Kathy Liviingston
Reviews.Content: Love it! Still working on smoothing out some of the functions but getting there. Met all of my expectations and more.

Reviews.Title: Bought to Replace Wife's Laptop and makes a great educational tool also.
Reviews.Author: Bobby Deckard
Reviews.Content: I bought the Kindle Fire HDX for my wife to replace her laptop that was starting to go out after three years. She loves it. The download speeds are quick and the picture on it is amazing. The operating system was no problem because she was already familiar with the Android system thanks to her phone. She takes it with her when my daughter is at practice which before, with her laptop, would have been too cumbersome. If she is using her Kindle and she needs to do something, she simply (and easily) sets it to the side, goes about her task and easily returns to where she left off. The size is ideal and she doesn't worry about the "leg burn" you can get from a laptop sitting on your legs. The battery life is perfect and she takes it with her everywhere she goes. The portability is miles ahead of where a traditional laptop would be. And there is an app for just about everything you might want to do.She also uses her Kindle as an educational tool for some of the children she looks after. The app store has a multitude of educational apps that she has downloaded and uses with younger children to help them learn to read and to improve their math scores. Every day she seems to find a way to incorporate her Kindle Fire HDX in a new way.I am more than pleased with having made this purchase and somewhat surprised how much she uses it in a variety of ways. Also glad I went with the larger screen.

Reviews.Title: Grandsons
Reviews.Author: Naha "honey dew"
Reviews.Content: I purchased these for my grandsons in California. They love playing games on it and they share the kindle with each other which is nice.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth  Follis
Reviews.Content: This kindle fire is amazing.  I got it mainly to read books, but have found many other uses for it.  I plan to take it on an upcoming plane trip and watch a movie during the flight.  It's wonderful.  I have used the help button several times and the person answered my questions every time.  The people who answer the help feature are so nice, patient, and very knowledgeable. I would recommend this to anyone who is shopping for a tablet.

Reviews.Title: wife
Reviews.Author: Don Verran
Reviews.Content: my wife loves it , it was her birthday present, love you hun. thank you very much good product. the end.

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Julia L. Witt "Doll Crazy"
Reviews.Content: I thought I loved my first Kindle but the Fire HDX makes the experience so much more.  I have watch my first Instant Video and am hooked.

Reviews.Title: Best thing ever!
Reviews.Author: LAURA WAICUL
Reviews.Content: I am an extreme reader, 3 or 4 books a week.  Mainly got the Kindle because my laptop died and I wanted something to use for Internet, Facebook etc.  Wasn't sure I would really like reading books on it so I downloaded one for free and I am hooked! So easy to use, beautiful visual display, I have access to all my apps that I use on a regular basis.  I also got a cover and stylus pen to use with it,  Best investment I have ever made.

Reviews.Title: I Love it!
Reviews.Author: Lisa G.
Reviews.Content: This is my second Kindle. I really love this one because not only is it an e-reader it has wonderful capabilities. I totally recommend this Kindle.

Reviews.Title: great entertainment
Reviews.Author: sandra griffin
Reviews.Content: I use the kindle everyday for reading, playing, and internet use. Easy to use and very entertaining.  Would recommend it to friends and family.

Reviews.Title: Great playtime tablet, but all around purposes, not so much...
Reviews.Author: David Shields
Reviews.Content: Great product for the price, but it is limited by the available apps. No Salesforce1 is a major inconvenience preventing me from using this on a daily basis. In fact it seems I will have to buy another tablet for work. On vacation, however, it will the be tablet of choice.

Reviews.Title: I <3 IT!
Reviews.Author: Kyle Fischer
Reviews.Content: Easy shopping fast fast fast delivery and the perfect product. I will recommend this to anyone and every one that enjoys reading.

Reviews.Title: Kindle rating
Reviews.Author: Pattie
Reviews.Content: I have enjoyed being able to play solitare away from the computer and to read a book.  I can put down the kindle book and open it to the nexxt chapter with out finding a bookmark.

Reviews.Title: pretty good
Reviews.Author: Stephanie
Reviews.Content: Pretty good I just wish you received more for your money for $79 for annual cost. I'm not sure the Amazon prime is worth it.

Reviews.Title: Best ever!
Reviews.Author: P.A.W.
Reviews.Content: This is my fourth Kindle and have enjoyed all. I like the updates and I am so happy with the front facing camera. Love it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: bear
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift to replace the original Kindle. The new HDX is a vast improvement. Why is the cover so heavy? The unit is light and very thin. The heavy cover takes away the advantage of light weight.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: LEP
Reviews.Content: just what I expected and more. Got it and could not put it down, Mayday also great help when help is needed

Reviews.Title: My favorite device
Reviews.Author: Bob Conger
Reviews.Content: Exactly what it is advertised to be. The best. As a bibliophile with 2000 books, 500 of which are leather bound, I never thought I would go for an e-reader. Then I discovered the 1st edition Kindle. Being able to carry an entire library in my hand instead of utilizing an entire room is life changing. And the convenience of an instant dictionary is outstanding. Then, a small stroke and greatly diminished vision brought me to the HD. I still love my books, the way they feel, the way they smell, the way they look...just can't read them anymore. The HD allows me to read without skipping a beat. And with the 4G? We use it all the time on our travels. The best device since the PC...

Reviews.Title: Super case I hope it extends my Kindle's life by many years
Reviews.Author: Terry Cooperrider
Reviews.Content: The case was made to fit the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 and with this case the Kindle travels with all the time!Tip let the case warm up before installing, it goes on so much easier.The case has not interfered in any way with the operation  of the Kindle

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I rarely use. my laptop anymore.  This will be especially great when travelling. I had a friend visiting from out of town when I got my Kindle Fire and she ordered one immediately.

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Diana
Reviews.Content: Hubby got this as a Christmas gift, the best part he says that the likes talking to the help person

Reviews.Title: LOVE my Kindle
Reviews.Author: gzusisawesome
Reviews.Content: The Only thing I could add here is I wish Amazon would add The Blackboard Troy University App to their app store since I use my kindle mainly for school. otherwise A++ also love the mayday feature

Reviews.Title: HOW TO USE A NEW KINDLE
Reviews.Author: SCARLET
Reviews.Content: Just getting use to it. I m still having a little trouble with the added features. I have one of the first kindles and loved it except it had no lite.

Reviews.Title: I'm impressed
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: My first kindle. Very easy to use and so handy to find books that you really want to read. All the features are excellent and easy to use. I'm 63 years old and this almost makes  me feel as technologically advanced as my grandchildren

Reviews.Title: The Best Yet
Reviews.Author: JFS
Reviews.Content: A superior product in every way! The color is excellent . Could use a little more instructions for the first timer.

Reviews.Title: I love it.
Reviews.Author: Bill Duke
Reviews.Content: I had a Kindle white and really liked it.  This new one is fantastic.  Wish texting was easier.I recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Linda Ptacnik
Reviews.Content: Everything I expected - takes great pictures that are so easy to share!  Would recommend to my family and friends.

Reviews.Title: Quick and easy to use.
Reviews.Author: Phil
Reviews.Content: Wish it had a flash player. The experimental version seems to work sporadically.  While still learning which apps are best, I often use this instead of firing up the laptop.

Reviews.Title: Crystal clear display and easy to use!
Reviews.Author: Sandra Taylor
Reviews.Content: Gave to my husband for Christmas and he loves it.  He had worn out the first version of his Kindle.  Compact and easy to carry with him, it was easy to transition from the earlier version and easy for him to change his books over too.  He has been very happy with his gift.

Reviews.Title: 5stars for sure
Reviews.Author: Candy
Reviews.Content: Just love it! The size,speed,sound and clarity. Watching movies is easy. Searching the web is great. Things are working so well I haven't even had to try May day yet.

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle!
Reviews.Author: Jessica O'Donnell
Reviews.Content: Love my Kindle. It has been everything I've wanted it to be. Very slim and easy to toss in my bag when I leave for the day.

Reviews.Title: great value
Reviews.Author: Gerald Stouffer
Reviews.Content: Purchased this as a replacement for my original kindle that was stolen. Great color, easy to read in any light, lots of apps. Glad I was "forced" to make this purchase

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: ROBERT L HENDERSON
Reviews.Content: The features of the Kindle Fire HDX rival those of the best tablets out there and best of all it's a lot less expensive. Online help with May Day at your finger tips just another added bonus.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" Love It!
Reviews.Author: SJ
Reviews.Content: Just love this new Kindle! Love the new Mayday! I really liked my 1st Generation Kindle, but this one is over the top!

Reviews.Title: heads up
Reviews.Author: ronald bunt
Reviews.Content: Haven't spent as much time as I would like with it but seems easy to use and that was my goul

Reviews.Title: So much you can do.
Reviews.Author: Edward Tomicich
Reviews.Content: I was surprised to find out how much I could do withthe Kindle  HDX 8 9'  .It's like an extension to my PC.It will be with me everytime I travel.

Reviews.Title: must have!!
Reviews.Author: Vicki Shaffer
Reviews.Content: Love it, my son uses it at school, I get to play when he's not looking!!!  Must have and Great price!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent tablet for any needs
Reviews.Author: Nemico Allgier
Reviews.Content: It's so easy to use! The picture is amazing for movies and games. Can't live without my kindle fire HDX, I use it everyday.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase love the bigger screen
Reviews.Author: Nancy H
Reviews.Content: Own original kindle fire 7". This is like night & day. All my games are so much more fun & entertaining.

Reviews.Title: a good investment
Reviews.Author: J. Daniels
Reviews.Content: this is everything I hoped it would be.  The screen is so crisp and clear, making it fun to play games, read, watch movies.  I really wanted to be able to watch a movie outside on the patio.  I can't do it very well with my Kindle Fire second gen.  The picture quality is nowhere near good enough and the glare on the screen glass interferes with my view.  There is still some glare on the HDX but not as much, and the quality of the picture itself is so sharp, making it viewable in spite of the glare.The only issue I would have with this item so far is that I notice that sometimes the picture dims a little while I'm playing a game.  It's noticeable mostly at night when the lighting around me is low.  A bit annoying.

Reviews.Title: GREAT!!
Reviews.Author: Jean Kritschgau
Reviews.Content: Love it!!!Easy to use,I take it everywhere,seldom use my computer anymore.What else can I say, This is my 3rd Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Ginny D. Nowak
Reviews.Content: This is the best, does everything! Take it everywhere and can't put it down. If you are thinking of getting one, do it.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire 8.9 hdx
Reviews.Author: Janet
Reviews.Content: THIS IS MY THIRD KINDLE. LOVE WORKING WITH AMAZON. I HAVE TRIED THE APPLE IPAD AND RETURNED IT, BECAUSE CUSTOMER SERVICE WAS LACKING IN MANY WAYS.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Christine Reynolds
Reviews.Content: I use to own a the first kindle that came out, and I must say compare it to the kindle fire, the kindle fire is the best tablet that I have. I love the 8.9 screen it is like wow this is big and a very nice picture.But all and all I would tell any of my friends that the kindle fire is the best purchase for there money.

Reviews.Title: I am  a great fan of kindle and so there are no disputes on them we have 3 in our home !
Reviews.Author: Dr Carmen Otalora
Reviews.Content: I am  a great fan of kindle and so there are no disputes on them we have 3 in our home !, my grand children love their games I love my books and I can go from down stairs to up without my kindle because it syncronizes  my books pages it is great!!!

Reviews.Title: Great product.
Reviews.Author: L. Buechler
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my wife for Christmas and she doesn't put it down - which is a problem b/c I'd like to play with it too!  Excellent product and it works like a charm.  Best display screen I think I've seen.  This is the third Kindle product I've ordered.

Reviews.Title: love my new kindle
Reviews.Author: Avid Redhead Reader
Reviews.Content: Clear, easy to read and handle, fits in most purses, great pictures! Wish I had received sooner. Thanks to hubby

Reviews.Title: It's Great
Reviews.Author: TM
Reviews.Content: I really looked around and considered several tablets. After speaking to several people I got the Kindle.I am very happy with it. It is fast, reliable and the picture is awesome.

Reviews.Title: A Pleased User
Reviews.Author: Katie
Reviews.Content: My only problem with my new Kindle is that it is a little too big for my purse.  However my Kindle Touch goes with me easily, and I have something to look forward to when I come home.  I use my Amazon Prime movies on the Kindle Fire while I'm exercising, and it makes the workout go much more quickly.  When I travel with a friend, I can use my Kindle Fire when there is only one tv for us to share.  It is very convenient to check my email, and the picture quality is exceptional.  I haven't used all of the features, for example the camera.  I don't skype, and I haven't had a reason to take pictures on the kindle.  I did try it out, and it worked.

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: Karen Battista
Reviews.Content: There are so many things you can do with this Kindle and the viewing quality is great.  My only problem is that I want to spend too much time on it!  Would highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great device!
Reviews.Author: Suki Stevens
Reviews.Content: Can't stop my grand-daughter from playing her games! And for me beats going to the library some of time. I'd recommend this device to all my family and friends. Thanks Amazon!!!!

Reviews.Title: Easy to learn
Reviews.Author: Diane Ezero
Reviews.Content: Lovw the Kindle fire HDX.  Very easy to learn and of course the new feature of the help person is very nice....

Reviews.Title: 4th kindle and they are better every time
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Great resolution, easy user interface compared to last kindle fire.Love it!Got the wifi and verizon connection which is great compared to wifi only on the last one.  Can get what I want anywhere.

Reviews.Title: kindle hdx 8.9 rocks
Reviews.Author: Kathleen
Reviews.Content: Love love it.....I found that this product has been very useful to me, kindle fire HDX  8.9 rocks....thank you Amazon

Reviews.Title: The best device ever!
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: l have the kindle fire, so I wanted the HDX.I really like it better than my computer & labtop that I also have.

Reviews.Title: NICE TABLET
Reviews.Author: Xin Liang
Reviews.Content: The delivery was so fast. This is a nice tablet especially because of the high definition of the screen. I'm really into it. However, it does not last as long as iPad Air in terms of the battery. Anyway, I'm still recommending it to you because overall it is still fantastic!

Reviews.Title: Reading a book?  This goes UP so many levels...
Reviews.Author: Michelangelo Jack
Reviews.Content: From the moment I recharged this amazingly slim e-tablet and switched iton, I was impressed with the brilliant colours and clarity of the screen.  Soeasy to Register, adjust the date/time zone and load up the Flightradar24program, up and running within a very short time.  Downloaded a book frommy computer main Kindle Library in seconds, no fuss and now reading abook just got that so much more exciting, all over again.  Thanks Amazon.From time of order, it was in my hands in New Zealand in three days.Now, I wonder why I cannot order the protection cover/case?  For some reasonAmazon will not ship to NZ?  What is that about?

Reviews.Title: From laptops and hard back books, to HDX!
Reviews.Author: buckIinTX
Reviews.Content: I was totally against owning a tablet until I used a friend's kindle. After that, I had to own one. The rest is history! Great investment.

Reviews.Title: Wow! What a Kindle
Reviews.Author: David J. Crosby
Reviews.Content: This thing is really something. I think I like this one better than my old keyboard kindle, which is still holding my 90 some books. it is without a doubt far better than my HD which did not perform that well on a cruise in Australia.  The video is incredible and the speed is up way there.  Well worth the money.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: newmom15
Reviews.Content: Kindle fire is great. Light weight and bright screen! Battery holds charge and last long. Would definitely recommend it to others!!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Diane M. Davis
Reviews.Content: Was exactly what I wanted and the price was well worth it, it opened a whole new world for me

Reviews.Title: purchased for my wife as a valentines present
Reviews.Author: Pistol Pete
Reviews.Content: it is registered in her name now.  She loves it.  Only problem is, she had games on my kindle firethat were keeping score in my name, and when she registered her new HDX she had to startall over again.

Reviews.Title: highly recommend
Reviews.Author: Lori Freer
Reviews.Content: Had two other tablets that had issues.  This is easy to use a perfect size and I love it.  I take it everywhere.

Reviews.Title: Kindle FIre 8.9
Reviews.Author: Karen Brandt
Reviews.Content: I love the Kindle Fire.  THis is the 6th kindle fire that I have purchased.  You could say I am Kindle POOR!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Tracie Thomas
Reviews.Content: The Kindle  Fire HDX 8.9 was a gift from my husband and I absolutely love it. It's easy to use and the screen resolution is amazing. It's great for viewing images and watching videos with my granddaughter. I had originally thought I wanted a Surface, but as a loyal Amazon customer the choice was actually an easy one. It's fast loading and I have no hesitation recommending the kindle fire to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I love this kindle. it works for just what I need which is the internet and my kindle books. I'm sure it does way more than I know how to do but I just mainly use it to read on.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Thomas Keane
Reviews.Content: I am so impressed with the Kindle Fire HDX.  I have been looking and comparing similar products for more than a year.  I have an ipad and it  OK for some of the applications that I use.  Kndle leaves the ipad and Nook in the dust when comparing the full pontential of each.  I am very pleaed with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: Arilisa Heredia
Reviews.Content: My only real criticism is it's lack of customization.  I'd like to add my own lock screen wallpaper and control what pops up in the carousel.  Aside from this though, I am in love with my kindle!  I would definitely recommend it to anyone who loves reading!

Reviews.Title: BEATS ANY TABLET OUT THERE
Reviews.Author: alzera morrison
Reviews.Content: It's the best electronic of its kind.  The mayday feature is awesome!!! To think if I need help I don't ever have to hear again, "due to high call volume your call will be answered in 1 hour."!!!!! Awesome!!!

Reviews.Title: Enjoy very much
Reviews.Author: Judy Pfeiffer
Reviews.Content: I like the larger screen, I can take pictures. The picture is so much clearer. I t is not as heavy as my kindle fire.

Reviews.Title: We love this tablet!
Reviews.Author: Budge
Reviews.Content: After having this tablet for less than a week, both of my kids fight over who gets to use this new Kindle Fire instead of our iPad.  It's really fast and the picture quality is amazing.  And best of all...NO ITUNES!  I was a little concerned before buying this about not having access to Google Apps.  However, most apps were available through the Amazon App store.  Other things, like Google Maps, was available in it's full version using the Silk browser, which is really fast as well.  And if you really need an app you can't find in the Amazon App store, there are simple ways to get your apps from Google without needing to root your device.  Just search online...it's really easy.The only thing this tablet is missing that I can find is the lack of a GPS.  But for $170 less than an iPad, and for a faster processor and better display than almost any other tablet on the market, I can live without a GPS.  For the record, we are streaming videos to the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 and an iPad at the same time using the Corsair Voyager Air.  It works flawlessly on both devices.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Hardware. Wish...
Reviews.Author: Roberto Fonseca
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HDX is an excellent tablet. No doubt. FireOS 3.1 is also very polished OS. When tying it onto the Prime membership, it makes it a winning combination. There are a few reasons why I can't give 5 stars to this Kindle:1. No Google integration - Yes, I know what everyone else will say. If you really want that you should've bought either Google hardware or go with Samsung, etc. Sure, you're right. But no, that doesn't mean Google integration should not be part of the package. What happened if Google decided not to support any Amazon app (and just removed them all from Play store)? I wish Amazon would just allow Google apps in and let the market decide who they want to go with. Again, this hardware is just plain beautiful.2. Problem with speakers - Within the first few weeks I had a problem with speakers where they just stopped working.After reaching out to Mayday (awesome service, Amazon!) the service person suggested that I would insert/remove headphone jack and see if that would fix the issue. It did immediately. The person went on to say that it was a known issue and product development was working on it. I just wish there was some communication/fix on the issue already.Overall this is a great device. I am still enjoying it very much and look forward to updates to the ecosystem. I hope Amazon continues developing both software and hardware.

Reviews.Title: Stunning pics! Gotta have more Apps!!!
Reviews.Author: Gilda M. Kantey
Reviews.Content: Love it. Pics are amazing. Need more apps and compatibility with other systems. I do love it though and would recommend but with the app and compatibility caveat.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Love IT
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: This is a great device, especially for kids with all the controls that are available.  Love mine and would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Mail Program
Reviews.Author: James Cohen, D.D.S.
Reviews.Content: The unit is outstanding in all ways except for the email app provided. There is no mass delete selection that I can find and I spent time with Mayday and he couldn't find it either. Together we downloaded another mail app that wasn't as nice and didn't work as well but did have mass delete. I removed it from my device. The mail program app on my old Firefox was idea. Take a look at it and improve the new device's mail program. Thanks,

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: I have had the kindle for two months now and I absolutely love it I can watch videos, listen to music, play games, read books and many other things pretty much anytime I have some free time.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Kindle Fire Tablet
Reviews.Author: What`s Up With This?
Reviews.Content: This tablet does everything you need and is even faster.  This is lighter than other tablets and it is sturdy and durable

Reviews.Title: Amazing price for so much.
Reviews.Author: CInzia
Reviews.Content: For the price the quality is amazing! I watch all my programs and carry tons of books and photos.  Love it!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Francis R. Kwiatkowski "Mist-turi"
Reviews.Content: I had the original Fire and was quite happy with it, but this is a huge step up. Only a month and I wonder how I ever lived without it.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!!!
Reviews.Author: Rowanslife
Reviews.Content: It is so easy to use, clear to read, does everything I want and the help button is awesome. I have used it a couple of times and the customer service reps who "pop up" on my Fire have all been amazing, knowledgeable and easily took over my screen and showed me what to do, just like Kindle claims it will!  Not being a "techie" it is worth it just for that!  Hours of frustration have been eliminated.And the built in camera takes great pictures.  I synced it with my phone and computer and to my surprise my picture albums magically showed up on the Kindle.I also love its intuitiveness in suggesting items for me in the various areas I usually shop.  It has been very helpful and saves me time in just blindly researching for something. So far it has done a good job with its suggestions.Since I got the one which includes special offers I will admit I worried it would become a problem but it isn't.  They are there but they really are not all that intrusive. I also only got Wi-Fi since I do not travel, am retired and rarely have it someplace that does not offer free Wi-Fi these days so really had no need for one with a data package.  I got the best buy I could possibly have gotten on the budget I had. I do not regret it at all.I feel like a kid in a candy store.  Would HIGHLY recommend the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" in any of its versions and if you have a budget like mine but want the best out there, the Wi-Fi 16GB with special offers really fits the bill.

Reviews.Title: My favorite of my three Kindles...
Reviews.Author: Old Santa Lover
Reviews.Content: My first two Kindles were gifts and I've enjoyed each of them; I play games on my first one and read a LOT on my Paperwhite.  I'd been looking at the 'Fire for months to use as a tablet to do more on, and, a good friend gave me gift cards for Christmas; I decided the gifts were a good "sign" that I should make my purchase.  My 'Fire came on time and was well-packaged and is easy for me to use.  Not being very technically (sp?) oriented, I was a little concerned I wouldn't know how to use it.  So far, I've figured things out as a I go and I'm doing really well (for me) and use it every day.  I've not, yet, had to use the help feature but know it's there if/when I need it.  The bright colors and large viewing area are wonderful.  I would like for it to hold a charge longer than it does but hope Amazon is working on that issue.  I would recommend it for anyone who wants a, relatively, tether free tablet.

Reviews.Title: Love this kindle!
Reviews.Author: Kelli Bourassa
Reviews.Content: I love everything about my kindle. The display is beautiful, extremely easy to use and the battery life really impresses me. Best birthday gift ever.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Judith C. Dannenberg
Reviews.Content: This purchase is perfect for me since I am NOT a computer whiz and didn't like the other tablet styles nor did I want a laptop computer.  I am still learning all that it has to offer but at my own pace and the "MAYDAY" Technical Support people have been great with my numerous questions.  Love it!!

Reviews.Title: This is great!
Reviews.Author: Barry.S
Reviews.Content: The HDX is faster than the Fire HD and the 8.9 is much easier to read than the 7". I also think the Kindle has more features than an Android tablet; especially for book readers.

Reviews.Title: The kindle is great
Reviews.Author: sylvester stewart
Reviews.Content: It has excellent resolution the internet is quick the screen is big so it's easy to type it's super light so it makes easy traveling

Reviews.Title: Kindle FireHDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Ladybug T "A Reading Ladybug"
Reviews.Content: For all of those Kindle fans, this is the best piece of electronics I have ever had.  The resolution is great ! the features are easy to achieve, and it is great for reading as well.I would reccomend this to anyone that lokesthe NEW electronics to BUY this ! you won't be sorry.Ladybug 51

Reviews.Title: This is the tablet
Reviews.Author: Bryan Moorman
Reviews.Content: You have probably looked around at many and heard many arguments for many devices, but you needn't look further. For casual home entertainment and productivity usage this is the tablet.especially if you already have and use Amazon Prime and its various features.It would only get 3 stars for a business application though. No external memory port (shades of Apple).

Reviews.Title: I love it !!!
Reviews.Author: Ymustuhate "ymustuhate"
Reviews.Content: I fell in love with my kindle fire hd 7" 2-years ago.... Everything I need in the palm of my hand that wasn't my phone. This year I decided to upgrade and I'm head over heels..

Reviews.Title: my new kindle
Reviews.Author: MONICA RIDGEWAY
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle. Could use work on accessing more websites, and handling multiple open tabs. Other than that, it's perfect.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: bubbastar
Reviews.Content: My new best bud!! unfortunately my original Kindle  doesnt get as much attention now.Love it and love the graphics and  clarity.Camera is awesome..better than my sisters I-Pad ! Price was great..all in all a very good purchase!

Reviews.Title: Love, love, love
Reviews.Author: Linda Basilick
Reviews.Content: I am not computer expert (by far) so when I say it's easy to use, it's easy to use.  The camera is fantastic.  This is the only device I will take pictures with.  The more I use it the more I find features that I love.  Like being able to delete multiple pictures with one click or sending multiple pictures via email.  I've used the Mayday function and it was just fantastic.  Bravo Amazon!

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Michelle Giese
Reviews.Content: Love this! So many possibilities for the Kindle to keep one busy. The only draw back it has a tendency to freeze when your using it. You have to turn it off then back on.

Reviews.Title: best book reader ever!
Reviews.Author: BH
Reviews.Content: Best book reader ever!  That's been 90% of my use so far, but something I really wasn't expecting. I'm still getting used to tablet limitations and even using it rather than the laptop.  Also love how light it is. Didnt think it would replace my keyboard kindle, but it has. Glad I made this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Loveit!
Reviews.Author: Elane
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet but my second kindle. I love it for both purposes. I would recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: A very nice pad
Reviews.Author: Kindle reader
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HDX is a joy to use.  It's lighter and about half the thickness of my wife's iPad.  The quad-core processor makes everything fast.  Screen resolution is very sharp.  I like the home screen and the presentation of frequently used apps.  I am very pleased with the purchase.  One a side note, the Send to Kindle software on my PC is very useful to send documents to the Kindle for my schoolwork.

Reviews.Title: It's a nice step up
Reviews.Author: Rashelley "rashelley the reader"
Reviews.Content: I love it.  It's more responsive, gives much better information as you are reading, easier to make changes in format.  I love the help chat option.  Only problem is this one freezes and it's quite a challenge to get the pages to move.  I've mastered it, but it never happened on earlier, simpler models.  I do recommend it though.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fir HDX
Reviews.Author: Nancy Matthie "ravenous reader"
Reviews.Content: This is my 4th Kindle.  The first one had a small problem, so it was returned for a new one.  Those were the large Kindles, before Kindle Fire came out.  I still use that one at home for reading for long stretches...large screen.  My third Kindle is a Kindle Fire, which I can stick in my purse for taking to appointments, or when I travel.  My HDX is perfect for watching movies and videos, which since I subscribed to PRIME, I use very frequently.  Thanks, Amazon!

Reviews.Title: awso.e
Reviews.Author: Patricia J. Matthews
Reviews.Content: It's like a mini computer....this is my 3rd Kindle and I am in love:) office work, movies, tv, music and games. Wow!!!

Reviews.Title: Who needs Mayday?
Reviews.Author: jp! "Brisket City"
Reviews.Content: Flawless, flawless, flawless.  I would imagine many Amazon employees worked overtime on this and they all need to be congratulated for an outstanding product.  I think history will show that Amazon is providing us now with a "golden age" that we are fortunate to have.  Well done.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire  HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Marilyn J. Galambos
Reviews.Content: The best!  It has everything I need .  Fits in my brief case and goes where I go.  It is great!!!@!

Reviews.Title: After the first 24 hours, it appears to be a solid tablet
Reviews.Author: Thomas S.
Reviews.Content: I purchased the 32MB 4G LTE (Verizon) version, and after the first 24 hours I'm very pleased.  Connecting to my WiFi was simple and without problems.  Adding the device to my existing Verizon account did require my calling Verizon's tech support, but that's probably because I live out from town and wasn't getting a strong enough signal.  However, Verizon tech support was very helpful and quickly resolved the problem.  There was also a glitch connecting to my email account on my ISP, but that seems to have been a problem at their end, and has been resolved.  Connecting to my Gmail account was seamless.I've found the frequent complaint of not enough apps (compared to as standard Android) to be a non issue for me.  I've had no problem finding the apps I need and want, or acceptable replacements in cases where the ones I'm use to aren't available.It would be nice if the HDX came with Google maps/navigator installed, but I have that on my phone, so it's not a big issue.  Besides Map Quest maps/navigation is free at the Kindle app store.  It may not be quite up to Google maps, but then again, maybe it is.  I really haven't an opportunity to try it yet.All in all, I'm pleased with my device, and I'm giving it 4 stars only because I've only had it for one day.=======================  Comments added on 2/27/2014 ==================================================I'm now two weeks into owning my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 (Verizon), and I've added another star to my rating to make it a 5-star rating.  I stand by all my comments above, and would like to add that I find the management and use of my Kindle library so much easier with this tablet than with my old (Gen. 3, I think) Kindle.  With this device I get to see the cover of the book I'm reading each time I open it on the carrousel, so I can remember the name of the book I'm reading.  On my old Kindle, I usually only saw the title and author when I first started reading and quickly forgot both (hey, I'm 70 years old).I've installed Waze navigation app, and it works very well - not that I will use my tablet often for navigation, but it's nice to have.Like most, if not all, Android based tablets, it doesn't get as strong a 4G or 3G signal as my Android phone, but I'm usually connected to WiFi, so that's not particularly important to me, which I'm sure begs the question of why did I buy a 4G model to begin with.  The answer is simple - I wanted to.All in all I find the Kindle Fire HDX far superior to my wife's Android tablet, and I'm very pleased with it.  So far, I've found no down side.

Reviews.Title: Excellent, fast with beautiful display
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: I gave the Kindle Fire HDX 4 stars because of not having access to Google Play Store for even more apps. The "plus" is you are allowed to install apps from 3rd parties via a selection in the setting menu. I sometimes have the need to remote in to our servers at work using RDP. I can do that with the Kindle Fire HDX. I tried several RDP apps available through Amazon and the results weren't satisfactory. I got an app from a 3rd party and now I seamlessly access the servers I need to get to and can even access my workstation desktop. I added a bluetooth keyboard and am very happy with my choice of the Kindle. Great video and graphics. As an e-book reader? Perfect!

Reviews.Title: Never Pristine condition.
Reviews.Author: me
Reviews.Content: This is the best Kindle amazon has ever made.  It looks beautiful in the box.  No wear and tear.  Only open use but had bad luck getting to work.  Since it is the best that amazon has ever made I bought it with confidence.  They sure made it sound really like something every one would love.  Guess it was a big mistake to buy.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Linda Lou Neff
Reviews.Content: Very user friendly.  Have had to use help once or twice and it has been a very good experience.  Recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Had a nook, love this one so much more.. Easy to read and just better all the way around. So glad I purchased it.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: C. Gartz "Padigar"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for myself for Christmas and so far have enjoyed learning what all it offers. Once my husband saw how easy it is to maneuver through it, he’s ready to buy one for himself. Love all the deals Amazon offers for Kindle owners.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX - GREAT
Reviews.Author: Betty Furgele
Reviews.Content: Made a mistake - was rating the armorsuit for the kindle fire instead of the kindle fire.  But anyhow I love the Kindle Fire HDX and would recommend it to anyone.  Picture is beautiful, sound great, light weight.  Lighter than the 7" ipad.  Wish now I had gotten the one with the ability to sync to your internet provider.

Reviews.Title: Use it every day.  Love it.
Reviews.Author: Hilary B. Wagner "Hilary"
Reviews.Content: I also have an IPAD and an IPAD mini.  It's about the same size as the IPAD and weighs much less.  The display is the same and it has flash.  What's not to love.  Also, the battery lasts longer.

Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Georgeen M. Ibarra
Reviews.Content: My second kindle and I love it. Great display, easy to read, quick to recharge and so light.  I highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Wendy S Leishman
Reviews.Content: I originally purchased this so my husband could get into this century and learn to use a touchscreen! But now I find myself getting the Kindle whenever I want to look something up online instead of using my laptop. It's the perfect size, not too big not too small. It's fast and responsive. I only locked it up once and it was the game not the unit.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Steven D Spatz
Reviews.Content: Beautiful colors, clear images, very fast processor...This is much better than my IPAD-2 in every way.  I will be traveling with my Kindle Fire instead of my IPAD this year.

Reviews.Title: Fire away
Reviews.Author: Joan Duclow
Reviews.Content: Priced right and far more useful than I expected. I have no problem telling my friends to skip the pricey "big brand" and by a Kindle Fire HDX

Reviews.Title: excellent tab
Reviews.Author: scott d poort
Reviews.Content: Screen res. Fast.ease of use.the only reason not 5 stars is not used to amazon app store.very very good.whats next

Reviews.Title: great. product
Reviews.Author: Babs
Reviews.Content: Very easy to figure out even for the technologically impaired. Crisp picture. Good battery life. Mayday feature is very helpful.

Reviews.Title: Fire HDX is Hot!!
Reviews.Author: Kenneth V. Jack "Ken Jack"
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet or portable device, but my wife has an iPad4.  I found the iPad4 overpriced for my needs and it is heavy compared to the Fire HDX 8.9" tablet.  As most rave about in these reviews, I agree the screen display is superior on the HDX and it is faster.  I suppose there are users that can actually use many of the missing apps that the iPad offers but I can't.I trust Amazon to enhance the Fire HDX as time goes on.  The Flash player or something equivalent would be a great addition.For me, a portable device, like a tablet, will never replace a "real" computer.  I chose the Fire HDX because I'm a big reader of eBooks and I think Amazon has the edge on Apple with regard to the number and price of their eBooks.I have had my HDX for two months and have no complaints;  I recommend this device without reservations.TBlue Moon over Cuba: Aerial Reconnaissance during the Cuban Missile Crisis (General Aviation)

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire 8.9
Reviews.Author: B.JAQUEZ
Reviews.Content: I bought the kindle as a Christmas gift for my husband, it is awesome and way bigger then the one before.Love it and so does my husband.

Reviews.Title: An excellent product
Reviews.Author: Brian Dewhirst "BDewhirst"
Reviews.Content: This is just a great, fun product and with Prime content - you can't beat it.  I would recommend it to anyone you likes music, books, audiobooks and video.

Reviews.Title: Love it fast and easy
Reviews.Author: A. MATO "Ava Maria"
Reviews.Content: Love it everything I expected and more its fast and so easy to use I just love it Thanks Kindle..... Amazon

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Jodi
Reviews.Content: I Just bought my Kindle Fire hdx and am still learning it,  I Love it...I would recommend this to anyone without a problem.

Reviews.Title: More than met expectations
Reviews.Author: lbell
Reviews.Content: I have the first Kindle Fire which I loved, but this one is such an improvement over the first!  It is easier to use, color is better, faster, light weight, thinner, I could go on and on.  Just love it

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: BL
Reviews.Content: AHHH...the kindle fire rocks! Its like a giant iPhone but 10x better. I can do everything on it. Check my emails, watch tv shows, read, etc, etc. So awesome and multifunctional. Basically a mini computer.

Reviews.Title: Like it very much so far.
Reviews.Author: Sharon Hitchcock
Reviews.Content: I would definitely recommend it to anyone.  Although I am still getting acquainted with it, I have already used the Mayday button and found the person to be very helpful.

Reviews.Title: the best...
Reviews.Author: Steven R. Brooks
Reviews.Content: the fastest tablet on the market.  an antutu score of over 30k.  this tablet is light,  i mean feather light weight and the buttons are all ergonomically placed.  a well thought out design with a super processor that is eager to please, even the youth with gaming.

Reviews.Title: The perfect gift
Reviews.Author: Cass County Bob
Reviews.Content: I purchased the HDX 8.9 for my wife for Christmas. It replaces her original Kindle.  She loves it.  It gives her access to the books and other media she wants, and it also works great for internet tasks. We aren't much into streaming media yet, so I can't comment on that.

Reviews.Title: Very nice
Reviews.Author: Betquilts
Reviews.Content: This is a great machine. Light easy to hold if using as an ebook. Very bright screen great colors. Fast and sync is great.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Chuck Abbott
Reviews.Content: I enjoy it very much with the larger screen it has a great display and the live help is fantastic and quick.

Reviews.Title: Everything I expected.
Reviews.Author: Fisher man
Reviews.Content: I had an older Kindle reader (only) previously.  This Fire HDX is amazing to me.  I was worried that the browser would not be very user friendly, but SILK is just fine.  I don't think you can do Favorites and shortcuts like with Internet Explorer, but otherwise it is easy to surf with.  The display is simply awesome, and it is lighter than an iPad.  Not sure if I will ever need 64GB, but I was thinking of storing movies for trips in the car.  I am having a blast playing the free apps like the slot machine games.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Kim Fansler
Reviews.Content: I am so glad I purchased the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9.  I considered some type of tablet, but chose this instead.  I have the original e-reader and 1st generation Kindle Fire, so I was familiar with the Kindle.  So far I have had only one problem with transfering extra packs I had purchased for my grandchildren's games.  Amazon refunded my money and I was able to reload them on my new Kindle.  I have no complaints at all!

Reviews.Title: best tablet ever!!
Reviews.Author: S. Appiah-Kubi
Reviews.Content: I got this tablet as a gift from a friend and it's the best thing I have ever requested! The price is reasonable(I got extra $30 off) and received it in no time. It's simple to use and very lightweight. Sound quality and pictures and perfect. I would suggest people take a second look at this product because really nothing beats it. Go get kindle people!!Good job Amazon. Bravo.

Reviews.Title: Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Mario Lopez
Reviews.Content: Just keeps getting better as well as the features available!So far I own the last 3 models and will continue to purchase them.Perfect for the person who loves to read and does not want to pay for features they do not want or will use!(Maybe it's time to give share the older ones with family/friends in order to introduce them to e-reading?  I am afraid I might not get the tablets back!)

Reviews.Title: recommend
Reviews.Author: linda
Reviews.Content: love the kindle hdx, also purchased the hd.  pricing was ok, more so since the special offer allowed 4 equal payments. use this kindle just as much if not more than my computer

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Rosewicks
Reviews.Content: Fantastic picture, speed and sound.  I like the larger size and it's still lightweight.  Much improved over my older model Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Brenda Mason
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love my Kindle Fire!! Has become my new best friend - I can use for work and for leisure!!

Reviews.Title: Love it, Love it, Love it.
Reviews.Author: J. Taylor "book lover"
Reviews.Content: I didn't think I would like to read on anything like this, but was very pleasantly surprised. The print is large enough to see clearly, and the lighting is very nice. The picture while watching a video is excellent, and the sound isn't bad either. I just wish I could upload a video that I took with it to my computer, there may be a way but I haven't found it yet.

Reviews.Title: loving it
Reviews.Author: mary villella
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd kindle.  Never disappointed. It live up to my expectations.. highly recommend it to anyone who is think I g of buying an iPad.  And kindle are very supportive.

Reviews.Title: Everyone should have one!
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: Received as a present this Christmas to replace my original Kindle and absolutely love it!  Find myself using it much more than a laptop purchased six months ago.

Reviews.Title: Great device
Reviews.Author: Dsaraceni
Reviews.Content: I love my ereaders and its even better when I have many uses for it like a tablet.  Its fast and delivers everything I ask of it.  Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: So Gorgeous
Reviews.Author: douglas fuller
Reviews.Content: Tablet was so pretty wrapped up in it's original plastic I barely wanted to take it out.For such a thin and light tablet it's super powerful and easily one of the best tablets on the market. ONLY thing limiting it from being the very best is the lack of Google Play access but that comes with the territory of a Amazon tablet. But you can sideload the majority of the apps from GP. They may lack the stability of the original app but most work.If you don't mind getting a skinnier access to Android apps and want a strong tablet, this is your guy!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Ree
Reviews.Content: I got this to replace my Kindle fire 7" for Christmas. I'm still trying to figure out all the apps that I can use on it. I do like how light it is without the cover and the battery lasts forever. One thing I was disappointed in and thought was false advertising was that you can't just put what is on your kindle on the TV with a swipe, even though I do have a wireless router and Blue-ray with the wireless connection. I come to find out that we need an adapter that costs another $58 to add to the TV's HDMI. This should have been boldly pointed out in the commercial. I learned about it through the Mayday button. That is one upgrade that I do love over the last Kindle. My husband now uses the "old" Kindle fire.

Reviews.Title: These are nearly PERFECT
Reviews.Author: Vnyrdstar
Reviews.Content: All I can say, is I ended up buying TWO the 7" for my son and then the 8"9 for myself. I know people who have Ipads but why pay more for pretty much the same thing. And, I use Amazon for so much more. I also have a dell xps that doesn't fit into my purse. We are so happy with our Kindles we can read, watch and purchase anything, anywhere we want. We wouldn't be caught without them, and we don't have to. Yeah !!

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: amber anderson
Reviews.Content: I have been enjoying Kindle Fire.  I love how easy it is to use and I have been enjoying reading my books and watching various movies on it.Love the flex pay as well.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful Colors and Easy to Read Books On It
Reviews.Author: visualpurple
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HDX, and I'd recommend it to one and all. It's my favorite toy, my companion book-storage device, similar to my Kindle Paperwhite, but so very much more! Great definition and delicious colors ~ yum! I play my Majong game on it and Solitaire too, and I read, read, read! I use it more at home, and when I have to go out and waiting is involved, my Paperwhite is my choice device. But the colors on the Kindle Fire are unbeatable, and really happy-brain making. I'm very glad I got it, not one regret at all! (I especially love the Mayday option!)

Reviews.Title: best ever
Reviews.Author: PAMELA TUTOR
Reviews.Content: I love this kindle HDX 8.9 I had Samsung galaxy 8.0 this is way better more kid friendly ease of use the best

Reviews.Title: awesome crisp display
Reviews.Author: Toni Keeling
Reviews.Content: I've been able to work on the kindle, the apps are great, it also takes great pictures,with the editing functions , they come out wonderfull

Reviews.Title: LOVE it
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: My kids got me this for Christmas and I absolutely love it.  I had the original version and enjoyed it, but the upgrade is so much better that there is really no comparison.  I have some trouble seeing and the screen is very easy on my eyes.  I have Netflix and like being able to watch movies and Tv shows.  The only negative is some of the games I like to play on Facebook are not available.  At least I am unable to access them.

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: Justina Dismang
Reviews.Content: Great pic on screen. Crystal clear. It's fast and easy to use. Lightweight and easy to hold. Loved it so much I bought my husband one three days later!

Reviews.Title: Worththe $$$!
Reviews.Author: Lacey Barone
Reviews.Content: I like my tablet because I can download games and shows quickly. It also has many educational aspects. I would recommend this tablet to others because it a fun and easy tablet that is affordable!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Lou
Reviews.Content: Still getting use to my new Kindle Fire but so far so good.  I love this Kindle Fire.  I would order this again.

Reviews.Title: great gift. big hit.
Reviews.Author: Paula R.
Reviews.Content: MY GRANDSON LOVED THIS. HASN'T PUT IT DOWN SINCE CHRISTMAS.I'M THE BEST GRANDMA. HE'S READING MORE NOW AND LOVES THE GAMES.

Reviews.Title: The new Kindle Fire is amazing!
Reviews.Author: Robin R.
Reviews.Content: The new Kindle Fire is amazing! It is much lighter than I thought it would be, and the display is simply fabulous. I have never seen such a sharp picture on ANY tablet. It is also very user friendly. I have only had mine since Christmas and am still learning to use it, but I really love my new Kindle! I am still amazed with all its features and capabilities; AMAZON, you have a real winner with this one!!!

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Jackel of Jordan "Jackel of Jordan"
Reviews.Content: It met all my expectations. Do your research as to what you want and this will probably exceed those. Excellent

Reviews.Title: first tablet and I love it
Reviews.Author: Roger A. Bean
Reviews.Content: Lightweight, easy to use, fast downloads; use it now when I travel rather than lugging a p.c.; only "complaint" is it's easy to "fat finger" when you use the keyboard or tap the screen; so should include a stylus

Reviews.Title: Greatest yet!
Reviews.Author: TERRI L JUSTICK
Reviews.Content: Loving this Kindle......have Amazon Prime as well...perfect combo for use!  Would recommend this for anyone looking for a versatile tablet.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Pamzy
Reviews.Content: I love love love this tablet. I purchased this for myself after using an IPad for work. I like this much better than the Ipad.Great to have the the ports. Only prob for me is getting it synced w external keyboard and some downloads. But, suspect that is all me.I would recommend this over the Ipad, Easy to use, haven't tried the visible support but I will surely.Much better price and does more than IPad, alittle smaller which is good!

Reviews.Title: love my kindles
Reviews.Author: Terry L English
Reviews.Content: I'm a kindle fanatic! There is no need to say anything else.  I've purchased the original kindle, the kindle fire(loved the idea of color), and the kindle hdx.  Love them all, and I use all three!

Reviews.Title: Great better then my samsung 10.3
Reviews.Author: Curtis Thomas
Reviews.Content: Love the size, HD display only problem is I can only use Amazon apps. The sound for music and movies is the best.

Reviews.Title: fire hdx 8.9
Reviews.Author: terry pletcher
Reviews.Content: outstanding.  it is eons beyond the first fire and works seamlessly.  my wife is so pleased.  keep up the excellent work.  we have a family that has a number of I pads and the hdx competes well at a much lower cost.

Reviews.Title: Totally Awsome!
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Harp
Reviews.Content: I was betwwen the Kindle Fire and the iPad - I am very glad I bought the Kindle it is amazing!  It is by far the better value for the price.  The picture is outstanding and the speed is great and it is easy to use.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire 8.9
Reviews.Author: Robert Eder
Reviews.Content: Great very easy to use and the screen is the right size to be able to read or play a game or to watch a movie on

Reviews.Title: This was for me and I really like it.
Reviews.Author: Shirley Lehmann
Reviews.Content: I sit in dr.s office quite abit and so thought this would help keep me occupied while I wait for my appt.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Lesley
Reviews.Content: I really do love my kindle but I do wish I could print from it (other than my email) and I wish I was able to play my zumba videos. A lot of downloads consider the kindle as a mobile device and don't allow you to view there sites or videos. But it is very handy and very smart.  I use it a lot for recipes and learning its capabilities more so everyday.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful detail!
Reviews.Author: Diana Quinn
Reviews.Content: Thanks for offering a payment plan, that's the only way I was able to get this. I have two older android tablets that I eventually stopped using because of the need for a stylus. This Kindle Fire is so awesome, the view of my pictures is alone, almost worth the price of admission. My finger just glides through every screen, I finally understand the allure of a tablet. I subtracted one star for everyone's favorite complaint and that is the wish that Amazon figure out a way to work with Google Playstore. Even though I have found some nice apps and even a few android apps, I still want to share all my data with my phone and it's accounts.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This new version is a very lightweight device and my grandkids just love to watch their favorite videos on it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX rating
Reviews.Author: Patty Jenkins
Reviews.Content: I don't like that I cant get adobe flash player and it limits some things I can do on my Kindle. Other than that I love it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" 2013 Edition by Sheila P.
Reviews.Author: Sheila D. Pendergraph
Reviews.Content: I gave this tablet a 5 stars because it's a great tablet and so easy to use once you get the hang of it. Everything is right at your fingertips and does many multiy tasking and the small size comes in handy and fits right in your purse. I got one for Christmas and haven't been able to put it down yet! I like the Kindle better than my PC and would highly recommend this to everyone and the price is right!!

Reviews.Title: Useful and practical
Reviews.Author: P. Hulsey
Reviews.Content: Easy to use. Clear picture. Light weight for reading. Amazon book suggestions and free books. Enlarging icons good for old eyes

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!
Reviews.Author: Brandi Wood
Reviews.Content: It is a great Kindle, but I did return it because I like the size of the 7", so I exchanged it for the newest HD! I use my Kindle more for reading vs as a computer or TV.The clarity was fantastic, camera's were awesome, speed incredible! Price, perfect!!

Reviews.Title: Received Timely and in Great Shape
Reviews.Author: Pat
Reviews.Content: My husband can't put down his Kindle.  He loves it.  It is a great product for avid readers.  Thank you,

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: mike clark
Reviews.Content: Works great but email is too hard to set up by a dummy like me. 5more words are too many.

Reviews.Title: Love it, love it, love it.
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: This is my third Kindle.  They just keep getting better.  If you don't have the tablet habit yet here is where to start!

Reviews.Title: It's a Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Mr. Marcus
Reviews.Content: I've been using the Kindle Fire from it's inception.  It's THE e-reader/tablet of choice for me (and my youngest).  I've got four (4) so far and none disappoint.  Good job Amazon!

Reviews.Title: It's GREAT!
Reviews.Author: Rosalind K. Campbell
Reviews.Content: I upgraded from a NOOK...the Kindle is easy to use and great fun with tons of options.  The user manual is very user friendly...I haven't even had to use the 'panic' button yet.  I will recommend it to all my friends.  It does it all!!!

Reviews.Title: Love my new Kindle Fire!!!!
Reviews.Author: Juanita McIntosh
Reviews.Content: A lot of my family have and have raved about their Kindle Fire so I treated myself to one! Love it! The only thing is I am not tech savvy and wish it had more explicit tutorials on it, but then I went online and found all the explanations I needed!! Very well worth the money I paid for it and Love the fact that my grandchildren can have their own "app" on here so I can limit the time spent on games, etc....

Reviews.Title: KIndle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: We have a total of 5 Kindles, and this one is by far the best yet. My wife uses it, and it has replaced a Kindle Fire. She loves her gadgets, and has really taken to this new one.

Reviews.Title: 1st Tablet
Reviews.Author: Preston
Reviews.Content: As I had never used a tablet, I was intimidated by the thought of learning this new technology.  The May day feature was a big selling point. However, the Fire HAD was so user friendly I haven't had need to use it as much as often as I had imagined.  It is still comforting to know that I can access help instantly. PRESTON

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: Victoria Velasco
Reviews.Content: I love it! I use it everyday for school to study and store my notes. It comes in handy when I do not want to use my laptop.

Reviews.Title: its a ok tablet
Reviews.Author: Matthew Jones
Reviews.Content: Still trying to get use to the tablet haven't rely used its full potential. Have had a couple of stuck moments with the kindle which required a hard reboot. But still trying it out

Reviews.Title: A definitely must-have!
Reviews.Author: Cat Fox
