Reviews.Content: I LOVE it! I had the opportunity to use Mayday (learning curve regarding the dual-facing camera) and it was amazing. Thank you Amazon! This device is a winner!

Reviews.Title: This product is very easy to navigate.
Reviews.Author: D. Winkler
Reviews.Content: I see that the Kindle Fire HDX is cheaper than when  purchased it last month. Is there anyway I can get my purchase revised to reflect this savings? I would really appreciate it.

Reviews.Title: My Kindle
Reviews.Author: Glacia Parkins
Reviews.Content: I love that I have everything I want in this compact little screen and is so visually clear and the color is phenominal. Love it!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Can't hear the sound very well
Reviews.Author: Sandra Marshall "Sandy"
Reviews.Content: I can barely hear the sound even at maximum volume.  I had to get a separate speaker in order to hear it.

Reviews.Title: Stolen Kindle
Reviews.Author: William E Bidel
Reviews.Content: This is a great tablet. It would be extraordinary if Amazon wouldn't force you use THEIR web browser. If they would lift the block on the use of Firefox it would definitely raise the bar on this unit. If my Kindle had not been stolen i could give a more in depth evaluation of mine. I only had it a month.....not enough time to express my appreciation for its capabilities. I did especially like the camera. It did take wonderful pictures, and very quickly. No waiting between shots with high quality images.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous!
Reviews.Author: Pamela Splettstoesser "Pamela"
Reviews.Content: Have the Kindle Fire but wanted the larger display and the connectivity of the 4G while traveling. Absolutely Love it!

Reviews.Title: Kindle
Reviews.Author: Myrtle Brooks
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for our handicap son. He loves it and so does his wife. I guess he has used it from Morning to night.

Reviews.Title: Love my new Kindle Fire HDX!
Reviews.Author: Mary F
Reviews.Content: I love having the bigger screen.  I still use my 7" when I have to recharge the HDX.  What a difference.  I have also used the Mayday button and the people I have talked to are always nice and have answered my questions and found out the answers on things they weren't sure of without putting me on hold.  It's just like talking face to face with a person.  I couldn't be more happy with a product.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Lynne Miller
Reviews.Content: I'm very pleased with the Kindle for games and movies and T.V shows.I spend too much time with it.!!!! That's OK

Reviews.Title: Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: A. Bloom
Reviews.Content: Much improved screen and controls over the Fire HD. The main issue with the tablet is that it gets in the way of being able to download all the apps available in the Google play store.  With some APK program conversions, some of this can be ameliorated but not all the time.  Why not allow full use of all the apps available!

Reviews.Title: The BEST EVER
Reviews.Author: tamika
Reviews.Content: Amazon has sealed the deal I doubt that anything can top the HDX!!!! I love it and the battery life and all it perks.  Its my tablet, ereader, and gaming station all in one

Reviews.Title: Meets all my expectations
Reviews.Author: Richard Stewart
Reviews.Content: When looking for a tablet, Kindle Fire was not at the top of my list, but it does everything I wanted and all the familiarity of my kindle.  Set up was easy and fifteen minutes out of the box I was watching a  basketball game on the Kindle while reading a real dissertation.  Best past was that all my previous kindle books were right there.  Can't wait to explore more...

Reviews.Title: Loving my Kindle
Reviews.Author: D. Bryant
Reviews.Content: I am totally in love with my Kindle and I have not even begun to check out all it has to offer. If I can stop playing Free Flow and Bingo long enough, I can start exploring many of the other wonderful things it has to offer.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Alvin J. Rich
Reviews.Content: Right out of the box, when I turned on my Kindle Fire HDX, 8.9" I was amazed at the vivid colors and the performance of this tablet.It is everything that I had hoped for and much more.A. Rich  1/31/14

Reviews.Title: Best tablet out there!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Monette
Reviews.Content: The picture is possibly the clearest out of any other tablet out there. I get better picture with this than my HD TV.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Gladys Choyke
Reviews.Content: I really should have rated this Kindle Fire about 41/2 stars.  It is easy to use and love the display.

Reviews.Title: I love it.
Reviews.Author: Kathy A. Slagle
Reviews.Content: I got my new Kindle.  Had an older one and was expecting to have ti download everything from the Cloud.  I turned it on the first time and everything was right there.  Have really enjoyed the HD and larger size.  The weight is very manageable, even with a protective case.

Reviews.Title: Love the NEW Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: M. Liebergot
Reviews.Content: This is now my 3rd Kindle Fire.I had originally owned the "7" original and 2nd generation Kindle Fire's.I decided that I wanted to upgrade to the larger screen so I purchased the latest 32GB "8.9" Kindle Fire HDX.While I do love the larger screen size, I have to also say that I was rather impressed at how much thinner the new Kindle Fire HDX was.  And the screen resolution is phenomenal.While some have complained that they can't run non-Kindle Fire apps on it. I have found the opposite, as there are several sites out there that let you load other Android apps and browsers on it, without the need to jail break your unit. As a result I use my Kindle Fire HDX for what it does best, such as watch movies, and listen to music, as well as do work on it as well using office apps and the like.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet at a Reasonable Price
Reviews.Author: Kara
Reviews.Content: I LOVE my kindle fire HDX 8.9. The size is perfect (I'm not a big fan of smaller tablets) and the touch screen is just as responsive as that of an iPad. Although there is a smaller pool of apps to choose from, this is made up for by the capabilities it has regarding purchasing and reading books/magazines (which is what kindles were made for in the first place!). It is especially ideal for the college student who doesn't want to buy huge expensive textbooks to carry around. If you are looking for a tablet to replace your printed books/magazines and that has all the capabilities of an iPad for a great price, I would definitely recommend this product!

Reviews.Title: Absolutely love it.
Reviews.Author: Terry Brooks fan
Reviews.Content: I had been borrowing my husband,s IPad and I have the Kindle DX with the keyboard at the bottom. My Kindle started doing some crazy things, rebooting itself when I was reading a book, refusing to go online when I wanted to access the store, so I thought it was time for an upgrade.  I first considered the Kindle Fire because I already had a Kindle but after the commercial on TV, I had to have one.  Best decision I made.  Easy to use, beautiful screen quality.  I didn't even know it works the same as any tablet so researching things online has been great.

Reviews.Title: i love it!
Reviews.Author: wolfmoon
Reviews.Content: Was the best Christmas gift. My daughter was glad I got the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 too, because she got my Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Ronda
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"  I had the original Kindle Fire and thought it was great.  But this Kindle Fire HDX has far exceeded my expectations.  And my Grandson is loving my old Kindle because it is still working great!!  I highly recommend this tablet!

Reviews.Title: Right choice
Reviews.Author: Janet Pace
Reviews.Content: I have only had the new Kindle for a week, and I am impressed with it so far. I was afraid that the web browser would not work very well, but it has worked great. I took it to my local public library and they helped me get set up to download books and audio books. I have done both and I am happy with the experience. It is easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Stunning Display
Reviews.Author: richk
Reviews.Content: Great tablet. It does everything I require. Ease of use. Silk browser smooth & fast. Only negative is app store which is why I gave 4 stars. There is no reason not to let us use google play for better selection of apps.

Reviews.Title: so far so good, but not too much different from iPad
Reviews.Author: duck
Reviews.Content: I am still getting used to it and learning how to use it.  Love the size, clarity and especially the weight.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire is the best gift ever!
Reviews.Author: linda
Reviews.Content: Just got my kindle and it is amazing. I absolutely love it. My next order will be books and a cover so I can take it everywhere.

Reviews.Title: great for the whole family
Reviews.Author: Lynda Vance
Reviews.Content: We love our kindle.  The whole family uses it. The parental controls are great. We use it from checking emails, playing games to surfing the net.

Reviews.Title: Pro
Reviews.Author: Patty Lovelace
Reviews.Content: Enjoying my Kindle HDX 8.9. Love the camera ability. Power last longer. Like the ability to talk with someone about the return I have on covers because I ordered the wrong size.

Reviews.Title: addictive
Reviews.Author: MagicMadge
Reviews.Content: Love it.  It is replacing my Nook for night time reading and I am saving a lot by not buying new batteries. With all the things that can be done, I'm spending way too much time on it.

Reviews.Title: Love
Reviews.Author: Judy W
Reviews.Content: Love love love love this!!!! I highly recommend this Kindle Fire HDX!!!!  Works like a dream I never leave it at home.

Reviews.Title: For all age groups
Reviews.Author: Hotti Dotti
Reviews.Content: Purchase the item for my 71 year old mother and she loves it. She can't stop talking about it she plays her music games

Reviews.Title: BETTER THAN I HOPED FOR
Reviews.Author: Hermann Weidemann
Reviews.Content: Functioning well, good thought out, many possibilities and nevertheless a quite excellent bookreader. I can hope for many will enjoy this product.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Susan McCrary
Reviews.Content: Excellent product that exceeds my expectations and competes well against the the iPad and other tablets.  A very pleasant surprise!

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx
Reviews.Author: Barbsco002
Reviews.Content: Love my kindle fire.  It works just as well if not better than my husband's I pad.  I can do everything on my kindle that he can on his I pad.

Reviews.Title: Quality and value
Reviews.Author: Alan D Johnson
Reviews.Content: Brilliant screen, easy to use and value price is great combo.  Browsing is quick and easy to read screen and fun to watch movies and shows.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX "Rocks"
Reviews.Author: Richard Gindhart
Reviews.Content: I love my new Kindle. I liked the old one, but the new HDX is faster, brighter and the images are sharper. The camera takes fabulous pictures both from front and back. The Kindle was easy to set up and learn. It was the best Christmas Present ever.

Reviews.Title: Recommended
Reviews.Author: Carol Hope
Reviews.Content: Although I personally returned my item, I do believe that the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" is one of the best tablets on the market. The resolution is AMAZING, the device is very lightweight, the picture and video quality is impeccable. I mean that wholeheartedly especially since I actually sell tablets for a competing store in which I cannot say the same of. My only issues with the device is the general limitations posed due to the fact that only Amazon's market is available. Beyond the vain critique that I cannot customize the wallpaper and lock screen (don't judge me), I purchased this device largely to contain my many music files however all of my eclectic taste was not recognized by Amazon Music and as a result, could not be entered into my library. Additionally, I found Amazon Prime membership slightly overpriced for my college budget, and even in my brief moments as member I dare say options  were limited nonetheless. I was expecting as much mobility as my Android cellular device and unfortunately that is not what I received but I very honestly believe in this product and no matter my result, I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: My New Toy
Reviews.Author: Nancy Mueller
Reviews.Content: I like the size and features and the lightness of the Kindle Fire and it takes the place of our PC when my husband is using the PC.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX--WOW!
Reviews.Author: Ed Hornbeck
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HDX was a gift for the holiday. I gave it a 5 star rating because I am very impressed with the quality. I have started using it by trying out the camera and video. The picture quality is excellent. I have the Wi-Fi set up and am able to use it at work and at home. It is very easy to use. I would recommend it for anyone.

Reviews.Title: 5 stars
Reviews.Author: LeBRON James
Reviews.Content: BEST TABLET EVER! ! ! ! ! ! ! ONly little bit more apps but otherwise movies books web is fast way better than Ipad

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Saramanoo "Sweet Victory"
Reviews.Content: I bought this kindle fire HDX 8.9 last month  it has blown me away!! I can record sharp videos on it web sure is fast I have watched full length movies on it that have HDX quality and areCinema quality music sounds awesome!! Worth the $$$$

Reviews.Title: Everything I expected and then some...
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Beautiful screen; if you are familiar with how to maneuver around a smart phone, this will be a piece of cake; I think the battery charges reasonably fast when using wall charger (I was concerned about this based on reviews I had read); battery seems to last as long or longer than I expect ...haven't officially tested it, but seems to last forever when on airplane mode and only reading with it, while playing games chews through battery life more quickly, it isn't out-of-the-norm for electronic devices; so far no connectivity or downloading issues.  I had been powering it all the way off inbetween uses, even when it was only going to be off a short while. I became concerned about whether this was the right thing to do, searched for the answer online, and found a thread that said no, leave it on standby, even overnight.  I hope in the 2-3 weeks I've been doing this I haven't ruined anything, or shortened its life by doing so.  It would be nice if they had made mention of this in the quick start guide.

Reviews.Title: First tablet and I love this Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: R. Hutton
Reviews.Content: I was somewhat resistant to the thought of a tablet, but now that I've had the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 for about a month, I have to say that I love it.  The screen is amazing.  Images and video are incredibly sharp.  Another thing I love about this Kindle is the speed.  Start up is super fast, the web responds very quickly, YouTube runs smoothly, and every app I've tried works perfectly.  Thanks, Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Wow a great picture
Reviews.Author: Leslie
Reviews.Content: What a surprise I got for Christmas when I received my kindle fire HDX 8.9. It has the most amazing picture and sound.I am not tech savvy but so easy to use.Love getting books and music.

Reviews.Title: Better than I pad air
Reviews.Author: c white
Reviews.Content: Absolutly love it Better than I pad  also have fire hd 8.9. The newcamera on back really makes this one complete

Reviews.Title: Fun Tablet
Reviews.Author: Terry Leishman
Reviews.Content: We have never had a tablet so aren't sure how to rate but we love it.  It is fun and seems easy to use.  It's very light and easy to read.  We love to use it for scriptures and LDS books and the Mormon Channel.  I would recommend this tablet.

Reviews.Title: no flash player
Reviews.Author: burgs6
Reviews.Content: I received as a gift. I really love it. It's simple and very user friendly. Why not give it 5? No flash player. Adobe does not work and it limits the websites you can use. If they fixed that problem it would be a lot better. I haven't found a solution that works for me. But it's great other than that.

Reviews.Title: Spectacular
Reviews.Author: TRTUC
Reviews.Content: You didn't put up enough stars...I would clearly give Kindle Fire HDX a 7 or 8.  This is one of the finest pieces of electronic equipment that I have come across through the "maze" of all that is out there. Beautiful crystal clear images, spectacular sound quality, easy to use, and overall beautifully designed for the user!I usually am not moved to critique products in which I have invested my hard earned dollars, but in this case I am making an exception.  This product is definitely worth the investment.  Oh by the way, if you order one of these instruments be sure to sign up for Amazon Prime membership. Another good investment.Thanks for allowing me to comment.TRTUC

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle
Reviews.Author: marie walker
Reviews.Content: so far so good. only had it for several weeks Like to look at books and play games. Spider solitaire are the best!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Karen Updegraff
Reviews.Content: I use my Kindle HDX everyday.  The only thing I do not like about it is I have issues getting on some of the sites that require adobe flashplayer.  I don't think I should have to purchase this.  The clarity is great and the weight of it is as advertised.  I would definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Love love my kindle.
Reviews.Author: Julie Rettig
Reviews.Content: I love love my new kindle and I haven't even scratched the surface of what I can do with it

Reviews.Title: Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Norma Cooksey "nc"
Reviews.Content: A gift to my husband for Christmas.  He is using it more and enjoying it more.  It does seem to need charging very quickly but this is only a minor inconvenience.  We would like to have received more instructions, an abbreviated manual perhaps, to be able to make use of all its capabilities.  It is a super little tablet!  Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Spoiled
Reviews.Author: Guy Kincaid
Reviews.Content: I chose the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" because of the aversion I have to pay more just because a product has an "I" in the name.  Also it's lighter and has already spoiled me to the ease of getting new books to read.  Can't hardly pick up an actual book anymore.

Reviews.Title: great Christmas gift.
Reviews.Author: Marilee Mcbride
Reviews.Content: I love it the only thing I  have any problem is you can only download certain games, have some on Facebook I would like to have on the kindle.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: John D
Reviews.Content: I have a Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 and it is no contest when it comes to my Kindle it's faster and smoother than even the iPad air I checked into first.

Reviews.Title: The kindle rocks
Reviews.Author: Brandon Reese
Reviews.Content: I love every thing on the kindle it's awesome and also how you get some of the apps . My son loves it.

Reviews.Title: Best Kindle yet
Reviews.Author: luc.3
Reviews.Content: Slim, light, responsive with a fabulous display. No need to use the panic button so far :)Kindle just keeps getting better!

Reviews.Title: I think it is a great product
Reviews.Author: Carl Rizzo
Reviews.Content: I got it for Christmas from my wife and it is the best present.I use it every day and I love it.  It's a great size.  Extremely light and I can easily read the screen.  It is responsive and easy to navigate.  I have watched moves, read books and loaded it with apps.My one disappointment is the mirror display function.  I have a fairly new Samsung TV and I thought I would be able to mirror the screen with no additional hardware and it is not new enough.  It is another $58.00 for the Netgear device to make it work and I am disappointed.  I think it is a little too high.  We have multiple devices in the house and some are Apple  It would be nice to have a device that for that price is compatible with everything.Amazon is usually pretty smart about these things.  The easier they make screen mirroring the more movies people will buy.All in all I am really pleased with the device.  I would recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Russell Klein
Reviews.Content: I really can't say enough about the HDX. Wonderful. I had a Kindle Fire before this that I liked very much. But the HDX is so easy to use and gives me everything that I need. I give it 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous instrument.
Reviews.Author: drdoug3
Reviews.Content: Excellent.  Just excellent. The high definition is very, very good for something this small. Speed is excellent for apps, and the RooCase is just the best.

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire sizzles
Reviews.Author: Pam Amato
Reviews.Content: Love this product.  Convienient to use however a few tasks have been tricky so I only gave it 4 stars.

Reviews.Title: More to Sweden, please.
Reviews.Author: Oskar Lorentzi Wall
Reviews.Content: No form of video downloading/streaming available in Sweden. Word not available, I cant view .docx documents.Audiobooks is wonderful though.

Reviews.Title: Lightweight and works great
Reviews.Author: J. Witoszynski "Vidman"
Reviews.Content: I really like the Fire HDX. It runs apps smoothly and is organized well. And it is really light (I'm glad I got an extra case because I think I would be afraid of dropping it.) Highly recommend it especially if you have a Prime membership.

Reviews.Title: The best Kindle i have ever owned
Reviews.Author: Sonya K. Sallee
Reviews.Content: I love the clarity of the screen.  I love watching movies on the larger screen.  The instant help is great. I take my Kindle everywhere, haven't taken any pics, but that's on the list next.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Nancy A. Shaw
Reviews.Content: LOVE IT!!!! I don't know how I ever did without this!!! Much easier to tote my Kindle with me than to have 3-4 paperback books shoved in my purse!! Sitting at the doctor's, eating lunch, ...can pass the time with my Kindle and absolutely love it. It's the best gift I have ever received!!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Bernice Archer
Reviews.Content: This is amazing and so easy to use.Love it.  I bought it to record dirt races at a track.. works amazing.v

Reviews.Title: It's Great! I love it!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I upgraded from the Fire which I had for 2 years and used it every day. I went to the FireHDX 8.9  for the bigger screen and do not regret it. I have found it just as easy to use and love the larger screen without adding any weight. My only complaint is so far, I have not found a way to delete a page of email messages at one time. This I could do on my fire.It is a great tablet for my uses and would recommend it to anyone who likes to read.

Reviews.Title: Can't live without my Kindle.
Reviews.Author: Leslie Becker
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd Kindle and I absolutely love it. I had a Fire HD 8.9 and was very happy with it but I was excited about the changes they made with the HDX so I just had to have one. The graphics are amazing and I am very happy with the placement of the power and volume buttons. Also, because of the slimmer profile and the lighter weight it is much nicer to hold. I'm already looking forward to the next model upgrade. Thank you Amazon!

Reviews.Title: It was a Christmas gift...
Reviews.Author: Bobbie Jones
Reviews.Content: My husband had bought me a Kindle 3 years ago for Christmas. I had him to take it back because I didn't think I would use it. I'm not a avid reader, but I find my self using this Kindle more and more. I was against the games now I play Candy Crush (ha ha ha).I downloaded the Bible and I list to it and it helps me learn to pronounce words I can't say. Now I get on my treadmill more because now I can listen to my Bible as I walk. I love my Kindle!!!

Reviews.Title: Best source of entertainment I have ever had.
Reviews.Author: Nelda C
Reviews.Content: This was a gift but it is everything you could want in a Kindle and much more.  It is very easy to operate and has great capacity. Love the camera and the ability to download free games and books.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Carol
Reviews.Content: For what I wanted to do with it, it was a good purchase. Also appreciate that more books are sold at a lower price than Nook.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Adella Clark
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a Christmas gift for myself and I love it. I wish I would have bought it sooner.

Reviews.Title: No complaints!
Reviews.Author: Myia
Reviews.Content: It's amazing. My fiancé got my kindle for me for Christmas! I love it!! I take it everywhere with me! No complaints yet.

Reviews.Title: Worth every penny!!!!
Reviews.Author: Marcel Solorzano
Reviews.Content: Great picture.  Easy to set up and use.  Great price.  Lots of apps to choose from.  Great for all ages from Kids to grandparents

Reviews.Title: Very pleased!!
Reviews.Author: Queenie
Reviews.Content: Love it!! Only thing missing is the square reader!! I would like to use a it at work. Bigger screen than the phone.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this when a discount was offered and was surprised with the versatility. I'm. able to play games, read, watch movies/tv and use the internet with speed. Would recommend to others.

Reviews.Title: my best friend!
Reviews.Author: Freddy Arreola
Reviews.Content: Smooth and fast tablet!! Only issue is thAt it does freeze up every once and then. Love the Amazon cloud

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: annie mosley
Reviews.Content: It is a great product. I received it for Christmas and I am learning g to use it. It helps with being semiblind to where I can enlarge to see it better.
